src_text: Taolo ya Dikoduwa Kamora Dikgohola.
tgt_text: Ukuphathwa kwenhlekelele emuva kokuhlasela kwezikhukhula.

src_text: Kabinete lebisitse matshediso bathong bohle ba lahlehetsweng ke beng ka bona dikgoholeng tsa morao tse mpe tse ileng tsa hlasela dibaka tse ngata tsa naha ya rona, haholoholo KwaZulu-Natal..     Sepheo ka tsebahatso ya Maemo Dikoduwa Naha le dithuso tsa boiphediso tse sa tswa tsebahatswa ke Presidente Cyril Ramaphosa ne le ho netefatsa karabelo atlehileng le hlophisehileng makaleng ohle mmuso, ka Setsi sa Taolo ya Naha ya Dikoduwa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lidlulise amazwi enduduzo kubo bonke abantu abashonelwe ngabathandiweyo babo ezikhukhuleni zakamuva ezidale umonakalo owesabekayo ezihlasele izingxenye eziningana zezwe lethu, ikakhulukazi isifundazwe saKwaZulu-Natali..     Ukumenyezelwa kweSimo Senhlekelele Sikazwelonke kanye nezinhlelo zosizo lokungenelela eziphathelene nenhlalo-mnotho yabantu ezimenyezelwe nguMongameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa kamuva nje, bekuhloswe ngakho ukuqinisekisa ukuthathwa kwezinyathelo ezisebenza kahle futhi ezihambelanayo kuzo zonke izinhlaka zikahulumeni, ngokusebenzisa iSizinda Sikazwelonke Sokuphathwa Kwenhlekelele..     Imali eyisigidigidi esisodwa samarandi ehlinzekwe nguhulumeni isetshenziselwa ukulekelela imizamo yokweseka nokuvuselela, ukubuyisela ukuhlinzekwa kwezidingo-ngqangi kanye nokuhlinzeka ngosizo lokunciphisa usizi nenhlupheko kubantu okusho ukuhlinzeka ngokudla, amanzi, indawo yokuhlala, ukuthuthwa kwendle kanye nezingubo zokugqoka..     Seyiqalisiwe kakade inqubo yokwakha kabusha izindawo ezikhahlamezekile njengoba abantu bezwe lakithi bebambene ngezandla ekuzimiseleni kwabo ukulekelela labo abalahlekelwe ngamakhaya abo kanye nempahla yabo.

src_text: Biliyone ya diranta eo mmuso e ntshitseng sebedisetswa ho tshehetsa maiteko dithuso le ho iphumana, ho kgutlisa ditshebeletso tsa motheo le ho phallela ba hlokang ka ho ba thusa ka dijo, metsi, botshabelo, tsa bohlweki le diaparo.
tgt_text: Ezakamuva ngeSifo Segciwane le-Corona (i-COVID-19).

src_text: Motjha wa ho aha botjha dibaka tse amehileng se qadile mme le batho ba naha ya rona ba kopane ka maikemisetso ho thusa ba lahlehetsweng ke bodulo le thepa ya bona..     Tlhahisoleseding ka Lefu laCoronavirus (COVID-19).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lizwakalise ukukhathazeka kwalo ngokudlondlobala kwenani labantu abasuleleka nge-COVID-19 kamuva nje ezingxenyeni ezithile zezwe futhi linxuse abantu bonke ukuba bathathe izinyathelo zokuzinakekela nokuqikelela impilo yabo ukuze bazivikele kuleli gciwane elibulalayo, ikakhulukazi esikhathini sasebusika.

src_text: Kabinete kgathatsehile ka ho eketseha ha morao tjena ha ditshwaetso tsa COVID-19 dikarolong tse ding tsa naha mme ipileditse ho bohle ho nka mehato ya ho itshireletsa kgahlano le vaerase ena kotsi, haholoholo mariha tjena..     Vaerase ena ntse le kotsi mme ho enta ntse le sebetsa se bohlokwa haholo seo re ka itshireletsang ka sona.
tgt_text: Igciwane liselokhu liyingozi esihleli nayo ngaso sonke isikhathi phakathi kwethu futhi ukugonywa kusalokhu kuyisona sikhali sokuzivikela esisebenza kahle kakhulu.

src_text: Kabinete thabiswa ke hore batho ba bangata ba ntse ba kgetha ho enta le tshireletso ya bona ya pele kgahlano le COVID-19 kamora hore dipalopalo tsa morao di bontshe hore batho ba baholo ba fetang dipersente tse mashome mahlano ba se ba entile diprovenseng tse hlano..     Kabinete ipiletsa ho ba so ente ho enta molemong wa ho itshireletsa le beng ka bona.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liyakuthokozela ukukhula kwesibalo sabantu abaqoka ukugonywa njengendlela yokuqala yokuzivikela ku-COVID-19 emuva kokuthi izibalo zakamuva zibonise ukuthi isibalo sabantu abadala asebegonyiwe ezifundazweni ezinhlanu sesikhule saze sayofinyelela enanini eliyingqophamlando elingaphezu kwamaphesenti angama-.

src_text: Bohle re lokela ho tswela pele le ho ikamahanya le melao ya ho itshireletsa ho COVID-19 kenyeletsang ho rwala semonkwana se kwahelang nko le molomo, ho hlapa matsoho ka metsi le sesepa, kapa ho sebedisa sehlwekisi se nang le alcohol ballwang dipersenteng tse 70, le ho arohana le ba bang ka bonnyane mitara..     Thuso Imollang Nakong ya Mathata (SRD).
Kabinete kgothaleditse baahi ba fumanang R350 ya SRDGrant ho etsa dikopo hape, kamora hore ho kenngwe tshebetsong melawana metjha laolang dikopo le ho lokela ha batho ho fumana dithuso.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liyabanxusa labo abangakagonywa ukuthi nabo benze kanjalo ukuze bazivikele futhi bavikele nabathandiweyo babo.

src_text: Dikopo di ka etswa websaeteng ya Setheo sa Dithuso tsa Setjhaba sa Afrika Borwa (SASSA) leng:https://srd.sassa.gov.za/.Mokgwatshebetso wa dikopo butswe ka la 23 Mmesa 2022 mme etswa inthaneteng molemong wa ho potlakisa katleho ya ona..     Thuso ena ya ho imolla bohlokwa haholo malapeng hlokang le ka sulafallwang ke maphelo ka lebaka la bofuma le ho hloka mesebetsi.
tgt_text: Kumele futhi siqhubeke nokulandela yonke imigomo yokuzivikela kwi-COVID-19, kubandakanya ukugqoka isifonyo esimboza kokubili ikhala nomlomo, ukugeza izandla ngamanzi nensipho, noma sisebenzise isibulali-magciwane sezandla esiqukethe i-alcohol engama-70%, futhi sigcine ibanga eliphephile okungenani eliyimitha elilodwa lokuqhelelana phakathi kwethu nabanye abantu emphakathini..     Isibonelelo Sosizo Olubhekiswe Kubantu Abagajwe Wusizi Nenhlupheko (i-SRD).

src_text: Mmuso ikemiseditse ho fana ka dithuso tsa setjhaba hoba hlokang haholo ba kgone ho fumana tseo ba di hlokang tsa motheo..     Polokeho le Tshireletseho.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likhuthaze izakhamuzi ezithola iSibonelelo se-SRD esingama-R350 ukuba zifake izicelo zazo kabusha, kulandela ukwethulwa kwemithethonqubo emisha elawula izicelo kanye nemibandela yokufaneleka kwabantu ukuthola lesi sibonelelo.

src_text: Kabinete tswella le ho nyatsa ho bolawa ka sehloho ha basadi mme ananetse karabelo potlakileng ya mapolesa ha tshwara babelaellwa polaong ya Mofumahatsana Hillary Gardee (28), waKamaguguMpumalanga.
tgt_text: Izicelo zingafakwa kwiwebhusayithi yoPhiko LweziMpesheni Nezibonelelo Zikahulumeni lwaseNingizimu Afrika (i-SASSA): https://srd.sassa.gov.za/.

src_text: Kabinete boetse nyatsitse ho bolawa ha batho ba tsheletseng Khayelitsha, Motsekapa.
tgt_text: Uhlelo lokufaka izicelo lwavulwa mhla zingama-23 kuMbasa 2022 futhi luwuhlelo oluqhutshwa ngobuchwepheshe bedijithali ngokuphelele ukuze kusheshe ukucutshungulwa nokuphothulwa kwezicelo..     Isibonelelo sokuhlinzeka ngosizo siyisibonelelo esisemqoka kakhulu sokubhekelela imindeni entulayo obekungenzeka izithole seyibhuqabhuqwa yisihlava sobubha nokuntuleka kwamathuba omsebenzi.

src_text: Dipolao tsena tse sehloho di re hopotsa hore re lokela ho sebetsa ka matla re le setjhaba ho fedisa dikgoka le dikgoka tsa bong le polao ya basadi (GBVF)..     Kabinete ipileditse ho bohle naheng ena ho sebetsa mmoho le mmuso ntweng kgahlano le bosenyi le GBVF.
tgt_text: Uhulumeni uzibophezele ekuhlinzekeni ngezibonelelo kulabo bantu abadla imbuya ngothi abangenawo amandla okuzibhekelela ngokwabo ukuze bakwazi ukuhlangabezana nezidingo zabo eziyisisekelo.

src_text: Mmoho re ka netefatsa hore metse le diterata tsa rona di bolokehile bakeng sa batho bohle, ho kenyeletsa maqheku, basadi le bana..     Moruo.
tgt_text: Ezokuphepha nokuvikeleka.

src_text: Kabinete ananetse ho bulwa semmuso ha feme ya ho etsa ditene ya Kwastina ya Corobrik, Driefontein,Gauteng ke Presidente Ramaphosa ka Laboraro la la 4 Motsheanong.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liyaqhubeka nokugxeka izenzo zokubulawa kwabantu besifazane ezingenangqondo futhi lisithokozele isenzo sabomthetho sokubabopha ngokushesha okukhulu abasolwa abayamaniswa nokufa kuka-Nks Hillary Gardee (28), obehlala endaweni yaKamagugu eMpumalanga.

src_text: Feme ena ya maemo phahameng haholo ke karolo ya matsete diranta tse dimiliyone tse 800 tsamayang mmoho le diranta tse ding tse dimiliyone tse 200 tse behetsweng ho atolosa feme ya Corobrik ya konkreiti KwaZulu-Natal.Corobrik ke nngwe ya dikgwebo tsa mona tse ileng tsa utlwa boipiletso ba Presidente Ramaphosa ba hore dikgwebo tsa Afrika Borwa le tsa matjhaba di tsetele moruong wa naha ena.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liphinde futhi lagxeka nesenzo sokubulawa kwabantu abayisithupha eKhayelitsha, eKapa.

src_text: Kabinete elelletswe hore moruo fokolang wahydrogen matlafaditswe kamora ho thakgolwa ha lori sebedisang hydrogen ke Anglo American.
tgt_text: Lokhu kubulawa kwabantu okungenangqondo kuyisikhumbuzo sokuthi kusekuningi okumele sikwenze njengomphakathi ukuqeda udlame kanye nodlame olweyamene nobulili kanye nokubulawa kwabantu besifazane (i-GBVF)..     IKhabhinethi linxuse abantu bonke kuleli ukuthi basebenzisane nohulumeni empini yokulwisana nobugebengu kanye ne-GBVF.

src_text: Lori ena neng sebedisa diesel mme ya fetolelwa tshebedisong ya hydrogen le sebedisang le dibetri tsa lithium-ion keya pele lefatsheng.
tgt_text: Uma sibambisene singaqinisekisa ukuthi imiphakathi yethu kanye nezitaladi zethu kuphephile kubantu bonke, kubandakanya nabantu esebekhulile ngokweminyaka, abesifazane kanye nezingane..     Ezomnotho.

src_text: Moruo wahydrogen hlwauwe le lewa le pele moruong wa naha ya rona lwantshang tshenyo ya tikoloho, mme moruo ona tla ntshetsa pele kgolo moruong thuse le ho thehweng ha mesebetsi..     Kabinetee boetse ananetse matsete mang moruong wa rona ka khampani ya dijo ya Ireland, The Kerry Group butseng feme ya diranta tse dimiliyone tse 650, Hammarsdale,KwaZulu-Natal, eo sepheo ka yona leng ho hlahisa dijo ho ya ho ile kontinenteng.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likwamukele ngezandla ezimhlophe ukuvulwa ngokusemthethweni kwefemu eyakha izitini yakwa-Corobrik, i-Kwastina e-Driefontein e-Gauteng okwenziwe nguMongameli u-Ramaphosa ngoLwesithathu mhla zizi-4 kuNhlaba.

src_text: Feme ena ke ikgethang hobane na le dikarolo tsa moshwelella tse kenyeletsang disebediswa tsa eneji nyenyane, tlhahiso ya matla letsatsi ho fokotsa tshebediso ya motlakase wa keriti ya naha ena, mokgwa wa paballo ya eneji, le wa paballo ya metsi, tshebediso ya ona hape le mokgwa wa ho fokotsa tshebediso ya ona.
tgt_text: Le femu kanokusho yohlobo lwesimanjemanje iyingxenye yotshalomali oluyizigidi ezingama-800 zamarandi, oluhambisana nolunye futhi utshalomali olwengeziwe oluyizigidi ezingama-200 zamarandi olwabelwe umsebenzi wokwelulwa kwemisebenzi kakhonkolo yakwa-Corobrik KwaZulu-Natali.

src_text: The Kerry Group fihlile Afrika Borwa ka 2011, mme matsete yona amang ke letshwao la hore Afrika Borwa ntse ratelwa matsete.
tgt_text: Abakwa-Corobrik bangelinye lamabhizinisi akuleli asabelile kwikhwelo likaMongameli u-Ramaphosa lapho enxusa amabhizinisi aseNingizimu Afrika kanye namabhizinisi amazwe ngamazwe ukuba atshale izimali emnothweni wezwe lethu.

src_text: Matsete ana tla kamora ho thakgolwa ha vene ena ya Isuzu D-Max hlahisitsweng naheng, Gqeberha, Kapa Botjhabela kgweding fetileng.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likuphawulile ukuthi umnotho wegesi ihayidrojini osafufusa uthole ukwesekwa nokufukulwa njengoba abakwa-Anglo American sebethule iloli elisebenza ngegesi yehayidrojini.

src_text: Koloi ena ya D-MAX ya mehleng ena bontsha boinehelo ba Isuzu naheng ena mmeke nngwe ya dikatleho tse fihletsweng tlasa Lenaneo la Ntshetsopele ya Tlhahiso ya Makoloi (APDP).
tgt_text: Leli loli – eliguquliwe ebelisebenza ngodizili manje eselisebenza ngehayidrojini, futhi elinengxenye ethile yalo esebenza ngamabhethri ohlobo lwe-lithium-ion – lingelokuqala ngqa ukubonakala emhlabeni wonke jikelele.

src_text: APDP ke mokgwatshebetso wa kgothatso wa tlhahiso bakeng sa indasteri ya makoloi oo sepheo ka ona leng ho phahamisa tlhahiso indastering boletsweng ya makoloi, ho phahamisa bolengindastering mme ka tsela ena ho thehwe mesebetsi makaleng ohle amanang le tlhahiso ya makoloi.Kediranta tse dibiliyone tse batlang di eba 2,8 tse tla etswa ka tlhahiso ya mona nakong ya tshebetso ya APDP.
tgt_text: Umnotho wehayidrojini usuhlonzwe njengento esemqoka kakhulu okumele ibekwe eqhulwini kuhlobo lomnotho wethu olungayinukubezi imvelo, futhi ukuze kukhuthazwe ukukhula komnotho kanye nokuvulwa kwamathuba omsebenzi..     IKhabhinethi liluthokozele futhi nolunye utshalomali olwengeziwe olufakwe yinkampani ekhiqiza ukudla yase-Ireland, i-Kerry Group, esivule ifemu entsha edle izigidi ezingama-650 zamarandi e-Hammarsdale, KwaZulu-Natali, okuhloswe ngayo ukukhiqizela leli zwekazi ukudla ngokuqhubekayo.

src_text: Matsete tla thusa ho theha mesebetsi fetang 1000 ka palo ka kotloloho femeng, le meng ya tlatsetso hirang batho ba 24 000, mme sena se tla kenya letsoho matlafatsong ya baahi lebatoweng.
tgt_text: Le femu iyifemu eyingqayizivele, futhi engafani neze namanye, njengoba inezinsiza-kusebenza eziningana eziyoyilekelela ukuthi iqhubeke isikhathi eside yenza umsebenzi wayo ngendlela esimeme, kubandakanya imishini engadli ugesi omningi, ukusetshenziswa kukagesi welanga ukuze kuncishiswe umthamo kagesi osuka esikhungweni sikagesi sikazwelonke, ukuqoqwa kwamandla kagesi nokushisa emithonjeni yamandla kagesi esisetshenzisiwe, kanye nokuqoqwa nokugcinwa kwamanzi ngobunyoninco, nokusebenzisa izinto kabusha kanye nokuncishiswa kwemfucuza ekhiqizwayo.

src_text: Seboka sa tsa Merafo.
tgt_text: Inkampani i-Kerry Group seyisebenze eNingizimu Afrika kusukela ngowezi-2011, futhi lolu tshalomali olwengeziwe luyinkomba yokuthi iNingizimu Afrika iyizwe eliyintandokazi kubatshalizimali.

src_text: Investing in African Mining Indaba 2022 neng tshwaretswe Cape Town International Convention Centreho tloha ka la 9 ho ya ho la 12 Motsheanong 2022, ke le leng la mapatlelo maholo ho bontshana le tshebedisano pakeng tsa ba amehang indastering ya merafo.
tgt_text: Lolu tshalomali lulandela ezinyathelweni zokwethulwa kweveni yohlobo lwe-Isuzu D-Max eyakhiwa kuleli e-Gqeberha eMpumalanga Kapa ngenyanga edlule.

src_text: Mookotaba wa ketsahalo ena ne le: “Ntshetsopele ho tsa Merafo Afrika: Matsete Diphetohong ho tsa Eneji, ESG, leMeruo”.
tgt_text: I-D-MAX entsha yohlobo lwesimanjemanje iwuphawu olucace bha lokuzibophezela kwenkampani yakwa-Isuzu eNingizimu Afrika futhi ingenye yezimpumelelo ezizuzwe ngaphansi koHlelo Lokuthuthukisa Ukwakhiwa Nokukhiqizwa Kwezimoto (i-APDP).

src_text: Kabinete na le tshepo ya hore Seboka sa tsa Merafo se tla thusa ho pepesa le ho phahamisa Afrika Borwa jwaloka naha ka kgahlang batsetedi..     Afrika Borwa amohela matsete naheng ya rona mme inehetse ho theheng maemo loketseng kgolo kenyeletsang bohle le diphetoho moruong..     Dikamano le Dinaha tsa Matjhaba le tsa Mabatowa.
tgt_text: I-APDP iwuhlelo lokukhuthaza umkhiqizo oluqondiswe embonini yezimoto okuhloswe ngalo ukugqugquzela nokukhulisa inani lezimoto ezikhiqizwa yile mboni yezimoto, ukugqugquzela ukwakhiwa nokulungiswa kwezingxenye zezimoto embonini yakuleli futhi ngalokho-ke kuvuleke amathuba omsebenzi ochungechungeni lonkana lwemisebenzi yokwakhiwa nokukhiqizwa kwezimoto.

src_text: Kabinete boetse ananetse ditherisano tsa morao tjena tsa Presidente Ramaphosa le Presidente Joe Biden wa Amerika, Presidente Emmanuel Macron wa France le Presidente Hakainde Hichilema wa Zambia mapatlelong fapaneng.
tgt_text: Lilinganiselwa kuma-R. 8 ezigidigidi inani lomkhiqizo wakuleli ozokhiqizwa esikhathini sonkana sokuqhubeka kwe-APDP.

src_text: Dipuisano tsena di nehile Presidente monyetla wa ho tiisa maqhama le tshebedisano pakeng tsa Afrika Borwa le dinaha tse ding ditabeng tsa bohlokwa boemong ba mabatowa le matjhaba, ho kenyeletsa ho fumana tharollo ya kgotso ntweng ya Ukraine     Diqeto tsa Kabinete.
tgt_text: Lolu tshalomali luzovikela imisebenzi eyi-1 000 yabantu abaqashwe ngqo kulesi sikhungo futhi luvulele abantu abayizi-24 000 amathuba omsebenzi emisebenzini eminingana engaphandle ehlobene nomsebenzi owenziwa yile nkampani futhi ngalokho-ke lulekelele kakhulu ekuthuthukisweni nokufukulwa komphakathi kulesiya sifunda..     INgqungquthela Yezezimayini.

src_text: Dipuo tsa Ditekanyetso tsa Ditjhelete.
tgt_text: INgqungquthela Yokutshalwa Kwezimali Ezimayini zase-Afrika yowezi-2022 ebibanjelwe e-Cape Town International Convention Centre kusukela mhla ziyisi-9 kuya kumhla ziyi-12 kuNhlaba 2022, ingesinye sezigcawu ezinkulukazi zokuxhumana nokusebenzisana phakathi kwabo bonke ababambiqhaza embonini yezimayini.

src_text: Kabinete ipiletsa ho baahi bohle ho mamela Dipuo tsa Ditekanyetso tsa Ditjhelete tsa mafapha naha mmuso le puo ya lefapha la Bopresidente molemong wa hore ba behe mmuso leihlo..     Ha ho tekwa Dipuo tsa Ditekanyetso, mafapha ohle fana ka dintlha tse felletseng tsa merero le tsa bohlokwa tseo ikemiseditseng ho di phetha selemong.
tgt_text: Isiqubulo sale ngqungquthela sabe sithi: “Uguquko-simo Lwezezimayini e-Afrika: Sitshala Izimali Ekuguqulweni Kwamandla, i-ESG, kanye Neminotho”.

src_text: Sepheo ka Dipuo tsa Ditekanyetso ke ho netefatsa hore ditjhelete tsa setjhaba di sebediswa hantle ho thusa setjhaba ka tseo di se hlokang.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi linethemba elikhulu lokuthi iNgqungquthela Yezezimayini izolekelela ekuvezeni kanye nokukhangisa iNingizimu Afrika njengezwe eliyintandokazi kubatshalizimali.

src_text: Dipuo tsa ditekanyetso di boetse ke monyetla wa hore Matona hlalose haholwanyane ka mosebetsi wa mmuso, ho kenyeletsa dikatleho le diphephetso tseo tobanang le tsona.
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika ilwamukela ngezandla ezimhlophe utshalomali olungena kuleli futhi izibophezele ekwakheni izimo ezikahle futhi ezikulungele ukukhula komnotho okubandakanyayo kanye nokulethwa koguquko emnothweni.

src_text: Lewa la Qalo ya Tshebediso ya Kgase ya Mafura (LPG).
tgt_text: Ubudlelwane namazwe ngamazwe omhlaba kanye namazwe esifunda.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana Lewa la Qalo ya Tshebediso ya LPG, le phatlaladitsweng hore setjhaba se ntshe maikutlo ka lona ka Tlhakubele.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likwamukelile futhi ukuxhumana nokufakana imilomo kwakamuva nje phakathi kukaMongameli  u-Ramaphosa noMongameli waseMelika u-Joe Biden, noMongameli wase-France u-Emmanuel Macron kanye noMongameli wase-Zambia u-Hakainde Hichilema ezigcawini zokuxhumana ezahlukene.

src_text: Sepheo ka lewa ke ho atolosa indasteri ya kgase ya mafura naheng.
tgt_text: Lokhu kuxhumana nokufakana imilomo kuhlinzeke uMongameli ngethuba elikahle lokuqinisa ubudlelwane kanye nobambiswano phakathi kweNingizimu Afrika namazwe ebambisene nawo ezindabeni ezisemqoka eziphathelene nesifunda kanye nalezo eziphathelene namazwe ngamazwe omhlaba, kubandakanya nokuthola isixazululo esinokuthula kwingxabano eqhubekayo e-Ukraine     Izinqumo zeKhabhinethi.

src_text: LPG tla ba le seabo se molemo phapanong ya mehlodi ya eneji..     Hara tse ding lewa le tla laola theko makaleng fapaneng tlhahiso le ho tshehetsa tlhahiso ya meqomo ya LPG naheng ena.
tgt_text: Amavoti Esabelomali.

src_text: Le tla boela le rute setjhaba ka melemo ya ho sebedisa LPG jwaloka mofuta mong wa eneji..
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi linxusa zonke izakhamuzi ukuba ziwalandele amaVoti Esabelomali ahlukahlukene ethulwa yiminyango kahulumeni kazwelonke kanye neHhovisi likaMongameli ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukuthi uhulumeni uyaphendula ngemisebenzi yakhe..     Ngenkathi kwethulwa amaVoti Esabelomali, yonke iminyango ichaza kabanzi ngezinhlelo zayo kanye nezinto ezibekwe eqhulwini ezizokwenziwa kulo nyaka.

src_text: Le tla fumaneha kamora hore le phatlalatswe ke Lefapha la Diminerale le Eneji howww.dmr.gov.za.
tgt_text: Amavoti Esabelomali kuhloswe ngawo ukuqinisekisa ukuthi izimali zikahulumeni zisetshenziswa ngobunyoninco ekuhlangabezaneni nezidingo zomphakathi..     Ahlinzeka futhi ngesigcawu esihle kakhulu sokuba oNgqongqoshe bakwazi ukuchaza kabanzi ngomsebenzi kahulumeni, kubandakanya izimpumelelo kanye nezinselele..     Iqhingasu Lokuqaliswa Kokukhishwa  Kwesibaseli Esiyigesi Ewuketshezi (i-LPG) .

src_text: Moralotshebetso wa Batho ba sa Itekanelang wa Lewa wa Naha Mabapi le Matsholo ho Hlokomedisa ka Ditokelo tsa ba sa Itekanelang.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liligunyazile iQhingasu Lokukhishwa kwe-LPG ukuze liqale ukusebenza,  okuyiqhingasu elashicilelwa ngoNdasa 2022 ukuze kuboniswane nomphakathi ngalo.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana Moralotshebetso wa Batho ba sa Itekanelang wa Lewa wa Naha mabapi le Matsholo ho Hlokomedisa ka Ditokelo tsa ba sa Itekanelang.
tgt_text: Leli qhingasu lihlose ukwelula nokunweba imboni ye-LPG ezweni.

src_text: Moralotshebetso tla tataisa lekala la poraefete le la setjhaba hore netefatse ho sireletswa ha ditokelo tsa basa itekanelang, jwalokaha di sireleditswe le Molaong wa Motheo wa Riphaboliki ya Afrika Borwa wa.
tgt_text: I-LPG izolekelela kakhulu ekuqinisekiseni ukusetshenziswa kwemithombo yamandla ehlukahlukene.

src_text: Moralotshebetso nehelana kadisebediswa tse tla thusa ho tlosa kgethollo thibelang ho nkuwa ha diqeto, haholoholo tse amanang le batho basa itekanelang boetse lemosa batho ba sa itekanelang hore ba tsebe ditokelo tsa bona jwalokaha di sireleditswe ke Molao wa Motheo.Moralotshebetso boetse fana ka thupelo hlokomedise mehloding ya ditaba le setjhabeng ka ditokelo tsa batho basa itekanelang thusa ho kenngweng tshebetsong ha Tokomane ya Tataiso ya Ditokelo tsa Batho ba sa Itekanelang.Afrika Borwa saenne Tumellano ya Matjhaba Kopaneng (UN) ya Ditokelo tsa Batho basa Itekanelang mmoho le Tokomaneya Matjhaba Kopaneng (UN) yaLekgotla la Tumellano la Ditokelo tsa Botho le Batho Afrika mabapi le Ditokelo tsa Batho ba sa Itekanelang leng Tokomane ya Tumellano ya Ditokelo tsa basa Itekanelang Afrika).
tgt_text: Phakathi kwezinye izinhlelo zokungenelela, leli qhingasu lizolawula amanani entengo emsebenzini wonkana wokukhiqizwa kwegesi ewuketshezi futhi leseke nomsebenzi wokukhiqizwa kwamasilinda e-LPG ezweni.

src_text: Ho bontshanwe le bohle ba amehang, ho kenyeletsa Ntshetsopele ya Moruo ya Naha le Lekgotlala Basebetsi..     Seboka sa Lefatshe Metseng ya Mahae sa Tsamaiso ya Lefatshe le Tokelo ya Lefatshe.
tgt_text: Futhi lizofundisa umphakathi ngemihlomulo yokusebenzisa i-LPG njengolunye uhlobo lwamandla olwehlukile olungasetshenziswa..     Abantu bazokwazi ukufinyelela kulona emuva kokuba selishicileliwe nguMnyango Wezimbiwa Namandla ku-www.dmr.gov.za.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tshwarwa ha Seboka saMetse ya Mahae sa Tsamaiso ya Lefatshe le Tokelo ya Lefatshe ka Labohlano la la 27 le ka Moqebelo wa la 28 Motsheanong 2022, Gauteng..     Kabinete tjhaetse monwana Tlaleho ya Maikutlo ka Seboka saMetseng ya Mahae sa Tsamaiso ya Lefatshe le Tokelo ya Lefatshe ka Tlhakubele.
tgt_text: Uhlaka Lwamasu Lukazwelonke olumayelana Nemikhankaso Yokuqwashisa Ngamalungelo Abantu Abanokukhubazeka.

src_text: Kabinete laetse hore ho be le dipontshano tse ding lebohle ba amehang..     Seboka ke sehlohlolo sa mosebetsi entsweng ngwahola ileng wa nonya maikutlo ba fapaneng ba amehang     Diketsahalo tse Tlang.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lilugunyazile uHlaka Lwamasu Lukazwelonke olumayelana Nemikhankaso Yokuqwashisa Ngamalungelo Abantu Abanokukhubazeka.

src_text: Seboka sa Bohlano sa Lefatshe sa Phediso ya Mosebetsi wa Bana.
tgt_text: Uhlaka luhlose ukuhola nokuqondisa umkhakha ozimele ngokunjalo futhi nomkhakha kahulumeni ekuqinisekiseni ukuthi avikelekile amalungelo abantu abanokukhubazeka, njengoba lokhu kubekwe ngokucacile kuMthethosisekelo weRiphabhulikhi yaseNingizimu Afrika wonyaka we-.

src_text: Afrika Borwa tla tshwara Seboka sa Bohlano sa Lefatshe sa Phediso ya Mosebetsi wa Bana, Durban International Convention Centre, KwaZulu-Natal ho tloha ka Sontaha sa la 15 ho ya ho Labohlano la la 20 Motsheanong.

Ke lekgetlo la pele Mokgatlo wa Lefatshe wa Basebetsi (ILO) tshwarela seboka sena Afrika..     Baetapele ba Dinaha, matona 120, baemedi ba dikarolo tse tharo tsa dinaha tse 187 tseo leng ditho tsa ILO, makgotla Mokgatlo wa Matjhaba, ditheo tsa thuto phahameng, mekgatlo ya baahi, mekgatlo eo eseng ya mmuso le mehlodi ya ditaba ba lebelletswe ho ba sebokeng sena..     Seboka se tla boela se nehe Afrika Borwa monyetla wa ho beha ka pele Molao wa Motheo wa naha jwalokaha sireletsa ditokelo tsa bana.
tgt_text: Uhlaka luhlinzeka ngeqoqwana lamathuluzi azolekelela ekususeni imigoqo ebandlululayo ekuthathweni kwezinqumo, ikakhulukazi lezo eziphathelene nabantu abanokukhubazeka.

src_text: Naha tla bontshana le dinaha tse ding tse itlhommeng pele phedisong ya mosebetsi wa bana mme ithute ho tsona.
tgt_text: Futhi luqwashisa abantu abanokukhubazeka ukuthi bawazi amalungelo abo njengoba evikelwe nguMthethosisekelo.

src_text: Imbizo ya Presidente ya Mokgwa wa Ntshetsopele ya Ditereke (DDM).
tgt_text: Uhlaka luhlinzeka futhi ngokuqeqeshwa,  imibiko yabezindaba kanye nokuqwashisa emphakathini mayelana namalungelo abantu abanokukhubazeka.

src_text: Presidente Ramaphosa tla ba le Imbizo ya Mokgwa wa Ntshetsopele ya Ditereke Mpumalanga ka Labohlano la la 20 Motsheanong 2022 tlasa mookotaba: “Ha re siye motho morao”.
tgt_text: Uhlaka luqalisa ukusebenza koMthetho Odingidwayo omayelana Nabantu Abanokukhubazeka.

src_text: Jwaloka mokgwa wa bohlokwa wa ho ba le seabo ha setjhaba, Imbizo fa Presidente monyetla wa ho buisana le ba amehang ba fapaneng ka ho otloloha – haholoholo batho ba metseng ya mahae – le ho mamela mathata bona ka sepheo sa ho buisana le bona ka ona..     Sepheo ka Imbizo ya Presidente ya Mokgwa wa Ntshetsopele ya Ditereke ke ho lwantsha tse sitisang phumantsho momahaneng ya ditshebeletso le ho kgothaletsa seabo sa baahi ho ikamahantswe le Mokgwa wa Ntshetsopele ya Ditereke..     Maafrika Borwa ka latela le ho ba leseabo dipuisanong kaho kena diwebsaeteng tsa ho etsa setswalle tlasa #PresidentialImbizo.
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika ingelinye lamazwe asayina iSivumelwano seNhlangano Yezizwe (i-UN) esiqondene Namalungelo Abantu Abanokukhubazeka kanye Nesivumelwano se-UN soMqulu wase-Afrika Wamalungelo Esintu kanye Namalungelo Abantu esiqondene Namalungelo Abantu Abanokukhubazeka (Isivumelwano Samalungelo Abantu Abanokukhubazeka base-Afrika).

src_text: Kgwedi ya Afrika.
tgt_text: Uhlaka kwaboniswana ngalo nabo bonke ababambiqhaza abafanelekile, kubandakanya noMkhandlu Kazwelonke Wokuthuthukiswa Komnotho Nabasebenzi.

src_text: Ho ketekwa ha selemo le selemo ha Kgwedi ya Afrika le Letsatsi la Afrika ka Laboraro lala 25 Motsheanong ho tla ba le mookotaba oo leng: “Selemo sa Phepo Nepahetseng: Matlafatso ya Phepo Nepahetseng le ya dijo tse lekaneng bohle kontinenteng ya Afrika”..     Jwaloka karolo ya ponelopele ya nako telele ho Agenda 2063 (eo leng leano la ntshetsopele la Afrika la ho fihlella ntshetsopele ya tsa bophelo kenyeletsang bohle le ya moshwelella ya dilemo tse fetang tse mashome mahlano), mookotaba ona tsepame bokgoning ba batho ba Afrika mme ho tsepamisitswe maikutlo haholo basading, batjheng le baneng.
tgt_text: INgqungquthela Yezokuphathwa Komhlaba kanye Namalungelo Obunikazi Nokusetshenziswa Komhlaba Ezindaweni Lapho Abantu Besebenzisa Khona Umhlaba Ngokuhlanganyela.

src_text: Sena se bohlokwa haholo bakeng sa ntshetsopele hobane se lebisa maphelong ntlafetseng bakeng sa motho ka mong, se lebise le meputsong hodimo le kunong hodimo bakeng sa dinaha..     Ntlha ka sehloohong meketeng ya Kgwedi ya Afrika ke Beke ya Dikgokahano ya Afrika tla ketekwa Constitutional Hill, Johannesburg ho tloha ka la 23 ho ya ho la 27 Motsheanong.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likugunyazile ukusingathwa kweNgqungquthela Yezokuphathwa Komhlaba kanye Namalungelo Obunikazi Nokusetshenziswa Komhlaba Ezindaweni Lapho Abantu Besebenzisa Khona Umhlaba Ngokuhlanganyela ngoLwesihlanu mhla zingama-27 kanye noMgqibelo mhla zingama-28 kuNhlaba 2022 e-Gauteng.

IKhabhinethi lasemukela ngokusemthethweni ngoNdasa 2021 iSitatimende Esichaza Ngokucacileyo Umbono-simo Kahulumeni maqondana Nokuphathwa Komhlaba kanye Namalungelo Obunikazi Nokusetshenziswa Komhlaba Ezindaweni Lapho Abantu Besebenzisa Khona Umhlaba Ngokuhlanganyela.

src_text: Kgwedi ya Afrika ke monyetla wa ho phahamisa kopano ya Afrika le momahano tebileng ya lebatowa, le ho inehela botjha ha Afrika bokamosong bo le bong.
tgt_text: Liyalele ukuthi kubanjwe ezinye izigcawu zokubonisana nabo bonke ababambiqhaza abafanelekile.

src_text: Kabinete hopotsa bohle hore ditabatabelo tsa rona tsa naha di amana haholo le botsitso, kopano le tswelopele ya Afrika     Melaetsa.
tgt_text: Ingqungquthela izoba yisigcawu sokusonga nokuphothula umsebenzi osuwenziwe kusukela ngonyaka odlule kuze kube manje, lapho bekunxenxwa khona imibono evela kubabambiqhaza abahlukahlukene     Imicimbi Ezayo.

src_text: MatshedisoKabinete lebisitse matshediso malapeng le metswalleng ya bana: •    MmePhindile Xaba(53),ya sebeditseng nako telele le ka bokgabane indastering ya ditaba, Afrika Borwa le mose sebeleditse ntlafalo ya naha ena ka boitelo.•    LenqosaSilumkoSokupa(74),ya sebeleditseng Lekgotla la Tshireletseho ya Mmuso maemong fapaneng, nako telele sebetsa ka bokgabane Tshebeletsong ya Mmuso.
tgt_text: INgqungquthela Yesihlanu Yomhlaba Wonke Mayelana Nokuqedwa Kokusetshenziswa Kwezingane.

src_text: •    Profesa Francis Wilson(83), setsebi sa moruo se ipabotseng, le mothehi wa Lekala la Diphuputso la tsa Basebetsi le Ntshetsopele Lebatoweng le Borwa ba Afrika     KhiroHo tlameha hore ho netefatswe mangolo thuto ba hirwang mme ho netefatswe le hore ba ha ba eso ka ba tlola molao..     Ngaka Kesavan Naidoo jwaloka Motlatsa-Molaodi-Kakaretso (DDG): Ntshetsopele ya Makgabane Ditheong, Lefapheng la Puso ya Kopanelo (DCoG).
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika izosingatha iNgqungquthela Yesihlanu Yomhlaba Wonke Mayelana Nokuqedwa Kokusetshenziswa Kwezingane e-Durban International Convention Centre, KwaZulu-Natali, kusukela ngeSonto mhla ziyi-15 kuze kube nguLwesihlanu mhla zingama-20 kuNhlaba.

src_text: Monghadi Siphosihle Emmanuel Hlomukajwaloka DDG: Botsamaisi ba Tshehetso le Dithuso Mebusong ya Lehae,DCoG..     Monghadi Risimati Patrick Mathyejwaloka DDG: Botsamaisi ba Ditshebeletso tsa Metsi le Bohlweki (DWS)..     MonghadiCollin Xolani Zwane jwaloka DDG: Taolo, Tumellano le Phethahatso,DWS.
tgt_text: Kuzobe kungokokuqala ngqa ukuthi iNhlangano Yezabasebenzi Yamazwe Ngamazwe (i-ILO) isingathe le ngqungquthela ezwekazini lase-Afrika..     Izinhloko zemibuso, ongqongqoshe abayi-120, umbimbi olumkhakha-mithathu lwamazwe ayi-187 angamalungu e-ILO, izikhungo ze-UN, izikhungo zezemfundo, izinhlangano zezinhlaka zomphakathi wonkana, izinhlangano ezingekho ngaphansi kukahulumeni, abezindaba kanye namaqembu omphakathi kulindeleke ukuthi bayethamele le ngqungquthela.

src_text: MonghadiMelanchton Makobe jwaloka DDG:Ditshebeletso tsa Molao le Peholeihlo ya Tshebetso Pusong, Dikgwebong tsa Mmuso,Lefapheng la Dikgwebo tsa Mmuso     Kabinete dumellane le Matona ka ho hirwa ha ba latelang:.
tgt_text: Ingqungquthela izonikeza futhi iNingizimu Afrika ithuba lokuveza nokubonakalisa uMthethosisekelo wezwe njengoba uwavikela amalungelo ezingane.

src_text: MonghadiBhekuyise Mathews Khenisajwaloka Mohlanka Moholo wa Phethahatso(CEO)Lekgotleng la Ntshetsopele ya Phumantsho ya Bodulo (HDA).
tgt_text: Leli lizwe lizoxhumana futhi libonisane namazwe ahlukahlukene asekhathule indima ebanzi kakhulu kuneyethu ekuqedeni ukusetshenziswa kwezingane futhi lifunde kulawo mazwe..     Imbizo kaMongameli eqondene Nohlelo Lokuthuthukiswa Kwezifunda (i-DDM).

src_text: Mme Joy KelediMasemolajwaloka Mohlanka Moholo wa Ditjhelete, HDA.
tgt_text: UMongameli u-Ramaphosa uzobamba Imbizo kaMongameli eqondene ne-DDM eMpumalanga ngoLwesihlanu mhla zingama-20 kuNhlaba 2022 ngaphansi kwesiqubulo esithi: “Ungashiyi muntu ngemuva”.

src_text: Ngaka Cornelius Ruiters jwalokaCEO ya Lepelle Northern Water.
tgt_text: Njengesigcawu esimqoka sokubamba iqhaza komphakathi, Imbizo izonikeza uMongameli ithuba lokuxhumana ngqo nababambiqhaza abahlukahlukene – ikakhulukazi imiphakathi yezindawo zasemakhaya – futhi uzolalela izinkinga nezinselele zabo ngenhloso yokuzixazulula.

src_text: Boiphumano le Maiteko Kahobotjha Kamora Dikgohola.
tgt_text: Imizamo yokutakula nokukhuculula kanye nokwakha kabusha ngemuva kokuhlasela kwezikhukhula.

src_text: Kabinete rorisitse le ho ananela mosebetsi wa batho le mekgatlo yohle kentseng letsoho maitekong hore batho ba iphumane, le kahongbotjha kamora dikgohola tse mpe dikarolong tse ding tsa naha, haholoholo KwaZulu-Natal lebohile mekgatlo yohle eo eseng ya mmuso, ya ditumelo, baahi, beng ba dikgwebo le mekgatlo thusang faneng ka dijo, diaparo, dikobo, dipakana tse sebediswang ke bomme ha ba le matsatsing  le diaparo tsa sekolo malapeng tlokotsing sa kgoneng ho iphumanela tsa motheo tseo di hlokang..     Setsi Sa Taolo ya Dikoduwa se ntse se tswela pele le ho kopanya makala ohle mmuso maitekong sona ho fana ka thuso ya diphallelo malapeng ohle amehileng.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi izwakalise amazwi ayo okutusa kanye nokubonga kubo bonke abantu kanye nezinhlangano ezibandakanyekayo emizamweni yokutakula nokukhuculula kanye nokwakha kabusha kulandela ukuhlasela kwezikhukhula ezishiye kukhalwa kwezinye izingxenye zezwe, ikakhulukazi KwaZulu-Natali.

src_text: Batho ba fetang 7 000 ka palo ba fuwa botshabelo diterekeng tse nne tse amehileng haholo KwaZulu-Natal qadile mosebetsi wa ho fumantsha malapa amehileng bodulo ba nakwana ditsheng tseo leng tsa mmuso tse hlwauweng KwaZulu-Natal tse ka sebedisetswang ho ahela batho.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ibonge zonke izinhlangano ezingekho ngaphansi kukahulumeni, izinhlangano zamabandla ezenkolo, imiphakathi, osomabhizinisi kanye nezinhlangano zosizo ezihlinzeke ngokudla, izingubo zokugqoka, izingubo zokulala, izinsiza/izimpahla zokubuyisa isithunzi kanye nemifaniswano yesikole emindenini ehlwempu ukuze ikwazi ukuhlangabezana nezidingongqangi zayo.

src_text: Kabinete tiisitse boinehelo ba mmuso ba ho laola matlole dithuso tsa kamora dikgohola ka hloko le ka ho se pate letho.
tgt_text: Isikhungo Sikazwelonke Sokuphathwa Kwenhlekelele siyaqhubeka nokudidiyela zonke izinhlaka zikahulumeni emizamweni yaso yokuhlinzeka ngezinsiza ezikhombisa isihe nobubele kubantu kuyona yonke imizi ekhahlamezekile.

src_text: Mohlahlobi Moholo wa Dibuka tsa Ditjhelete Afrika Borwa fana ka tshebeletso ya tlatsetso ya peholeihlo mme tlhophisobotjha ya ditjhelete ikamahanya le mokgwatshebetso wa mmuso wa ditekanyetso tsa ditjhelete..     Tsa Morao tsa Lefu la Coronavirus (COVID-19).
tgt_text: Izinsizakalo zokukhoselisa abantu zihlinzekiwe kubantu abangaphezu kwezi-7 000 kwizifunda okuyizona ezikhahlamezeke kakhulu KwaZulu-Natali..     Umsebenzi usuqalile maqondana nokwakhiwa kwezindawo zokuhlala zesikhashana zemindeni ekhahlamezekile ezindaweni zokwakha eziphethwe nguhulumeni ezihlonzwe KwaZulu-Natali ukuze abantu bakwazi ukuthuthelwa kuzona beyohlaliswa kabusha.

src_text: Kabinete ipileditse ho batho bohle ba Afrika Borwa ho nka mehato ya ho itshireletsa ho thibela ho ata ha COVID-19 kamora hore dipalopalo tsa morao tjena di bontshe hore palo ya batho ba tshwaetsehang le ba kulang a eketseha jwalokaha mariha se kene..     Kabinete hopoditse bohle ho tswela pele ka ho itshireletsa le batho ba bang ka ho hlapa matsoho kgafetsa, ho rwala dimonkwana ha motho le kahara moaho, ho se atamelane le ba bang, ho bula difenstere moya kene, le ho enta..     Ente ntse le tshireletso matla kgahlano le COVID-19 hobane thibela ho kula haholo, ho robatswa sepetlele le ho hlokahala.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikuqinisekisile ukuzibophezela kukahulumeni ekuphatheni izimali zokusiza nokutakula abakhahlanyezwe yizikhukhula ngobuhlakani nobuyoninco kanjalo nokusebenzela obala.

src_text: Ha hloke hore be le aterese ya moo dulang teng hore ente.
tgt_text: UMcwaningimabhuku Jikelele waseNingizimu Afrika uhlinzeka ngensizakalo yokuqapha ngeso lokhozi eyengeziwe futhi ukubekwa kabusha eqhulwini kwezimali kuyahambelana nohlelo lukahulumeni lokwabiwa kwezimali..     Ezakamuva ngeSifo Segciwane le-Corona (i-COVID-19).

src_text: Mang kapa mang ya nang le bukana ya boitsebiso le ya se nang yona ka enta mahala dibakeng tsohle tsa setjhaba tsa ho enta naheng ka bophara..     Kgethollo ya Mmala ha Fele!.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi inxuse bonke abantu abaseNingizimu Afrika ukuba bathathe izinyathelo zokuzivikela ukuze kunqandwe ukusabalala kwe-COVID-19 ngemuva kokuba izibalo zakamuva nje zibonise ukwenyuka okukhulu esilinganisweni sokuthelelana ngesifo kanye nokugula okuhlobene nesikhathi sasebusika lapha ezweni..     IKhabhinethi ikhumbuze bonke abantu ukuba baqhubeke nokuzigada bona uqobo kanye nabanye abantu ngokuhlanza njalo izandla noma ukusebenzisa isibulali-magciwane ezandleni zethu, ukugqoka isifonyo uma usendaweni evalelekile, ukugcina ibanga lokuqhelelana eliphephile, ukuvula amawindi ukuze kungene umoya kanye nokugoma..     Ukugoma kusalokhu kungukuzivikela okungungqa-phambili ukulwisana ne-COVID-19 njengoba kuvimbela ukugula okubi kakhulu, ukulaliswa esibhedlela ngisho nokufa imbala.

src_text: Kabinete nyatsitse diketso tsa kgethollo ya mmala ka matla naheng ena, ho kenyeletsa diketsahalo tse tlalehilweng tsa Sekolo se Phahameng sa Good Hope Seminary le Yunivesithi ya Stellenbosch, Kapa Bophirima.
tgt_text: Awudingi ukuthi ube nekheli lasekhaya ukuze ugome.

src_text: Diketso tsena tse mpe di kgahlano le makgabane Molaotheo ao naha ya rona thehuweng hodima ona kenyeletsang seriti sa botho, ho se kgethollane ka mmala, ho se kgethollane ka bong, toka setjhabeng, ho se be leeme, le hlomphano.
tgt_text: Noma ubani, onomazisi noma ongenawo umazisi, angagoma mahhala kuzona zonke izikhungo zokugoma zikahulumeni ezweni lonkana.

src_text: Molaotheo wa Riphaboliki ya Afika Borwa wa 1996 ke ona re tataisang hore re fedise dikarohano tse mpe le diketso tsa kgale tsa tlhokeho ya toka.
tgt_text: Nqanda ukucwasana ngokwebala!.

src_text: Ho ipiletswa ho batswadi ho ruta bana ba bona ho se ikamahanye le diketso tsa kgethollo ya mmala le ho atlarela diphapano jwaloka karolo ya letsholo la rona le tsitlalletseng ho kgothaletsa kaho ya setjhaba le momahano ya setjhaba re sebetseng mmoho ho pepesa diketso tsa kgethollo ya mmala hohle moo di bonahalang di amoheleha mme re romele molaetsa hlakileng reng ha di amoheleha naheng ya rona ya demokrasi..     Dikamano tsa Afrika Borwa le Germany.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi izihlaba zonke izenzo zokucwasa ngokwebala ezweni, kubandakanya nezigameko ezibikiwe esikoleni i-Good Hope Seminary High School kanye naseNyuvesi yase-Stellenbosch eNtshonalanga Kapa.

src_text: Kabinete ananetse leeto la semmuso le bileng le katleho la Tjhanselara ya Riphaboliki ya Federale ya Germany, Monghadi Olaf Scholz, Afrika Borwa ka Labobedi la la 24 Motsheanong.
tgt_text: Lezi zenzo ezithunazayo zilwisana namagugu esawathola ngokomthethosisekelo nokuyiwona esathola ngawo izwe lethu elibuswa ngentando yeningi labantu, abandakanya ukuhloniswa kwesithunzi somuntu, ukungacwasani ngokwebala, ukungacwasani ngokobulili, ubulungiswa bezenhlalakahle, ukulingana kanye nenhlonipho..     UMthethosisekelo weRiphabhulikhi yaseNingizimu Afrika we-1996 ungumhlahlandlela wethu esiwusebenzisayo maqondana nokuqeda ukuhlukana okwenyanyekayo kanye nokungabikhona kobulungiswa kwesikhathi esedlule.

Abazali bayanxuswa ukuba bafundise izingane ukuba zikwenqabe ukucwasana ngokwebala kodwa zamukele ukubumbana yize sihlukahlukene, njengengxenye yomkhankaso wethu oqinile wokukhuthaza ukwakhiwa kwesizwe kanye nokubumbana komphakathi.

src_text: Tjhanselara Scholz etetse kwano semmuso menngwe ke Mopresidente Cyril Ramaphosa, eo leng moetapele wa letsholo la mmuso la ho kgothaletsa dikamano tse ntle tsa lebatowa le matjhaba, mmoho le ho hohela matsete hlokwang ka matla..     Hara tse ding baetapele bana ba babedi ba buisane ka ditsela tsa ho ntlafatsa tshebedisano ho tsa eneji le diphetoho maemong lehodimo, kgwebisano le matsete, le mekgwa ya ho lwantsha COVID-19 le tlhokeho matla ya ente.
tgt_text: Asisebenzisaneni ukuze siveze obala ukucwasana ngokwebala noma yikuphi lapho kuthathwa khona njengosikompilo futhi sithumele umyalezo ocacile wokuthi asinayo indawo yokucwasana ngokwebala ezweni lethu elibuswa ngentando yeningi labantu..     Ubudlelwano phakathi kweNingizimu Afrika – kanye neJalimane.

src_text: Ba boetse ba buisana ka diketsahalo tsa kontinenteng ya Afrika le matjhabeng, ho kenyeletsa ntwa ya Ukraine le kamoo amang moruo wa lefatshe le phumaneho ya dijo le eneji.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ilwamukelile Uhambo Olusemthethweni olube yimpumelelo lukaShansela weRiphabhulikhi Yamazwe aseJalimane (i-Federal Republic of Germany), uMhlonishwa u-Olaf Scholz, ehambele lapha eNingizimu Afrika ngoLwesibili, mhla zingama-24 kuNhlaba.

src_text: Germany ke molekane wa bobedi moholo kgwebisanong le Afrika Borwa, mme boetse ke naha ya boraro eo leng mohlodi wa bahahlaudi ba mose tsetela haholo naheng ena mme ke molekane ho tsa ntshetsopele..     Seboka sa Lefatshe sa Bohlano sa Phediso ya Mosebetsi wa Bana.
Kabinete ananetse ho phethelwa ka katleho ha Seboka sa Lefatshe sa Bohlano sa Phediso ya Mosebetsi wa Bana se neng se tshwaretswe Durban ho tloha ka la 15 ho ya ho la 20 Motsheanong.
tgt_text: Uhambo Olusemthethweni lukaShansela u-Scholz lwenziwe ngesimemo sikaMongameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa, okunguyena ohola umkhankaso kahulumeni wokuqinisa amaxhama obudlelwano obuhle nezifunda kanye namazwe omhlaba, kanye nokuheha utshalomali oludingeka kakhulu.

src_text: Ba amehang ba tswang lefatsheng ka bophara ba ne ba le sebokeng sena se neng se tshwerwe ka tshebedisano le Mokgatlo wa Lefatshe wa Basebetsi..     Kamora ho buisana ka mesebetsi metle kentsweng tshebetsong ke dinaha tse fapaneng le ho hlwaya tse salletseng morao le mehato potlakileng hlokehang bakeng sa ho potlakisa phediso ya ya ho etsa bana makgoba le ho qobellwa ha bana ho sebetsa, ho thehilwe ‘Durban Call to Action’ ho sebetsana le bothata ba ho etsa bana makgoba..     Ho etsa bana makgoba ke ntho mpe etswang ke setjhaba mme beha bana pontsheng ya maemo kotsi.
tgt_text: Laba baholi ababili badingide, phakathi kokunye, izindlela zokuthuthukisa ukusebenzisana emikhakheni enjengamandla kagesi kanye nokushintsha kwesimo sezulu, ukuhwebelana kanye notshalomali, kanye nokusabela kwi-COVID-19 kanye nesidingo esikhulu somgomo.

src_text: Ke tlhekefetso mme thibela bana ho fumana thuto le menyetla meng ka ba ntshetsang pele.
tgt_text: Baphinde badlinza kabanzi ngentuthuko ekhona ezwenikazi lase-Afrika kanye nasemazweni omhlaba, kubandakanya nengxabano ese-Ukraine kanye nemithelela yayo eminothweni yamazwe omhlaba kanjalo nokutholakala kokudla kanye namandla kagesi okwanele..     IJalimane ayiyena nje kuphela umlingani wesibili ngobukhulu wokuhwebelana neNingizimu Afrika, kodwa iphinde ibe yisizinda sesithathu esikhulukazi sabavakashi baphesheya kwezilwandle, umtshalimali omkhulu kakhulu kanye nomlingani kwezentuthuko..     Ingqungquthela Yesihlanu Yamazwe Omhlaba Wonke maqondana Nokuqedwa Kokusetshenziswa Kwezingane.

src_text: Ngwana mong le mong wa Afrika Borwa na le tokelo ke keng ya phehiswa ya ho sireletswa diketsong tse sotlang mosebetsing.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamukelile ukusongwa ngempumelelo kweNgqungquthela Yesihlanu Yamazwe Omhlaba Wonke maqondana Nokuqedwa Kokusetshenziswa Kwezingane ebibanjelwe eThekwini kusukela mhla ziyi-15 kuya kumhla zingama-20 kuNhlaba.

Ababambiqhaza abavela emhlabeni wonkana bebehambele le ngqungquthela, ebibanjwe ngokubambisana neNhlangano Yabasebenzi Yamazwe Omhlaba..     Ngemuva kokudingida imikhuba emihle yokusebenza eqaliswe ukusetshenziswa amazwe ahlukahlukene kanye nokuhlonza amagebe kanye nezinyathelo ezisheshayo ezidingekayo ukuze kusheshiswe ukuqedwa kwakho kokubili ukusetshenziswa kwezingane kanye nokusebenza ngempoqo, babe sebamukela isiqubulo esithi ‘Durban Call to Action’ ukuze kubhekwane nalesi sihlava esesiyinsakavukela sokusetshenziswa kwezingane.

src_text: Tokelo ya thuto ya motheo kentswe Molaong wa rona wa Motheo mme ho ya ka Molao wa Dikolo wa Afrika Borwa wa 1996 (Molao 84 wa 1996), “motswadi mong le mong tlameha ho netefatsa hore morutwana mong le mong eo mo hodisang kena sekolo ho tloha letsatsing la pele la sekolo selemong seo ngwana qetang dilemo tse supa ho sona ho fihlela letsatsi la ho qetela la sekolo selemong seo ngwana qetang dilemo tse 15 kapa bang ho kereiti ya borobong ho sona, ho tla ya ka hore ke efe etsahalang pele.” .
tgt_text: Ukusetshenziswa kwezingane kumele umphakathi omubi kakhulu futhi kuvulela izingane ezimweni eziyingozi.

src_text: Ho ya ka Molao wa Bana wa 2005 (Molao 38 wa 2005), “ha ho motho ya ka sebedisang reka fana ka ngwana hore sebetse kapa hire ngwana”     Diqeto tsa Kabinete.
tgt_text: Kuhambelana nokuhlukumeza futhi kuvimbela izingane ukuba zithole imfundo kanye namanye amathuba okuzithuthukisa.

src_text: Kananelo ya ho ba karolo ya Tumellano ya Matjhaba ya Tshireletso ya Batho Bohle ba Nyametswang ke Mapolesa (ICPPED).
tgt_text: Yonke ingane eNingizimu Afrika inelungelo elingenakuphikwa lokuvikelwa emikhubeni yokusetshenziswa ngokuxhashazwa.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana tokomane ya tlhahiso ya ICPPED palamenteng bakeng sa tekolo ha Afrika Borwa lohotha ho ba karolo ya tumellano ena.
Ke tumellano tlamang dinaha tse saenneng tsa Matjhaba Kopaneng (UN) sebetsanang le tlolo ya ditokelo tsa botho ka mokgwa wa ho nyametswa ha batho ke mapolesa.
tgt_text: Ilungelo lokuthola imfundo eyisisekelo libhaliwe kuMthethosisekelo wethu futhi ngokoMthetho Wezikole ZaseNingizimu Afrika, we-1996 (uMthetho wama-84 we-1996), “wonke umzali kufanele enze ukuthi wonke umfundi anesibopho phezu kwakhe aye esikoleni kusukela ngosuku lokuqala lwesikole lonyaka nokufanele lowo mfundi abe neminyaka eyisikhombisa kuze kube wusuku lokugcina lesikole lonyaka nokuyilapho lowo mfundi eyobe eseneminyaka eyi-15 ubudala noma esefunda iBanga lesishiyagalolunye, noma yikuphi okufika kuqala”..     NgokoMthetho Wezingane, wezi-2005 (uMthetho wama-38 wezi-2005), “akekho umuntu ongasebenzisa, athenge noma aqashe ingane enzela ukusetshenziswa kwezingane”     Izinqumo zeKhabhinethi.
Ukungena Esivumelwaneni Samazwe Omhlaba Sokuvikelwa Kwabo Bonke Abantu Ekunyamalaleni Ngempoqo (i-ICPPED) .

src_text: Tumellano hlalosa ho nyametswa ke mapolesa ho qobelletsweng ho kenyeletsa kwetelo, ho tshwarwa ke mapolesa, ho kwallwa kapa mekgwa meng ka bakang hore sesenyi se hane ho dumela kapa se pate hore lehlatsipa le kae..     Ha tumellano se ananetswe kenyeleditswe le melaong ya naha ena, ho tla lebellwa hore Afrika Borwa tlalehele Matjhaba Kopaneng dilemo tse ding le tse ding tse pedi ka kamoo sebedisang tumellano ena kateng.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi igunyaze ukwethulwa kwe-ICPPED ePhalamende ukuze kucutshungulwe ukungena kweNingizimu Afrika esivumelwaneni.

src_text: Tumellano fana ka mehato eo dinaha tseo leng ditho di ka nkang ho thibela ho nyametswa ha batho.
tgt_text: Le sivumelwano siyisibopho emhlabeni wonke jikelele seNhlangano Yezizwe Ezihlangene (i-UN) esibhekana nokwephulwa kwamalungelo abantu ngokunyamalaliswa kwabantu ngempoqo..     Isivumelwano sichaza ukunyamalaliswa ngempoqo ukuthi kubandakanye ukuthunjwa, ukuboshwa, ukuvalelwa noma yiluphi uhlobo okungaholela ekutheni umenzi wobubi anqabe ukuvuma noma afihle imbala lapho kukhona khona umgilwa..     Uma sesamukelwe ukuba sifakwe emithethweni yethu, iNingizimu Afrika kuzolindeleka ukuba ibike njalo ngemuva kweminyaka emibili kwi-UN mayelana nokuthi isisebenzisa kanjani isivumelwane lesi.

src_text: Tlaleho ya Bone ya Naha ya Afrika Borwa ya Tshireletso le Ntshetsopele ya Ditokelo tsa Botho.
tgt_text: Isivumelwano sihlinzeka ngezinyathelo zokuvikeleka okumele amazwe angamalungu aso azisebenzise ukuvimbela ukunyamalaliswa ngempoqo kwabantu emazweni awo ngokwehlukana kwawo..     Umbiko Wezwe wesine weNingizimu Afrika maqondana Nokuvikelwa kanye Nokukhuthazwa Kwamalungelo Abantu.

src_text: Kabinete ananetse tlhahiso ya Tlaleho ya Bone ya Naha ya Tshireletso le Ntshetsopele ya Ditokelo tsa Botho Lekgotleng la Matjhaba Kopaneng la Ditokelo tsa Botho.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi igunyaze ukwethulwa koMbiko Wezwe wesine maqondana Nokuvikelwa kanye Nokukhuthazwa Kwamalungelo Abantu eMkhandlwini Wamalungelo Abantu Wenhlangano Yezizwe Ezinhlangene.

src_text: Tokomane ena tla lekolwa hamorao selemong ke lekala la Matjhaba Kopaneng le lekolang diketsahalo tse amang ditokelo tsa botho dinaheng tseo leng ditho tsa UN.
tgt_text: Ithimba le-UN Lokubuyekezwa Komhlaba Jikelele Ngezikhathi Ezithile elibizwa ngokuthi yi-UN Universal Periodic Review lizowubuyekeza umbiko ekuhambeni kwesikhathi kulo nyaka.

src_text: Afrika Borwa se lekotswe makgetlo mararo esale ba karolo ya Tumellano ya Ditokelo tsa Botho ya Matjhaba Kopaneng, mme tekolo ya ho qetela entswe ka Loetse..     Tlaleho fana ka tsa morao tse mabapi le dikgothaletso tse 187 tse amohetsweng tsa motjha wa tekolo wa.
tgt_text: Selokhu yaqala ukuba ngelinye lamazwe asayinayo kwiSivumelwano se-UN Samalungelo Abantu, iNingizimu Afrika isibuyekezwe amahlandla amathathu, nalapho ubuyekezo lokugcina lwenziwa ngoMandulo wezi-..     Umbiko uhlinzeka ngokwazisa kwakamuva maqondana nezincomo eziyi-187 ezavunywayo ohlelweni lokubuyekezwa lowezi-.

src_text: Ho qotsitswe maikutlo mang dintlheng tse netefaditsweng, tlhahisoleseding tswang mafapheng amehang, ditheo tse tshehetsang demokrasi le mekgatlo ya baahi amehang.
tgt_text: Ukuphawula nezincomo kwathathwa kwimininingo eqinisekisiwe, ulwazi oluvela eminyangweni efanelekile, izikhungo ezasungulwa ngaphansi kweSahluko sesi-9 soMthethosisekelo kanye nezinhlangano zomphakathi ezifanelekile..     IKhabhinethi ijabule kakhulu ngenqubekelaphambili esiyenziwe ukuqalisa ukusetshenziswa kwezincomo kanye nangalezo zindawo ezisasetshenzwa.
Umbiko uzotholakala emphakathini uma usuwethuliwe kwi-UN ngoNcwaba wezi-.

src_text: Kabinete motlotlo ka kgatelopele entsweng ha ho kenngwa tshebetsong dikgothaletso tsena le ka dikarolo tseo ho ntseng ho sebetsanwa le tsona.
tgt_text: Inqubomgomo Yokuphathwa Kwamanzi Asezimayini yowezi-.

src_text: Tlaleho tla phatlalatswa ha se teketswe Mokgatlo wa Matjhaba ka Phato.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi igunyaze inqubomgomo Yokuphathwa Kwamanzi Asezimayini yowezi-2022 ukuba iqaliswe ukusebenza.

src_text: Leano la Botsamaisi ba Metsi Merafo la.
tgt_text: Inqubomgomo ihlinzeka ngezindlela zokuvikela kanye nokulondoloza ukusetshenziswa kwamanzi.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana hore ho kenngwe tshebetsong Leano la Botsamaisi ba Metsi Merafo la.
tgt_text: Yenza kube khona ukuhambelana phakathi kwemisebenzi yezomnotho eyenziwa ezimayini kanye nesibopho sokuhlinzeka ngokusetshenziswa kwamanzi okusimeme ezweni.

src_text: Leano lena le fana ka mekgwa ya ho sireletsa le ho baballa metsi.
tgt_text: Phakathi kokunye ukungenelela, inqubomgomo icacisa ngemisebenzi kanye nezibopho ezikhona ezinhlakeni zontathu zikahulumeni mayelana nezindaba zamanzi asezimayini.

src_text: Le setletsa mesebetsi ya merafong le boikarabello ba merafe ba ho netefatsa tshebediso ya metsi ya ho ya ho ile bakeng sa naha.
tgt_text: Izinguquko ezihlongozwayo zizoxazulula izingqinamba zokufakwa konswinyo kulabo abangcolisa imvelo futhi zizokwenza kube lula ukunxenxela ukusetshenziswa komgomo wokuthi lowo ongcolisile akhokhe.

src_text: Hara tse ding, leano le hlakisa mesebetsi le boikarabello ba makala mararo mmuso malebana le tse amanang le metsi merafo.
tgt_text: Inqubomgomo isungulwe ngokuhambelana noMthetho Kazwelonke Wamanzi, we-1998 (uMthetho wama-36 we-1998).

src_text: Diphetoho tse sisintsweng di tla rarolla mathata ho tlisa dikotlo kgahlano le merafo silafatsang metsi mme di bebofatse   tshebediso ya molao reng ba silafatsang ba lefe.
tgt_text: Umbiko mayelana Nohlakakusebenza oluqondene Nokuhlela Okusabelayo Ezindabeni Zobulili, Ukwabiwa Kwezimali, Ukuhlolwa Kokuqapha kanye Nokucwaningwa Kwamabhuku.

src_text: Leano lena le hlahisitswe ho ikamahantswe le Molao wa Naha wa Metsi, 1998 (Molao wa 36 wa 1998).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi yamukele umbiko wenqubekelaphambili esiyenziwe maqondana nokuqalisa ukusebenza koHlakakusebenza oluqondene Nokuhlela Okusabelayo Ezindabeni Zobulili, Ukwabiwa Kwezimali, Ukuhlolwa Kokuqapha kanye Nokucwaningwa Kwamabhuku.

src_text: Tlaleho ya Moralotshebetso Nahanelang Bong wa Merero, Ditekanyetso tsa Ditjhelete, Tekolo ya Peholeihlo le Bohlahlobi ba Dibuka tsa Ditjhelete.

Kabinete amohetse tlaleho ya kgatelopele ya ho kenngwa tshebetsong ha Moralotshebetso Nahanelang Bong wa Merero, Ditekanyetso tsa Ditjhelete, Tekolo ya Pehololeihlo le Bohlahlobi ba Dibuka tsa Ditjhelete.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iyincomile inqubekelaphambili enkulu eyenziwe iningi leminyango kahulumeni ekufakeni ezinhlelweni zayo uhlakakusebenza olwamukelwa ngowezi-2019 ukuze luqale ukusebenza.

src_text: Kabinete amohetse kgatelopele matla entsweng ke mafapha fapaneng mmuso kentseng tshebetsong moralotshebetso ananetsweng ka..     Mafapha mang se behile pele maano tla tataisa mananeo matjha tla shebana le ditlhoko tsa basadi, batjha le batho ba sa itekanelang.
Kabinete kopile hore ho be le mekgwa matla ya peholeihlo le tlaleho, haholoholo mafapheng so kenye ditlaleho tsa ona..     Puisano ya Batjha ya ho Tlotla Nelson Mandela (NMYD).
tgt_text: Iminyango eminingi isiqalise ukusebenza izinto eziseqhulwini zenqubomgomo ezizoqondisa izinhlelo zokuhlukaniswa ngemikhakha ezisophe abantu besifazane, intsha kanye nabantu abaphila nokukhubazeka.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana hore ho be le NMYD selemo le selemo ho tloha ka.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi isinxuse ukuba kube khona ukuqapha okuqinile kanye nokubika, ikakhulukazi kule eminye iminyango ebingakaqali ukubika.

src_text: NMYD ya pele tla ba ka la 07 ho ya ho la 20 Phupu.
tgt_text: Inkulumo-mpendulwano Yentsha ka-Nelson Mandela (i-NMYD).

src_text: Bona ke boiteko ba Bopresidente ba ho neha batjha ba kontinente ena lepatlelo la ho tshwara ditherisano tse ahang ka ditaba tse ba amang..     Dipuisano tsena tse tla bua ka Mopresidente wa mehleng ya hlomphuwang haholo matjhabeng Nelson Rolihlahla Mandela, di tla thakgola meqoqo amanang le ho otlella tlwaelo ya boetapele bo kgabane Afrika..     Dipuisanong tsena batjha ba tla nehwa monyetla wa ho abelana ka botjhaba ba bona.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ivumile ukuba i-NMYD yenzeke njalo ngonyaka kusuka ngowezi-.

src_text: Boiteko bona bo tla boela bo matlafatse dikamano tsa batho ka ho otloloha hara batjha ba kontinente.
tgt_text: I-NMYD yokuqala ngqa izobanjwa kusukela mhla ziyi-7 kuya mhla zingama-20 kuNtulikazi.

src_text: Lefapha la Basadi, Batjha le Batho ba sa Itekanelang le tla fana ka dintlha tsa lenaneo la diketsahalo hamorao..     Tlaleho ya Selemo le Selemo ya Peholeihlo ya Tshebetso ya Ntlafatso ya Basadi le Tekano ya Bong, Ntshetsopele ya Batjha le Ntshetsopele ya Ditokelo tsa Batho ba sa Itekanelang ya 2021/.
tgt_text: Lolu uhlelo oluphethwe yihhovisi likaMongameli elinikeza intsha yaseZwenikazi lethu inkundla yokuxoxisana ngezinkulumo-mpendulwano ezakhayo maqondana nezinkinga ebhekene nazo.

src_text: Kabinete fumane tlaheho ya selemo le selemo ya peholeihlo ya tshebetso ya 2021/22 malebana le ntlafatso ya basadi, batjha le batho ba sa itekanelang.

Tlaleho latella ditshupo tsa bohlokwa ntshetsopeleng ya tekatekano, boemo ba khiro le thuo le seabo sa dihlopha tsena tsa batho diketsahalong tsa mafapha le ditheo tsa mmuso..     Tlaleho bokeleditswe ho ikamahantswe le moralo, tekanyetso ya ditjhelete, peholeihlo, tekolo le moralotshebetso wa Hlahlobo ya Dibuka tsa Ditjhelete tsepameng ho bong ananetsweng ke Kabinete ka     Dibili.
tgt_text: Izinkulumo-mpendulwano – isisekelo sazo sizoba ngaphansi kwegama lengqalabutho yethu eyaziwa umhlaba wonke nowayenguMongameli waphambilini u-Nelson Rolihlahla Mandela – zizoqala izingxoxo ezizogxilisa usiko lobuholi obuqotho e-Afrika.

src_text: Bili ya Tlhomathiso ya Bophelo bo Botle le Polokeho Merafong.
tgt_text: Zizonikeza abantu abasha ithuba lokwabelana ngamagugu amasiko abo anothile.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho phatlalatswa ha Bili ya Tlhomathiso ya Bophelo bo Botle le Polokeho bakeng sa hore setjhaba se ntshe maikutlo ka yona.
tgt_text: Lolu hlelo luzophinda luqinise ubudlelwano kumuntu nomuntu phakathi kwentsha yasezwenikazi lethu.

src_text: Sepheo ka Bili ena ke ho ntlafatsa bophelo bo botle le polokeho tsa basebetsi ba merafong, ho kenyeletsa tikoloho eo tshebetso ya merafong etsahalang ho yona.
tgt_text: UMnyango Wabantu Besifazane, Intsha, Abantu Abaphila Nokukhubazeka uzohlinzeka ngemininingwane yohlelo lwemicimbi ekuhambeni kwesikhathi.

src_text: Bili fetola Molao wa jwale wa Bophelo bo Botle le Polokeho Merafong wa 1996 (Molao wa 29 wa 1996).
tgt_text: Umbiko Wonyaka Wokuqapha Ukusebenza wezi-2021/2022 maqondana Nokusimamiswa Kwabantu Besifazane kanye Nokulingana Ngokobulili, Ukuthuthukiswa Kwentsha kanye Nokukhuthazwa Kwamalungelo Abantu Abaphila Nokukhubazeka.

src_text: Hara tse ding ditlhomathiso tse lokisitsweng di hlakisa dikgopolo tse ding tse kahara Molao, di matlafatse moralotshebetso wa bophelo bo botle le polokeho mme di amahanye le mekgwa ya tshebetso tswang pele lefatsheng ha ho tluwa ho tsa polokeho merafong.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi yamukele umbiko wonyaka wokuqapha ukusebenza wezi-2021/22 maqondana nokusimamiswa kwabantu besifazane, intsha kanye nabantu abaphila nokukhubazeka.

src_text: Bili ya Tlhomathiso ya Molaotheo ya Leshome le Metso Robedi ya.
tgt_text: Umbiko ulandelela izinkomba ezisemqoka ekukhuthazweni kokulingana, izinga lokuqashwa kanye nobunikazi kanye nokubandakanywa kwalawa maqembu abantu emisebenzini yeminyango kanye nezikhungo eziphethwe nguhulumeni.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho phatlalatswa ha Bili ya Tlhomathiso ya Molaotheo ya Leshome le Metso Robedi ya 2022 hore setjhaba se ntshe maikutlo ka yona le hore Letona la Toka le Ditshebeletso tsa Ditjhankana, Monghadi Ronald Lamola ntshe tsebiso nang le dintlha tsa tlhomathiso sisintsweng ya Molaotheo.
tgt_text: Umbiko uhlanganiswe ngokuqhathaniswa nokuhlelwa kwesabiwomali esisabelayo ezindabeni zobulili, ukuqapha, ukulinganisa kanye nohlakakusebenza lokucwaningwa kwamabhuku olwamukelwa yiKhabhinethi ngowezi-     IMithethosivivinywa.

src_text: Bili fetola Karolo ya 6(1) ya Molaotheo wa Rephaboliki ya Afrika Borwa wa 1996 tsebahatsang hore dipuo tsa semmuso tsa Afrika Borwa tse 11 ke Sepedi, Sesotho, Setswana, siSwati, Tshivenḓa, Xitsonga, Afrikaans, English, isiNdebele, isiXhosa le isiZulu..     Ditlhomathiso di tla tlisa hlompho Puong ya Matsoho ya Afrika Borwa (SASL) jwaloka puo ya bo-12 ya semmuso naheng ena mme sena se tla ntshetsa pele puo le ba buang se boele se tiise tekano ya ditokelo tsa Maafrika Borwa ohle, ho sa kgathallehe maemo bona.
tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa Wokuchibiyela Wezempilo Ezimayini kanye Nezokuphepha.

src_text: Lefapha la Thuto ya Motheo le se le ananetse Puo ya Matsoho jwalo ka puo ya lapeng     Diketsahalo tse Tlang.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi igunyaze ukushicilelwa koMthethosivivinywa Wokuchibiyela Wezempilo Ezimayini kanye Nezokuphepha ukuze kutholwe imibono yomphakathi ngawo.

src_text: Beke ya Tshireletso ya Bana.
tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa uhlose ukwenza ngcono ezempilo kanye nezokuphepha kwabasebenzi basezimayini, kubandakanya nendawo lapho imisebenzi yasezimayini yenzelwa khona.

src_text: Afrika Borwa tla keteka Beke ya Tshireletso ya Bana ya Naha ho tloha ho la 29 Motsheanong ho ya ho la 4 Phuptjane 2022 tlasa mookotaba reng: “A re Sireletseng Bana nakong ya COVID-19 le Kamora moo.”.
tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa uchibiyela uMthetho wamanje Wezempilo Ezimayini kanye Nezokuphepha, we-1996 (uMthetho wama-29 we-1996).

src_text: Bekeng ena ho tla tsepamiswa maikutlo ntlheng kgolo naheng ya ho ima ha batjha leng ntho totileng haholo ka nako ya COVID-19 ha batjha ba bangata ba beleha ka..     Kabinete ipileditse ho batswadi, mekgatlo ya baahi, ya ditumelo tse fapaneng le baahi ka kakaretso ho sebedisana le ho thusa ho lwantsha keketseho ya ho ima ha batjha..     Seboka sa Lefatshe sa Moruo (WEF).
tgt_text: Izichibiyelo ezibuyekeziwe zihlinzeka, phakathi kokunye, ukucacisa amanye amagama akhona kuMthetho, ziqinisa uhlakakusebenza lokulawula ezempilo kanye nezokuphepha futhi ziluhambelanise nezindlela zokusebenza ezingungqaphambili emazweni omhlaba mayelana nezokuphepha ezimayini..     UMthethosivivinywa Wokuchitshiyelwa KoMthethosisekelo Kweshumi Nesishiyagalombili wezi-2022 .

src_text: Afrika Borwa na le seabo ho WEF tla tshwarelwa Davos-Klosters, Switzerland ho tloha ka la 22 ho ya ho la 26 Motsheanong 2022, tlasa mookotaba reng: “Re Sebetsa Mmoho ho Kgutlisa Tshepo”.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi igunyaze ukushicilelwa koMthethosivivinywa Wokuchitshiyelwa KoMthethosisekelo Kweshumi Nesishiyagalombili wezi-2022 ukuze kutholwe imibono yomphakathi ngawo kanye nokuthi uNgqongqoshe Wezobulungiswa kanye Nezinsizakalo Zokuhlunyeleliswa Kwezimilo, uMnu Ronald Lamola, angasikhipha isaziso esinemininingwane yesichibiyelo esihlongozwayo kuMthethosisekelo..     UMthethosivivinywa uchibiyela iSigaba 6(1) soMthethosisekelo weRiphabhulikhi YaseNingizimu Afrika we-1996, esazisa ngokuthi izilimi eziyi-11 ezisemthethweni eNingizimu Afrika yiSepedi, Sesotho, Setswana, Siswati, Tshivenda, Xitsonga, isiBhunu, isiNgisi, isiNdebele, isiXhosa kanye nesiZulu..     Izichibiyelo zizokwazisa noma zizokwethula uLimi Lwezimpawu LwaseNingizimu Afrika (i-SASL) njengolimi lwe-12 olusemthethweni lakuleli lizwe futhi zizothuthukisa ukwamukelwa kwalo ngokwamasiko ziphinde ziqinisekise amalungelo alinganayo kubo bonke abantu baseNingizimu Afrika, kungakhathalekile ukukhubazeka kwabo abaphila nakho.

src_text: Afrika Borwa thabela monyetla wa ho ba karolo ya tharollo le ho abelana ka boiphihlelo ba rona sebokeng sa lefatshe.
tgt_text: UMnyango Wemfundo Eyisisekelo usuvele uyayamukela i-SASL njengolimi lwasekhaya     Imicimbi Ezayo.

src_text: Boteng ba rona WEF bo bohlokwa haholo ho phahamiseng lebitso la rona sebakeng sa matsete sa lefatshe, ho abelana le lefatshe ponelopele ya rona ya bokamoso le ho totobatsa tse ntjha tse seng di sibollotswe kahara naha..     Kgwedi ya Batjha.
tgt_text: Isonto Lokuvikelwa Kwabantwana.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana Lenaneo la Kgwedi ya Batjha la 2022 tlasa mookotaba reng: “Ntshetsopele ya mekgwa ya ho iphedisa ya moshwelella ya batjha le matla bona molemong wa bokamoso bo tjhatsi.”.
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika izoqala iSonto Likazwelonke Lokuvikelwa Kwabantwana kusukela mhla zingama-29 kuNhlaba kuya mhla zi-4 kuNhlangulana 2022 ngaphansi kwendikimba ethi: “Asivikeleni Abantwana ngesikhathi se-COVID-19 Nangemuva Kwayo”..     Kuleli sonto, kuzogxilwa kakhulu odabeni oluthinta uzwelonke lokukhulelwa kwamatshitshi, okubonakale kudlondlobala ngesikhathi se-COVID-19 lapho kubonakale amatshitshi amaningi ethola izingane ubuthaphuthaphu ngowezi-..     IKhabhinethi inxenxe ukuba kube nomzamo ohlanganyelwe owenziwa ngabazali, izinhlangano zomphakathi, amaqoqo amabandla ahlukene kanye nomphakathi ngobubanzi ukusiza ukuguqula isimo sokudlondlobala kokukhulelwa kwamatshitshi.

src_text: Letsatsi la Batjha le tla ketekwa semmuso Kapa Botjhabela..     Monongwaha ho tla be ho ketekwa selemo sa bo-46 esale baithuti ba itseka ka la 16 Phupjane 1976, Soweto, ba ipelaetsa kgahlano le ho qobellwa ho ithuta dithuto kaofela ka puo ya Afrikaans ke mmuso wa kgethollo..     Ka moya oo wa Phuptjane 1976, Kabinete ipileditse ho batjha ba naha ena ho lwantsha tlhokeho ya mosebetsi ntseng eketseha ya batjha ka ho ba le seabo mananeong ntshetsopele kang thupelo ya mosebetsi lebisang ho fumaneng mangolo, le mananeo thupelo ya mosebetsi bakeng sa ba seng ba na le mangolo..     Mmuso sibollotse mananeo nang le molemong wa ho tshehetsa ho thehwa ha mesebetsi bakeng sa batjha le ho thehwa ha mesebetsi ya nakwana.
tgt_text: Inkundla Yezomnotho Womhlaba (i-WEF).

src_text: Dikgwebo le tsona di kgothaletswa ho hohella batjha mosebetsing ka ho ba thehela menyetla ya mesebetsi..     Lenaneo la batjha bakeng sa kgwedi ya Phuptjane le kenyeletsa diketsahalo tse fapaneng ho tloha ho thakgolweng ha letsholo la dipulamadiboho tsa batjha, ho thakgolweng ha Lenaneo la Moemedi wa Letshwao wa NYDA le diketsahalo tse ding tsa tshebeletso ya naha ya Batjha naheng ka bophara.
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika ibambe iqhaza kwi-WEF e-Davos-Klosters, e-Switzerland kusukela mhla zingama-22 kuya mhla zingama-26 kuNhlaba 2022, ngaphansi kwendikimba ethi: “Sisebenza Ndawonye, Sibuyisa Ithemba”..     INingizimu Afrika iyalazisa kakhulu ithuba lokuba yingxenye yesisombululo kanye nokwabelana ngezimo zethu esesike sabhekana nazo enkundleni yomhlaba wonke.

src_text: Letona la Basadi, Batjha le Batho ba sa Itekanelang Lefapheng la Bopresidente haufinyane le tla hlakisa lenaneo kaofela.
tgt_text: Ukuba khona kwezwe lethu kwi-WEF kuphinde kube semqoka kakhulu ekukhuliseni isithunzi sethu njengendawo umhlaba wonke ongatshala kuyona izimali, ukwabelana nomhlaba wonke umbono wethu wekusasa kanye nokuqhakambisa intuthuko entsha eyenzeka ezweni lethu.

src_text: Ho lebelletswe hore diketsahalo tsohle tsa batjha di ikamahanye le melawana ya bophelo bo botle ya COVID-.
tgt_text: Inyanga Yentsha.

src_text: Seboka sa Lefatshe la Metseng ya Mahae.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi igunyaze Uhlelo Lwenyanga Yentsha yowezi-2022 ngaphansi kwendikimba ethi: “Ukukhuthaza ukuziphilisa okusimeme kanye nokuphikelela kwabantu abasha ukuze babe nekusasa elingcono”.

src_text: Mmuso, ka tshebedisano le ntlo ya Naha ya Baetapele ba Setso tla ba le Seboka sa Lefatshe la Metseng ya Mahae ka Labohlano la la 27 le ka Moqebelo wa la 28 Motsheanong 2022 molemong wa ho buisana ka ditaba tse amanang le thuo ya mobu..     Ditaba tsena di kenyeletsa motjha wa ho tloswa ha lefatshe la metseng ya mahae Mmusong le iswa ho beng ba lona ba loketseng leng se bohlokwa bakeng sa matlafatso ya baahi ba metseng ya mahae.
tgt_text: Usuku Lwentsha olusemthethweni luzogujelwa eMpumalanga Kapa.

src_text: Ho se be teng ha thuo ya lefatshe ka molao metseng ya mahae ho fokodisa ditokelo tsa beng ba lefatshe le ho fokotsa bokgoni ba bona ba ho le sebedisetsa ho ntlafatsa maphelo bona le maemo bona ditjhelete     Melaetsa.

MahlohonoloKabinete lebohisitse le ho lebisa ditakalletso tse ntle ho: Mme Leanne Manas, sebohodi sa lenaneo la SABC la Morning Live, ya hlomphilweng ka Kgau Tlotlang Tshebetso Ipabotseng ya France ho tswa naheng ya France ka Labobedi la la 17 Motsheanong 2022, bakeng sa seabo sa hae boqolotsing ba ditaba, kgasong le mesebetsing meng fapaneng ya ho thusa setjhaba.
tgt_text: Lo nyaka uwunyaka wama-46 wokubungaza izibhelu zabafundi zangomhla ziyi-16 kuNhlangulana 1976 e-Soweto lapho abantu abasha babhikishela khona ukufakwa ngempoqo kwesiBhunu umbuso wobandlululo njengolimi lokufunda nokufundisa.

src_text: MatshedisoKabinete lebisitse matshediso malapeng le metswalleng ya bana: Monghadi Mpho Moerane (52), Ramotse wa mehleng wa Masepala wa Johannesburg, eo neng le radipolotiki ya neng lwanela ditokelo tsa batho bile le mohlanka wa batho ba Johannesburg.
tgt_text: Ngokuvunguza komoya kaNhlangulana we-1976, iKhabhinethi inxuse intsha yakuleli lizwe ukuba ilwisane nenselelo yokwenyuka kokungasebenzi kwentsha ngokuthi ibambe iqhaza ezinhlelweni ezithuthukisayo ezinjengokufundela umsebenzi kanye nokufundela ukwenza umsebenzi ngaphakathi enkampanini..     Uhulumeni usesungule izinhlelo zokweseka ukuqashwa kwentsha kanye nokusungulwa kwemisebenzi yesikhathi esifushane.

src_text: Pele e ba Ramotse bile setho sa Komiti ya Ramotse ya Tikoloho le Meralo ya Ditshebeletso.
tgt_text: Amabhizinisi nawo ayagqugquzelwa ukuba aqashe abantu abasha abaningi ngokusungula amathuba emisebenzi yentsha..     Uhlelo lwentsha lwenyanga yonke kaNhlangulana lubandakanya imisebenzi enhlobonhlobo kusukela ekwethulweni komkhankaso wamavulandlela amancane, ukwethulwa koHlelo Lwenxusa Le-NYDA kanye nokuvulwa kwamagatsha amaningi eNsizakalo Kazwelonke Yentsha ezweni lonkana..     UNgqongqoshe eHhovisi likaMongameli Wabantu Besifazane, Intsha kanye Nabantu Abaphila Nokukhubazeka uzothukulula maduze nje uhlelo lonke oluphelele.

src_text: Ngaka Deborah Fraser (56), sebini se hapileng dikgau tse ngata mminong wa sedumedi se neng se sa tswa hlomphuwa ka Doctor of Philosophy in Sacred Music ke Christian Leadership Academy.Ngaka Namane Magau (70), serutehi se neng se hlompheha bile le setho se hlomphehang sa Boto ya Bahlokomedi ba Ditjhelete ba Lekgotla la Naha la AIDS Afrika Borwa.Monghadi Mike Schüssler (60), eo neng le setsebi se hlomphehang sa moruo Afrika Borwa le mokaubere indastering ena mme na le maikutlo tjhatsi ka maemo moruo wa Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: Yonke imisebenzi yentsha kuzolindeleka ukuba ithobele imigomo yezempilo ye-COVID-.

src_text: Monghadi Jamie Bartlett (56), sebapadi se neng se tlotlwa Afrika Borwa sa kalaneng le dipapadi tsa thelevisheneng se neng se hapile dikgau tse ngata, se tumme ka seabo sa sona jwaloka Mike O'Reilly ho Isidingo le David Genaro ho Rhythm City.
tgt_text: Inkomfa Yomhlaba Womphakathi.

src_text: Kabinete mmoho le Mopresidente Ramaphosa ba boetse ba lebisitse matshediso mmusong le bathong ba United Arab Emirates (UAE) kamora ho hlokahala ha Mopresidente Sheikh Khalifa bin Zayed Al Nahyan (73) wa UAE      KhiroHo tlameha hore ho netefatswe mangolo thuteho ba hirwang mme ho netefatswe hore ha ba so ka ba tlola molao.
tgt_text: Uhulumeni, ngokubambisana neNdlu Kazwelonke Yabaholi Bendabuko, uzobamba Inkomfa Yomhlaba Womphakathi ngoLwesihlanu, mhla zingama-27 kanye noMgqibelo, mhla zingama-28 kuNhlaba 2022 ukuzodingida izindaba eziphathelene nobunikazi bomhlaba..     Lezi zindaba zibandakanya nohlelo lokudluliswa komhlaba womphakathi ususwa kuMbuso unikezwa abanikazi bawo bangempela abafanelekile, okusemqoka kakhulu ukuze kusimamiswe imiphakathi yasezindaweni ezisemakhaya.

src_text: Monghadi Bongani Sinenhlanhla Dladla ke Mohlanka ya ka Sehloohong wa Phethahatso Botong ya Ntshetsopele ya Indasteri ya tsa Kaho.
tgt_text: Ukwentuleka kobunikazi obusemthethweni bomhlaba ezindaweni ezisetshenziswa imiphakathi ngokuhlanganyela akuthunazi kuphela amalungelo abantu okukwazi ukuba abanikazi bomhlaba abaphila kuwona kodwa kuphinde kunqinde amandla abo okuwusebenzisa ngendlela ezokwenza ngcono izimpilo zabo ngakwezomnotho     Imiyalezo.

src_text: Mongadi Shabeer Hamid Khan ke Akhaontente Kgolo Matlotlong Naha..     Mme Mendoe Ntswahlana ke Mohlanka ya ka Sehloohong Thekong ya Thepa, Matlotlong Naha..     Kabinete dumellane le ho hirwa ha ba latelang bakeng sa ho tlatswa ha dikgeo Botong ya Balaodi ya Letlole le Leholo la Eneji     Monghadi Mosimaneotsile Jim Besnaar; (ii)    Mme Unati Nombakuse-Figlan.
tgt_text: SiyanihalaliselaIKhabhinethi idlulise amazwi ayo okuhalalisa kanye nezifiso ezinhle ku: Nksz Leanne Manas, Umethuli Wohlelo Lwasekuseni kwa-SABC, ohlonishwe ngendondo ye-Knight of the French National Order Merit ngoLwesibili, mhla ziyi-17 kuNhlaba wezi-2022, ngegalelo lakhe emsebenzini wobuntatheli, umthombo wezindaba kanye neminye imisebenzi enhlobonhlobo esemqoka yesihe nokunikela emphakathini..     Amazwi Enduduzo IKhabhinethi idlulise amazwi enduduzo nokuzwelana nomndeni kanye nabangani baka: Mnu Mpho Moerane (52), uSodolobha Omkhulu Wedolobha LaseGoli wangaphambilini, futhi obeyisishoshovu sezepolitiki impilo yakhe yonke kanye nomsebenzeli wabantu baseGoli.

src_text: Moruo.
tgt_text: Umnotho .

src_text: Kabinete ananetse kgatelopele tsa morao tjena tse kgothatsang, maitekong mmuso ao sepheo ka ona leng ho kgothaletsa kgolo ya moruo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi yamukele izingenelelo zezwe ezinhle zakamuva ezihlose ukufukula ukukhula komnotho.

src_text: Ho ya ka dipalopalo tsa morao tjena tsa tlhokeho ya mosebetsi tse tswang ho ba Dipalopalo Afrika Borwa, tlhokeho ya mosebetsi fokotsehile ho tloha dipersenteng tse.
tgt_text: Ngokwezibalo zakamuva zabantu abangasebenzi ezibuya kwabeZezibalo eNingizimu Afrika, izinga labantu abangasebenzi lehle kusuka kumaphesenti angama-.

src_text: 3 kotareng ya bone ya 2021 ho ya dipersenteng tse.
tgt_text: 3 kwikota yesine yangowezi-2021 laya kumaphesenti angama-.

src_text: 5 kotareng ya pele ya.
tgt_text: 5 kwikota yokuqala yangowezi-.

src_text: Ke kotara ya bobedi jwale sekgahla se atolositsweng sa tlhokeho ya mosebetsi se fokotseha.
tgt_text: Izinga lokungasebenzi lehlile kumakota amabili elandelana.

src_text: Mesebetsi mengata fumanwe makaleng ditshebeletso tsa baahi le setjhaba, makaleng tlhahiso le bohwebi.
tgt_text: Imiphumela emihle yalo msebenzi ibonakale kwizinsizakalo zomphakathi nezenhlalo, ekukhiqizeni nasekuhwebeni..     Umkhiqizo wonyaka wezwe kwikota yokuqala yangowezi-2022 ukhule ngo-.
9% lokho okubeka isilinganiso somnotho wethu kumazinga ayeyiwo ngaphambi kokufika kobhubhane.

src_text: Tlhahiso yohle ya kahara naha kotareng ya pele ya 2022 hodile ka persente tse.
tgt_text: Kwikota, umkhakha wezokukhiqiza wawungummongo wezomnotho ngenxa yokukhula ekukhiqizeni uwoyela namakhemikhali, ukudla neziphuzo, kanye nezinsimbi nemishini.

src_text: 9% mme sena sa lekanya moruo wa rona le nakong ya pele ho sewa sena.
tgt_text: Le mpumelelo emaphakathi ibonisa ukuthi umnotho wethu usalokhu uqinile futhi izingenelelo ezifana noHlelo Lokwakha Kabusha Nokuvuselela Umnotho zithola umfutho.

src_text: Kotareng eo, lekala la tlhahiso bile lona le sebetsang ka matla mme le bile le kgolo tlhahisong ya petroliamo le dikhemikhale, dijo le dino, le dimethale le metjhini..     Phaello tsena tse itekanetseng di bontsha hore moruo wa rona ntse le matla le hore maiteko kang Leano la Tlhophisobotjha le Tsoseletso ya Moruo ntse matlafala.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi icela wonke umuntu ukuthi aseke amabhizinisi alapha ekhaya kanye nezimboni ngokuthi bathenge imikhiqizo kanye nezinsizakalo zalapha ekhaya.

src_text: Kabinete ipiletsa ho bohle ho tshehetsa dikgwebo le diindasteri tsa lehae ka ho reka dihlahiswa le ditshebeletso tsa tsona..     Kabinete boetse ananetse qeto ya mokgatlo wa ditekolo wa S&P Global ya ho lekolabotjha maemo Afrika Borwa ho kgona ho lefa melato ya yona – ho tloha maemong tsitsitseng ho ya ho matle.
Mokgatlo ona boetse behile bokgoni ba naha ba ho lefa melato ya ditjhelete tsa dinaha tse ding ho BB minus le ya tjhelete ya kwano ho BB.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iphinde yamukela isinqumo se-ejensi ehlola isimo sezimali i-S&P Global sokubuyekeza isimo sezikweletu seNingizimu Afrika - kusuka kwesizinzile kuya kwesihle kakhulu.

src_text: Theko ya tsa ho Iphedisa.
tgt_text: I-ejensi ehlola isimo sezimali iphinde yaqinisekisa ukuthi ukukwazi ukumelana nezikweletu kwesikhathi eside kume ku-BB minus naku-BB ngokulandelana.

src_text: Lefu la Coronavirus (COVID-19) le ntwa ntseng tswela pele lefatsheng di bile le kameho matla thekong ya tsa ho iphedisa lefatsheng ka bophara.

Maafrika Borwa le ona tsieditswe ke theko nyolohang ya mafura, dijo le tse ding tsa bohlokwa..     Re lokela ho sebetsa mmoho, re thusane re boele re baballe disebediswa tsa rona nakong tsena tse boima.
tgt_text: Izindleko zokuphila  .

src_text: Mmuso etsa ka hohle kamoo ka kgonang kateng ho thusa bohle, haholoholo ba futsanehileng..     Banka ya Afrika Borwa Kgolo sebetsang hantle matla le ikemetseng thusa ho sireletsa setjhaba ditlamoraong tsa boleng ba tjhelete ka ho tsitlallela infleishene seng batsi tlase ha ho bapiswa le ya dinaha tse ding..     Kabinete ananetse qeto ya Matlotlo Naha ya ho eketsa nako ya ho fokotswa ha Lekgetho la Mafura la Kakaretso (GFL).
tgt_text: Ubhubhane lweSifo Segciwane le-Corona (i-COVID-19) kanye nokungqubuzana emazweni omhlaba okuqhubekayo kube nomthelela omkhulu kakhulu ezindlekweni zokuphila emhlabeni jikelele.

src_text: GFL fokoditswe ka  50 bakeng sa litara ya mafura ka Mmesa le Motsheanong, mme sena se tla tswela pele le ho tloha ho la 1 Phuptjane ho ya ho la 6 Phupu.
tgt_text: Abantu baseNingizimu Afrika nabo badiniwe ukukhuphuka kwamanani ophethiloli, ukudla kanye nemikhiqizo ebalulekile..     Sonke kudingeka ukuthi sibambisane, sisizane futhi sigcine izinsiza zethu kulesi sikhathi esinzima.
Uhulumeni wenza konke okusemandleni ukuhlinzeka ngosizo kuwo wonke umuntu, ikakhulukazi labo abadla imbuya ngothi.

src_text: Kabinete boetse ananetse qeto ya Khomeshene ya Ditlhodisano ya ho beha ditheko tsa dintho tsa bohlokwa leihlo, haholoholo pehelo ya hore dikgwebo di lokela ho fana ka mabaka ho eketsa ditheko tsa dihlahiswa..     Kopano ya tsa Kgwebo ya Japan le Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: IBhangengodla lethu laseNingizimu Afrika elisebenza kahle, eliqinile futhi elizimele lisiza ukuba yihawu lomphakathi ukuthi ungacekelwa phansi ukwehla kwamandla emali ngokuthi iyigcine isesilinganisweni esibekiwe; okungaphansi kwalokho okubhekane namanye amazwe amaningi njengamanje.

src_text: Kabinete ananetse diphetho tsa Kopano ya morao ya tsa Kgwebo ya Japan le Afrika Borwa, eo ho yona ho dumellanweng ka lenaneo le leholo la mosebetsi le kenyeletsang tshebedisano ho tlisweng ha diphetoho ho tsa tikoloho, ditheknolojing tsa dipalangwang tsa motlakase le mehlodi ya motlakase ya tsa tlhaho..     Kopanong ho boetse ho dumellanwe ka hore ho be le letsholo la marangranng la ho hlakisa menyetla teng Afrika Borwa ho beng ba dikgwebo ba Japan, ntshetsopele ya boiphihlelo indastering ya lehae ya tlhahiso ya makoloi, menyetla ya tlhahiso le phapanyetsano ya boiphihlelo ho tsa tekgniki..     Japan ke nngwe ya dinaha tseo leng balekane ba bohlokwa kgwebisanong le rona mme tsetela haholo makaleng fapaneng Afrika Borwa, ho tloha ho tsa tlhahiso ya makoloi ho ya metjhining tswang pele ya merafong, le ho tloha ho kgwebo ho tsa temothuo ho ya ditshebeletsong tsa ditjhelete..     Kabinete boetse ananetse ho thehwa ha Mokgwatshebetso wa Barekisetsi ba Dinaheng tse ding ba Batho ba Batsho ke Lefapha la Kgwebisano, Diindasteri le Ditlhodisano (dtic), molemong wa ho kopanya difeme tse romelang thepa entsweng naheng ena dinaheng tse ding lefatsheng.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi yamukele isinqumo somnyango weZamafa kuZwelonke ukwelula isikhathi sokuncishiswa kweNtela Kaphethiloli i-General Fuel Levy (i-GFL).

src_text: Mokgwatshebeso ona tla thusa kabelanong ya tlhahisoleseding, bokgoni le tsebo, mme tsamaya mehlaleng ya dikatleho tsa Lenaneo la Beng ba Diindasteri ba Batho ba Batsho.
tgt_text: I-GFL yehliswa nge-R. 50 ilitha elilodwa ngoMbasa nangoNhlaba, futhi lizoqhubeka kusuka mhla lu-1 kuNhlangulana kuze kube umhla wesi-6 kuNtulikazi.

src_text: Eneji.
Mehato ya rona ya ho netefatsa boteng ba motlakase sa timeng  nako telele matlafaditswe kamora hore ho nehelanwe ka Karolo ya 4 ya Sebaka sa ho Fehla Motlakase sa Kusile, Mpumalanga.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iphinde yamukela isinqumo seKhomishini Yokuncintisana sokuqapha ngeso lokhozi amanani okudla okusemqoka, ikakhulukazi ukuthi amabhizinisi kumele abe nezizathu ezibonakalayo zokukhuphula amanani.

src_text: Ho nehelana hona ke letshwao la phihlello ya bohlokwa matsapeng Eskom ho tsitsisa mokgwatshebetso wa motlakase mme ho tla eketsa dimekawate (MW) tse 800 keriting ya matla..     Kabinete elelletswe hore kaho ya dikarolo tse nne tsa tse tsheletseng tsa ho fehla motlakase phethetswe projekeng ya Kusile ya ho Fehla Motlakase..     Kabinete ananetse ho eketswa ha bokgoni bo bong ba ho fehla motlakase keriting leng ntho kgonahaditsweng ke ho dumella bahlahisi ba motlakase ba ikemetseng hore ba hlahise motlakase.
tgt_text: UMhlangano Wezamabhizinisi phakathi kweJalimani neNingizimu Afrika.

src_text: Mmuso sa tswa saena tumellano ya ho reka dimekawate tse 150 ho Scatec ASA, bao leng bahlahisi ba motlakase tswang mehloding ya tlhaho..     Lekgotla la Boeletsi la Matlafatso ya Batho ba Batsho Batsi Moruong (B-BBEE).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi yamukele imiphumela yoMhlangano Wezamabhizinisi phakathi kweJalimani neNingizimu Afrika, ebivumelana nohlelo lomsebenzi obandakanya ukusebenzisana kwezimboni ezingangcolisi imvelo, ubuchwepheshe bezimoto ezihamba ngogesi kanye nehayidrojini engangcolisi imvelo..     Umhlangano uphinde wavumelana 'ngombukiso' ozokwenziwa ngobuchwepheshe be-inthanethi wokuqhakambisa amathuba eNingizimu Afrika kumabhizinisi amaningi aseJalimani, ukuthuthukiswa kwamakhono embonini eyakha izimoto yalapha ekhaya, izindlela zokusebenza ezehlukene kumathuba okukhiqiza kanye nokwabelana ngamakhono obuchwepheshe.

src_text: Kabinete ananetse ho kgethwa ha Lekgotla le letjha la naha la Boeletsi la B-BBEE.
