tgt_text: IJalimani ingomunye wabalingani bethu ababaluleke kakhulu kwezohwebo kanye nomtshalizimali ohamba phambili emikhakheni eminingi yaseNingizimu Afrika, kusuka emkhakheni wezimoto kuya emishinini yezimayini ephambili, kusuka kwezolimo kuya emkhakheni wezezimali.

src_text: Lekgotla le na le batho ba bangata ba tswang makaleng kgwebo, mekgatlo ya basebetsi, mekgatlo ya baahi le ditheo tsa thuto hodimo, ba tla thusa ho tataisa mmuso ho tlisweng ha diphetoho moruong..     Leha ho bile le kgatelopele kgahlisang molemong wa ho lokisa tse senyehileng nakong ya mmuso wa kgethollo, ho sa na le tse ngata tse lokelang ho etswa ho matlafatsa botsamaisi ba batho ba batsho, ho matlafatsa ntshetsopele ya bokgoni le ho atolosa phumano ya thepa le ditshebeletso molemong wa ho neha batjha le basadi ba batho ba batsho menyetla.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iphinde yamukela ukusungulwa kweNkundla Yabantu Abamnyama Yokuthunyelwa Kwempahla Kwamanye Amazwe i-Black Exporters Network nguMnyango Wezohwebo, Izimboni Nokuncintisana (i-DTIC), ukwakha ubumbano kumafemu abantu abamnyama njengamanje athumela izimpahla ezenziwe kuleli kwamanye amazwe omhlaba.

src_text: Dikgohola.
tgt_text: Le nkundla izovumela ukwabelana ngolwazi, isipiliyoni nendlela yokusebenza, futhi yakhela phezu kwempumelelo yoHlelo Losozimboni Abamnyama..     Ezamandla.

src_text: Dithuso tse ntseng di tswella tsa mmuso diprovenseng tse anngweng ke dikgohola di etsa phapang kgolo.
tgt_text: Ukutholakala kwezamandla kwesikhathi eside kukhuthazwe kakhulu kulandela ukuthengiswa kwe-Unit 4 eSiteshini Sikagesi saseKusile eMpumalanga.

src_text: Mmuso behile pele phumantsho ya dijo, metsi le botshabelo bakeng sa batho ba tlaletsweng ke naha, le ho lokiswa ha meralo ya ditshebeletso senyehileng.
tgt_text: Lokhu kudluliswa kube ngenye yengqophamlando emizamweni ka-Eskom ukuletha uzinzo ohlelweni logesi futhi luzokwengeza ama-800 megawatt (ama-MW) kwisizinda sikagesi..     IKhabhinethi ikuphawulile ukuthi ukwakhiwa kwezingxenye zeziphehlimandla ezine kweziyisithupha sekuphothuliwe kumklamo weSiteshi Sikagesi eKusile..     IKhabhinethi yamukele ukwengezwa komthamo omusha wesiphehlimandla kwisizinda sogesi, lokhu okwaphunyeleliswa isinqumo sokuvumela abakhiqizi bogesi abazimele ukuthi bakhiqize ugesi.

src_text: Ho sebetswa ka matla ho tsoseletsa ditshebeletso tsa motheo tse kang metsi, motlakase, bohlweki le tsamaiso ya dikgwerekgwere..     Ke tjhelete ka bang dimiliyone tse R189, 217 sebediswang Lenaneong la Ntlafatso ya Mekhukhu leo ka lona sepheo leng ho fetola boleng ba bophelo ba ba phelang mekhukhung..     Ho boetse ho na le dimiliyone tse R733, 086 tsa Ntshetsopele ya Nyehelo ya Phumantsho ya Matlo tse tla thusa ho thehweng ha bodulo ba moshwelella le bo momahaneng ha batho..     Kabinete ananetse thuso ya botho tswang naheng ya Qatar ya dijo, diaparo, di-generator, dihlwekisametsi, metjhini thusang bakudi ho phefumoloha, ditente le disebediswa tsa bongaka.
tgt_text: Uhulumeni usanda kusayina isivumelwano sokuthenga ama-150 MW omthamo wogesi kumkhiqizi wogesi ovuselelekayo, okuyi-Scatec ASA.

src_text: Nyehelo ena tla thusa batho ba fetang 4 000 ka palo ba fuweng bodulo ba nakwana ditsing tsa tlhokomelo tsa baahi.
tgt_text: UMkhandlu Oluleka Ngokuthuthukiswa Komnotho Wabantu Abamnyama (i-B-BBEE).

src_text: Kabinete boetse ananetse thuso ya botho tswang United Arab Emirates (UAE) ya dijo le metsi ho thusa mahlatsipa dikgohola..     Ho Thehwa ha Letlole la Ntshetsopele ya Setjhaba.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi yamukele ukuqokwa okwenziwe nguMongameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa koMkhandlu omusha wezwe we-B-BBEE.

src_text: 1    Kabinete ananetse ho thehwa ha Letlole la Mesebetsi ya Setjhaba ke Mokgatlo wa Ntshetsopele ya Diindasteri (IDC) sebedisana le lefapha la Bookamedi le dtic.
tgt_text: Lo mkhandlu wakhiwe ngabantu abahlukahlukene abasuka kumabhizinisi, izinyonyana zohwebo, izinhlangano zomphakathi kanye nezifundiswa, umsebenzi wabo okuzoba ukuhlahlela indlela uhulumeni ngokuguqulwa kwesimo somnotho.

src_text: Tshehetso ena tla thusa ho theha menyetla ya mesebetsi ya nakwana bakeng sa batjha ba ka bang 50 000 leng mesebetsi tla tswela setjhaba molemo etswang metseng.. 2    Tshehetso tla kenyeletsa tlhokomelo ya bophelo bo botle le ya baahi, dijo le phepo ntle ka mokgwa wa dibaka tsa ho phehela batho, ntshetsopele ya ho ngola le ho bala, mananeo ho hlokomedisa ka tsa tikoloho le ho lwantsha diphetoho maemong lehodimo mmoho le maiteko ho tshehetsa batjha.
tgt_text: Ngesikhathi kube nenqubekelaphambili ebonakalayo ekubuyiseleni emuva ukuhlanekezelwa komnotho ngesikhathi sobandlululo, mningi umsebenzi okusamele wenziwe ekwenyuseni ukuphatha kwabantu abamnyama, ukuthuthukisa amakhono kanye nokusabalalisa amathuba okukhishwa kwemisebenzi ukuze kuzonikwa abesifazane abamnyama nentsha amathuba.

src_text: Letlole le tla tshehetsa dikgwebo tse 26 tsa baahi le tse sa iketsetseng phaello..     Bosenyi le Bobodu.
tgt_text: Izikhukhula.

src_text: Kabinete ananetse ho tshwarwa ha batho mabapi le diketso tsa manyofonyofo, ho patwa ha mehlodi ya ditjhelete tse seng molaong le bobodu.
tgt_text: Imizamo eqhubekayo kahulumeni yokuxhasa izifundazwe ezikhahlanyezwe izikhukhula zakamuva yenza umehluko omkhulu.

src_text: Ba tshwerweng ba kenyeletsa bao neng le bahlanka ba hodimo mmusong le dikgwebong tsa mmuso, mme ba bang ba bona ba tobane le diqoso tse kenyeletsang ho tlolwa ha Molao wa Botsamaisi ba Ditjhelete tsa Setjhaba, 1999 (Molao wa 1 wa 1999).
tgt_text: Uhulumeni ubeke eqhulwini ukuhlinzeka ngokudla, amanzi kanye nezindawo zokufihla ikhanda kubantu abalahlekelwa izindawo zokuhlala nokulungiswa kwengqalasizinda eyonakele.

src_text: Ho tshwarwa ha batho bana ho kenyeletsang le ho tshwarwa ha mohlanka wa Lefapha la Ditaba tsa Kahara Naha, Setsing sa Kamohelo ya Baphaphathehi sa Desmond Tutu, Pretoria, ya belaellwang ka ho nka tjotjo ho letswantle, ke bopaki ba hore ha ho motho eo molao sa tlo mo fihlela mme ha ho sebaka sa basebetsi ba sa tshepahaleng lekaleng la setjhaba..     Kabinete boetse ananetse kgatelopele bonahalang pusetsong ya baena ba ha Gupta, Rajesh le Atul, Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: Umsebenzi omkhulu uyaqhubeka ukubuyisela izidingonqangi ezifana namanzi, ugesi, ukuthuthwa kwendle kanye nodoti.

src_text: Sena se latela ho tshwarwa ha morao ha bona Dubai, UAE, kamora hore Mokgatlo wa Matjhaba wa Mapolesa Bosenyi (Interpol) ntshe ditsebiso tsa ho ba batla.
tgt_text: Zibalelwa kwizigidi ezingama-R. 217 izimali ezisetshenziswa kuHlelo loKwakha Kabusha Izindawo Zasemijondolo okuhloswe ngalo ukwenza ngcono izinga lempilo kubahlali basemijondolo.

src_text: Bobedi bona bo batleha Afrika Borwa mabapi le seabo sa bona ho hatjweng ha mmuso, ho kenyeletsa manyofonyofo le ho patwa ha mehlodi ya ditjhelete tse seng molaong.
Ditherisano pakeng tsa mekgatlo ya tshebetso ya molao ya naha ya UAE le Afrika Borwa ka pusetso ya bona naheng ya rona di tswela pele.
tgt_text: Isamba esengeziwe sezigidi ezingama-R. 086 sibekelwe ukuthi sisize ekusunguleni izindawo zokuhlala zabantu ezisimeme nezihlanganisiwe ngohlelo lweSibonelelo Sokuthuthukiswa Kwezindawo Zokuhlalisa Abantu..     IKhabhinethi yamukele usizo lwesihe oluvela ezweni lase-Qatar lokudla okusemathinini, izingubo zokugqoka, ama-generator, okokuhlanza amanzi, okokungenisa umoya ohlanzekile, amathende kanye nemikhiqizo yokwelapha.

src_text: Ho tshwarwa ha bona ke sesupo sa maikemisetso mmuso ho lwantsha bosenyi le bobodu ntle le tshabo kapa leeme..     Ho tshwarwa ha bona ke sesupo sa metjha le mekgwa sebetsang hantle ya hore ba belaellwang ka bosenyi ba ikarabelle diketsong tsa bona tse mpe le ho netefatsa hore ha ho ya kahodima molao..     Kabinete nyatsitse boiteko bo se nang dihlong ba ho kgella mmuso le naha ya rona fatshe kamora hore ho senngwe hampe kheibole Karolong ya 1 ya Seteishene sa ho Fehla Motlakase sa Matla sa Eskom, Mpumalanga ne le ketsahalo ya bone ya tshenyo belaellwang seteisheneng sa ho fehla motlakase kamora hore diketsahalo tse tshwanang le eo di tlalehwe diteisheneng tse ding tse tharo dibekeng tse mmalwa tse fetileng.
tgt_text: Lo mnikelo uzosiza izakhamuzi ezingaphezu kwezi-4 000 ezisahlaliswe okwesikhashana ezikhungweni zomphakathi.

src_text: Dipalopalo tsa morao tjena tsa diketso tsa bosenyi ke pontsho ya hore re tlameha ho leka ka matla re le setjhaba ho etsa hore ho be le polokeho metseng ya rona.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iphinde yamukela usizo lwesihe oluvela e-United Arab Emirates (e-UAE) lokudla okusemathinini kanye namanzi ukusiza labo abakhahlanyezwe izikhukhula zakamuva.

src_text: Dintlha tsena di re hopotsa hore ho lwantsha bosenyi ke boikarabelo ba setjhaba le hore kaofela ha rona, ho kenyeletsa mapolesa, baetapele ba dipolotiki, baahi, malapa, beng ba dikgwebo, basebetsi le mekgatlo ya baahi, re lokela ho ba le seabo twantshong ya bosenyi..     Kabinete na le tshepo ya hore ditjhelete tse ding tse behetsweng thoko ke Lefapha la Mapolesa bakeng sa diteishene tsa mapolesa tse nang le palo hodimo ya melato ya dipolao, dipeto le diketso tse ding tsa bosenyi ba dikgoka, di tla thusa ho fetola maemo le ho tlisa polokeho metseng..     Tsa Morao tsa COVID-.
tgt_text: Ukwethulwa kweSikhwama Sokusungula Imisebenzi Emphakathini.

src_text: Kabinete hopoditse bohle hore COVID-19 ha so fele mme dikotsi tsa tshwaetso tse ntjha di tla eketseha nakong ya mariha.
tgt_text: 1    IKhabhinethi yamukele ukwethulwa kweSikhwama Sokusungula Imisebenzi Emphakathini sivulwa yiNhlangano Yokuthuthukiswa Kwezimboni (i-IDC) ngokubambisana neHhovisi likaMongameli ne-DTIC.

src_text: Re tlameha ho tswela pele ho nka mehato ya bohlokwa ya ho itshireletsa le ba bang kenyeletsa ho hlapa kapa ho hlwekisa matsoho kgafetsa, ho rwala semonkwana ha le kahara moaho, ho se atamelane le ba bang, ho bula difenstere hore ho kene moya le ho enta..     Seboka sa African Union (AU).
tgt_text: Ukweseka lokhu kuzohlinzeka ngamathuba omsebenzi afinyelela kwizi-50 000 kubantu abasha emsebenzini odingwa umphakathi owenziwa emiphakathini yendawo.. 2    Lokhu kweseka kuzobandakanya ukunakekela ngokwezempilo nokomphakathi, usizo lokudla nesondlo olufana nokuphekela labo abaswele, ukugqugquzelwa kokufunda nokubhala, izinhlelo zokunakekelwa kwemvelo kanye nokuqedwa kokuguquguquka kwesimo sezulu kanye nemizamo yokweseka intsha.

src_text: Kabinete amohetse tsebahatso, boitlamo le boinehelo bo ananetsweng Sebokeng se sa Tlwaelehang sa AU sa Boferekanyi le Diphetoho tse sa Tsamaelaneng le Molaotheo Afrika se neng se tshwaretswe Malabo, Republic of Equatorial Guinea, ka Moqebelo wa la 28 Motsheanong..     Baetapele ba Afrika ba lekotse ditshoso tse pheelletseng, ba lekola mekgwa ya jwale ya ho di arabela mme ba itlama ho matlafatsa polokeho ya dinaha tseo leng ditho tsa AU tse tobaneng le boferekanyi le bongangele..     Lefu la Monkeypox.
tgt_text: ISikhwama sizosiza amabhizinisi omphakathi futhi angabheke nzuzo angama-.

src_text: Kabinete tiiseditse Maafrika Borwa hore balaodi ba rona ba tsa bophelo bo botle ba malala laotswe ho beha leihlo le ho thibela lefu la Monkeypox kamora hore le qhome dinaheng tse se nang lona.
tgt_text: Ubugebengu nenkohlakalo.

src_text: Leha ho se motho ya fumanweng na le lefu lena Afrika Borwa, balaodi ba tsa bophelo bo botle naheng ba tswela pele ho beha maemo ana leihlo     Qeto ya Kabinete.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamukele ukuboshwa kwabantu abaningi okuxhumene nokukhwabanisa, ukushushumbiswa kwemali kanye nenkohlakalo.

src_text: Puisano le Setjhaba ka Mehato ya ho Sebetsana le Kgwebo seng Molaong ya Masalla Ditshepe.
tgt_text: Lokhu kubandakanya abasebenzi baphambilini bakahulumeni ezikhundleni eziphezulu, abanye ababhekene namacala ahlobene nokuphula uMthetho Wokuphathwa Kwezimali Zikahulumeni, we-1999 (uMthetho woku-1 we-1999).

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana hore ho be le dipuisano le setjhaba mabapi le ditshisinyo tsa ho thibela kgwebo ya masalla ditshepe tse utswitsweng le tse lokisitsweng.
tgt_text: Lokhu kuboshwa - okubandakanya ukuboshwa kwalowo oyisikhulu soMnyango Wezasekhaya esikhungweni sokwamukela ababaleki i-Desmond Tutu Refugee Reception Centre ePitoli osolwa ngokwamukela intshontsho kowokufika kuleli - kuyisibonelo sokuthi akekho ongaphezu komthetho futhi abasebenzi abangathembekile ngeke babekezelelwe emkhakheni kahulumeni..     IKhabhinethi iphinde yamukela inqubekelaphambili eyenziwe ukubuyisa izelamani zakwa-Gupta, u-Rajesh no-Atul, eNingizimu Afrika.

src_text: Boshodu ba masalla ditshepe le dikheibole tsa koporo meralong ya ditshebeletso ya setjhaba bo sitisa tshebetso ya moruo ka ho baka ditjeho tse hodimo.
tgt_text: Lokhu kulandela ukuthi kamuva bekhalelwe ngamasongo kaSigonyela e-Dubai e-UAE emva kokuthi Inhlangano Yamazwe Yamaphoyisa (i-Interpol) iwuhlabe yawulawula.

src_text: Tse ding tsa ditshitiso di kenyeletsa tshitiso ya phepelo ya motlakase le ditshebeletso tsa diterene ka lebaka la diporo tse sentsweng.
tgt_text: Lezi zelamani ziyafuneka eNingizimu Afrika ngezinsolo zokubandakanyeka ekuqhwagweni kwamandla ombuso, okufaka phakathi ukukhwabanisa kanye nokushushumbiswa kwemali.

src_text: Ho sitisa tsamaiso ya dipalangwang tsa bapalami ho eketsa ditefello tsa ho tsamaya.
tgt_text: Izingxoxo phakathi kwabomthetho e-UAE naseNingizimu Afrika ngokubuyiswa kwabo ziyaqhubeka.

src_text: Dikheibole tsa motlakase tse sentsweng le tse sa bolokehang di kotsi ho baahi, haholoholo bana..     Kabinete laetse dtic ho etella pele dipuisano bakeng sa nako itseng, le ho nonya maikutlo setjhaba le makala loketseng, ka mehato sebetsang hantle eo mmuso ka kenyang tshebetsong ho thibela ho senngwa ha meralo ya ditshebeletso ya bohlokwa.
tgt_text: Ukuboshwa kwabo kubonisa ukuzimisela kukahulumeni ukulwa nobugebengu nenkohlakalo ngaphandle kokwesaba ukwenzelela..     Lokhu kuboshwa kubonisa ukuthi inqubo nezindlela-kusebenza zisebenza ngempumelelo ukuthi ababhebhezeli bobugebengu babhekane namacala ezenzo zabo futhi kuqinisekisa ukuthi akekho ongaphezu komthetho..     IKhabhinethi iyawugxeka kakhulu umzamo osobala nje wokudicilela phansi umnotho wethu kanye nezwe lakithi kulandela ukonakaliswa okubi kwentambo kagesi kwi-Unit 1 eSiteshini Sogesi i-Matla sakwa-Eskom eMpumalanga.

src_text: Kamora moo, Kabinete tla tsebahatsa mehato tjhaetsweng monwana     Diketsahalo tse Tlang.
tgt_text: Lesi bekuyisigameko sesine okusolwa ukuthi ngesokucekela phansi esiteshini sogesi emva kokuthi kube nezigameko ezifanayo ezibikiwe kwezinye iziteshi zogesi ezintathu emavikini ambalwa edlule.

src_text: Seboka sa Matjhaba se Mabapi le Theknoloji Polokong ya Kgotso (PTPS) sa Matjhaba Kopaneng (UN).
tgt_text: Izibalo zakamuva zobugebengu zibonisa ukuthi kumele sisebenze kakhudlwana njengomphakathi ukuze senze ukuthi imiphakathi yethu iphephe.

src_text: Afrika Borwa tla tshwara seboka sa Botshelela sa PTPS Lekgotleng la Diphuputso tsa Saense le Diindasteri Pretoria ho tloha ka Labobedi la la 21 ho ya ho Labohlano la la 24 Phuptjane.
tgt_text: Lokhu kusikhumbuza ukuthi ukunciphisa ubugebengu kungumsebenzi womphakathi wonke kanye nathi sonke - kubandakanya amaphoyisa, abaholi bezepolitiki, imiphakathi, imindeni, osomabhizinisi, abasebenzi nomphakathi - kumele sidlale indima yethu ekulweni nobugebengu..     IKhabhinethi inethemba lokuthi izimali ezengeziwe ezibekwe eqhulwini nguNgqongqoshe Wamaphoyisa ezizoya eziteshini zamaphoyisa ezinamanani aphezulu amacala okubulala, awokudlwengula kanye nobunye ubugebengu obunodlame zizosiza ukuguqula isimo futhi kubuyise nokuphepha emiphakathini kuwo wonke umuntu.

src_text: Ho lebelletswe baromuwa ba 300 ba tswang dinaheng tse 50 tseo leng ditho sebokeng sena..     Seboka se kopanya ba nang le thahasello ho tswa sesoleng, sepoleseng, le batho ka kakaretso Dinaheng tseo leng Ditho tsa Matjhaba Kopaneng molemong wa hore ba sebetse mmoho tshebedisong ya ditheknoloji tsa sejwalejwale le tse tswetseng pele le dikgopolotaba matsholong poloko ya kgotso Matjhaba Kopaneng.
tgt_text: Ezakamuva nge-COVID-.

src_text: Seboka se tla sebediswa jwaloka lepatlelo la ho abelana ka tlhahisoleseding le ho qothisana lehlokwa bakeng sa dinaha tseo leng ditho tsa UN tse nang le seabo matsholong ho boloka kgotso ka tshebediso ya ditheknoloji tsa morao tjena matsholong ana..     Tlhodisano ya Naha Tshwarwang Kamora Dilemo tse Pedi tla Tshwarwa Lekgetlo la Bone ya WorldSkills South Africa (WSZA).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikhumbuze wonke umuntu ukuthi i-COVID-19 ayikapheli futhi ubungozi bokutheleleka okusha buzokhula ngesikhathi sobusika.

src_text: Ho tshwerwe Tlhodisano ya Naha ya Kamora Dilemo tse Pedi ya Bone ya WSZA, Inkosi Albert Luthuli International Convention Centre, KwaZulu-Natal ho tloha ka la 7 ho ya ho la 10 Phuptjane 2022 tlasa mookotaba: “Ntlafatso ya Tlhahiso ya ba Etsang Mesebetsi ya Matsoho Mongwahakgolong wa bo-21”..     Ketsahalo ena sebedisetswa ho ntlafatsa boiphihlelo ba batho ba etsang mesebetsi ya matsoho jwaloka mosebetsi ka phedisang motho le ho lebisa tshebedisanong le ba bang indastering ena.
tgt_text: Kumele siqhubeke nokuqaphela ukuze sizozivikela thina kanye nabanye abantu.

src_text: Ketsahalo ena boetse sebedisetswa ho lekola boemo ba boithuto ba mosebetsi le ntshetsopele ya ba etsang mesebetsi ya matsoho hodima ho kgothaletsa ho kgethwa ha mesebetsi ya matsoho jwaloka kgetho ya pele ya baithuti ba rona     Molaetsa.
tgt_text: Lokhu kufaka phakathi ukuhlanza izandla noma ukusebenzisa isibulali-magciwane njalo nje, ukugqoka isifonyo uma ungaphakathi kwesakhiwo, ukugcina igebe elanele phakathi kwabanye abantu, ukuvula amafasitela ukuze kuzongena umoya ohlanzekile kanye nokugoma.

src_text: MatshedisoKabinete le Mopresidente Ramaphosa ba lebisitse matshediso Lelapeng la Boreneng le setjhabeng sa Borena ba Maphoto kamora ho hlokahala ha Motlotlehi Morena Moholo Zanozuko Tyelovuyo Sigcau     KhiroHo tlameha hore ho netefatswe mangolo thuto ba hirwang mme ho netefatswe le hore ba ha ba so ka ba tlola molao..     Monghadi Jacob Ganny Mbele jwaloka Molaodi-Kakaretso (DG) Lefapheng la Diminerale le Eneji..     Mme Pumeza Nwabisa Nodada jwaloka Motlatsa-Molaodi-Kakaretso (DDG): Botsamaisi ba Meru Lefapheng la Meru, Botshwasi le Tikoloho.
tgt_text: INgqungquthela YoBumbano Lwamazwe ase-Afrika (i-AU).

src_text: Mme Susan Mafanedza Masapu jwaloka Moeletsi ya ka Sehloohong wa Mmuso wa Molao Lefapheng la Toka le Ntshetsopele ya Molaotheo..     Mme Doris Tshepe jwaloka Mokhomeshenara Khomesheneng ya Ditlhodisano..     Ngaka Alex Mahapa jwaloka Moeletsi ya Ikgethang wa nako tsohle ho Letona le Tshwereng Mokobobo lefapheng la Tshebeletso ya Mmuso le Tsamaiso.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi yamukele isimemezelo, izethembiso kanye nezibopho ezithathwe kwiNgqungquthela Eyingqayizivele ye-AU ebimayelana noBuphekula Nezinguquko ezingalandeli Umthethosisekelo e-Afrika ebibanjwe e-Malabo, e-Riphabhulikhi yase-Equatorial Guinea, ngoMgqibelo, mhla wama-28 kuNhlaba..     Abaholi base-Afrika bahlolisise izinsongo ezilokhu zibelesele, bahlolisisa izindlela zamanje zokubhekana nalokhu futhi bazinikela ekuqiniseni ukuphepha ngokubambisana kwamazwe angamalungu abhekene nobuphekula namavukela-mbuso.

src_text: Diphetoho Maemong Lehodimo.
tgt_text: Ukuguquguquka Kwesimo Sezulu.

src_text: Kabinete amohetse ketelo ya Monghadi Alok Sharma, Afrika Borwa, eo leng Mopresidente wa Seboka sa bo-26 sa Maemo Lehodimo sa Matjhaba Kopaneng (UN), ho tloha ka la 19 ho ya ho la 21 Phuptjane 2022, le tekolo ya hae ya hore Afrika Borwa bontshitse ho ikemisetsa ho fetohela enejing ya mehlodi ya tsa tlhaho..  Ka 2021, Mopresidente Cyril Ramaphosa kopane le baetapele ba bang tsebahatsong ya tshebedisano ya bohlokwa le dinaha tsa France, Germany, United Kingdom le Amerika, mmoho le European Union, molemong wa ho tshehetsa phetoho nang le toka moruong sebedisang mehlodi ya eneji sa hlahiseng khabone le setjhaba se nang le bokgoni ba ho emelana le maemo lehodimo mabe..  Afrika Borwa sebeditse ka thata itokisetsa ho fetela tlhahisong ya motlakase hlwekileng le ho fallela mehloding ya eneji ya tlhaho kang matla mafura hlwekileng etswang ka metsi le motlakase, dimela, matla moya, matla letsatsi le metsi, hara mehlodi meng.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi yamukele uhambo lokuvakashela eNingizimu Afrika kuka-Mnu Alok Sharma, uMongameli wama-26 weNgqungquthela Yezokuguquguquka Kwesimo Sezulu yeNhlangano Yezizwe Ezibumbene (i-UN), kusuka mhla ziyi-19 kuya mhla zingama-21 kuNhlangulana 2022, kanye nokuhlola kwakhe isimo seNingizimu Afrika ukuthi ibonise ukuzinikela okucacile ekuqinisekiseni ukungangcoliswa kwemvelo..     Ngowezi-2021, uMongameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa wahlanganyela nabanye abaholi ekumemezeleni ingqophamlando yokusebenzisana nohulumeni base-France, e-Germany, e-United Kingdom kanye nowase-United States, kanjalo nowase-European Union, ukweseka ukuguqukela emnothweni onekhabhoni encane kanye nomphakathi omelana nesimo sezulu..     INingizimu Afrika ibilokhu isebenza kanzima ekulungiseleleni ukuguqukela nasekuyeni kwimithombo engangcolisi umkhathi ezifana nehayidrojini engangcolisi imvelo, i-biomass, amandla omoya, amandla adonswa elangeni kanye nasemanzini, phakathi kwezinye zamandla avuselelekayo.

src_text: Motswako ona wa eneji tlisa tekatekano pakeng tsa mehlodi ya eneji ho netefatsa matla tshepehang emelanang le ditlhoko tsa naha tsa eneji tse eketsehang..  Tshebediso ya Ente ya Lefu la Coronavirus (COVID-19).
tgt_text: Le nhlanganisela yamandla ivumela ukuhambisana phakathi kwemithombo yezamandla ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukuthembeka kwamandla azohlangabezana nezidingo zamandla zezwe ezikhulayo.

src_text: Kabinete ananetse ho theoha ka matla ha palo ya batho ba tshwaetswang ke COVID-19 rekotilweng Afrika Borwa dibekeng tse mmalwa tse fetileng mme ya kgothaletsa batho bohle ba loketseng, ho tswela pele ka ho enta leng ntho thusang ho thibela ho kula haholo, ho robatswa sepetlele le ho hlokahala..  Ho fihlela jwale halofo ya palo ya batho ba baholo ba Maafrika Borwa se fumane bonnyane ente le nngwe ya COVID-.
tgt_text: Ukugomela iSifo Segciwane le-Corona (i-COVID-19).

src_text: Mmuso ikemiseditse ho sebedisa tjhelete ya tswala tlase eo sa tswa kadingwa ke Banka la Lefatshe ho reka diente tse ding tsa COVID-19 le ho netefatsa hore setjhaba se sireletsehile ka ho lekaneng ditshwaetsong tse ka bang teng..  Kabinete boetse buisane ka dintlha tse amanang le tswelopele taolong ya sewa sa COVID-19, haholoholo kgatelopele etswang molemong wa ho kgutlela bophelong bo tlwaelehileng.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi yamukele ukwehla okubonakalayo kwabantu abatheleleka nge-COVID-19 eNingizimu Afrika emavikini ambalwa edlule futhi igqugquzele bonke abantu abafanelekile ukuthi baqhubeke bagome, lokho okusiza ukugwema ukugula kakhulu, ukulaliswa esibhedlela kanye nokufa imbala..     Ingxenye yabo bonke abantu abadala eNingizimu Afrika sebethole okungenani umthamo owodwa womgomo we-COVID-19 kuze kube manje.

src_text: Letona la Bophelo bo Botle, Ngaka Joe Phaahla, le tla fana ka dintlha tse ding..  Letsatsi la Naha la Batjha.
tgt_text: Uhulumeni uhlose ukusebenzisa imali ebolekwe kamuva nje enenzalo ephansi esanda kugunyazwa yiBhange Lomhlaba ukuthenga eminye imigomo ye-COVID-19 ukuqinisekisa ukuthi isizwe sivikeleke ngokwanele egciwaneni.

src_text: Kabinete lebohile Maafrika Borwa ohle ikamahantseng le mekete ya naha ya Letsatsi la Naha la Batjha ya Labone la la 16 Phuptjane 2022 tlasa mookotaba reng: “Ntshetsopele ya mekgwa ya ho iphedisa ya moshwelella ya batjha le matla bona molemong wa bokamoso bo tjhatsi.” Moya wa tjantjello le matla bontshitsweng ke batjha naheng ka bophara ke dintho tse ka ketekelwang mme di tlisa tshepo ya bokamoso bo tjhatsi..  Jwalokaha re lebile mafelong Kgwedi ya Naha ya Batjha re tebiseng matsapa rona ho netefatsa hore batjha ba fihlella mananeo mangata ao mmuso fanang ka ona le ho ba thusa hore ba kgone ho ba le seabo moruong..  Tshebeletso ya Setjhaba, jwaloka mohiri moholo arabetse phephetso ena ka ho thusa batjha ba phethetseng dithuto tsa bona ba sa sebetseng ho fumana boiphihlelo ka Lenaneo la Tshebeletso ya Setjhaba la ho Rupella Batjha Mosebetsing.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iphinde yacubungula udaba oluhlobene nokuqhubekayo ekulawulweni kobhubhane lwe-COVID-19, ikakhulukazi ngenqubekelaphambili eyenziwayo ukuthi sibuyele ngokuphelele emisebenzini yezenhlalo-mnotho eyejwayelekile.

src_text: Mmuso boetse kenya tshebetsong Letlole la Mesebetsi ya Setjhaba (SEF) le Tsehebeletso tsoseleditsweng ya Naha ya Batjha (NYS) leng maiteko ho theha mesebetsi tla thusa khirong ya batjha ba ka bang.
tgt_text: UNgqongqoshe Wezempilo, uDkt Joe Phaahla, uzohlinzeka ngeminye imininingwane.
Usuku Lukazwelonke Lwentsha  .

src_text: Maiteko ana tla fana ka boiphihlelo bo hlokehang haholo ba mosebetsing mme boele tiise molemo wa seabo sa baahi.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ibonge bonke abantu baseNingizimu Afrika ngokuhlanganyela emibungazweni yoSuku Lukazwelonke Lwentsha ngoLwesine, mhla we-16 kuNhlangulana 2022 ngaphansi kwesiqubulo esithi: "Sigqugquzela izindlela zokuphila ezisimeme kanye nokuzimelelela ingomuso elingcono kwabantu abasha."

src_text: SEF sebetsa mmoho le mekgatlo eo eseng ya mmuso (di-NGO) ha NYS hira batjha ditshebeletsong tse tswelang baahi molemo naheng ka bophara..  Dipalangwang.
tgt_text: Umoya wentshisekelo kanye nokuzimelela okuboniswe intsha kulolonke izwe nakanjani yikho okuyimbangela yokubungaza kanye nokuba nethemba lekusasa elingcono.

src_text: Kabinete ananetse Morero wa Dintlha tse 11 wa Tshebetso tla sebetsana le ho kwalwa ha mebila le ho hirwa ha matswantle jwaloka bakganni ba dilori.
tgt_text: Njengoba iNyanga Kazwelonke Yentsha iya ekupheleni, masiqinise imizamo yethu yokuqinisekisa ukuthi abantu abasha bayafinyelela ezinhlelweni zokubeseka eziningi ezihlinzekwa nguhulumeni futhi sibheke ukuzibandakanya kwabo emnothweni..     Ezemisebenzi Kahulumeni, njengomqashi omkhulukazi, usebhekane nale nselele ngokuvulela labo abaqede izifundo zabo ezikhungweni eziphakeme abangasebenzi ukuthi bafunde umsebenzi bathole isipiliyoni ngokusebenzisa uhlelo lwe-Public Service Graduate Internship and Learnership Programme.

src_text: Morero ona sibollotsweng ke Komiti ya Matona Fapaneng (IMC) ya Mebila le ho tsamaiswa ha Thepa ka tshebedisano le ba amehang indastering ya ho tsamaiswa ha thepa, hara tse ding kgothaletsa ho kenngwa tshebetsong ha ditokomane tsa ho eta le ho ikamahanya le melao ya tsa basebetsi..  IMC thehetswe ho sebetsana le diketsahalo tse jeleng setsi tsa ho kwalwa ha mebila le mehwanto ya boipelaetso ya bakganni ba dilori ba Maafika Borwa ba sa kgotsofalang.
tgt_text: Uhulumeni uphinde waqalisa iSikhwama Sokusungula Imisebenzini Emiphakathini (i-SEF) futhi wavuselela imizamo yokusungulwa kwemisebenzi yoHlelo Lukazwelonke Lokusiza Intsha (i-NYS) ngayinye ezodonsela abantu abasha abayizi-50 000 emnothweni.

src_text: Mehwanto le ho kwalwa ha mebila di na le kameho mpe phallong ya dipalangwang tshosa boramatsete ba dinaha tse ding mme sa bohlokwa haholo na le kameho mpe moruong le metjheng bohlokwa ya phepelo sebedisang mebila amehang mehwantong..  Kgaello ya metsi Masepaleng Moholo wa Nelson Mandela Bay (NMB).
tgt_text: Le mizamo angeke nje kuphela isize ngesipiliyoni somsebenzi esidingekayo kodwa izogcizelela ukubaluleka kwezakhamuzi ezisebenzayo.

src_text: Kabinete ananetse seabo sa Lefapha la Metsi le Bohlweki (DWS) Masepaleng Moholo wa NMB, Kapa Botjhabela molemong wa ho thibela ho kwalwa ha phepelo ya metsi nakong eo provense tobaneng le mathata matla kgaello ya metsi qadileng ka.
tgt_text: I-SEF isebenzisana nezinhlangano ezingekho kuhulumeni (ama-NGO) ngesikhathi i-NYS ifaka ohlwini abantu abasha emisebenzini esiza imiphakathi kulolonke leli lizwe..     Ezokuthutha    .

src_text: DWS sebetsa le provense ho kenya tshebetsong mehato ya nako kgutshwane bohareng le telele ya ho lwantsha ditlamorao tsa komello..  Kabinete boetse ipileditse ho baahi ba NMB ho ikamahanya le melawana ya metsi behilweng ke bomasepala ba lehae ho netefatsa boteng ba metsi nako telele.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi yamukele iQhingasu Elinamaphuzu ayi-11 okubhekana nokuvalwa kwemigwaqo kanye nokuqashwa kwabantu bakwamanye amazwe njengabashayeli bamaloli.

src_text: Ka kakaretso, metsi sebediswang ka letsatsi lokela ho fokotswa ka dilitara tse dimiliyone di 50, ho tloha ho dilitara tse dimiliyone di 280 tse sebediswang hona jwale ka letsatsi, mme sena se tla lebisa tshebedisong ya dilitara tse dimiliyone di 230 ka letsatsi..  Bosenyi le bobodu.
tgt_text: Iqhingasu, elaqhamuka neKomidi Longqongqoshe Lezemigwaqo Nokuthuthwa Kwempahla (i-IMC) ngokubambisana nababambiqhaza embonini yezemigwaqo nokuthuthwa kwempahla, ligqugquzela phakathi kokunye ukuthotshelwa kwezidingo zezimvume zokuhamba kanye nokuthotshelwa kwemithetho yezabasebenzi.

src_text: Kabinete amohetse ho tshwarwa ho sa tswa etsahala ha mosebetsi wa Lefapha la Ditaba tsa Kahara Naha ofising ya Benoni ya nehileng moahi wa Bangladesh bukana ya ho eta ya mokunyata.
tgt_text: I-IMC yasungulelwa ukubhekana nokunyuka kwezinga lokuvalwa kwemigwaqo kanye nemibhikisho eyenziwa abashayeli bamaloli baseNingizimu Afrika abangeneme.

src_text: Mosebetsi eo leng Mme Sibongile Simelane fumane beili ya R5 000 Lekgotleng la Dinyewe la Makgistrata la Benoni ka Labobedi la la 21 Phuptjane.
tgt_text: Imibhikisho nokuvalwa kwemigwaqo kuphazamisa kakhulu ukuhamba, kufake itwetwe kubatshalizimali bangaphandle futhi ikakhulukazi, kuthunaza umnotho kanye nokuthunyelwa kwempahla ebalulekile esebenzisa imigwaqo esuke ivaliwe.

src_text: Moahi enwa wa Bangladesh leng Monghadi Fahim Kazi tshwerwe leka ho tswa naheng ena ka la 12 Motsheanong 2022 sebedisa lebitso la ‘Lebogang Ndlovu’.
tgt_text: Ukuswelakala kwamanzi kuMkhandludolobha i-Nelson Mandela Bay (i-NMB).

src_text: Lefapha la Ditaba tsa Kahara Naha (DHA) le sa tswa romela sebapadi sa dipaleng sa Lithuania, Ieva Andrejevaite naheng ya habo, ha ne batla ho sebedisa hampe botsamaisi ba Afrika Borwa ba taolo ya baphaphathehi iqapela pale eo seng nnete batla botshabelo kwano ka lebaka la “ntwa Ukraine.”.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi yamukele ukungenelela koMnyango Wezamanzi Nokuthuthwa Kwendle (i-DWS) kuMkhandludodlobha i-NMB eMpumalanga Kapa ukugwema ukwehla kweZinga Lamanzi emadamini njengoba lesi sifundazwe sibhekene nokuswelakala kwamanzi okunzima okuqale ngowezi-.

src_text: Kabinete rorisitse mosebetsi etswang ke Karolo ya ho Lwantsha Bobodu ya DHA thoholetsa le ho kgothaletsa Maafrika Borwa ho tswela pele ka ho tlaleha diketso tseo tsa tlolo ya molao.
tgt_text: I-DWS isebenzisana nesifundazwe ukuqalisa izinyathelo zesikhathi esifishane, esiphakathi neside ukubhekana nokuqeda umthelela wesomiso ongaba khona.

src_text: Diketso tse seng molaong tsa Maafrika Borwa rekisang boitsebiso ba ona di na le ditlamorao tse mpe le tse kgolo bakeng sa polokeho ya naha le maemo yona bophelong ba setjhaba le moruong wa yona.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iphinde yanxusa abahlali base-NMB ukuthi bathobele imithetho yamanzi ebekwe kumasipala wendawo ukuqinisekisa ukutholakala kwamanzi.

src_text: Mmuso tla tswella le ho nka mehato matla kgahlano le mang kapa mang ya ikamahanyang le diketso tse seng molaong tseo leng tello melao ya rona ya ho kena naheng ena, ntle le tshabo kapa leeme..  Kabinete boetse ananetse ho tshwarwa ho sa tswa etsahala ha titjhere ya Durban, mme Nomusa Precious Gabuza (37) – ya ahlotsweng dilemo tse tharo tsa ho sebeletsa setjhaba le tse nne tsa tjhankaneng, mme hloletswe kantle dilemo tse tharo ke Lekgotla la Dinyewe la Lebatowa la Mlazi, Kwazulu-Natal – ka ho tlola Molao wa Dikgetho tsa Bomasepala wa Mebuso ya Lehae, 2000 (Molao wa 27 wa 2000).
tgt_text: Phezu kwakho konke, ukusetshenziswa kwamanzi kufanele kuncishiswe ngamalitha ayizigidi ezingama-50 ngosuku, kusuka ezingeni lamanje elingamalitha ayizigidi ezingama-280 ngosuku kuye emalitheni ayizigidi ezingama-230 ngosuku.

src_text: Jwaloka titjhere sekolong se neng se le sebaka sa ho kgetha nakong ya Dikgetho tsa Bomasepala, Mme Gabuza dumetse molato wa ho kgetha makgetlo 24, ho kenyeletsa makgetlo 12 Dikgethong tsa Bomasepala le 12 Dikgetho tsa Diwate..  Kahlolo ena ke pontsho matla ya boinehelo ba Khomeshene ya Dikgetho ya Afrika Borwa ya ho nka bohato kapele le ho bontsha taolo ya boitshwaro bo bobe.
tgt_text: Ubugebengu nenkohlakalo  .

src_text: Ena ke tiisetso matla ya mekgwatshebetso ya dikgetho seng matlafaditswe ka ho hlahiswa ha Sesebediswa sa Taolo ya Bakgethi thibelang ho kgetha habedi..  Kabinete tiisitse hore dikgetho ke tshiya ya demokrasi ya rona mme di lokela ho sireletswa ka hohle kamoo ho ka kgonehang kateng..  Seboka sa bo-12 sa Matona (MC12) sa Mokgatlo wa Lefatshe wa Kgwebisano (WTO).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi yamukele ukuboshwa kwakamuva kwesikhulu soMnyango Wezasekhaya ehhovisi elise-Benoni ngokukhiphela owokufika wase-Bangladeshi iphasiphothi yomgunyathi.

src_text: Kabinete ananetse diphetho tsa WTO MC12 neng tshwaretswe Geneva, Switzerland ho tloha ka la 12 ho ya ho la 17 Phuptjane 2022, haholoholo qeto reng dinaha tse nang le bokgoni di ka ba le ditokelo tsa ho hlahisa diente tsa COVID-19 ho fihlela ka.
tgt_text: Isikhulu lesi, okunguSibongile Simelane, uthole ibheyili yezi-R5 000 eNkantolo kaMantshi yase-Benoni ngoLwesibili, mhla wama-21 kuNhlangulana.

src_text: Qeto ya ho atolosa sena hore se kenyeletse kalafo le hlahlobo tsa COVID-19 kgutliseditswe morao ka dikgwedi tse tsheletseng.
tgt_text: Owokufika wase-Bangladeshi, uMnu Fahim Kazi, wakhalelwa ngamasongo kaSigonyela ngesikhathi ezama ukuphuma kuleli mhla we-12 kuNhlaba 2022 esebenzisa igama elithi, ‘u-Lebogang Ndlovu’.

src_text: Esale Afrika Borwa itlhomme pele boipiletsong ba hore WTO dumelle dinaha tse ding ho ba le ditokelo tsa ho iketsetsa diente tsa COVID-19 mme sena se ka netefatsa hore ho na le phihlello lekanang enteng le ho kgonahatsa hore dinaha tse nang le bokgoni ba ho hlahisa diente di di etsa..  Seboka se boetse sa inehela motjheng bulehileng le kenyeletsang bohle molemong wa ho tlisa diphetoho mesebetsig ya sona, mme ha dumellanwa ka ditumellano tsa kgwebisano tse sebetsanang le tsa bophelo bo botle, ho behwa ha meedi dithusong tsa botshwasi, kemiso ya nakwana kgwebisanong ya marangranng le boteng ba dijo nako telele  Diqeto tsa Kabinete.
tgt_text: UMnyango Wezasekhaya (i-DHA) isanda kuxosha umlingisi we-Lithuanian, uNks Ieva Andrejevaite, obefuna ukuhlukumeza abaphathi abalawula ababaleki eNingizimu Afrika ngesikhathi eziqambela udaba lokufuna ukufaka isicelo sokukhoseliswa ngenxa "yempi ese-Ukraine".

src_text: Kgatelopele Lenaneong la ho Fallela Kgasong ya Dijithale (BDM).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iyawuncoma kakhulu umsebenzi owenziwe uPhiko lwe-DHA Olulwisana Nenkohlakalo.

src_text: Kabinete tsebisitswe ka tsa morao Lenaneong la BDM mme ya amohela kgatelopele entsweng ka ho kenngwa ha di-set-top box le karolo ya ho fallela kgasong ya dijithale ho tloha ho ya analogue.
tgt_text: Ishayela ihlombe futhi igqugquzela bonke abantu baseNingizimu Afrika ukuthi baqhubeke nokubika lezi zenzo zobugebengu.

src_text: Kabinete boetse tobokeditse tlhokeho potlakileng ya ho phethela BDM molemong wa ho etsa hore ho be le spectrum se hlokehang bakeng sa phihlello ya inthanete, le bakeng sa mesebetsi meng amanang le theknoloji ya tlhahisoleseding le dikgokahano..  Letona la Dikgokahano le Ditheknoloji tsa Dijithale, Khumbudzo Ntshavheni le tla ba le seboka le boraditaba hosane (Labohlano, 24 Phuptjane) ho fana ka dintlha tse ding.
tgt_text: Izenzo ezingekho emthethweni zabantu baseNingizimu Afrika abadayisa ubunikazi babo zinomthelela omubi kakhulu ekuvikelekeni kwezwe kanye nesimo senhlalo-mnotho.

src_text: Tlaleho ya Selemo le Selemo ya Naha ya Maemo Ditokelo tsa Ngwana.
tgt_text: Uhulumeni uzoqhubeka nokubhekana kanzima nanoma ngubani obandakanyeka ezenzweni ezingekho emthethweni ezibukela phansi imithetho yethu yokungena nokuphuma kuleli lizwe, ngaphandle kokusaba ukwenzelela.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho phatlalatswa ha Tlaleho ya bobedi ya Selemo le Selemo ya Naha ya Maemo Ditokelo tsa Ngwana.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iphinde yamukela ukulahlwa yicala nokugwetshwa kothisha waseThekwini, uNks Nomusa Precious Gabuza (37) – owagwetshwa iminyaka emithathu azoyidonsa ngaphandle kanye neminyaka emine engaphakathi, kwalengiswa kuyoyonke emithathu, eNkantolo kaMantshi yaseMlazi KwaZulu Natali - ngokuphula uMthetho Wezokhetho Lohulumeni Basekhaya, wangowezi-2000 (UMthetho wama-27 wezi-2000).

src_text: Tlaleho fana ka tlhahisoleseding mabapi le ho kenngwa tshebetsong ha Morero wa Naha wa Tshebetso wa Bana bakeng sa 2019 ho ya ho.
tgt_text: Njengothisha wasesikoleni esasisetshenziswa njengesikhungo sokuvota ngesikhathi Sokhetho Lomasipala ngoMfumfu ngowezi-2021, uNks Gabuza uwavumile amacala okukhwabanisa amavoti angama-24, kufaka phakathi ayi-12 oKhetho Lomasipala namanye ayi-12 oKhetho Lwesigceme.
Ukulahlwa yicala nokugwetshwa kubonisa ukuzinikela kweKhomishini Yezokhetho eNingizimu Afrika ukungenelela ngesikhathi kanye nokubhekana nemiphumela yesimo.

src_text: Tlaleho hlakisa dikatleho tsa 2020 ho ya ho boetse hlakisa dibaka tse sa ntseng di fana ka bothata, ho kenyeletsa polokeho ya bana le ho se lekane pakeng tsa bana ba hlokang le ba sa hlokeng.
tgt_text: Lokhu futhi kuyisiqinisekiso sezindlela zokusebenza kwezokhetho, ezilokhu ziqinile selokhu kwethulwa i-Voter Management Device evimbela ukuthi umuntu avote kabili.

src_text: Tlaleho boetse bontsha kamoo sewa sa COVID-19 se ammeng bana kateng nakong ena..  Sepheo ka mehato ya ho kena dipakeng kenngwang tshebetsong ke mmuso ke ho netefatsa ho hlomphuwa ha ditokelo tsa bana, jwalokaha di hlalositswe Molaotheong wa Rephaboliki ya Afrika Borwa wa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iqinisekise ukuthi ukhetho lungummongo wentando yeningi labantu futhi kumele luvikelwe ngazo zonke izindlela..      Ingqungquthela ye-12 YoNgqongqoshe (i-MC12) yeNhlangano Yezohwebo Yomhlaba (i-WTO).

src_text: Mehato ena boetse tshehetsa maitlamo naha Ditumellanong tsa Dinaha tsa Matjhaba tsa Ditokelo tsa Ngwana (UNCRC) le Tokomane ya Tumellano ya Afrika ya Ditokelo le Thekolohelo ya Ngwana (ACRWC).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi yamukele imiphumela ye-WTO MC12 ebibanjwe e-Geneva, e-Switzerland kusuka mhla ziyi-12 kuya mhla ziyi-17 kuNhlangulana 2022, ikakhulukazi isinqumo sokuthi amazwe afanelekile angeqa ngaphezulu ilungelo lobunikazi bemigomo ye-COVID-19 kuze kube ngowezi-.

src_text: Afrika Borwa saenne ditokomane tsa UNCRC le ACRWC..  Tlaleho bokeleditswe ka tshebedisano le mafapha mmuso le ba bang ba amehang boemong ba naha le ba diprovense.
tgt_text: Isinqumo sokudlulisela lokhu kwezokwelashwa nokuhlonzwa kwe-COVID-19 simiswe izinyanga eziyisithupha.

src_text: Tlaleho felletseng tla behwa websaeteng ya Lefapha la Ntshetsopele ya Setjhaba: www.dsd.gov.za.
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika beyilokhu ihamba phambili esicelweni sokuthi i-WTO isuse amalungelo obunikazi emigomweni ye-COVID-19 lokho okuzoqinisekisa ukufinyelela okulinganayo emigomweni futhi kuvumele namazwe anekhono lokuzikhiqizela imigomo ukuthi enze njalo.

src_text: Tlaleho ya Nako le Nako ya Afrika Borwa ho UNCRC Kopantsweng ya boraro ho ya ho ya botshelela ho UNCRC.
tgt_text: Ingqungquthela iphinde yazinikela kwinqubo evulelekile nebandakanya wonke umuntu ukuguqula yonke imisebenzi yayo futhi yavuma ukuhwebelana okuzobhekana nezinto ezifana nezempilo, ukubeka imikhawulo kuxhaso lwezokudoba, ukumiswa kwesikhashana kokuthengisa ngobuchwepheshe be-inthanethi kanye nokutholakala kokudla     Izinqumo zeKhabhinethi.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tekwa ha Tlaleho ya boraro ho ya ho ya botshelela ya Nako le Nako ho UNCRC.
tgt_text: Inqubekelaphambili oHlelweni Lokushintshela Ekusakazeni Ngedijithali (i-BDM).

src_text: Tlaleho ena tla kamora ya bobedi tekilweng ho UNCRC ka.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ibikelwe ngezakamuva oHlelweni lwe-BDM futhi yayiphawula inqubekelaphambili esiyenziwe ngokuxhunywa kwamabhokisi njengengxenye yokushintshela ekusakazeni ngedijithali kusukwa kwi-analogi.

IKhabhinethi iphinde yagcizelela ukuphuthuma kokuphothula i-BDM ukuze kuzovuleka amagagasi omoya adingwa omakhalekhukhwini, kanye neminye imisebenzi ehlobene nobunye ubuchwepheshe bolwazi nezokuxhumana..     UNgqongqoshe Wezokuxhumana Nobuchwepheshe Bedijithali uKhumbudzo Ntshavheni uzoba nesithangami sabezindaba kusasa (ngoLwesihlanu, mhla wama-24 kuNhlangulana) ukunikeza ngeminye imininingwane.

src_text: Tlaleho bokeleditswe ho latela Karolo ya 44 ya UNCRC, mme boetse akaretsa ditlhokomelo le dikgothaletso tse entsweng tlalehong ya ho qetela.
tgt_text: UMbiko Kazwelonke Wonyaka Ngesimo Samalungelo Ezingane.

src_text: UNCRC rometse ditlhokomelo le dikgothaletso tsa naha ka.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi igunyaze uMbiko wesibili kazwelonke Wonyaka Ngesimo samalungelo Ezingane ukuthi ushicilelwe.
Umbiko lo uhlinzeka ngezakamuva ekuqalisweni kweQhingasu Likazwelonke Lezingane lesikhathi sangowezi-2019 kuya ngowezi-.

src_text: Pokeletso entswe ka tshebedisano le mafapha ohle loketseng le ba amehang naheng ka bophara.
Tlaleho felletseng tla phatlalatswa ha se teketswe UNCRC.
tgt_text: Umbiko ugqamisa lokho okuzuzwe ngesikhathi sangowezi-2020 kuya kowezi-.

src_text: Tlaleho ya naha ka ho kenngwa tshebetsong ha Lenaneo le Letjha la Metse ya Ditoropong.
tgt_text: Uphinde ugqamise izingxenye ezisenezinselele, kubandakanya ukuphepha kwezingane kanye negebe elikhona phakathi kwabadla imbuya ngothi kanye nalabo abadla izambane likapondo uma kubhekwa ezinganeni.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tekwa ha tlaleho ya pele ya Afrika Borwa ya naha mabapi le ho Kenngwa Tshebetsong ha Lenaneo le Letjha la Metse ya Ditoropong tekwa Lenaneong la Phumantsho ya Bodulo la UN (UN-Habitat).
tgt_text: Umbiko uphinde ubonise ukuthi ubhubhane lwe-COVID-19 luzithinte kanjani izingane ngalesi sikhathi..     Izinyathelo zokungenelela eziqaliswa nguhulumeni sihlose ukugcina amalungelo ezingane, njengokubeka koMthethosisekelo weRiphabhulikhi yaseNingizimu Afrika wangowe-.

src_text: UN-Habitat amohetse Lenaneo la yona le Letjha la Metse ya Ditoropong, Sebokeng sa yona sa Phumantsho ya Bodulo le Ntshetsopele ya Bodulo ba Ditoropng bo Tsitsitseng ka Mphalane.
tgt_text: Ziphinde zeseke izibopho zezwe kwiZivumelwano ze-UN ngaMalungelo Ezingane (i-UNCRC) kanye noSomqulu Wase-Afrika weNhlalakahle Yezingane (i-ACRWC).

src_text: Ho ne ho lebelletswe hore dinaha tseo leng ditho di nehelane ka ditlaleho tsa kgatelopele ka ho ithaopa..  Afrika Borwa tsheheditse ho amohelwa ha Lenaneo le Letjha la Metse ya Ditoropong mme hamorao ya le kenya tshebetsong ka Moralotshebetso Momahaneng wa Ntshetsopele ya Metse ya Ditoropong (IUDF).
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika yasayina kokubili i-UNCRC kanye ne-ACRWC..     Umbiko wahlanganiswa ngokuxoxisana neminyango kahulumeni kanye nababambiqhaza abaningi abafanelekile emazingeni kazwelonke nakwizifundazwe.

src_text: Sepheo sa IUDF ke ho tataisa ntshetsopele ya bodulo ba ditoropong bo kenyeletsang bohle, bo matla le bo nang le seriti..  Tlaleho ya kgatelopele bokeleditswe ka tshebedisano le mmuso wa naha, diprovense le mebuso ya lehae, le mekgatlo loketseng eo seng ya mmuso..  Lewa le Momahaneng la Ntshetsopele ya Batjha (IYDS).
tgt_text: Umbiko ogcwele uzofakwa kwiwebhusayithi yoMnyango Wezokuthuthukiswa Komphakathi: www.dsd.gov.za.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho kenngwa tshebetsong ha IYDS.
tgt_text: Umbiko Ohlanganisiwe weNingizimu Afrika wesithathu kuya kowesithupha oya ku-UNCRC.

src_text: Lewa le thusa ho kenya tshebetsong Leano la Naha la Batjha la 2020 ho ya ho.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikugunyazile ukubekwa ezithebeni koMbiko wesithathu kuya kowesithupha ku-UNCRC.

src_text: Le hlalosa diketsahalo, diprojeke le mananeo lokelang ho etswa ke ba fapaneng ba amehang ho tswa mekgatlong ya batjha..
tgt_text: Lo mbiko ulandela uMbiko wesibili owethulelwa i-UNCRC ngowezi-..     Umbiko uhlanganiswe ngokulandela iSihloko sama-44 se-UNCRC, futhi uqukethe okuboniwe kanye nezincomo ezenziwe kumbiko owedlule.

src_text: Le boetse le thusa ka ho fokotsa phethapheto ya dithuso tsa mmuso mme le tataise kamoo mekgatlo ya basebetsi le lekala la poraefete di ka tshehetsang batjha ho fihlella menyetla.
tgt_text: I-UNCRC yathumela lokho eyakuthola kanye nezincomo zezwe ngowezi-..     Ukuhlanganiswa kwawo kwenziwa ngokuxoxisana nayoyonke iminyango efanele kanye nababambiqhaza ezweni lonkana.

src_text: Pokeletso ya lewa na le maikutlo makala fapaneng setjhabeng..  Moralo wa Tokomane ya Tataiso ya Paballo le Tshebediso ya Ho ya Ho Ile ya Dihlodilweng tsa Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: Umbiko ogcwele uzokhishelwa umphakathi uma usudlule ezithebeni ze-UNCRC.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana hore setjhaba se ntshe maikutlo ka moralo wa Tokomane ya Tataiso ya Paballo le Tshebediso ya Moshwelella ya Dihlodilweng tsa Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: Umbiko kazwelonke ngokuqaliswa koHlelo Olusha Lokuthuthukiswa Kwamadolobha i-New Urban Agenda.

src_text: Dihlodilweng tsa Afrika Borwa di fana ka motheo wa bohlokwa bakeng sa kgolo le ntshetsopele ya moruo, mme di bohlokwa boiphedisong ba batho..  Tokomane ena ya Tataiso thusa ho kenya tshebetsong dkgothaletso tsa Moifo wa Boemo bo Hodimo wa Ditsebi kgethilweng ka 2019 hore lekolebotjha maano jwale, molao le mekgwa ya ditaba tse amanang le mefuta ya bohlokwa ya dihlodilweng..  Tlaleho kgothaleditse tshibollo ya leano le leholo le akaretsang la paballo le tshebediso ya Moshwelella ya dihlodilweng tsa naha.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi igunyaze ukulethwa kombiko kazwelonke wokuqala waseNingizimu Afrika ngokuQaliswa koHlelo Olusha Lokuthuthukiswa Kwamadolobha oHlelweni Lokuhlaliswa Kwabantu lwe-UN (i-UN-Habitat).

src_text: Leano le tla kenngwa tshebetsong makaleng ohle mmuso.
tgt_text: I-UN-Habitat yamukela UHlelo lwayo Olusha Lokuthuthukiswa Kwamadolobha kwiNgqungquthela yayo Yokwakha kanye Nokuthuthukiswa Okusimeme Kwamadolobha ngoMfumfu ngowezi-.

src_text: Paballo bohlokwa bakeng sa letsholo la naha la ho potlakisa kgolo ya moruo le ho thehwa ha mesebetsi..  Lewa la Nama ya tse Hlaha.
tgt_text: Amazwe angamalungu ayelindeleke ukuthi alethe imibiko yenqubekelaphambili ngokuzithandela.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho phatlalatswa ha Moralo wa Lewa la Nama ya tse Hlaha hore setjhaba se ntshe maikutlo ka lona.
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika yakweseka ukwamukelwa koHlelo Olusha Lokuthuthukiswa Kwamadolobha futhi yalandelisa ngokuqalisa ukulisebenzisa oHlakeni Oludidiyelwe Lokuthuthukiswa Kwamadolobha (i-IUDF).

src_text: Sepheo ka lewa ke ho hophisa le ho tlisa diphetoho indastering ya nama ya tse hlaha.
tgt_text: I-IUDF ihlose ukuhlahla indlela ekuthuthukisweni kwezindawo zamadolobha ezifaka wonke umuntu, ezinamandla nekuphilekayo kuzona..     Umbiko wenqubekelaphambili wahlanganiswa ngokuxoxisana nezinhlaka zikahulumeni kuzwelonke, ezifundazweni nasemakhaya, kanye nama-NGO afanele.

src_text: Sepheo se seng ke ho ba le seabo phumanehong ya dijo nako telele..  Indasteri ya nama ya tse hlaha indastering eo haholoholo sa hlophisehang sebetsang ka mokgwa sa momahanang.
tgt_text: IQhingasu Elididiyelwe Lokuthuthukiswa Kwentsha (i-IYDS).

src_text: Lewa lena le sisinngwang le fana ka mokgwa wa tshebetso tla hlophisa le ho matlafatsa lekala lena jwaloka le fanang ka dijo nako telele le la kgolo ya moruo le ka thusang ho thehweng ha menyetla ya mosebetsi  Dibili.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi igunyaze ukuqaliswa kwe-IYDS.

src_text: Bili ya Tlhomathiso ya Merero ya Setso ka Kakaretso ya.
tgt_text: Leli qhingasu lingumphumela weNqubomgomo Kazwelonke Yentsha yangowezi-2020 kuya kowezi-.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tekwa ha Bili ya Tlhomathiso ya Merero ya Setso ka Kakaretso ya 2022 Palamenteng bakeng sa hore ke sekasekwe.
tgt_text: Icacisa izinyathelo, imiklamo kanye nezinhlelo okumele zithathwe ngababambiqhaza abehlukahlukene abaphuma ezinhlanganweni zentsha.

src_text: Sepheo ka dikarolo tse ngotsweng botjha ke ho lekolabotjha Molao wa Boetapele ba Setso le ba MaKhoi-San wa 2019  (Molao wa 3 wa 2019) keneng tshebetsong ka la 01 Mmesa.
tgt_text: Iphinde ibhekane nokunciphisa ukuphindaphinda izingenelelo zikahulumeni futhi iphinde ibe ngumhlahlandlela wokuthi umphakathi kanye nomkhakha ozimele ungabeseka kanjani abantu abasha ukuthi bafinyelele emathubeni.
Ukuhlanganiswa kwaleli qhingasu kubandakanya imibono eyehlukene ephuma kwimikhakha eyehlukene yomphakathi.

src_text: Bili ya Tlhomathiso ya 2022 ya Tshireletso ya Demokrasi Itshetlehileng ho Molaotheo kgahlano le Boferekanyi le Diketsahalo tse Amehang.
tgt_text: UMthetho Odingidwayo Osahlongozwa Ngokongiwa Kwemvelo kanye Nokusetshenziswa Okusimeme Kwezitshalo Nezilwane Eziphilayo eNingizimu Afrika.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tekwa ha Bili ya Tlhomathiso ya 2022 ya Tshireletso ya Demokrasi Itshetlehileng ho Molaotheo kgahlano le Boferekanyi le Diketsahalo tse Amehang, Palamenteng bakeng sa hore ke sekasekwe.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi igunyaze uMthetho Odingidwayo osahlongozwa Ngokongiwa Kwemvelo kanye Nokusetshenziswa Okusimeme Kwezitshalo Nezilwane Eziphilayo eNingizimu Afrika ukuthi umphakathi uphawule ngawo.

src_text: Ha se amohetswe, Bili tla fetola Molao wa jwale wa Tshireletso ya Demokrasi Itshetlehileng ho Molaotheo Kgahlano le Boferekanyi le Diketsahalo tse Amehang wa 2004 (Molao wa 33 wa 2004).
tgt_text: Izitshalo nezilwane eziphilayo eNingizimu Afrika kunikeza ngesisekelo esibalulekile ekukhuleni nasekuthuthukeni komnotho, futhi zibucayi kakhulu ezindleleni zokuziphilisa zabantu.

src_text: Bili ena fetile motjheng matla wa dipuisano le setjhaba kamora hore tjhaelwe monwana ke Kabinete ka Motsheanong.
Sepheo ka diphetoho ke ho tjhorisa metjha ya kwano ya ho lwantsha boferekanyi le ya lefatshe teng.
tgt_text: UMthetho Osadingidwa ungumphumela wezincomo ezenziwa iThimba Eliphezulu Lezingcweti elabekwa ngowezi-2019 ukubuyekeza izinqubomgomo zethu esinazo, imithetho kanye nemikhuba esenza ngayo ezindabeni ezihlobene nezitshalo nezilwane ezibalulekile.

src_text: Diphetoho di boetse tsa lokisa dikarolwana tseo ho neng hothwe ha di ikamahanye le molaotheo ke Lekgotla la Molaotheo..  Jwaloka setho sa Lekgotla la Tshireletseho la Matjhaba Kopaneng, Afrika Borwa tlameha ho sebedisa melao ya matjhaba naheng ena leng melao eo sepheo ka yona leng ho matlafatsa mehato ya ho lwantsha boferekanyi lefatsheng  Diketsahalo tse Tlang.
Seboka sa bo-14 sa Brazil, Russia, India, China le Afrika Borwa (BRICS).
tgt_text: Umbiko ubeke isincomo sokuthuthukiswa kwenqubomgomo egcwele yokongiwa kwemvelo nokusetshenziswa okusimeme kwezitshalo nezilwane eziphilayo zakuleli lizwe.

src_text: Mopresidente Ramaphosa tla etella pele Afrika Borwa Sebokeng sa mokgwa wa vidiyo sa bo-14 sa Baetapele ba dinaha tsa BRICS se tla tshwarwa ke People’s Republic of China ho tloha ka Labone la la 23 ho ya ho Labohlano la la 24 Phuptjane.
tgt_text: Le nqubomgomo izoqalisa ukusebenza kuzozonke izinhlaka zikahulumeni.
Ukongiwa kwemvelo kubalulekile emkhankasweni wezwe wokuqhubela phambili ukukhula komnotho nokusungulwa kwemisebenzi.

src_text: Botho ba rona ba BRICS bo tswela pele ho tswela naha molemo.
tgt_text: IQhingasu Ngenyama Yenyamazane.

src_text: Ngwahola thepa ya Afrika Borwa rometsweng dinaheng tse ding ballwang dipersenteng tse fetang tse 17 ile dinaheng tsa BRICS, mme dipersente tse fetang tse 29 tsa thepa tlileng kwano di ne di tswa dinaheng tseo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi igunyaze ukushicilelwa koMthetho Ohlongozwayo weQhingasu Ngenyama Yenyamazane ukuze umphakathi uzophawula ngawo.

src_text: Boleng ba kgwebisano ena ntse bo ntse bo hola, mme kgwebisano yohle ya Afrika Borwa le dinaha tse ding tsa BRICS ka 2021 ballwa dibiliyoneng tse R702, ha ka 2017 ne ballwa dibiliyoneng tse  .
tgt_text: Leli qhingasu lihlose ukufaka emthethweni futhi liguqule imboni yenyama yenyamazane.

src_text: Tshebedisano hara dinaha tseo leng ditho tsa BRICS makaleng kang bophelo bo botle le kgwebisano ntlafetseng hodisitse diindasteri tsa naha ena, mme tswetse ditho tsohle tsa BRICS molemo.
tgt_text: Liphinde lihlose ukufaka igalelo ekutholakaleni kokudla ngendlela esimeme.

src_text: Sepheo ka botsetedi ba rona diprojekeng tsa ntshetsopele ya meralo ya ditshebeletso le maiteko ho potlakisa metjha ya kgwebo ke ho eketsa thepa romelwang ho balekane ba rona ba BRICS..  Sekolo sa Mariha sa Tsamaiso ya Moruo.
tgt_text: Imboni yenyama yenyamazane ngokuvamile iyimboni engahlelekile esebenza ngokwehlukana phakathi.

src_text: Sekolo sa Naha sa Mmuso (NSG) se tla tshwara Lenaneo la sona la boraro la sekolo sa Mariha sa Tsamaiso ya Moruo bakeng sa Bahlanka ba Phethahatso, Johannesburg ho tloha ho la 27 Phuptjane ho ya ho la 1 Phupu.
tgt_text: Iqhingasu elihlongoziwe lihlinzeka ngesu lokuliqalisa elizokwenza ukuthi umkhakha lo uhleleke futhi uqine njengomhlinzeki wokudla kanye nomkhakha okhulisa umnotho lokho okuzosiza ukusungula amathuba omsebenzi     IMithethosivivinywa.

src_text: Sebokeng ho tla tla Matona tswang Côte d'Ivoire; South Sudan le Afrika Borwa; le Balaodi-Kakaretso ba Lesotho, Zambia, Democratic Republic of Congo, Tanzania le Ghana.
tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa Wokuchibiyela Wezezindaba Zendabuko wangowezi-.

src_text: Boramotse ba Afrika Borwa, mmoho le ditho tsa dikomiti tsa boramotse le makgotla phethahatso ba tla ba teng le bona..  Ho lebelletswe hore bahlanka bana ba phethahatso ba tswang dinaheng tse fapaneng ba abelane dikgopolo le dithuto ka maemo fapaneng ao ba kopanang le ona mosebetsing wa bona wa letsatsi le letsatsi..  NSG radile lenaneo la selemo le selemo bakeng sa ditho tsa phethahatso ka 2020 le karolo ya tshehetso ya yona boinehelong ba mmuso ba ho aha naha nang le bokgoni.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi igunyaze ukulethwa koMthethosivivinywa Wokuchibiyela Wezezindaba Zendabuko wangowezi-2022 ePhalamende ukuze kuzoqhutshekwa nokuthi udingidwe.

src_text: Sepheo ka sekolo sena hara tse ding ke ho hlomella bahlanka ba phethahatso makaleng mararo mmuso ka boetapele bo ntlafetseng le bokgoni ba ho hlokomela le hore ba kgone ho lekola botjha diphephetso tsa tsamaiso tse sitisang ho kenyeletswa ha bohle le kgolo ya ho ya ho ile ya moruo..  Letsatsi la Matjhaba la Nelson Mandela.
tgt_text: Izichibiyelo zihlose ukubuyekeza uMthetho Wamasiko Nobuholi babaThwa, wangowezi-2019 (uMthetho wesi-3 wezi-2019), owaqala ukusebenza mhla lu-1 kuMbasa.

src_text: Letsatsi la Matjhaba la Nelson Mandela le ka Mantaha, 18 Phupu 2022, mme le tla ketekwa tlasa mookotaba: “Etsa seo se kgonang, ka seo nang le sona, moo leng teng”.
tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa Wokuchibiyela Wokuvikelwa kweNtando Yeningi Labantu Engumthethosisekelo kuMaphekula kanye nezenzo Ezihlobene nakho wangowezi-..     IKhabhinethi igunyaze ukulethwa koMthethosivivinywa Wokuchibiyela Wokuvikelwa kweNtando Yeningi Labantu Engumthethosisekelo kuMaphekula kanye nezenzo Ezihlobene nakho wangowezi-2022 ePhalamende ukuthi kuqhutshekwe udingidwe.

src_text: Ke boipiletso bo matla bathong hore ba tshehetse le ho ba le seabo letsholong lena ka maiteko moshwelella nang le thuso ya nako telele..  Bo bong ba maiteko ao moshwelella ke Dipuisano tsa selemo le selemo tsa Batjha tsa ho tlotla Nelson Mandela le Lenaneo la Boetapele bo Kgabane bo tsepameng dintlheng tseo ho buuwang ka tsona haholo tse amanang le batjha Afrika Borwa le lefatsheng ka bophara..  Nako ya Lekgetho.
tgt_text: Uma sewamukelwe, lo Mthethosivivinywa uzochibiyela uMthetho wamanje Wokuvikelwa kweNtando Yeningi Labantu Engumthethosisekelo kuMaphekula kanye nezenzo Ezihlobene nakho, wangowezi-2004 (uMthetho wama-33 wangowezi-2004).

src_text: Sehla sa 2022 sa ho kenya ditokomane tsa lekgetho se qala ka la 1 Phupu ho ya ho la 24 Mphalane.
tgt_text: Lo Mthethosivivinywa udlule emphakathini waphawula ngawo emva kokuthi wagunyazwa iKhabhinethi ngoNhlaba ngowezi-.

src_text: Balefi ba lekgetho ba kgothaletswa ho kenya ditokomane tsa bona tsa lekgetho ka mokgwa wa eFiling (www.sarsefiling.co.za) kapa ho MobiApp ya Tshebeletso ya Pokello ya Lekgetho ya Afrika Borwa (SARS)..  Monongwaha SARS tla nne sebedise tlhahisoleseding eo e bokellang ya motho ka mong, ho etsa tlaleho ya motho nang le dintlha tsohle tsa hae tsa ditjhelete, ho thusa ho bebofatsa motjha wa ho kenya ditokomane tsa lekgetho.
tgt_text: Izichibiyelo zihlose ukulinganisa izindlela zaleli lizwe zokulwa nobuphekula nezindlela zomhlaba ezibekiwe.

src_text: Ka 2021 SARS bokelletse tlhahisoleseding ya balefi ba lekgetho ba dimiliyone tse fetang tse tharo.
tgt_text: Ziphinde zaphendula iziqeshana iNkantolo Yomthethosisekelo ezithole ukuthi azihambisani nomthethosisekelo.

src_text: Ho kenngwa ha ditokomane ka nako le ka nepo ho netefatsa hore batho ba ikamahanye le melao ya lekgetho, le ho thusa mmuso ho isa ditshebeletso ho Maafrika Borwa di hlokang haholo  Melaetsa.
tgt_text: Njengezwe elisayine kuMkhandlu Wezokuvikela we-UN, iNingizimu Afrika ibophezelekile ukuthi ithathe imithetho yamazwe ngamazwe ekuhloswe ngayo ukuqinisa izindlela zokulwa nobuphekula emhlabeni iyisebenzise kuleli     Imicimbi Ezayo.

src_text: DithoholetsoKabinete thoholeditse le ho lebisa ditakaletso tse ntle ho bana: • Moahlodi Owen Lloyd Rogers kamora hore kgethelwe ho ba moahlodi wa Lekgotla la Molaotheo la Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: INgqungquthela ye-14 ye-Brazil, i-Russia, i-India, i-China neNingizimu Afrika (i-BRICS).

src_text: • Kabinete le Mopresidente Ramaphosa ba lakaleditse Mopresidente wa Mehleng Thabo Mbeki mahlohonolo Letsatsi la Tswalo ha qeta dilemo tse 80, leo le ketekileng ka la 18 Phuptjane.
tgt_text: UMongameli u-Ramaphosa uzohola ukubamba iqhaza kweNingizimu Afrika kwiNgqungquthela Yabaholi ye-14 ye-BRICS ezobanjwa ngobuchwepheshe be-inthanethi ezosingathwa iRiphabhulikhi yaseShayina kusukela ngoLwesine, mhla wama-23 kuya kuLwesihlanu, mhla wama-24 kuNhlangulana.

src_text: Monghadi Mbeki lakaleditse Maafrika Borwa ohle bokamoso bo tjhabileng le bo nang le katleho  KhiroHo tlameha hore ho netefatswe mangolo thuto ba hirwang mme ho netefatswe le hore ba ha ba so ka ba tlola molao.
Balaodi ba Ikemetseng ba Boto ya Boladi ya Bofofisi Afrika Borwa  Monghadi Ernest Khosa  Mme Bulelwa Koyana  Monghadi Surendra Sooklal; led.
tgt_text: Ubulungu bethu be-BRICS buyaqhubeka nokuzuzela izwe.

src_text: Mme Rejoice Edith Phewa.
tgt_text: Ngonyaka odlule impahla engaphezu kwama-17% yaseNingizimu Afrika yathunyelwa kwamanye amazwe angamalungu e-BRICS, futhi impahla engaphezu kwama-29% evela kwamanye amazwe ibibuya kula mazwe.

src_text: Ditho tsa Ofisi ya Diphatlalatso tsa Dilounu tsa ho reka Matlo le Phatlalatso ya Dikoloto tsa Matlo  Mme Kenosi Pearl Louisa Selane (Modulasetulo)  Mme Catharina Maria Van der Sandt  Monghadi Errol Vincent Magerman  Moadvokheiti Mandla Dludlu  Monghadi Matsobane Gabriel Mello  Mme Palesa Mawasha  Mme Penelope Anne Beck-Paxton  Mme Sphiwe Dorris Mayinga  Mme Tshifhiwa Victor Mphigalale; lej.
tgt_text: Inani laloku kuhwebelana liyaqhubeka nokukhula, ngenani eliphelele lokuhweba kweNingizimu Afrika namanye amazwe elifika kwizigidigidi ezingama-R702 ngowezi-2021, lisuka kwizigidigidi ezingama-R487 ngowezi-.

src_text: Tsa Moraorao Mabapi le Kokwanahloko ya Khorona (COVID-19).
tgt_text: Ezakamuva ngeSifo Segciwane le-Corona (i-COVID-19).

src_text: Kabinete leboha batho bohle ba Afrika Borwa ba ileng ba kgetha ho enta le ho ikobela dipehelo tsohle tse mabapi le COVID-19 leng se entseng hore lenane la batho ba tshwaetsehang le se ke la phahama haholo leqhubung la bohlano la sewa sena naheng ena..     Leha ho le jwalo, re ntse re tlameha ho ba hlokolosi jwalo ka ha COVID-19 ntse so fele.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lincome bonke abantu baseNingizimu Afrika abaqoke ukuphuma bayogonywa futhi abayithobelayo yonke imigomo ye-COVID-19, osekuholele ekutheni izwe likwazi ukugwema ukukhula kwezigameko ezintsha zokutheleleka kwabantu ngegciwane ehlandleni lesihlanu lobhubhane..     Kepha-ke, akumele neze sidembesele njengoba i-COVID-19 iselokhu ikhona phakathi kwethu.

src_text: Leha mmuso sa tswa phumula molao qobellang batho ho apara dimonkwana setjhabeng, empa batho ba nang le mafu sa phekoleheng, le ba kulang, ba ntse ba tlameha ho tswela pele le ho di apara.
tgt_text: Nakuba kamuva nje izwe likuqedile ukugqokwa kwezifonyo okuphoqelelekile emphakathini, abantu abanezifo ezingamahlalakhona kanye nalabo abagulayo bayakhuthazwa ukuba baqhubeke nokugqoka isifonyo.

src_text: Re ntse re tlameha ho tswela pele le ho hlapa matsoho rona kgafetsa kapa ho hlwekisa ka sebolaya dikokwanahloko, ho iqaqolohanya le ba bang mmoho le ho ba sebakeng se kenang moya hantle..     Ente ntse le yona feela mokgwa nang le bopaki ba saense ba hore thibela COVID-19, mme Kabinete kgothaletsa batho bohle ba so kang ba enta ho etsa jwalo ka potlako le ba entileng ho fumana ente ya tlatsetso mahala ditsing tse haufi tsa ho entela..     Monkeypox.
tgt_text: Kumele futhi siqhubeke nokugeza izandla noma sizihlanze ngesibulalimagciwane futhi siqinisekise ukuqhelelana ngendlela efanele phakathi kwethu nabanye abantu, futhi siqinisekise ukuthi endaweni okuhleli kuyona abantu kungena umoya ohlanzekile owanele.

src_text: Kabinete ile ya behwa sehlohlolong sa ditaba tsa moraorao mabapi le Monkeypox le ho tshwaetsa ha yona naheng ena ho latela ho fumaneha ha motho wa bobedi ya nang le bohloko bona naheng ena.

Bakudi bana ka bobedi ba ipolokile ka bonngwe malapeng mme ho ntse ho tsongwa batho bao ba kileng ba kopana le bona, bao ho ka etsahalang hore ba bile kotsing ya ho tshwaetseha..     Ka bobedi Lefapha la Bophelo bo Botle le Mokgatlo wa Naha wa Mahloko Tshwaetsanang, ba sebedisana mmoho le Mokgatlo wa Matjhaba wa Bophelo bo Botle ho hlahloba kotsi ya tshwaetsano bohlokong bona naheng ena ba ipapisitse le dipehelo tsa Matjhaba tsa Bophelo bo Botle..     Kokwanahloko ya monkeypox ha tshwaetsane ha bonolo ntle le ha thetsane le motho ya nang le yona jwalo ka ho sunana, ho mo sika kapa ho thetsa dikarolo tsa mmele tse nang le yona.
tgt_text: Ukugonywa kusalokhu kuyiyona ndlela yokuzivikela ku-COVID-19 eqinisekisiwe ukuthi iyasebenza efakazelwa yisayensi futhi iKhabhinethi liyabakhuthaza bonke abantu abangakagonywa ukuba baphume ngokushesha bayogonywa, kanti ngokunjalo futhi abantu esebegonyiwe nabo kumele baphume bayothola umjovo oweseka futhi ulekele umgomo egazini mahhala esikhungweni sokugoma esiseduze nabo..     Isifo i-Monkeypox.

src_text: Batho ba se nang matshwao kokwanahloko ena ba ke ke ba tshwetsa ba bang..     Kabinete eletsa batho ba bang le matshwao feberu mokgohlane tlwaelehileng tsamaisanang le matjhatjhetsi kang lekgopho hore ba etele ditsi tsa bophelo bo botle ho ka fumana ho hlahlojwa le ho alafuwa sa le nako..     Koduwa ya Tameneng ya East London.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lithulelwe umbiko wakamuva mayelana nokusabalala kwesifo i-Monkeypox ezweni kulandela ukuqinisekiswa kamuva nje kwesigameko sesibili sokutheleleka komuntu kuleli.

src_text: Koduwa hlahileng Tameneng ya Enyobeni, East London mane Kapa Botjhabela, ka la 26 Phuptjane 2022, eo ho yona ho ileng ha hlokahala batjha ba 21 ile ya tshosa naha ka bophara.
tgt_text: Labo bantu abathelelekile bagonqile emakhaya futhi kulandelwa umkhondo wabo bonke abanye abantu abake basondelana nabo ukuze kuhlonzwe futhi kutholwe labo okungenzeka ukuthi nabo bathelelekile..     UMnyango Wezempilo kanye NeSikhungo Sikazwelonke Sezifo Ezithathelwanayo basebenzisana neNhlangano Yezempilo Emhlabeni ukubheka nokuhlola ubungozi bokusabalala nokutheleleka kwabantu ngalesi sifo ezweni ngokuhambisana neMithethonqubo Yezempilo Yamazwe Ngamazwe..     Igciwane le-monkeypox alisabalali kalula futhi lidluliseka kuphela emuva kokusondelana kakhulu kwabantu njengokuqabulana, ukwangana noma ukuthintana namalunga omzimba onezilonda ze-monkeypox.

src_text: Re ipotsa hore be malapa bona ikutlwa jwang ka ho lahlehelwa ke bana ba ona koduweng kang eo..     Kabinete fetisetsa matshidiso yona ho malapa ohle lahlehetsweng ke beng ka bona mmoho le ho leboha bohle ba ileng ba bontsha moya wa botho ka ho tshehetsa malapa ao nakong eo ya tlokotsi..     Ke ntho ngongorehisang hore bana ba dilemong tsa bo 13 ba dumellwe ho kena dibakeng tseo ho nowang jwala ho tsona.
tgt_text: Abantu abangenazo izimpawu ze-monkeypox abalidluliseli igciwane kwabanye abantu..     IKhabhinethi liluleke abantu abanezimpawu ezinjengemfiva, kanye nezimpawu ezijwayelekile zomkhuhlane ezilandelwa wukuqubuka okunamabhamuza ukuba baphuthume esikhungweni sezempilo esiseduzane ukuze baxilongwe futhi bathole ukwelashwa kusenesikhathi.

src_text: Re ipiletsa ho setjhaba hore le sona se nke karolo ho netefatsa hore bana ba rona ba bolokehile ka dinako tsohle..     Bana ba dilemo tse ka tlase ho tse 18 ha ba dumellwa ho kena ditameneng, dishibining, dibakeng tseo ho nwellwang ho tsona le tse rekisang jwala.
tgt_text: Isibhicongo esenzeke endaweni yokucima ukoma eMonti.

src_text: Ke tlolo ya molao ho batho bohle ba hwebang ka jwala ho se ikobele melao ena, mme hape ba tlameha le ho amohuwa dilaesense tsa bona tsa ho rekisa jwala..     Sephetho sa Kopano ya Baetapele ba Dinaha tse Supileng (G7).
tgt_text: Isibhicongo esesabekayo esenzeke endaweni yokucima ukoma Enyobeni eMonti eMpumalanga Kapa ngeSonto, mhla zingama-26 kuNhlangulana 2022 esidlule nemiphefumulo yamabhungu namatshitshi angama-21, sishiye izwe lethu lonkana likhungathekile futhi lisosizini.

src_text: Mopresidente Cyril Ramaphosa ile nka karolo Kopanong ya Baetapele ba G7 neng tshwaretswe Bavaria, Jeremane, ka Mantaha wa la 27 Phuptjane.
tgt_text: Kunzima ngisho ukucabanga nokubona ngamehlo engqondo usizi nobuhlungu obesabekayo obubhekene nemindeni elahlekelwe yizingane zayo ngendlela ebuhlungu kangaka..     IKhabhinethi lizwakalise ukudabuka kwalo futhi ladlulisa namazwi enduduzo emindenini elahlekelwe yizingane zayo ezithandayo futhi lizwakalise amazwi okubonga kubo bonke labo abafake isandla ngokulekelela nokuhlinzeka ngosizo emindenini esemanzini kulesi sikhathi esinzima kangaka ebhekene naso..     Kuyinto ekhathazayo ukuthi izingane ezisencane kangaka, ngisho nalezo ezineminyaka yobudala eyi-13 imbala, zivunyeliwe ukuba zingene kule ndawo yokucima ukoma futhi zavunyelwa nokuphuza utshwala.

src_text: Mopresidente ne menngwe kopanong ena ke Moetapele wa naha eo ho neng ho tshwaretswe kopano ena ho yona leng Motjhanselara Olaf Scholz.
tgt_text: Sinxusa imiphakathi ukuba idlale indima yayo ukugcina izingane zethu ziphephile ngaso sonke isikhathi..     Izingane ezineminyaka yobudala engaphansi kweyi-18 azivumelekile ukungena emathaveni, emashibhini, ezinkantini kanye nasemabhodlela-sitolo.

src_text: Kopanong ena, ho ne ho sekasekwa ditaba tse amang maemo lehodimo, motlakase, tsa bophelo bo botle, tlhahiso ya dijo boemong ba matjhaba le tekatekano ya bonng..     G7 ke tshebedisano ya mebuso le diforamo tsa dipolotiki dinaheng tse kang Khanada, Fora, Jeremane, Ithali, Japane, United Kingdom le Dinaha tse Kopaneng tsa Amerika     Diqeto tsa Kabinete.
tgt_text: Abathengisi botshwala abayotholakala bephula noma yimiphi kule mithetho bayobekwa amacala futhi kuhoxiswe nezimvume zabo zokuthengisa utshwala..     Imiphumela Yengqungquthela Yabaholi Beqembu Lamazwe Ayisikhombisa (i-G7).

src_text: Moralo wa Tshebetso wa Lekala la tsa Molao (LSC).
tgt_text: UMongameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa ubebambe iqhaza eNgqungqutheleni Yabaholi Bamazwe e-G7 ebibanjelwe e-Bavaria, kwelaseJalimane ngoMsombuluko mhla zingama-27 kuNhlangulana.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho phatlalatswa ha Moralo wa LSC bakeng sa maikutlo setjhaba.
tgt_text: UMongameli – obambe iqhaza ezigcawini zokusebenza lapho kubhungwe khona ngezindaba eziphathelene nesimo sezulu, amandla kagesi, ezempilo, ukutholakala kokudla okwanele kanye nokulingana ngokobulili – ubemenywe ngumsingathi wengqungquthela uShansela Olaf Scholz..     I-G7 wumbimbi lwezepolitiki olubandakanya ohulumeni bamazwe ahlukahlukene olubandakanya i-Canada, France, Germany, Italy, Japan, United Kingdom kanye ne-United States     Izinqumo zeKhabhinethi.

src_text: Maikemisetso dipehelo tsena ke ho potlakisetsa ho etswa ha diphetolo lekaleng lena ho etsa hore kemedi ho lona be nepahetseng ho ya ka maemo setjhaba ka ho fapana.
tgt_text: Uhlaka Lwemithethomgomo Yomkhakha Wezomthetho (uHlaka lwe-LSC).

src_text: Dipehelo tsena di tla thusa ho theha mokgatlo tla netefatsa hore lekala lena le ba le batho ba rupeletsweng ka botlalo ho fana ka ditshebeletso tsa molao..     Ho ngolwa ha moralo ona wa LSC ho ne ho okametswe ke Mokgatlo wa Basebeletsi ba Molao leng mokgatlo thehilweng ho latela Karolo ya 4 ya molao wa Legal Practice Act, 2014 (Molao wa bo 28 wa 2014) ka tlasa tataiso ya Leano la molao wa Tshehetso ya ba Batsho Moruong (B-BBEE) wa 2013 (Molao wa bo 46 wa 2013).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likugunyazile ukushicilelwa koHlaka lwe-LSC ukuze umphakathi uphawule ngalo.

src_text: Molao wa B-BBEE wa 2013 neha Letona la Dikgwebo le Ditlhodisano matla ho etsa dipehelo mabapi le tshebetso nepahetseng ho tsa tshehetso ya ba batsho moruong makaleng itseng.
tgt_text: Izinjongo zale mithethomgomo wukuletha uguquko emkhakheni wezomthetho ukuze kube nokumeleka ngendlela efanele kwabantu bonke bakuleli.

src_text: Ha jwale, ba ditshebeletso tsa molao ha ba na dipehelo tseo ba sebeletsang hodima tsona ho tobana le mathata ho se lekalekane lekaleng lena la tsa molao..     Moralo ona wa LSC tla phatlalatswa Bukeng ya Diphatlalatso tsa Mmuso matsatsi 60 hore setjhaba se ntshe maikutlo ka ona..     Tlaleho ya Tshebetso ya Habedi ka Selemo.
tgt_text: Imithethomgomo izoqinisekisa futhi nokusungulwa kwenhlangano ezokhiqiza abahlinzeki bezinsizakalo zomthetho abaqeqeshwe kahle futhi abawenza ngobunyoninco umsebenzi wabo.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana tlaleho ya tshebetso tswang habedi ka selemo ya ho tloha ka Mphalane 2021 ho isa ho Tlhakubele.
tgt_text: Umsebenzi wokwakhiwa koHlaka lwe-LSC bewenganyelwe nguMkhandlu Womsebenzi Wezomthetho, okuyinhlangano esemthethweni esungulwe ngokweSigaba sesi-4 soMthetho Womsebenzi Wezomthetho, wonyaka wezi-2014 (uMthetho wama-28 wonyaka wezi-2014) futhi ngokuholwa nokuqondiswa nguMthetho Wezokufukulwa Nokuhlonyiswa Kwabantu Abamnyama Kwezomnotho (i-B-BBEE), wonyaka wezi-2013 (uMthetho wama-46 wonyaka wezi-2013).

src_text: Ditlaleho tsena ke karolo ya Leano la Meralo ya Nako ya Bohareng (MTSF) ho tloha ka selemo sa 2019 ho isa ho sa.
tgt_text: UMthetho we-B-BBEE wonyaka wezi-2013 uhlinzekela ukuthi uNgqongqoshe Wezohwebo, Izimboni Nokuncintisana akhiphe imithethomgomo yenkambiso enhle okumele ilandelwe ekufukulweni nokuhlonyiswa kwabantu abamnyama kwezomnotho emikhakheni ethile ehlosiwe.

src_text: Leano lena la MTSF 2019-2024, ke moralo wa tshebetso oo ka ona ho boetseng ho ikemiseditsweng ho fihlela Leano la Naha la Ntshetsopele: Leano la Tjhebelo pele la selemo sa 2030 tla beng le nako ya puso ya botshelela..     Ditlaleho tsena di shebile haholo maikemisetso ao mmuso a behileng pele leng (1) Diphetoho moruong le thehong ya menyetla ya mesebetsi; (2) Tsa thuto, thupello, le tsa bophelo bo botle; (3) Leano la tshehetso ya setjhaba ka ho fana ka ditshebeletso tsa boleng ka tsela otlolohileng; (4) Tsa bodulo ba setjhaba le tsa bommasepala; (5) Tshebedisano ya setjhaba mmoho le polokeho ya sona; (6) Theho ya mmuso nang le bokgoni le puso nang le toka; le (7) Ho theha maemo betere Afrika le matjhabeng mmoho le ho kenella ha puso ya botshelela..     Kabinete amohetse kgatelo pele dikarolong tse neng di hlwahilwe nakong ena ya ho lekola botjha.
tgt_text: Amalungu omsebenzi wezomthetho njengamanje awanayo imithethomgomo eqondene nalo mkhakha ezowahola futhi iwaqondise ekubhekaneni ngqo nokungalingani okukhona emsebenzini wezomthetho.

src_text: Kabinete boetse elelletswe le dikarolo tseo ho sa ntsa neng ho hlokahala ho kenellwa ho tsona ka lebaka la tieho bileng teng ka lebaka la sewa sa COVID-.
tgt_text: UHlaka lwe-LSC lwashicilelwa kuSomqulu Kahulumeni isikhathi esiyizinsuku ezingama-60 ukuze umphakathi ukwazi ukuphawula ngalo..     Imibiko Yenqubekelaphambili Yokusebenza Ekhishwa Kabili Ngonyaka.
IKhabhinethi liyigunyazile imibiko yenqubekelaphambili yokusebenza ekhishwa kabili ngonyaka yesikhathi esifaka phakathi uMfumfu 2021 kuya kuNdasa.

src_text: Matona tla tshwara diboka tsa boraditaba dibekeng tse mmalwa tse tlang ho hlalosa ha batsi ka ditlaleho tsa ona le ho hlalosa dikarolong tseo ho hlokahalang hore ho sebetswe ka thatanyana ho tsona     Diketsahalo tse Tlang.
tgt_text: Le mibiko iyingxenye yoHlaka Lwamaqhinga Esikhathi Esimaphakathi (i-MTSF) 2019-.

src_text: Seboka sa Boradiindasteri ba Batsho le Barekisi Dinaheng tsa Matjhaba (BIEC).
tgt_text: I-MTSF 2019-2024 iwuhlelo lokuqalisa umsebenzi kanye nokusebenza kohlaka lokuqapha okuhloswe ngalo ukufezekisa izinto ezibekwe eqhulwini nguhulumeni wehlandla lokuphatha lesithupha ngaphansi kweNhlosombono yowezi-2030 yoHlelo Lokuthuthukiswa Kwezwe.

src_text: Seboka sa pele sa BIEC se tla tshwarelwa Sandton International Convention Centre, Lejweleputswa ka Laboraro la la 20 Phupu.
tgt_text: Imibiko ibigxile ezintweni eziyisikhombisa ezibekwe eqhulwini nguhulumeni, okuyilezi (1) Uguquko kwezomnotho nokuvulwa kwamathuba omsebenzi; (2) Ezemfundo, amakhono kanye nezempilo; (3) Ukuqiniswa kwezibonelelo zikahulumeni nokubhekelelwa komphakathi kangcono ngokuthi kuhlinzekwe izidingongqangi ezithembakele ezitholakala ngendlela efanele ngaso sonke isikhathi futhi ezisezingeni elifanele; (4) Ukudidiyelwa ngendlela efanele kwezindawo okutholakala kuzona ingqalasizinda nezikhungo eziwusizo, izindawo zokuhlaliswa kwabantu kanye nohulumeni basekhaya; (5) Ubumbano lomphakathi kanye nemiphakathi ephephile; (6) Umbuso onekhono lokusebenza ngendlela efanele, olandela inkambiso elungileyo emsebenzini owenzayo futhi othuthukisayo; kanye (7) ne-Afrika nomhlaba ongcono, kanye nezinhlelo zokungenelela zikahulumeni wehlandla lokuphatha lesithupha ezihlobene nalokho..     IKhabhinethi liyamukele ngezandla ezimhlophe imikhakha okwenzeke kuyona inqubekelaphambili emigomweni obekuhloswe ukufinyelela kuyona kulesi sikhathi sokubika esibuyekezwayo.

IKhabhinethi liyiphawulile futhi naleyo mikhakha edinga ukuthi kube nezinhlelo zokungenelela ukuze kulungiswe inkinga yokubambezeleka okwenzekile ngenxa yokukhahlamezeka okudalwe wubhubhane lwe-COVID-.

src_text: Seboka sena se tla ka mora tlhomamiso ya Marangrang Thekiso Matjhabeng ke mmuso bakeng sa Boradiindasteri ba Batsho ka maikemisetso ho ba thusa ho kena mmarakeng meng, le ho fumana ditsela tsa ho fumana ditshehetso tsa ditjhelete le mekgwa ya ho bapatsa     Melaetsa.

DitebohoKabinete lebisa diteboho le ditakaletso tse ntle ho: Sehlopha sa Springboks, ka tlholo ya sona papading ya sona le naha ya Wales papading ya sona ya pele ya tse tharo tsa diteko Lebaleng la Loftus Versveld, Tshwane, ka Moqebelo wa la 2 Phupu.
tgt_text: ONgqongqoshe bazobamba izithangami nabezindaba kula maviki ezayo ukuze bakwazi ukwenaba kabanzi ngemibiko yabo ngokwehlukana kwabo futhi bachaze kabanzi nangalezo zindawo lapho kudingeka khona ukuba kuqiniswe isandla kusetshenzwe ngokuzikhandla     Umcimbi ozayo.

src_text: Banyana Banyana, ka tlholo ya bona ya 2-1 ka Montaha wa la 4 Phupu 2022 kgahlano le naha ya Nigeria papading ya bona ya pele Tonamenteng ya Basadi ya Dinaha tsa Afrika tshwaretsweng naheng ya Morokho     Khiro    Pele batho bohle ba hirwa, ho tla hlahlobisiswa mangolo bona thuto le mang hlokahalang.
tgt_text: INgqungquthela Yosozimboni Abamnyama Abathumela Impahla Nemikhiqizo Emazweni Angaphandle (i-BIEC).

src_text: Ngaka Nyameko Barney Pityana kgethetswe ho ba Modulasetulo wa Komeshene ya Naha ya Diloto..     Moatevokate Rory Voller kgethetswe ho ba Mokomeshenara wa Komeshene ya Ngodiso ya Dikhamphani le Dihlahiswa tsa Mahlale.
tgt_text: I-BIEC yokuqala ngqa izobanjelwa e-Sandton International Convention Centre eGoli ngoLwesithathu mhla zingama-20 kuNtulikazi.

src_text: Motlase.
tgt_text: Ezamandla.

src_text: Kabinete amohetse taba ya ho kenella ha mmuso mathateng motlakase naheng ena.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lamukele izingenelelo ezethulwe nguhulumeni ukubhekana nenkinga kagesi ebhekene nezwe.

src_text: Mehato ena betla tsela yang boitekong ba ho fedisa ho kgaolwa ha motlakase ka maikemisetso ho baballa, ho fetolwa ha lekala la motlakase le ho ba le tharollo ya nako telele tabeng ya motlakase..   Ho kenya letsoho ho fokotseng mathata phepelo ya motlakase naheng ena, re tlameha ho fokotsa tshebediso ya ona ka megawatts tse 600 naheng ka bophara dikgweding tsena tse tharo tse tlang..   Malapa le ona ka nka karolo ho fokotseng hona ha tshebediso ya motlakase ka ho tima mabone sa hlokahaleng le disebediswa tse jang motlakase haholo nakong ya tshebediso phahameng ya motlakase.
tgt_text: Lezi zinyathelo ezizohamba ibanga elide ekuhlahleni indlela yokunciphisa ukuncishwa kogesi ngenhloso yokuwonga, ukuletha uguquko emkhakheni kagesi kanye nokuqinisekisa ukutholakala kogesi isikhathi eside.

src_text: Dikgwebo le tsona tlhahisong ya tsona di kgothaletswa ho sebedisa thekenoloji ya sejwale jwale ho leka ho fokotsa tshebediso matla ya motlakase..   Letsholo la Vulindlela.
tgt_text: Ukuze seseke isizinda sikagesi futhi sisize izwe lethu ngokuthunyelwa kogesi olinganiselwe, sidinga ukunciphisa ukusetshenziswa kogesi njengezwe ngama-600 megawatts ezinyangeni ezintathu ezizayo..  Amakhaya angadlala indima yawo ekongeni ugesi ngokucisha zonke izibani ezingabalulekile kanye nezinto ezisebenzisa ugesi omningi ngezikhathi lapho ugesi usetshenziswa kakhulu khona.

src_text: Kabinete amohetse kgatelopele seng fihletswe tlasa Letsholo la Vulindlela ho leka ho fokotsa tshubuhlellano neng le teng lekaleng la motlakase, la tsa kgokahano, la metsi ha mmoho le la bohahlaudi ka maikemisetso ho aha moruo botjha..   Ho se ho tsoseleditswe botjha meralo ya motheo robong ho 26 mme 11 le yona bontsha kgatelopele.
tgt_text: Amabhizinisi ayagqugquzelwa ukuthi aqale ukusebenzisa ubuchwepheshe obonga ugesi emkhiqizweni yawo futhi azibandakanye emizamweni yokunciphisa ukudingeka kogesi..  Umkhankaso we-Operation Vulindlela.

src_text: Hara dikatleho tse seng di fihletswe re ka bala le ho nyollwa ha tekanyetso ya tlhahiso ya motlakase ke bahlahisi ba ikemetseng, ntlafatso ya Taolo ya Naha ya Boemakepe ba ha Transnet, ho lekolwa botjha ha letoto la mesebetsi bohlokwahadi, ho sebediswa ha mokgwa wa inthanete wa ho kenya kopo tsa Visa dinaheng tse 14, ho kenyeletsa le dibaka tse ntjha tse kgolo tsa bohahlaudi tse kang Tjhaena, Indiya, Kenya le Nigeria..   Ditlhekefetso tsa Bonng le ho Bolawa ha Basadi (GBVF).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lamukele inqubekelaphambili eyenziwe emkhankasweni we-Operation Vulindlela wokususa zonke izihibe emikhakheni yezamandla, owezokuxhumana, nowamanzi kanye nezokuvakasha ngenhloso yokuvuselela umnotho.

src_text: Kabinete halefisitswe ke ketso soto ya ho betwa ha basadi ba robedi mane Krugersdorp, Gauteng.
tgt_text: Izinguquko kwizakhiwo eziyisishiyagalolunye kwezingama-26 sezikhona, neziyi-11 nazo ziqhubekela phambili kahle kakhulu.

src_text: Ketso tsena tse sehloho ha mmoho le ho hlekefetswa ha basadi di kgella fatshe mosebetsi wa setjhaba.
tgt_text: Ukuphumelela kwalokhu kubandakanya ukwenyusa isilinganiso sokukhishwa kwemvume yokuphehlwa kogesi ovuselelekayo, ukuguqulwa kwe-Transnet National Ports Authority ibe yinkampani, ukukhishwa kohlu olubuyekeziwe lwamakhono abucayi kanye nokuqaliswa kohlelokusebenza lwe-e-Visa kumazwe ayi-14, kubandakanya nezimakethe zabavakashi ezinkulukazi ezintsha okuyi-China, i-India, i-Kenya ne-Nigeria..  Udlame Olubhekiswe Kwabobulili Obuthile Nokubulawa Kwabesifazane (i-GBVF).

src_text: Kabinete boetse thoholetsa Sepolesa sa Afrika Borwa ka ho potlaka ho tshwara babelaellwa diketsong tsena tsa bonokwane..   Kabinete ipiletsa ho setjhaba ho sebedisana le mekgatlo qobellang molao ka ho fana ka lesedi kapa hona ho tlaleha diketso tse belaetsang.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lizwakalise intukuthelo ngokudlwengulwa okunesihluku kwakamuva kwabesifazane abayisishiyagalombili e-Krugersdorp e-Gauteng.

src_text: Ha re sebedisana re ka fetola setjhaba sa rona ho ba dibaka tse bolokehileng bakeng sa bana le basadi..
