Moafrika Borwa mong le mong na le boikarabelo ba ho lwantsha diketso tsa dikgoka ka tsela tse molaong ka tlaleha diketso tsohle tsa GBVF sepoleseng se haufi kapa letsetse Nomoro ya Mahala ya ho Tlaleha Ditlolo tsa Molao: 08600 10111, kapa ya Naha ya ho Tlaleha Diketso tsa GBVF: 0800 428 428 kapa ya ho Tlaleha Diketso Tlhekefetso ya Bonng: 0800 150. .
tgt_text: Lezi zenzo ezimbi nokuhlukunyezwa kwabesifazane kudicilela phansi isithunzi sethu emphakathini.

src_text: Kgwedi ya Basadi.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liphinde lancoma uPhiko Lwamaphoyisa eNingizimu Afrika ngokusheshe abophe abasolwa abaningana abasolwa ngalo bugebengu obunyantisayo..  IKhabhinethi linxuse imiphakathi ukuthi isebenzisane nabomthetho ngokunikezela ngolwazi noma ngokubika izenzo ezisolisayo.

src_text: Kgwedi ena ya Basadi Ketekwa selemo le selemo ho hlompha basadi bohle ba ileng ba lwanela tokoloho ya naha ena le basadi bohle setjhabeng sa rona..   Selemong sena Kgwedi ena ya Basadi ketekilwe tlasa lepetjo le reng: “Tshehetso le Ditokelo tsa Basadi Moruong le Setjhabeng: Kaho Botjha bakeng sa Ntlafatso le Matlafalo ya Basadi.”.
tgt_text: Ngokusebenza ngokubambisana, singenza imiphakathi yethi iphephe kubantu besifazane nasezinganeni..  Wonke umuntu waseNingizimu Afrika unomsebenzi wokulwa nababhebhezeli bodlame ngokulandela umthetho.

src_text: Basadi ba fetang 20 000 ba ileng ba hwantela Union Buildings, Tshwane ka la 9 Phato 1956, ba ne ba netefatse hore tekatekano ya bonng ba ya bohlokwa ho demokrasi ya Afrika Borwa..   Sebete sa bona se ile sa kgothatsa basadi ka kakaretso ho bapala karolo ya bona Palamenteng, mmusong le setjhabeng, mme re tswelapele le moralo ona ho tloha re fumane tokoloho ka.
tgt_text: Bika zonke izigameko ezihlobene ne-GBVF esiteshini samaphoyisa esiseduze nawe noma ushayele inombolo yokunqanda ubugebengu ye-Crime Stop ku: 0860 01 0111, isikhungo i-National GBVF Command Centre ku: 0800 428 428 noma iNombolo Yosizo Yokunqandwa Kodlame Olubhekiswe Kubulili Obuthile ku: 0800 150. .
INyanga Yabesifazane.

src_text: Sehopotso sa Marikana.
tgt_text: INyanga Yabesifazane yaminyaka yonke ngoNcwaba ibungaza abesifazane ababa negalelo emzabalazweni wenkululeko nabobonke abesifazane emphakathini wakithi..  Kulo nyaka iNyanga Yabesifazane ibungazwa ngaphansi kwesiqubulo esithi: “Amalungelo Enhlalo-mnotho Nokuthuthukiswa Kwabesifazane: Sakha Kabusha Ukuthuthukisa Amandla Abesifazane”..  Abesifazane abangaphezu kwezi-20 000 abamashela eZindlini Zombuso ePitoli mhla we-9 kuNcwaba 1956 baba negalelo ekuqinisekiseni ukuthi ukulingana ngokobulili nokunithuthukiswa kuhlala kuseqhulwini eNingizimu Afrika yentando yeningi labantu.

src_text: Ka Labobedi la la 16 Phato 2022, mmuso le setjhaba ba ile ba kopana mmoho ho hopola koduwa neng etsahale Marikana, Leboya Bophirima ka.
tgt_text: Isibindi sabo sagqugquzela abanye besifazane jikelele ukuthi nabo bathathe indawo yabo ePhalamende, kuhulumeni nasemphakathini, futhi siyaqhubeka nokwakhela phezu kwale ntuthuko kusukela sazuza inkululeko ngowe-.

src_text: Bohloko ba basebetsi bao, ba malapa bona esitana le setjhaba ka kakaretso bo tla dula bo hopoleha nalaneng ya rona..   Ho thehilwe Lenaneo la Ntlafatso ya Marikana ho tlisa maemo tla dumella ho ntlafatswa ha maphelo setjhaba sa Marikana.
tgt_text: Isikhumbuzo sase-Marikana.

src_text: Ngwahola mmuso lefile tjhelete ya ditlhapiso kalo ka dimilione tse R176 ho malapa mahlatsipa mme nyewe ntseng tswelapele lekgotleng la dinyelwe yona tlameha ho fela pele ho mafelo Phato.
tgt_text: NgoLwesibili, mhla we-16 kuNcwaba 2022, uhulumeni uhlanganyele nezwe lonkana ekukhumbuleni isibhicongo esenzeka e-Marikana eNyakatho Ntshonalanga ngowezi-.

Ubuhlungu obazwiwa ngabasebenzi, imindeni yabo kanye nesizwe sonke buzohlale buqoshiwe emlandweni wethu..  UHlelo Lokwakha Kabusha i-Marikana seluqaliwe ukuze kuzokwakhiwa kabusha futhi kwenziwe isimondawo esivumela ukuthuthukisa izimpilo zomphakathi wase-Marikana.

src_text: Ho na le matlo ntlafaditsweng le ahilweng botjha bakeng sa bahlolohadi ba marikana mme tse ding di tla qetelwa selemong sena.
tgt_text: Ngonyaka owedlule uhulumeni wakhokha izigidi eziyi-R176 njengesinxephezelo emindenini yabagilwa futhi amacala asasele asaqulwa kulindeleke ukuthi aphothulwe uma kuphela uNcwaba ngowezi-.

src_text: Ho na le projeke ya kaho ya matlo ya dimilione tse R700 tla etsa hore basebetsi ba merafong ba dule matlong maemong matle.
Ho teng mehato seng nkilwe ho ntlafatsa maphelo batho ba sebetsang merafong.
tgt_text: Izindlu eziningi ezilungisiwe noma ezintsha zidluliselwe kubafelokazi base-Marikana kanti ezinye zizoqedelwa kulo nyaka.

src_text: Imbizo ya Mopresidente ya Gauteng ya Lenaneo la Ntlafatso ya Ditereke (DDM).
tgt_text: Umklamo wokwakhiwa kwezindlu wezigidi ezingama-R700 uzoholela ekuboneni abasebenzi basezimayini bethola izindlu ezisezingeni elihle.

src_text: Ka Labohlano la la 12 Phato 2022, Masepala wa Setereke wa Sedibeng mane Gauteng ne tshwere Imbizo ya bone neng eteletswe ke tse tharo tse neng di tshwaretse Leboya Bophirima, Foreisitata le Mpumalanga..   Tlasa lepetjo le reng: “Ho se be le ya salang”, Mopresidente Cyril Ramaphosa ne eteletse pele kemedi ho tswa mmusong wa naha, wa profensi esitana le wa bommasepala.
tgt_text: Ingqalasizinda ebucayi kwezenhlalo iyahlinzekwa ukwenza ngcono izimo zokuhlala emiphakathini yasezimayini..  Imbizo kaMongameli yoHlelo Lokuthuthukiswa Kwezifunda (i-DDM) e-Gauteng.

src_text: Ho ile ha etswa kgoeletso ho Maafrika Borwa ka ho fapana hore tshwarane ho lwantshana le bofuma hammoho le masisapelo bakwang ke maemo mabe moruo..   Setereke sa Sedibeng se se se hatetse pele Lenaneo la Ntlafatso ya Moruo la Noka ya Lekwa (SEZ) le nang le kgonahalo ya tsoseletso ya moruo wa sedika seo, profensi eo esitana le naha ka bophara.
tgt_text: Kulandela impumelelo yeZimbizo zikaMongameli ezintathu ze-DDM ebezibanjwe eNyakatho Ntshonalanga, eFreyistata naseMpumalanga, uMasipala Wesifunda i-Sedibeng e-Gauteng usingathe imbizo yesine ngoLwesihlanu, mhla we-12 kuNcwaba..  Ngaphansi kwesiqibulo eithi: “Masingashiyi muntu ngemuva”, uMongameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa uhole ithimba lezikhulu eziphezulu kuzwelonke, kwisifundazwe kanye nakohulumeni basekhaya.

src_text: Lenaneo lena la Noka ya Lekwa le ikemiseditse ho kenyeletsa makala latelang bohlokwa: Sitsi se Setjha sa Thekenoloji sa Noka ya Lekwa; Thekenoloji ya Tlhahiso ya Motlakase wa Metsi; thekiso ya dihlahiswa tsa matekwane; tsamaiso ya dihlahiswa tsa tsa temo; kaho ya boemafofane ba difofane tse kgolo le tse nyane; tsamaiso ya thepa ka difofane le ntlafatso ya tlhahiso ya tshepe..   Seboka sa Mopresidente sa Lekala la Setjhaba.
tgt_text: Abantu baseNingizimu Afrika ngokwehlukahlukana kwabo banxenxwa ukuba basebenze ngokubambisana ukulwa namazinga akhulayo obubha kanye nobuphofu okudalwa izinselele zezimo zomnotho..  ISifunda i-Sedibeng senze inqubekelaphambili ekuqalisweni kohlelo lwe-Vaal River Special Economic Zone (i-SEZ), oluthembisa kakhulu ekuthuthukisweni kwezimboni zesifunda, zesifundazwe kanye nasezweni lonkana.

src_text: Seboka sa Mopresidente sa Lekala la Setjhaba se ne se tshwaretswe Ekurhuleni mane Gauteng ka la 4 le la 5 Phato 2022 mme lepetjo la teng le ne le re “Tshehetso ya Tshebedisano ya Setjhaba ho Thusa Setjhaba ho Nka Karolo Moruong le Tabeng tsa Setjhaba.” Seboka sena se ile sa kopanya batho ho tswa makaleng fapaneng ho tla sebetsa mmoho le mmuso ho tobana le mathata setjhaba ha mmoho le moruo, esitana le ho sebedisa dihlahiswa tsohle tse teng molemong wa setjhaba..   Seboka sena se nkilwe le seboka sa ditlaleho ho tswa diprofensing kaofela mathateng ao di nang le ona ho kenyeletsa tshehetso ya ditjhelete, mathata mabapi le taolo, ntlafatso ya lekala lena la setjhaba ka maikemisetso ho sebedisana le setjhaba ho ka rarolla mathata kang bofuma, ho se lekalekane ha mmoho le leqeme la mesebetsi..   Kabinete etsa kgoeletso ho mekgatlo ya setjhaba ho nka karolo ka maikemisetso ho aha bokamoso bo betere ho latela Morero wa Ntshetsopele ya Naha: la Tjhebelopele ya   Diqeto tsa Kabinete.
tgt_text: I-Vaal River SEZ ihlele ukubandakanya le mikhakha ebucayi elandelayo: iDolobha Elisha Lobuchwepheshe Besimanje e-Vaal River; Isiphehlimandla Esiphehla Ugesi Ngamanzi Nangomoya; isizinda esikhiqiza insangu; ukuthuthwa kwemikhiqizo yezolimo; idolobha elizungeze isikhumulo sezindiza; isikhumulo sezindiza esincane; ukuthuthwa kwempahla ngezindiza kanye nokuvuselelwa komkhakha okhiqiza insimbi.

src_text: Moralo wa Diindasteri tsa Setso le Bonono.
Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho kengwa tshebetsong ha Moralo wa Diindasteri tsa Setso le Bonono.
tgt_text: INgqungquthela kaMongameli Yomkhakha Wezenhlalo.

src_text: Moralo ona tobane haholoholo le taba ya tlhahiso ya bonono ba ditshwantsho; mesebetsi ya matsoho le ho rala; ditshwantsho le mmino; mesebetsi ya meralo le bonono; dipapadi le menyanyako, ho kenyeletsa mmino, diphatlalatso le kgatiso..   Moralo ona tla kenella makaleng ana ho thusa ho tlisa diphetoho lekaleng la bonono hore le kgone ho tsebisahala boemong ba matjhaba.
tgt_text: INgqungquthela kaMongameli Yomkhakha Wezenhlalo ebibanjwe Ekurhuleni, e-Gauteng kusuka mhla we-4 kuya mhla we-5 kuNcwaba 2022 ngaphansi kwesiqubulo esithi: “Sikhuthaza Ukubumbana Kwezenhlalo Ukuvumela Ukubamba Iqhaza kwiNhlalo-mnotho Emiphakathini”, iqoqele ndawonye ababambiqhaza ababuya kwizifunda ezehlukene ukuthi basebenze nohulumeni ukubhekana nezinselele zenhlalo-mnotho kanye nokunxenxa izinsiza zomphakathi, phakathi kwezinye izinjongo..  Ingqungquthela ibheke imibiko yezinkulumo-ngxoxo yezifundazwe eziyisishiyagalolunye kwizinselele lezi zifundazwe ezibhekene nazo, okufaka phakathi ukufinyelela kuxhaso-mali, izinkinga zokulawula, ukuguqulwa komkhakha wezenhlalo ngokombono wokuqinisa ubudlelwano phakathi kukahulumeni nemiphakathi ukuze kuzobhekanwa nezinselele ezihlobene nobubha, ukungalingani kanye nokuntuleka kwemisebenzi..  IKhabhinethi linxuse izinhlangano zomphakathi nezakhamuzi ukuthi badlale indima yabo ebonakalayo ekuqinisekiseni ukuthi sakha ikusasa elingcono, njengoba kucatshangiwe kuHlelo Lwentuthuko Lukazwelonke: NgokoMbono wezi-  Izinqumo zeKhabhinethi.

src_text: Sena se tla etsa hore lekala lena le kgone ho sebetsa kwano le matjhabeng.
tgt_text: UHlelo-kusebenza Lwezimboni Zamasiko Nobuciko.
IKhabhinethi ligunyaze uHlelo-kusebenza Lwezimboni Zamasiko Nobuciko ukuthi luqaliswe ukusebenza.

src_text: Tokomane Lekotsweng Botjha ya Kadimo ya Ditjhelete tsa Tshohanyetso ke Bommasepala.
tgt_text: Lolu hlelo-kusebenza lugxile kubuciko obubonakalayo; imisebenzi yezandla nemiklamo; ubuciko obulalelwayo nobubukwayo kanye nobuciko obenziwa ngekhompyutha; izinsizakalo zokuklama nobuciko; ukudlala nokubungaza, kufaka phakathi umculo, ukuxhumana ngokubhaliwe nokushicilelwe phansi..  Uhlelo-kusebenza luzongenelela kule mikhakha ekwakheni umkhakha omusha oguqukile ozokwaziwa emhlabeni jikelele futhi uncintisane ezingeni.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwane dintlafatso tse entsweng Tokomaneng ya Kadimo ya Ditjhelete tsa Tshohanyetso ke Bommasepala.
tgt_text: Luzosebenzela imboni yobuciko eNingizimu Afrika ukuthi ikwazi ukufinyelela ezimakethe zakuleli nasemhlabeni jikelele..  UHlaka Lwenqubomgomo Olubuyekeziwe Lokuboleka KoMasipala Nezimo Eziphuthumayo Zemali.

src_text: Dintlafatso tsena di entswe karolong ya dikadimo feela.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi libuyekeze ukuchitshiyelwa koHlaka lwenqubomgomo yamanje Yokuboleka Komasipala Nezimo eziphuthumayo Zemali.

src_text: Tse ding tsa dintlafatso ke tsa ho lelefatsa nako ya lefa tjhelete ya kadimo ho tsamaisana le boleng ba thepa rekilweng.
tgt_text: Izichibiyelo lezi zibhekele kwisahluko sokuboleka salolu hlaka.

src_text: Dintlafatso tsena di boetse di hlakisa karolo ya dibanka tsa thuso ya ditjhelete ho kadimeng bommasepala ditjhelete..   Karolo ya bo 230 ya Molaotheo wa Afrika Borwa wa 1996 dumella bommasepala ho kadima ditjhelete bakeng sa ho reka thepa kapa ho lefa dikoloto.
tgt_text: Phakathi kwezichibiyelo eziphakanyisiwe ngokwethula isikhathi eside sokuboleka ukuze sizohambisana nesikhathi sokusebenza kwempahla esuke ibolekwa futhi ikhokhelwa nemali.

src_text: Tokomane ya pele ne tjhaelwe monwana ke Kabinete ka selemo sa 2000 le ho tataisa Kgaolo ya bo 6 le ya bo 13 ya Molao wa Kadimo ya Ditjhelete ke Bommasepala wa 2003, (Molao wa bo 56 wa 2003).
tgt_text: Izichibiyelo zibuye zicacise umsebenzi wezikhungo zokuthuthukiswa kwezimali endimeni yokweboleka yomasipala.

src_text: Dintlafatso tsena di tlisa merokotso itseng ho dikhamphane tse kadimang bommasepala tjhelete, empa sa kgeloha maikemisetsong tokomane ena sethatho leng dikadimo.
tgt_text: ISahluko sama-230 soMthethosisekelo waseRiphabhulikhi yaseNingizimu Afrika we-1996 unika amandla omasipala ukuthi baboleke imali ukuze bathole imali yokuqalisa ukusebenza noma ukukhokhela izindleko ezikhona.
Uhlaka lokuqala lwagunyazwa yiKhabhinethi ngowezi-2000 ukuhlahlela indlela iSahluko se-6 nese-13 soMthetho Wezezimali Komasipala, wezi-2003 (Umthetho wama-56 wezi-2003).

src_text: Ho Phatlalatswa Pele ho Nako ha Tokomane ya Dipalopalo tsa Ditlolo tsa Molao tsa Kotara tsa Selemo sa Ditjhelete sa 2022/.
tgt_text: Izichibiyelo ezigunyaziwe zihlose ukukhuthaza ababolekisi abaningi ezimakethe zomasipala kodwa zibe ziqhubeka nokugcina izimiso ezingumongo eziyisisekelo sokuboleka komasipala..  Ukukhishwa ngaphambi kwesikhathi kwekhalenda ukuze lizoshicilelwa lezibalo zobugebengu zekota zangonyaka wezimali wezi-2022/.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana tshisinyo ya ho phatlalatswa pele ho nako ha tokomane ya dipalopalo tsa ditlolo tsa molao tsa kotara tsa selemo sa ditjhelete sa 2022/.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligunyaze ukukhishwa ngaphambi kwesikhathi kwekhalenda okuphakanyisiwe ukuze lizoshicilelwa lezibalo zobugebengu zekota zangonyaka wezimali wezi-2022/.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana dipalopalo tsa ditlolo tsa molao tsa kotara tse sa tswa phatlalatswa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligunyaze ukukhishwa kwezibalo zobugebengu zekota.

src_text: Sena se etseditswe ho fetola nako ya ho phatlalatswa ha dipalopalo tsa ditlolo tsa molao tsa naha..   Dinako tse sisintsweng tsa phatlalatso ya dipalopalo tsa ditlolo tsa molao tsa kotara ke Phato 2022 bakeng sa kotara ya pele le Pudungwana 2022 bakeng sa kotara ya bobedi.
tgt_text: Lokhu kwenziwe ukuze kuzoshintshwa izikhathi zokukhishwa kwezibalo zobugebengu zonyaka ezedlule zezwe.

src_text: Tsa kotara ya boraro le ya bone tsona di tla phatlalatswa ka ho latellana ka Hlakola le Motshehanong.
tgt_text: Ikhalenda eliphakanyisiwe lezibalo zobugebengu nguNcwaba 2022 ukuthi kukhishwe elekota yokuqala bese kuthi ngoLwezi 2022 kukhishwe elekota yesibili.
Izibalo zobugebengu zekota yesithathu nekota yesine zizokhishwa ngoNhlolanja nangoNhlaba ngowezi-2023 ngokulandelana..  Ukuphela kweSimo Senhlekelele Kuzwelonke (i-NSoD).

src_text: Ho Fediswa ha Maemo Koduwa Naheng.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligunyaze ukuphela kweSimo Senhlekelele Kuzwelonke (i-NSoD) esamenyezelwa emva kwezikhukhula ezadala umonakalo eMpumalanga Kapa naKwaZulu Natali..  I-NSoD iphele mhla we-18 kuNcwaba 2022 kulandela ukwelulwa mhla we-18 kuNtulikazi.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho fediswa ha Maemo Koduwa Naheng ho latela dikgohola tse neng di le Kapa Botjhabela le KwaZulu-Natal..   Maemo ana fedisitswe ka la 18 Phato ho latela ho eketswa ha nako ya teng ka la 18 Phupu.
tgt_text: Ukwelulwa kwakungenxa yesidingo sokuqhubeka ngokwengeza izinyathelo eziphuthumayo ezikhona ezazithathwe yizinhlaka zikahulumeni ukuqeda nokubhekana nomphumela odalwe isimo esibi sezulu ezifundazweni ezithintekayo..  IKhabhinethi livumile ukuthi izimo zamanje azisafanele izinyathelo ezinqala njengezinhlaka zikahulumeni, umkhakha ozimele kanye nomphakathi sizoqhubeka siqinisekise usizo, ukuvuselela kanye nokwakha kabusha okuqhubekayo  Imithethosivivinywa.

src_text: Ho eketswa hona ha nako ne le ho fana ha nako ho makala mmuso neng shebane le tshenyo neng bakilwe ke maemo lehodimo diprofensing tsena tse amehileng..   Kabinete dumellane hore maemo renang ha jwale ha sa hloka mehato matlafetseng jwalo ka ha makala mmuso ikemetseng le mekgatlo ya setjhaba di tla tswela pele ho fana ka thuso le kaho botjha   Tshisinyo tsa Melao.
tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa Wokuchibiyela Ukubhaliswa Komhlaba wezi-.

src_text: Tshisinyo ya Molao wa ho Ngodisa Ditsha wa Selemo sa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligunyaze ukulethwa koMthethosivivinywa Wokuchibiyela Ukubhaliswa Komhlaba wezi-2020 ePhalamende ukuze ucutshungulwe.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tliswa Palamenteng ha Tshisinyo ya Molao wa Ngodiso ya Ditsha wa Selemo sa 2020 ho tla sekasekwa ho ya pele.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lagunyaza lo Mthethosivivinywa ngoNhlangulana wezi-2020 ukuthi kuxoxisanwe nomphakathi ngawo.

src_text: Kabinete ne tjhaele Tshisinyo ena monwana ka Phuptjane 2020 bakeng sa maikutlo setjhaba..   Dintlafatso tse tshisinyong ena di tla thusa ho netefatsa taba ya ho ba le mobu ngotsweng Karolong ya bo 25(6) ya Molaotheo wa Afrika Borwa wa.
tgt_text: Izichibiyelo ezethuliwe zizobonisa ubunikazi bomhlaba obufakwe ngokomthetho kwiSahluko sama-25(6) soMthethosisekelo waseNingizimu Afrika we-.

src_text: Tshisinyo ena fana ka dipalopalo ho ya ka merabe, bonng, bodudi le boahi ba naha ho batho ba nang le ditokelo tsa ho ba le mobu Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa uhlinzeka ngokuqoqwa kwemininingwane ngokobuhlanga, ubulili, ubuzwe kanye nokuba isakhamuzi kwalabo abanamalungelo omhlaba eNingizimu Afrika.

Lokhu kuzoholela ekubeni nemibiko yokuhlolwa kwamabhuku eqondile kanye nocwaningo esikhathini esizayo olumayelana nokuguqulwa kobunikazi bomhlaba..  UMthethosivivinywa We-ejensi Kazwelonke Yengqalasizinda Yomthombo Wamanzi (i-NWRIA) wezi-.

src_text: Tshisinyo ya Molao Shebaneng le Mokgatlo wa Meralo ya Motheo ya Metsi wa Selemo sa 2022 (NWRIA).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligunyaze ukushicilelwa koMthethosivivinywa we-NWRIA wezi-2022 ukuze umphakathi uphawule ngawo isikhathi esiyizinsuku ezingamashumi ayisishiyagalolunye (90).

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho phatlalatswa ha Tshisinyo ya Molao wa NWRIA wa 2022 bakeng sa maikutlo setjhaba ho tla nka matsatsi   Tshisinyo ena ya molao ka yona ho ikemiseditswe ho tla le meralo, tshehetso ya ditjhelete le kaho ya meralo ya motheo ya metsi bakeng sa naha ena tla boele laola le taolo ya meralo ya motheo ya metsi teng ha jwale..   Mokgatlo ona tla netefatsa phepelo otlolohileng le tshepahetseng ya metsi ikamahantseng le Molaotheo wa naha.
tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa uhlongoza ukubekwa kwe-NWRIA ukuthi umsebenzi wayo kube ngukuhlela, ukuxhasa ngezimali kanye nokuthuthukisa ingqalasizinda yamanzi kuleli lizwe.

src_text: Mokgatlo ona tla thehwa le Lekala la Mmuso tlasa Shetjule ya bobedi ya Molao wa Tshebediso ya Ditjhelete tsa Setjhaba, wa 1999 (Molao wa 1 wa 1999).
tgt_text: Izophinde ibhekele ukunakekelwa kwengqalasizinda yamanzi ekhona njengamanje.

src_text: Mokgatlo ona tla etsa mosebetsi oo ha jwale etswang ke Trans-Caledon Tunnel Authority..   Tshisinyo ya Molao Dumellang Bommasepala ho Iketsetsa Lekgetho wa Selemo sa.
tgt_text: I-ejensi izoqinisekisa ukuthunyelwa kwamanzi okusimeme, okulingene nokuthembakele okuzohambisana nezimiso zomthethosisekelo zokuba nelungelo lokufinyelela emanzini nokuhlala endaweni ephephile enempilo.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tliswa Palamenteng ha Tshisinyo ya Molao Dumellang Bommasepala ho Iketsetsa Lekgetho wa Selemo sa.
tgt_text: I-ejensi izokwakheka njengeNkampani Kahulumeni ngaphansi kweSahluko sesi-2 soMthetho Wokwenganyelwa Kwezimali Zikahulumeni, we-1999 (Umthetho woku-1 we-1999).

src_text: Tshisinyo ena etsa dintlafatso Molaong laolang Matla Bommasepala ho Iketsetsa Lekgetho wa Selemo sa 2007, (Molao wa bo 12 wa 2007).
tgt_text: I-ejensi izokwenza imisebenzi okwamanje eyenziwa i-Trans-Caledon Tunnel Authority..  UMthethosivivinywa Wokuchibiyela Ezamandla Ezimali Nemisebenzi Yomasipala wezi-.

src_text: Dintlafatso tsena di tlo laola matla bommasepala ho lefisa lekgetho bakeng sa dintlafatso tsa mobu tse tliswang ho bona.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligunyaze ukulethwa ePhalamende koMthethosivivinywa Wokuchibiyela Ezamandla Ezimali nemisebenzi Yomasipala wezi-.

src_text: Dintlafatso tsena di tlo netefatsa hore bommasepala ba lefisa lekgetho ka nepo le ka tsela hlokang leeme.
tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa uchibiyela uMthetho Wamandla Ezimali Nemisebenzi Yomasipala, wangowezi-2007 (Umthetho we-12 wezi-2007).

src_text: Kabinete ne tjhaele Tshisinyo ena monwana ka 2020 bakeng sa maikutlo setjhaba.
tgt_text: Izichibiyelo zilawula amandla omasipala ekufakeni intela ezindlekweni zentuthuko ngokwezicelo zokuthuthukiswa komhlaba ezilethwe komasipala.
Lezi zichibiyelo zizoqinisekisa ukuthi omasipala basebenzisa lezi zindleko ngeqiniso, obala futhi ngendlela eqondile.

src_text: Tshisinyo ya Molao Laolang Ditaba tsa Ditjhelete wa Selemo sa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lagunyaza lo Mthethosivivinywa ngowezi-2020 ukuze umphakathi uphawule ngawo..  UMthethosivivinywa Wokuchibiyela Izindaba Zezimali wezi-.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tliswa Palamenteng ha Tshisinyo ya Molao Laolang Ditaba tsa Ditjhelete wa Selemo sa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligunyaze ukulethwa ePhalamende koMthethosivivinywa Wokuchibiyela Izindaba Zezimali, wezi-.

src_text: Tshisinyo ena ya molao ka yona ho ikemiseditswe ho ntlafatsa melao supileng leng (1) Molao Laolang ho Sebetsa ha Dikhamphane tsa Dipenshene, wa 1963 (Molao wa bo 41 wa 1963); (2) Molao Laolang Penshene ya Masole, wa 1976, (Molao wa bo 84 wa 1976); (3) Molao Laolang Penshene ya Basebeletsi ba Mmuso wa 1996; (4) Molao Laolang Komeshene Shebaneng le Lekgetho, wa 1997 (Molao wa bo 99 wa 1997; (5) Molao Laolang Banka ya tsa Temo le Mobu, wa 2002 (Molao wa bo 15 wa 2002); (6) Molao Laolang ho Sebetsa ha Bahlahlobi ba Dibuka tsa Ditjhelete wa 2005 (Molao wa bo 26 wa 2005 le (7) Ntlafatso ya Molao Laolang ho Sebetsa ha Bahlahlobi ba Dibuka tsa Ditjhelete wa 2021 (Molao wa bo 5 wa 2021).
tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa uhlongoza ukuchibiyela iMithetho eyisikhombisa, okuyilena (1) uMthetho Wempesheni Yezikhungo Ezisebenzisanayo, we-1963 (Umthetho wama-41 we-1963); (2) uMthetho Wempesheni Womkhosi Wezempi, we-1976 (Umthetho wama-84 we-1976); (3) uMthetho Wempesheni Yabasebenzi Bakahulumeni we-1996; (4) uMthetho Wekhomishini Yezezimali, we-1997 (Umthetho wama-99 we-1997); (5) uMthetho weBhange Lokuthuthukiswa Komhlaba Nezolimo, wezi-2002 (Umthetho we-15 wezi-2002); (6) uMthetho Wabacwaningi-mabhuku wezi-2005 (Umthetho wama-26 wezi-2005) kanye (7) noMthetho Ochitshiyelwe Wabacwaningi-mabhuku wezi-2021 (Umthetho wesi-5 wezi-2021).

src_text: Ho Molao Laolang Dipenshene tsa Masole wa 1996 ho kenyeleditswe hore motho kenye molekane wa hae mme seo se nkuwa ka se etsahetse ho tloha ka la 27 Mmesa.
tgt_text: Izichibiyelo ezihlongozwayo zibandakanya, ngaphansi koMthetho Wempesheni Yomkhosi Wezempi we-1996, ukubandakanywa kwabalingani kwizinzuzo kubuyelwa emuva kusuka ngama-27 kuMbasa.

src_text: Dintlafatso molaong ona wa dipenshene tla thusa hore balekane ba masole ba kgone ho fumana karolo ya bona hang hang ha ba kgaola lenyalo..   Ho hong hape, dintlafatso tsena di tla hlakisa karolo ya Letona La Matlotlo mme lehlakoreng la mosebetsi wa ho hlahloba dibuka teng dintlafatso tsena di fetola hanyane matla komiti ya bahlahlobi ba dibuka ha ho etsahetse mohlahlobi wa dibuka fumanwa le molato.
tgt_text: Izichibiyelo zemithetho yempesheni zizovumela amakhosikazi nabayeni ukuthi bathole inzuzo yempesheni yabo masinya nje emva kokuhlakazwa komshado.

src_text: Tshisinyo ena ya molao ile ya phatlalatswa ka Hlakola 2022 bakeng sa maikutlo setjhaba.
tgt_text: Ngaphezu kokucacisa umsebenzi kaNgqongqoshe Wezezimali nasekucwaningeni amabhuku, izichibiyelo ziphinde zilinganise amandla ekomidi eliqinisa umthetho lapho umcwaningi-mabhuku ethole khona kunecala.

UMthethosivivinywa washicilelwa ngoNhlolanja wezi-2022 ukuthi umphakathi uphawule..  UMthethosivivinywa Wokuchibiyela Imithetho Engujikelele (Ukulwa Nokushushumbiswa Kwemali noKulwa Nokuxhasa Ngezimali Izenzo Zobudlova) wezi-.

src_text: Tshisinyo ya Dintlafatso Molaong Akaretsang (Phapanyetsano seng molaong ya Ditjhelete le ho Thibela ho Tshehetsa Botshosetsi ka Ditjhelete) wa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligunyaze ukulethwa koMthethosivivinywa Wokuchibiyela Imithetho Engujikelele (Ukulwa Nokushushumbiswa Kwemali Nokulwa Nokuxhasa Ngezimali Izenzo Zobudlova) wangowezi-2022 ePhalamende ukuthi uzocutshungulwa.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tliswa Palamenteng ha Tshisinyo ya Dintlafatso Molaong Akaretsang (Phapanyetsano seng molaong ya Ditjhelete le ho Thibela ho Tshehetsa Botshosetsi ka Ditjhelete) wa 2022 ho ka sekasekwa ho ya pele.
tgt_text: Lo Mthethosivivinywa unguMthethosivivinywa oyingxubevange ochibiyela iMithetho ekhona njengamanje okuyi  uMthetho Wesikhungo Sobunhloli Bezezimali, wezi-2001 (Umthetho wama-38 wezi-2001); (ii) uMthetho Wezinhlangano Ezingenzi Nzuzo, we-1997 (Umthetho wama-71 we-1997); (iii) uMthetho Wokulawulwa Kwempahla eku-Trust, we-1988 (Umthetho wama-57 we-1988); (iv) uMthetho Wezinkampani, wezi-2008 (Umthetho wama-71 we-2008) kanye  noMthetho Wokulawulwa Komkhakha Wezimali, wezi-2017 (Umthetho we-9 wezi-2017).

src_text: Tshisinyo ena ya molao tlisa dintlafatso melaong latelang  Molao Laolang Tshebediso ya Ditjhelete tsa Mautlwela, wa 2001 (Molao wa bo 38 wa 2001); (ii) Molao Laolang ho Sebetsa ha Mekgatlo sa Etseng Phaello, wa 1997 (Molao wa bo 71 wa 1997); (iii) Molao Laolang Thepa Laolwang ke Matlole, wa 1988 (Molao wa bo 57 wa 1988; (iv) Molao Laolang ho Sebetsa ha Dikhamphane, wa 2008 (Molao wa bo 71 wa 2008) le  Molao Laolang Lekala la Ditjhelete, wa 2017 (Molao wa bo 9 wa 2017)..   Dintlafatso tsena di kgona ho rarolla mathata neng fumanwe ke Komiti Ikgethang neng Lekola Maemo Ditjhelete tsa Naha (FATF).
tgt_text: Izichibiyelo ziphendula ukuntula okubonakele ngesikhathi sokubuyekezana kwamazwe okwenziwa yithimba le-Financial Action Task Force (i-FATF).

src_text: Komiti ena ne etse dikgothaletso tse 40 tse tla thusa Afrika Borwa hore kgone ho sebetsa ka tsela ya matjhaba mabapi le ho lwantsha phapanyetsano seng molaong ya ditjhelete mmoho le tshehetso ya botshosetsi ka ditjhelete..   Ho ne ho fumanehe hore Afrika Borwa ne haella dikarolong tse.
tgt_text: Umbiko wokuhlolwa ofanayo waqhamuka nezincomo ezingama-40 ezingasiza ekubekeni iNingizimu Afrika ukuthi ihambisane nezinyathelo zomhlaba zokulwa nokushushumbiswa kwemali kanye nokuxhasa ngezimali izenzo zobudlova..  INingizimu Afrika yatholakala ukuthi isemuva ezindaweni ezingama-.

src_text: Tshisinyo ena ya molao tla lokisa dikarolo tse 14 ho tsena tse badilweng.
tgt_text: Lo Mthethosivivinywa ubhekene nezindawo eziyi-14 zalezi zindawo ezibonakele.

src_text: Afrika Borwa haesale le setho sa FAFT ho tloha ka.
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika selokhu yaba yilungu le-FAFT kusukela ngowezi-.

src_text: Tshisinyo ya Molao Laolang Tshebediso ya Dithethefatsi le ho Thibela Phapanyetsano ya Tsona seng Molaong wa.
tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa Wokuchibiyela Ezezidakamizwa Nokushushumbiswa kwazo wezi-.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tliswa Palamenteng ha Tshisinyo ya Molao Laolang Tshebediso ya Dithethefatsi le ho Thibela Phapanyetsano ya tsona seng Molaong ya 2002 ho ka sekasekwa ho ya pele.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligunyaze ukulethwa ePhalamende koMthethosivivinywa Wokuchibiyela Ezezidakamizwa Nokushushumbiswa Kwazo wezi-2022 ukuthi ucutshungulwe.

src_text: Molao Laolang Tshebediso ya Dithethefatsi le ho Thibela Phapanyetsano seng Molaong ya tsona, wa 1992 (Molao wa bo 140 wa 1992) bolelang hore ke tlolo ya molao ho hlahisa dithethefatsi tse ngotsweng ho Shetjule ya Pele le ya Bobedi ya Molao ona..   Dintlafatso tsena di bolela ha Karolo ya bo 63 ya molao oo se molaong sa dumellane le molaotheo wa naha jwalo ka ha shetjule ya molao ona dumella Letona ho etsa diphetoho molaong ona ntle le ho latela tsela nepahetseng ya ketsa molao..    Ka 2020, Lekgotla la Molaotheo le ne le bolele ha Karolo ya bo 63 ya Molao Laolang Tshebediso ya Dithethefatsi le ho Thibela Phapanyetsano ya Tsona seng Molaong wa 1992 mme lekgotla la neha Palamente ho fihlela ka la 17 Tshitwe 2022 ho lokisa phoso eo.
tgt_text: UMthetho Wezidakamizwa Nokushushumbiswa Kwazo, we-1992 (Umthetho we-140 we-1992) ukwenza kube licala ukukhiqizwa nokusatshalaliswa kwanoma isiphi isidakamizwa kwezibalulwe ngaphansi kweSahluko soku-1 neSahluko sesi-2 soMthetho..  Izichibiyelo zibhekana nokungasebenzi kweSahluko sama-63, okwatholakala ukuthi akuhambisani nomthethosisekelo uma uNgqongqoshe ezonikwa amalungelo okuchibiyela izahluko ngaphandle kokubandakanya inqubo yomthetho.

src_text: Ketsahalo Tlang.
tgt_text: Ngowezi-2020, iNkantolo Yomthethosisekelo yamemezela ukuthi iSahluko sama-63 esimayelana neZidakamizwa Nokushushumbiswa Kwazo we-1992 asihambisani nomthethosisekelo futhi yamisa ukungasebenzi kwaso ukuya mhla ziyi-17 kuZibandlela 2022 ukunikeza iPhalamende isikhathi sokulungisa leli phutha  Umcimbi ozayo.

src_text: Mohope wa Lefatshe wa Rugby Sevens wa.
tgt_text: Indebe yomhlaba i-Rugby World Cup Sevens.

src_text: Afrika Borwa tlo tshwara Mohope wa Lefatshe wa Rugby Sevens wa 2022 mane Kapa ka la 9 le la 11 Lwetse.
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika izosingatha imidlalo yendebe yomhlaba i-World Cup Sevens 2022 eKapa phakathi komhla we-9 nomhla we-11 kuMandulo.

src_text: Mohope ona tla be tshwarelwa lekgetlo la pele kontinenteng ya Afrika moo dihlopha tsa banna ba 24 le sa basadi ba 16 di tla beng di qothisana lehlokwa   Melaetsa.
tgt_text: Lo mcimbi wombukiso uzosingathwa okokuqala ezwenikazi i-Afrika futhi kuzobonakala amaqembu amadoda angama-24 nawesifazane ayi-16 aphuma emhlabeni jikelele encintisana  Imiyalezo.

src_text: DitebohoKabinete lebisa diteboho le ditakaletso tse ntle ho: ●  Banyana Banyana, ka ho etsa nalane ka ho hapela Afrika Borwa Mahope wa Pele wa Basadi wa Dinaha tsa Afrika (WAFCON), ka ho hlola naha ya Morokho papading ya makgaolakgang ka Moqebelo wa la 23 Phupu.
tgt_text: UkuhalalisaIKhabhinethi lihalalisela futhi lifisela okuhle kodwa laba: I-Banyana, ngokuqopha umlando benqoba indebe yokuqala ngqa yaseNingizimu Afrika ye-Women's Africa Cup of Nations (i-WAFCON), emdlalweni wamanqamu we-2022 WAFCON obudlalwa e-Rabat, e-Morocco ngoMgqibelo, mhla wama-23 kuNtulikazi.

src_text: Tlholo ena ya bona ba kentse Mohopeng wa Lefatshe wa FIFA wa Basadi tla tshwarelwa naheng ya Australia le New Zealand ho tloha ka la 20 Phupu ho ya ho 20 Phato.
tgt_text: Ngokuphumelela kwabo, bazodlulela emincintiswaneni yeNdebe Yomhlaba Yabesifazane ye-FIFA ngonyaka ozayo ezobe isingathwe ngokuhlanganyela i-Australia ne-New Zealand kusuka mhla wama-20 kuNtulikazi kuya mhla wama-20 kuNcwaba.

src_text: ●  Sehlopha sa Afrika Borwa, ka ho hapa dimetale tse 27 dipapading tse fapafapaneng Dipapading tsa Commonwealth mane Birmingham, Englane ho tloha ka la 28 Phupu ho ya ho 8 Phato.
tgt_text: IQembu laseNingizimu Afrika, ngokuhlabana ngezindondo ezingama-27 emidlalweni enhlobonhlobo ye-2022 Commonwealth Games ebidlalwa e- Birmingham, e-England kusuka mhla wama-28 kuNtulikazi kuya mhla wesi-8 kuNcwaba.

src_text: Sehlopha sena se ne se be maemong borobong ka metale tse supileng tsa kgauta, tse robong tsa silifera le tse 11 tsa bronze.
tgt_text: Bathathe indawo yesishiyagalolunye ngezindondo eziyisikhombisa zegolide, eziyisishiyagalolunye zesiliva kanye nezili-11 zethusi.Iqembu Labesifazane lama-Springbok, ngokunqoba i-Spain emdlalweni wabo wokuqala kwemibili yokuzwana amandla ye-Women’s Winter Series e-Emirates Airline Park e-Johannesburg.Nks Ndavi Nokeri (23), ngokwethweswa isicoco sikaZime waseNingizimu Afrika wezi-.

src_text: ●  Sehlopha sa Basadi sa Springbok, ka ho hlola naha ya Spain Letotong la Dipapadi tsa Basadi tsa Mariha tse neng di bapalla Lebaleng la Emirates Airline Park, Johannesburg.●  Mme Ndavi Nokeri (23), ka ho ba Mmabotle wa Afrika Borwa wa.
tgt_text: Nks Ashleigh Buhai, ngokuhlabana ku-2022 AIG Women’s Open waba ngowesifazane wesithathu waseNingizimu Afrika ukuhlabana ngendondo yegolide.

src_text: ●  Mme Ashleigh Buhai, ka ho hapa Dipapadi tsa 2022 tsa AIG Women’s Open mme ba mosadi wa boraro wa Afrika Borwa wa ho hapa kgau ya kgauta..   Matshidiso       Kabinete fetisetsa matshidiso yona ho lelapa le metswalle ya: ●   Tokollo “Magesh” Tshabalala (46), sebini le sengodi sa dipina ya neng tumi nakong eo ba neng ba theha sehlopha sa TKZee ka 1996 le metswalle ya hae mmedi..  Kgiro.
tgt_text: Amazwi enduduzo         IKhabhinethi lidlulisa amazwi enduduzo emndenini nakubangani baka: ● Tokollo “Magesh” Tshabalala (46), umculi kanye nombhali wamaculo owadlondlobala waduma ngesikhathi yena nabangani bakhe ababili beqala iqembu lomculo we-kwaito ngowe-1996 elalibizwa nge-TKZee.

src_text: Pele batho bohle ba hirwa, ho tla hlahlobisiswa mangolo bona thuto le mang hlokahalang.
Mme Zenkosi Dumile Mhlongo Motlatsi wa Molaodi Kakaretso (DDG): Karolong ya Dipatlisiso ka Melawana le Taolo Lefapheng la Mesebetsi ya Setjhaba le Meralo ya Motheo.
tgt_text: Abaqashiwe.

src_text: Ngaka Bongani Elias Sithole jwalo ka DDG: Sitsing sa Nala sa Taolo ya Dikoduwa Lefapheng la Puso ya Kopanelo..   Ntate Adam Mthombeni jwalo ka DDG: Dikamanong tsa Mafapha Mmuso Lefapheng la Mesebetsi ya Setjhaba le Meralo ya Motheo.
tgt_text: Bonke abaqashiwe kumele kuqinisekiswe iziqu zabo futhi bahlolwe ngokufanele.
Nks Zenkosi Dumile Mhlongo njengePhini loMqondisi-Jikelele (i-DDG): Kwezocwaningo Lenqubomgomo Nomthethonqubo kuMnyango wezemisebenzi Kahulumeni Nengqalasizinda (i-DPWI).

src_text: Kabinete dumellana le ho hirwa ha batho ba latelang:.

Ngaka Zwanani Titus Mathe jwalo ka Motsamaiso ya ka Sehloohong Mokgatlong wa Ntshetsopele ya Eneji Afrika Borwa..   Ditho tsa nakwana tsa Mokgatlo wa Naha Laolang Taba tsa Motlakase Afrika Borwa: Ntate Thembani Bukula (Modulasetulo);Mme Zandile Mpungose (Motlatsi wa Modulasetulo); Mme Precious Sibiya;Mme Thembeka Semane; leNtate Fungai Sibanda kgethilwe hape)..   Modulasetulo le setho sa Moifo wa Boto ya Thekenoloji ya Dimenerale: Ngaka Thibedi Ramontja (Modulasetulo); leMoprofesara Lwazi Ngubevana..   Mme Cladie Thamo Hloniphile Mzobe jwalo ka Motsamaisi Moholo wa Sedika wa Mokgatlo wa Tshireletso wa Afrika Borwa wa KwaZulu-Natal.
tgt_text: Dkt Bongani Elias Sithole njenge-DDG: kwiSikhungo Sokulawulwa Kwesimo Senhlekelele kuMnyango Wezokubusa Ngokubambisana..  Mnu Adam Mthombeni njenge-DDG: KweZobudlelwano Phakathi Kukahulumeni e-DPWI.

src_text: Moruo.
tgt_text: Umnotho.

src_text: Kabinete amohetse taba ya ho fokotseha hanyane ha palo ya batho ba sa sebetseng naheng ena ka persente tse.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lamukele ukwehla kancane kwezinga labantu abangasebenzi kuleli lizwe, okwehle nge-.

src_text: 6, ho tloha ho persente tse.
tgt_text: 6%, kusuka kuma-.

src_text: 5 ho ya ho tse.
tgt_text: 5% kwikota yokuqala kwaya kuma-.

src_text: 9 ka kotara ya bobedi ya selemo sa.
tgt_text: 9% kwikota yesibili ngowezi-.

src_text: Ho ya ka dipalopalo tse phatlaladitsweng Tokomaneng ya Kotara ya Dipalopalo tsa Ditaba tsa Kgiro phatlaladitsweng ke Lefapha la Dipalopalo la Afrika Borwa, mesebetsi mengata fumanehile lekaleng la Ditshebeletso tsa Ntshetsopele ya Setjhaba (276 000), la tsa Kgwebo (169 000), la Ditjhelete (128 000) le la Kaho (104 000).
tgt_text: Amanani ashicilelwe kuCwaningo Lwabasebenzi Lwekota ngabeZezibalo eNingizimu Afrika abonisa ukuthi imisebenzi eminingi ebe khona ibe semkhakheni wezoMphakathi Nezinsiza Zenhlalo (276 000), wezoHwebo (169 000), weZezimali (128 000) kanye nowoKwakha (104 000)..     Inani eliphelele labantu abaqashiwe lime kwizigidi eziyi-.

src_text: Palo ya batho ba sebetsang ha jwale ke dimilione tse 15,6 kotareng ya bobedi ya selemo sa 2022 mme palo ya ba sa sebetseng yona eketsehile ka batho ba 132 000 ho ya ho ba dimilione di 8,0 ka kotara ya bobedi ya selemo sa 2022 ha ho bapiswa le kotara fetileng.
tgt_text: 6 kwikota yesibili ngowezi-2022, kwathi inani labantu abangasebenzi lakhula ngezi-132 000 laya ezigidini eziyi-.

src_text: Keketseho ena le ha le nyane, empa bontsha kgatelo pele boitekong ba mmuso le mahlahana ona ba ho aha moruo botjha esitana le ho theha menyetla hlokahalang ya mesebetsi.
tgt_text: 0 kwikota yesibili ngowezi-2022 uma kuqhathaniswa nekota eyedlule.

src_text: Sena ke bopaki ba hore ha re tshwarisane, mme re sebetsa mmoho re ka hlola diphephetso tse shebaneng le moruo wa rona.
tgt_text: Le mpumelelo engatheni kodwa ejabulisayo ibonisa ukuthi inhlanganisela yemizamo kahulumeni ekanye nozakwabo emiphakathini yokukhulisa umnotho nokusungula imisebenzi edingekayo isiqala ukuthela izithelo..     Lokhu kungubufakazi bokuthi uma sonke sisebenza ngokubambisana siphikelele phambili ngamandla ahlangene, singazinqoba izinselele ezibhekene nomnotho wethu..     IKhabhinethi liyakuqonda ukukhungatheka kwabantu baseNingizimu Afrika njengoba bethwele kanzima ukuphila nsuku zonke ngenxa yezindleko eziphezulu zempilo kanye nezinga eliphezulu labantu abangasebenzi.

src_text: Kabinete utlwisisa hantle pherekano maikutlong Maafrika Borwa jwalo ka ha hula ka thata ka lebaka la leqeme la mesebetsi le ditjeho tse hodimo tsa ho phela.
tgt_text: Njengohulumeni onakekelayo, silokhu sizimisele futhi sizinikele ekusebenzisaneni nozakwethu emiphakathini ukwakha ikusasa elingcono lawo wonke umuntu.

src_text: Jwalo ka mmuso hlokomelang, re ikemiseditse ka hohlehohle ho sebedisana le mahlahana rona ho aha bokamoso bo betere bakeng sa batho bohle.
tgt_text: Uhulumeni usalokhu ezinikele ekwesekeni amabhizinisi alapha ekhaya ngokuthenga impahla nokusebenzisa izinsiza zalapha ekhaya.

src_text: Mmuso ntse ikemiseditse ka taba ya ho tshehetsa dikgwebo tsa lapeng ka ho reka le ho sebedisa ditshebeletso tsa lapeng.
tgt_text: Ingqalasizinda Yomphakathi.

src_text: Disebediswa tsa Setjhaba.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi liyakugxeka kakhulu ukucekelwa phansi kwengqalasizinda ngabahlali basoThongathi KwaZulu Natali ngesikhathi bebhikishela amanzi.

src_text: Kabinete hanyetsana haholo le taba ya tshenyo ya disebediswa tsa setjhaba ke baahi ba Tongaat mane KwaZulu-Natal nakong ya boipelaetso ba bona ka lebaka la ho kgaoha ha phepelo ya metsi.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi licela ukuthi kwehliswe amaphaphu futhi kubekezelwe njengoba umsebenzi usuqalile wokulungisa iSizinda Samanzi oThongathi.

src_text: Kabinete ipiletsa ho setjhaba hore se be le mamello jwalo ka ha mosebetsi se qadile wa ho lokisa Sitsi se Hlwekisang Metsi sa moo Tongaat..  Kabinete utlwisisa hantle pherekano ya baahi jwalo ka ha ba tlameha ho sebedisa metsi tliswang ka dilori ka lebaka la tshenyo neng bakwe ke dikgohola botjheng ba selemo sena.
Leha ho le jwalo, meruso le ho senya disebediswa tsa setjhaba ha se tharollo, empa le ho eketsa mathata setjhabeng.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liyakuqonda ukukhungatheka kwabahlali okufanele basebenzise izimoto zamathangi amanzi isikhathi esengeziwe selokhu kwaba nezikhukhula ekuqaleni kwalo nyaka.

src_text: Dintlafatso Molaong Laolang Tsela ya Tshebetso ya Bommasepala wa Selemo sa.
tgt_text: Noma kunjalo, udlame nesiphithiphithi akusona isixazululo, futhi ukucekelwa phansi kwengqalasizinda yomphakathi kulimaza imiphakathi esendaweni kuphela.

src_text: Kabinete amohetse ho saenelwa ha Tshisinyo ya Dintlafatso Molaong Laolang Tsela ya Tshebetso ya Bommasepala wa Selemo sa 2022, (Molao wa bo 3 wa Selemo sa 2022) ho ba molao ka botlalo ke Mopresidente Cyril Ramaphosa.
tgt_text: ISichibiyelo soMthetho Wezindlela Zokusebenza Zomasipala Bohulumeni Basekhaya sezi-.

src_text: Ka molao ona, ho ikemiseditswe ho ntlafatsa maemo le boleng ba tshebetso ya bommasepala.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lamukele ukusayinwa kufakwe emthethweni iSichibiyelo Somthetho Wezindlela Zokusebenza Komasipala Bohulumeni Basekhaya, sezi-2022 (Umthetho wesi-3 wezi-2022) nguMongameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa.

src_text: Molao ona, ke karolo ya matsapa mmuso ho ntlafatsa maemo Phano ya Ditshebeletso tsa Setjhaba leng tokelo ya sona ngotsweng ho Molaotheo wa Afrika Borwa wa Selemo sa..  Molao ona hlakisa hantle le tsela tlamehang ho latelwa ha ho hirwa basebeletsi maemong hodimo boetse hape thibela basebeletsi ba mmuso ho ba ketapeleng ya mekga ya dipolotiki.
tgt_text: Lo Mthetho uhlose ukuthuthukisa ikhono kanye namazinga okuziphatha kohulumeni basekhaya.

src_text: Molao ona hape dumella hore dikgeo tsa batsamaisi ba bommasepala di phatlalatswe boemong ba naha ho bebofatsa taba ya ho fumana batho ba nang le bokgoni bo hlokahalang.
tgt_text: Lo mthetho uyingxenye yemizamo kahulumeni yokusebenza ngokulandela umthetho Kwezemisebenzi Kahulumeni kanye nokuqinisekisa ukuhlinzekwa okusimeme kwezinsiza kubantu, njengelungelo elihamba phambili elilotshwe kuMthethosisekelo waseNingizimu Afrika wangowe-..

src_text: Kabinete na le boitshepo ba hore diphetoho tsena di tla netefatsa hore ba kgethelwang kapa ba hirelwang dikgeong tseo, ba sebetsa ka tsela lebelletsweng le ho netefatsa hore re ntlafatsa maphelo batho bohle.
tgt_text: Lo Mthetho ucacisa inqubo okumele ilandelwe uma kuqashwa abantu ezikhundleni zokuphatha.

src_text: Bonokwane.
tgt_text: Manje usuvimbela izikhulu eziphethe kuhulumeni ukuthi zibe nezikhundla emahhovisi amaqembu epolitiki.

src_text: Kabinete thoholetsa ba Ditshebeletso tsa Lekgetho Afrika Borwa ka ho kgona ho fumana sethethefatsi sa crystal meth sa boima ba 785kg, se ka bitsang dimilione tse   Sethethefatsi sena, se fumanwe mane Boemafofaneng ba Matjhaba ba OR Tambo ka Sontaha sa la 28 Phato.
tgt_text: Ngalo Mthetho futhi, izikhundla ezingenabantu zabaphathi bomasipala kulindeleke ukuthi zikhangiswe kuzwelonke ukuze kuzohehwa abantu abaningi abafanelekile abangafaka izicelo zalezi zikhundla..     IKhabhinethi liyazethemba ukuthi lezi zinguquko zizoqinisekisa ukuthi labo abaqashwayo noma abakhethwayo kulezi zikhundla bazokwazi ukugcina izethembiso zabo ukuze sizokwazi ukuba nempilo engcono yawo wonke umuntu.

src_text: Ho fumaneha ha sethethefatsi sena, ho tla romela molaetsa ho dinokwane hore madiboho rona sebetsa ka thata ho lwantsha ditlolo tsa molao  Diqeto tsa Kabinete.
tgt_text: Ubugebengu.

src_text: Tlaleho ya Moifo wa Thuto Phahameng Mabapi le Dipatlisiso ka Meputso ya Baokamedi ba Diyunivesithi (CHE) le Basebeletsi ba Boemong ba Botsamaisi ho tsona Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lincome izikhulu ezisebenza ngentela eSikhungweni Esiqoqa Intela eNingizimu Afrika ngokushaqa izidakamizwa ze-crystal meth ezingama-785 kg ezingabiza inani eliyizigidi ezingama-R236 esikhumulweni sezindiza i-OR Tambo International Airport ngeSonto, mhla wama-28 kuNcwaba.

src_text: Kabinete ile ya hlajwa malotsana ka sephetho sa dipatlisiso ka CHE, tse neng di thakgolwe ke Letona la Thuto Phahameng, Saense le Mahlale, Ngaka, Blade Nzimande, ho hlahloba taba ya meputso le tsela ya tshebetso ya batsamaisi ba ka sehloohong diyunivesithing dilemong tse 15 tse fetileng, ho tloha ka selemo sa 2005 ho isa ho sa..  Dipatlisiso tsena, di ne di lekola taba ya tshebetso, katleho le ntshetsopele diyunivesithing kapa lekaleng la thuto phahameng naheng ena.
tgt_text: Ukushaqwa kwalezi zidakamizwa kuzothumela isexwayiso kuzigelekeqe sokuthi imingcele yethu engenayo nephumayo ivikelwe kakhulu futhi amahhovisi ethu asebenza ngokuzikhandla ukuqeda nya ubugebengu     Izinqumo zeKhabhinethi.

src_text: Tlaleho ena le dikateng tsa yona di kenyeletsa le dikgothaletso tsa teng.
tgt_text: UMbiko Womkhandlu Wezemfundo Ephakeme (i-CHE) Wophenyo lokuKhokhelwa kwamaPhini oShansela Emanyuvesi kanye Nabaphathi Abakhulu eNingizimu Afrika.

src_text: Tse ding tsa dikgothaletso di kenyeletsa ho matlafatswa esitana le ho sebetsa ka tsela hlakileng mabapi le ditaba tsa meputso.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi litshelwe kafushane ngemiphumela yophenyo lwe-CHE eyayijutshwe ngowezi-2020 nguNgqongqoshe Wezemfundo Ephakeme, Ezesayensi Nokuqamba Kabusha, uDkt u-Blade Nzimande, ukuthi iphenyisise ngezigaba zokukhokhelwa nokuhola kwezikhulu eziphezulu emanyuvesi esikhathini seminyaka eyi-15 kusukela ngowezi-2005 kuya kowezi-..     Uphenyo lwalusungulelwa ukuthola ukusimama, ukusebenza kahle kanye nokuthuthukiswa komkhakha wamanyuvesi noma wemfundo ephakeme kuleli lizwe.

src_text: Tse ding dikgothaletso di eletsa ho thehwa ha komiti ikemetseng tla shebana le taba ya meputso.
tgt_text: Lo mbiko ucacisa lokho okutholiwe kanye nezincomo ezethuliwe zokulungisa isimo..     Izincomo lezi ziphakamisa, phakathi kokunye, inqubo yokukhokhelwa eqinile nengafihli lutho.

src_text: Dikgothaletso tsena, di boetse di sisinya le hore ho be le ho matlafatswa mmoho le ho lekolwa ha tshebetso  ditsing tsa thuto phahameng.
tgt_text: Ukusungulwa kwethimba langaphandle futhi elizimele ukuqapha inqubo yokuthathwa kwezinqumo ngamaholo.

src_text: Dipatlisiso tsena, di boetsa tsa lekola le ho fetana ha boholo ba ditsi tsena mme tsa boela tsa bapiswa le maemo matjhaba.
tgt_text: Uphinde waphakamisa ukuqiniswa kwezindlela zokuhlola ukwenziwa komsebenzi ezikhungweni.

src_text: Letona la Thuto Phahameng, Saense le Mahlale ho lebeletswe hore le buisane le ketapele ya diyunivesithi ka maikemisetso ho di ntshetsa pele.
tgt_text: Ucwaningo luphinde labhekisisa ubukhulu balezo nalezo zikhungo futhi wabe sewenza isilinganiso esihambelana nesamazwe ngamazwe.

src_text: Ka morao ho moo, tlaleho ena tla phatlalatswa ho websaete ya Lefapha la Thuto Phahameng le Thupello: www.dhet.gov.za.
tgt_text: UNgqongqoshe Wezemfundo Ephakeme, Ezesayensi Nokuqamba Kabusha ulindeleke ukuthi axoxisane ngalo mbiko nobuholi basemanyuvesi njengesinyathelo sokuqinisa lezi zikhungo zemfundo.

src_text: Ho Potlakiswa ha Diphetoho Dipatlisisong le Mokgweng wa ho Ruta Lekaleng la Thuto Phahameng.
tgt_text: Umbiko uzobe emva kwalokho sewuchicilelwa kwiwebhusayithi yoMnyango Wezemfundo Ephakeme Nokuqeqeshwa ethi: www.dhet.gov.za.

src_text: Kabinete tshehetsa dikgothaletso tsa dipatlisiso tse pedi tse neng di etswe ho ka eletsa ka tsela le mekgwa ka sebediswang ho potlakisa diphetoho dipatlisisong le mokgweng wa ho ruta ditsing tsa thuto phahameng.
tgt_text: Uguquko Olusheshisiwe Lwezocwaningo kanye Nekhono Lokufundisa Emkhakheni Wezemfundo Ephakeme.

src_text: Tlaleho ya pele ne etswe ke Komiti Ikgethileng ya Matona neng fuputsa ka thibelo ya kgiro, tshebediso le katleho ya barutehi ba batho ba batsho Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi leseke izincomo zocwaningo olubili obelwenzelwe ukweluleka ngezinyathelo okumele zithathwe ukuze kuzosheshiswa uguquko kwezocwaningo kanye nekhono lokufundisa ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme.

src_text: Tlaleho ya bobedi – neng ntshitswe ke Lefapha la Saense le Mahlale mmoho le Mokgatlo wa Naha wa Dipatlisiso – yona ne etswe ke Mokgatlo wa Diyunivesithi tsa Afrika Borwa leng mokgatlo emetseng diyunivesithi tse 26 tsa setjhaba naheng ena.
tgt_text: Umbiko wokuqala wenziwa iThimba LikaNgqongqoshe elaliphenya imigoqo evimbe ukuqashwa, ukugcinwa emsebenzini kanye nenqubekelaphambili ezifundisweni zabantu abamnyama eNingizimu Afrika.

src_text: Ka bobedi ditlaleho tsena di kgothaletsa taba ya ho potlakiswa ha diphetoho dikarolong tse hlano leng tshebediso ya dirutehi; ho nka karolo ha basebeletsi ba diyunivesithi; mokgwa le tshebetso ya diyunivesithi; melawana le maano tshebetso, le kgaello ya disebediswa.
tgt_text: Umbiko wesibili - owayalelwa nguMnyango Wezesayensi Nokuqamba Kabusha kanye neNhlangano Kazwelonke Yezocwaningo - yenziwa yibhodi i-Universities South Africa, okuyibhodi eliyinhlanganisela elimele amanyuvesi angama-26 kuleli lizwe.

src_text: Tumellano ya Matjhaba ho Tshebediso ya Dimela le Diphoofolo Tlhahisong ya Dijo le tsa Temo (the Treaty).
tgt_text: Yomibili le mibiko iphakamisa amaqhingasu okungenelela ukuze kuzolethwa ngokushesha uguquko emikhakheni emihlanu ebanzi, okubalwa kuyo umkhakha wasebeneziqu; ukubamba iqhaza kwabasebenzi; usikompilo nemikhuba yesikhungo; inqubomgomo neqhingasu, kanye nezinsiza-kusebenza ezinganele.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tliswa ha the Treaty Palamenteng bakeng sa tekolo.

Sena se tla etsa hore Afrika Borwa be karolo ya Tumellano ena fanang ka tataiso ho dinaha tseo leng ditho mabapi le paballo le tshebediso ya nako telele ya dihlahiswa tsa dimela le diphoofolo dijong le ho tsa temo.
tgt_text: ISivumelwano Samazwe Ngamazwe Ngemithombo Yofuzo Lwezitshalo Zokudla Nezolimo (iSivumelwano).

src_text: Ho amohelwa ha Tumellano ena, ho tla matlafatsa boitlamo ba naha ena mabapi le paballo le tshebediso ya nako telele ya dihlahiswa tsa dimela le diphoofolo, mme ho tshehetswe le batho ba mahaeng.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligunyaze ukungeniswa kweSivumelwano ePhalamende.

src_text: Moralo wa Leano la Diphetoho Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: Lokhu kuzovumela iNingizimu Afrika ukuthi ibe ingxenye yamazwe ahambisana nalesi Sivumelwano, esikhomba indlela amazwe angamalungu ekugcineni nasekuqinisekiseni ukusetshenziswa okusimeme kwemithombo yofuzo lwezitshalo ukuze kuzokhiqizwa ukudla nezolimo.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho kengwa tshebetsong ha Moralo wa Leano la Diphetoho.
tgt_text: Ukungena kulesi Sivumelwano kuzophinde kuqinise ukuzinikela kwaleli lizwe ekugcineni nasekusebenziseni ngokusimeme imithombo yofuzo lwezitshalo, kuphinde kweseke imiphakathi yasemakhaya.

src_text: Moralo ona hlakisa ponelopele ka Afrika Borwa nang le Maemo Lehodimo Tsitsitseng.
tgt_text: UHlaka Loguquko Lwesimo eNingizimu Afrika.

src_text: Moralo ona hlalosa tsela le mekgwa ya ho fihlela sena.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligunyaze uHlaka Loguquko Lwesimo ukuthi luqale ukusebenza.

src_text: Moralo ona tla ama motho ohle Afrika Borwa fane le ka menyetla ya ho lokisa ho se lekalekane ha nako fetileng le ho aha moruo tla tswela bohle molemo.
tgt_text: Uhlaka lolu luletha umbono owodwa weNingizimu Afrika elinganayo, nemelana nesimo sezulu.

src_text: Komeshene ya Mopresidente ya Maemo Lehodimo buisane le mahlahana yona mme ya fumana tshehetso kgolo ka moralo ona.
tgt_text: Licacisa izimiso nenqubomgomo ezoholela kulokhu.

src_text: Kabinete ka netefatsa taba ya hore moralo ona wa ho fihlela tikoloho moya hlwekileng ka selemo sa 2050 tlameha ho tshehetsa moruo le ntshetsopele ya naha ho kenyeletsa menyetla ya mesebetsi ho bohle, tshebedisano le setjhaba le phediso ya bofuma.
tgt_text: Uhlaka loguquko luzothinta wonke umuntu eNingizimu Afrika, futhi lunika ithuba lokubhekana nokungalingani kwangesikhathi esedlule futhi lwakha umnotho okuzozuza kuwona wonke umuntu.

src_text: Kabinete ipiletsa ho mahlahana yona ohle hore tshehetse moralo ona.
tgt_text: IKhomishini KaMongameli Eqaphe Isimo Sezulu yaqhuba inqubo ejulile yokuxoxisana nokusetshenzisanwa nabo emphakathini futhi yathola ukwesekwa okukhulu ngalolu hlaka.

src_text: Ho tla ralwa tsela eo moralo ona tlang ho kengwa tshebetsong ka yona mme tla kenyelletswa moralong wa maano le kabo ya ditjhelete tsa mmuso.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likuqinisekisile ukuthi ukuguqukela emnothweni ongenayo ikhabhoni ngowezi-2050 kumele kweseke izifiso zentuthuko zezwe, kubandakanya imisebenzi engcono yawo wonke umuntu, ukubandakanywa komphakathi kanye nokuqedwa nya kobubha.

src_text: Mofuta Motjha wa Lengolo la Afrika Borwa la ho Kganna.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi selicele bonke okusetshenziswana nabo emphakathini ukuthi beseke futhi bamukele lolu hlaka.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho fetolwa ha mofuta sebetsang ha jwale wa lengolo la ho kganna ho ya ho le nang le dikarolo tse ntjha tsa tshireletso.
tgt_text: Uhlelo olunemininingo lokuqalisa lolu hlaka luzokwenziwa, futhi luzohlanganiswa nezinhlelo zikahulumeni kanye nesabelomali.

src_text: Mofuta ona sebediswang ha jwale, haesale le tshebetsong ho tloha ka selemo sa.
tgt_text: Ikhadi Elisha Lelayisensi Yokushayela eNingizimu Afrika.

src_text: Maemo thekenoloji fetohile haholo matsatsing ana mme ho bitsa tjhelete ngata ho tswela pele le mofuta ona.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligunyaze ukushintshwa kweKhadi Lelayisensi Yokushayela lamanje kube yileli eliklanywe lafakwa izici zokuphepha..     Indlela yamanje selokhu yasetshenziswa kusukela ngowe-.

src_text: Mofuta motjha wa karete tsamaisana le Maemo Matjhaba Mangolo ho Kganna le Thekenoloji ya Poloko ya Dintlha tsa Batho.
tgt_text: Ubuchwepheshe buyaguquguquka futhi sekuyizindleko ukugcina ingqalasizinda ekhona njengamanje.

Ikhadi elisha eliphakanyisiwe lizokwenza ukuthi ilayisensi yokushayela kuleli lizwe ihambisane nobuchwepheshe be-International Information Technology Personal Identification Compliant Driving Licence (i-ISO18013).

src_text: Melawana ya Leano la Mmuso la Tshehetso ya Setjhaba (EPWP).
tgt_text: INqubomgomo Yohlelo Olweluliwe Lwezemisebenzi Kahulumeni (i-EPWP).

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho phatlalatswa ha moralo wa EPWP bakeng sa maikutlo setjhaba.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligunyaze ukufakwa kusomqulu kweNqubomgomo ye-EPWP ehlongozwayo ukuze kubonisanwe ngayo emphakathini.

src_text: Leano lena la EPWP, ke leo ka lona mmuso thusang setjhaba ho leleka bofuma ka ho theha mesebetsi ya nakwana, haholo bakeng sa basadi le batjha.
tgt_text: I-EPWP ngenye yezinhlelo ezingumongo zikahulumeni okuhloswe ngazo ukuletha usizo ekubhekaneni nobubha kanye nosizo lwemalingena ngokusungula amathuba emisebenzi yesikhashana, ikakhulukazi entsheni nakwabesifazane..     Inqubomgomo entsha ehlongozwayo izoqinisa uhlelo futhi icacise ngodaba lwamaholo, uxhasomali kanye nokuvikeleka komphakathi, futhi luzolinganisa i-EPWP nezindlela zesimanje zokusebenza.

src_text: Moralo ona motjha tla hlakisa dintho tse ngata tse kang meputso, tshehetso tsa ditjhelete, tshireletso ya setjhaba le hore leano lena le ipapise le melao ya tsa kgiro.
tgt_text: Izogqugquzela ubudlelwano phakathi kukahulumeni nomkhakha ozimele ekuqinisekiseni ukuthi i-EPWP inegalelo elikhulu ekwakheni imisebenzi engcono nokuqedwa kobubha.

src_text: Le tla boela le kgothaletsa le tshebedisano mmoho pakeng tsa mmuso le lekala le ikemetseng ho ka netefatsa hore lenaneo lena la EPWP le thusa ho theha mesebetsi ya moshwelella le ho leleka bofuma.
tgt_text: Le nqubomgomo izophinde igqugquzele ukuqamba kabusha ekuqalisweni kwezinhlelo zemisebenzi kahulumeni kulolonke izwe..     Izichibiyelo zoChungechunge Lwesine Lwezinhlamvu Zemali eNingizimu Afrika.

src_text: Moralo ona tla hlaha ka mahlale ho kenya lenaneo lena la mesebetsi ya setjhaba tshebetsong naheng ka bophara.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligunyaze ububanzi, umklamo kanye nokuhlanganiswa koChungechunge Lwesine Lwezinhlamvu Zemali eNingizimu Afrika Lwangowezi-.

src_text: Diphetoho Mofuteng wa Bone wa Tjhelete ya Tshepe Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: Ligunyaze uhlelo lokusebenza lokushintshanisa njalo ngonyaka ukusetshenziswa kwezilimi ezisemthethweni kulolu chungechunge lwesine lwezinhlamvu zemali.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana tlhahisong ya Mofuta Motjha wa Tjhelete ya Tshepe Afrika Borwa ho tloha ka selemo sa tjhaetse monwana ho tjhentjhisana ha tshebediso ya dipuo tse molao tjheleteng ena jwalo ka selemo.
tgt_text: Igama elithi "iNingizimu Afrika" lizofakwa ngakwelinye icala lohlamvu futhi lizobhalwa ngazo zonke izilimi ezisemthethweni.

src_text: Lentswe lena “Afrika Borwa” le tla hlahella lehlakoreng le le leng la tjhelete mme ho tjhentjhanywe dipuo tsohle tse molaong.
tgt_text: Izilimi ezintathu zizofakwa kuhlamvu luka-R5; izilimi ezimbili ku-R2; bese kuthi izinhlamvu zika-50c, 20c no-10c kanye no-R1 kufakwe ulimi olulodwa.

src_text: Ho R5, ho tla sebediswa puo tse tharo; ho R2; 50c, 20c le 10c ho sebediswe puo tse pedi mme ho R1 ho sebediswe puo le nngwe.
tgt_text: Zonke lezi zilimi zizosetshenziswa ngokushintshana njalo ngonyaka isikhathi esiyiminyaka eyishumi ezayo.

src_text: Dipuo tsena di tla nne di tjhentjhane jwalo ka selemo dilemong tsena tse leshome tse tlang.
tgt_text: INqubomgomo Ehlongozwayo Ngokuphathwa Kwezinga Lamanzi (i-IWQM) yangowezi-.

src_text: Moralo wa Molawana wa Tlhwekiso ya Metsi (IWQM) wa Selemo sa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligunyaze ukufakwa kosomqulu kweNqubomgomo Esahlongozwa ye-IWQM ukuze kuzoxoxisanwa nomphakathi.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho phatlalatswa ha Moralo wa IWQM bukaneng ya diphatlalatso tsa mmuso bakeng sa maikutlo setjhaba.
tgt_text: Inqubomgomo ehlongozwayo izongena esikhundleni seNqubomgomo ye-WQM yowe-1991 ephelelwe isikhathi kanye neqhingasu layo elabekwa ngowezi-.

src_text: Moralo ona tla kena sebakeng sa wa kgale wa WQM wa selemo sa 1991 neng kengwe tshebetsong ka selemo sa..  Molawana ona hlakisa dintlha tsa bohlokwa tsamaisong ya tlhwekiso ya metsi.
Moralo ona tsamaisana le melao yohle ya naha laolang metsi mme ntse ikamahantse le boinehelo ba naha ba ho nka metsi jwalo ka sehlahiswa se sa atang.
tgt_text: Inqubomgomo icacisa iqoqwana lezimiso ezizokwakha isisekelo sokulawulwa kwezinga lamanzi.

src_text: Moralo wa Molawana Laolang Maqhubu Diyalemoya Bakeng sa Nako Tlang.
tgt_text: Ihlinzeka ukuhambisana kuyoyonke imithetho efanele ehambisana namanzi kanye nokuzinikela emhlabeni kwaleli lizwe ukuhlinzeka nokugcina amanzi njengensiza eyingcosana.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho phatlalatswa ha Moralo wa Molawana Laolang Maqhubu Diyalemoya bakeng sa Nako Tlang bakeng sa maikutlo setjhaba.
tgt_text: Inqubomgomo Ehlongozwayo Ngokusakaza Ngamagagasi Omoya.

src_text: Maqhubu kgaso ya diyalemoya, ke bohlokwa ho tsa kgokahano le tshebedisong ya dijithale Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligunyaze ukushicilelwa kweNqubomgomo ehlongozwayo Ngokusakaza Ngamagagasi Omoya ukuze umphakathi uzobeka imibono.

src_text: Molawana ona tla hlakisa taba ya ho fana ka dilaesense bakeng sa diselefounu; kgaso; tshebeletso tsa difofane le tsa dikepe; tsa dipatlisiso le ntshetsopele; tshebedisano le setjhaba ha mmoho le diindasteri tse ding tse amehang.
tgt_text: Ukusakaza ngamagagasi omoya kungumthombo wemvelo obaluleke kakhulu ekukhuleni komnotho wedijithali eNingizimu Afrika kanye nengqalasizinda yezokuxhumana.

src_text: Molawana ona tla netefatsa tshebetso hlokang leemo kabong ya dilaesense lekaleng lena ha mmoho le ho netefatsa hore bohle ba fumana kgokahano ntle ka mokgwa wa dijithale le dibakeng tse dikoting naheng ena.
tgt_text: Inqubomgomo ehlongozwayo ihlose ukweseka ukwabiwa kwamagagasi omoya kanye nokukhishwa kwamalayisensi ezimboni zomakhalekhukhwini; zokusakaza; zezindiza nezasolwandle; zocwaningo nokuthuthukisa; ukufinyelela emphakathini, kanye nezinye izimboni ezifanele.

src_text: Kemedi ya Afrika Borwa ho Boto ya Matjhaba ya Moifo wa Taolo ho tsa Kgokahano ya Diyalemoya (ITU).
tgt_text: Inqubomgomo iphinde igqugquzele ukwabelwa okulinganayo nokuneqiniso ukuze kuzofakwa igalelo ekuguqulweni kwalo mkhakha kanye nokufinyelela ekuxhumaneni ngokwedijithali ngisho ezingxenyeni ezingaphandle kwezwe.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho kgethwa ha Ntate Mandla Samuel Mchunu ho ya emela Afrika Borwa ho ITU (Region .
tgt_text: Ukukhethwa Kozomela iNingizimu Afrika kumkhandlu woMfelandawonye Wezokuxhumana Wamazwe Ngamazwe (i-ITU) kanye neBhodi Lokulawulwa Komsakazo..     IKhabhinethi ligunyaze ukukhethwa komele iNingizimu Afrika uMnu Mandla Samuel Mchunu kwiBhodi Lokulawulwa Komsakazo (iSifunda .

src_text: Ha jwale Ntate Mchunu ke setho sa boto ena.
tgt_text: UMnu Mchunu njengamanje usebenza njengelungu lebhodi.

src_text: Ho sisintswe hore boele kgethelwe ho sebetsa teng hape ho tloha ka semo sa 2023 ho isa ho sa..  Dikgetho di tla tshwarelwa Sebokeng sa ITU sa Kemedi tsa Dinaha se tla ba mane Bucharest, Romania ho tloha ka la 26 Lwetse ho isa ka la 14 Mphalane.
tgt_text: Uphakanyiselwe ukuthi aphinde akhethwe kuMkhandlu we-ITU wesikhathi sangowezi-2023 kuya kowezi-.

src_text: Afrika Borwa ikemiseditse ho ikamahanya le dipehelo tsa ITU ho netefatsa hore kgokahanyo finyella diqoleng tsohle tsa lefatshe ka mokgwa wa dijithale .
Kgwedi ya Botjhaba.
tgt_text: Ukhetho luzokwenzeka ngesikhathi seNkomfa Yamanxusa e-ITU ezobanjwa e-Bucharest, e-Romania kusuka mhla wama-26 kuMandulo kuya mhla ziyi-14 kuMfumfu.

src_text: Selemong sena Kgwedi ya Botjhaba leng ya Lwetse re tla keteka tlasa lepetjo le reng: “Re Hopola Lefa la Solomon Linda le Mmino wa Setso sa Afrika Borwa”.
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika isalokhu izinikele ngezinjongo ze-ITU zokuvala igebe kwezedijithali ixhumanise bonke abantu emhlabeni     Imicimbi Ezayo.

src_text: Kabinete ipiletsa ho Maafrika Borwa kaofela ho keteka Botjhaba ba rona ka ho fapana ha rona empa re ntse re le setjhaba se le seng se bopahaneng.
tgt_text: INyanga Yamagugu.

src_text: Re tlameha ho sebetsa mmoho re tshwarane ho fedisa dikarohano le dipherekano tsa nako  fetileng mme re be setjhaba se le seng se motlotlo ka Afrika Borwa  Melaetsa.
tgt_text: INyanga Yamagugu ngoMandulo kulo nyaka izobungazwa ngaphansi kwesiqubulo esithi: "Sibungaza Ifa lika-Solomon Linda kanye Nomculo Womdabu waseNingizimu Afrika".

src_text: DitebohoKabinete lebisa diteboho le ditakaletso tse ntle ho:Bahlodi bohle, ba fumaneng dimetale le bohle ba nkileng karolo lebelong la bo 95 la Comrades tummeng ka hore ke “Lebelo Botho la ho Hlola Kaofela”, le neng le mathwa ka la 28 Phato.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi linxusa bonke abantu baseNingizimu Afrika ukuthi basebenzise iNyanga Yamagugu ukubungaza amasiko ethu anothile kanye nokwehlukana okunamandla okubumba isizwe sethu.

src_text: Mokgahlelong wa banna mohlodi bile Tete Dijana (ka nako ya dihora tse 5, metsotso 30 le metsotswana 38).
tgt_text: Kufanele sonke sizinikele ekusebenzeni ngokubambisana  ukuqeda ukwahlukana kanye nokungabi nabulungiswa kwesikhathi esedlule futhi sigqugquzele umuzwa wokuzigqaja ngokuba ngowaseNingizimu Afrika     Imiyalezo.

src_text: Mohlodi enwa tswa Mahikeng profensing ya Leboya Bophirima.
tgt_text: Ukuhalalisa    IKhabhinethi ihalalisela futhi ifisela okuhle laba: Bonke abadle umhlanganiso, abathole izindondo kanye nalabo abangenele umncintiswano ababe yingxenye yomjaho we-95th Comrades Marathon, owaziwa kakhulu ngokuthi yi-“Ultimate Human Race”, ngeSonto, mhla wama-28 kuNcwaba.

src_text: Mokgahlelong wa basadi teng mohlodi bile Alexandra Morozova ho tswa naheng ya Rashia (ka nako ya dihora tse 6, metsotso 17 le metsotswana 47).
tgt_text: U-Tete Dijana wahlabana kumjaho wamadoda (ngamahora ama-5, imizuzu engama-30, imizuzwana engama-38) ongowase-Mahikeng eNyakatho Ntshonalanga kwathi kumjaho wabesifazane owadla umhlanganiso kwaba ngumsubathi waseRashiya u-Alexandra Morozova (amahora ayisi-6, imizuzu eyi-17, imizuzwana engama-47).

src_text: MatshidisoKabinete lebisa matshidiso yona ho lelapa le metswalle ya:Mme Rita Alice Ndzanga (88), eo neng le molwanedi wa tsa tokoloho le ditokelo tsa basebetsi ya neng fumane Kgau ya National Order of Luthuli ka selemo sa 2004 ka “Kabelo ya hae ho lwaneleng ditokelo tsa basebetsi le tsa Afrika Borwa sa kgetholleng ka morabe le bonng.”Ditho tse hlano tsa Sepolesa sa Afrika Borwa (SAPS) tse ileng tsa swahlamana le sefofane Boemafofaneng ba Rand, Germiston, ka Labobedi la la 30 Phato.
SAPS ntse fuputsa sesosa sa kotsi ena.
tgt_text: Amazwi enduduzo IKhabhinethi lizwakalisa amazwi enduduzo emndenini nakubangani baka: UMama Rita Alice Ndzanga (88), umakadebona woMzabalazo nomqambi ophambili wemfelandawonye yabasebenzi owaphinde wamukela i-National Order of Luthuli ngowezi-2004 ngomsebenzi wakhe wokuba negalelo emzabalazweni wamalungelo abasebenzi kanye nasekuzuzeni iNingizimu Afrika engacwasi ngokobuhlanga, ngokobulili, ekhululekile futhi enentando yeningi labantu".Amaphoyisa amahlanu angamalungu oPhiko Lwamaphoyisa eNingizimu Afrika (i-SAPS) akade engabagibeli kwindiza ephahlazeke e-Rand Airport, e-Germiston ngoLwesibili, mhla wama-30 kuNcwaba.

src_text: Kabinete lakaletsa mofofisi wa teng ya lemetseng haholo ho fola ka potlako  Kgiro.
tgt_text: I-SAPS iyaphenya ngaloku kuphahlazeka.

src_text: Pele batho bohle ba hirwa, ho tla hlahlobisiswa mangolo bona thuto le mang hlokahalang  Mme Gugulethu Abigail Thimane jwalo ka Motlatsi wa Molaodi Kakaretso (DDG): ba keng sa Tekolo le Ntshetsopele Lefapheng la Meralo, Tekolo le Tekolobotjha  Mme Kwena Komape jwalo ka DDG: Ntshetsopele ya Moruo, tsa Kgwebo le Dipapatso Lefapheng la tsa Temo, Ditaba tsa Mobu le Ntshetsopele ya Dibaka tsa Mahaeng  Ngaka Bongani Elias Sithole jwalo ka DDG: Ofising ya Naha ya Taolo ya Dikoduwa Lefapheng la Puso ya Kopanelo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lifisele umshayeli wendiza olimele kakhulu ukululama okusheshayo     Abaqashiwe.

src_text: Motlakase.
tgt_text: Ezamandla.

src_text: Kabinete ile ya fumana tlaleho ho tswa ho Letona la Dikgwebo tsa Mmuso Pravin Gordhan ka mekgwa eo Eskom tlang ho sebedisa ho lwantshana le ho tingwa ha motlakase ka sepheo sa ho baballa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lethulelwe umbiko nguNgqongqoshe Wezamabhizinisi Kahulumeni u-Pravin Gordhan mayelana namandla enkampani yakwa-Eskom okunciphisa ukucinywa kukagesi ngenhloso yokuwonga okwenzeka ngezikhathi ezithile ezibekiwe, futhi liwutholile nombiko wenqubekela phambili esiyenziwe ovela eKomidini Lobungoti Bomsebenzi leKomidi Likazwelonke Elijutshwe Ukubhekana Nenkinga Yamandla Kagesi..     Ezinye izimemezelo zizokwenziwa emuva kokuphothulwa kwezingxoxo zokudingidwa ngokujulile kwale mibiko.

src_text: Kabinete boetse hape ya fumana le tlaleho ya kgatelo pele mosebetsing wa Komiti ya Naha Shebaneng le Mathata Motlakase..     Ha ditlaleho tsena ka bobedi di se di sekasekilwe ho tla ba teng phatlalatso tla etswa..     Kabinete ikwahlaya haholo ka ditshitiso tse bakwang ke ho tingwa hona ha motlakase dikgwebong le malapeng, haholoholo nakong eo mmuso kenyang tshebetsong matsapa neng phatlalatswe ke Mopresidente Cyril Ramaphosa ka Phupu.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lizwakalise ukudabuka kwalo ngokuphazamiseka kanye nobunzima obubangelwa wukucinywa kukagesi ngenhloso yokuwonga emabhizinisini kanye namakhaya, ikakhulukazi okwenzeka esikhathini lapho uhulumeni ematasa nemizamo yokungenelela eyamenyezelwa nguMongameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa ngoNtulikazi.

src_text: Matsete.
tgt_text: Utshalomali.

src_text: Kabinete amohetse ho thakgolwa ha Sitsi se setjha sa Tlhahiso sa Sandvik Khomanani mane Kempton Park, seo bileng karolo ya ditshepiso tse neng di etswe Sebokeng sa bone sa Matsete sa Afrika Borwa (SAIC) se neng se tshwaretswe Sandton Convention Centre ka la 24 Tlhakubele 2022 sa dimilione tse  .
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likwamukele ngezandla ezimhlophe ukwethulwa kwesizinda sokukhiqiza esisha i-Sandvik Khomanani Manufacturing Site e-Kempton Park, esiyingxenye yotshalomali oluyizigidi ezingama-R350 olwathenjiswa eNgqungqutheleni Yotshalomali yaseNingizimu Afrika (i-SAIC) eyayibanjelwe e-Sandton Convention Centre eGoli mhla zingama-24 kuNdasa..     Lesi sizinda esisha esingamamithasikwele ayizi-62 000 sihlanganisa ndawonye imisebenzi ngaphambilini ebeyenziwa ezizindeni ezinhlanu ezihlukene futhi sizokwazi ukwamukela abasebenzi abalinganiselwa kuma-.

src_text: Sitsi sena se setjha se bobatsi ba 62 000m², se kopantse tshebetso ya ditsi tse hlano tse neng di sebeletsa mona nakong fetileng mme se hirile batho ba ka bang.
tgt_text: Lesi singesinye sezizinda zabakwa-Sandvik ezinkulukazi futhi ezithuthuke kakhulu emhlabeni wonke jikelele, futhi sinamandla okukhiqiza imishini yokulayisha esebenza ngaphansi komhlaba equkethe umkhiqizo ongaphezu kwama-60% waseNingizimu Afrika.

src_text: Sena ke se seng sa ditsi tse kgolo le tse tswetseng pele tsa Sandvik lefatsheng ka bophara mme se kgona ho hlahisa dipersente tse fetang tse 60 tsa tlhahiso Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lilwamukelile futhi nohambo lokuhlola lukaMongameli u-Ramaphosa lapho ebevakashele khona esifundazweni saKwaZulu-Natali ngenkathi kwethulwa isikhungo sokukhiqiza, i-Hesto Harnesses, e-Stanger, KwaDukuza mhla ziyi-13 kuMandulo.

src_text: Kabinite boetse ya amohela ho etela ha Mopresidente ho thakgolweng ha sitsi sa tlhahiso sa Hesto Harnesses mane Stanger, KwaDukuza ka la 13 Loetse.
tgt_text: Lesi sikhungo singomunye wemiklamo emihlanu emikhulukazi yotshalomali oluyingxenye yalolo oluyizigidigidi ezingama-R. 4 olwathenjiswa yinkampani yakwa-Metair Investments Limited ukweseka umsebenzi wokwelulwa komklamo kanye nokukhiqizwa kohlobo olusha lwe-Ford Ranger kuleli lizwe.

src_text: Sitsi sena ke se seng sa diprojeke tse hlano tsa matsete tseo leng karolo ya matsete Metair Investments Limited dibilione tse  4 tlo tshehetsa katoloso ya tlhahiso ya mofuta motjha wa koloi ya Ford Ranger.
tgt_text: UMongameli wahambela futhi nomcimbi wokuvulwa komklamo wokukhuliswa nokwelulwa kwesigayo i-Sappi Saiccor Mill okungumklamo wezigidigidi ezingama-R. 7 osendaweni yaseMkhomazi okuhloswe ngawo ukukhulisa amandla kanye nekhono lenkampani lokuncintisana nezinye izinkampani emhlabeni wonke jikelele futhi kusenjalo kuvulwe namathuba omsebenzi esikhathi esifushane kanye nawesikhathi eside..     Lolu tshalomali luyingxenye yotshalomali olwathenjiswa ngosozimboni engqungqutheleni i-SAIC.

src_text: Mopresidente ile boela etela le ho bulweng ha khamphane atolotsweng ya ha Sappi Saiccor Mill bitsang dibilione tse R7,7 mane Umkomaas ikemiseditseng ho atolla tlhodisano ya tshebetso ya yona maemong matjhaba ha mmoho le ho eketsa menyetla ya mosebetsi bakeng sa nako kgutshwane le telele..     Matsete ana ke mang ditshepiso tse neng di etswe ke diindasteri tsena ho SAIC.
tgt_text: Lonke utshalomali olusha olungena ezweni lethu luyalekelela ekwakheni kabusha nokuvuselela umnotho wethu, futhi lokhu kuyaqhubeka nokukhangisa nokubonisa ngokusobala ukuthi iNingizimu Afrika iyizwe eliyintandokazi kubatshalizimali.

src_text: Matsete mang le mang matjha naheng ena thusa letsholong la kahobotjha le tsoseletso ya moruo, mme hape tswela pele ho etsa Afrika Borwa sebaka se setle sa ho etsa matsete..     Ntshetsopele ya Meralo ya Motheo.
tgt_text: Ukuthuthukiswa kwengqalasizinda.

src_text: Kabinete amohetse ho bulwa ha karolo ntjha ya Mmila wa Ring Road wa Musina mane Limpopo tla bebofatsa kgwebelano ha mmoho le ho tsamaya ha batho Musina le dinaheng tsa boahisane tse ka borwa ho Afrika.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likwamukelile ukuvulwa kwesigaba esisha somgwaqo i-Musina Ring Road eLimpopo ozokwenza kube lula ukuhamba eMusina namaphethelo, futhi okungumgwaqo ozovumela ukukhuliswa kohwebo kanye nemisebenzi yezomnotho phakathi kweNingizimu Afrika namazwe eNhlangano Yokuthuthukiswa Kwamazwe aseNingizimu ne-Afrika.

src_text: Projeke ena ya dimilione tse R640 thehile mesebetsi ya moshwelella fetang 275 mme ya thehela le dikgwebo tse nyane, tse bohareng le tse kgolo menyetla..     Ho ahwa ha mmila ona wa Musina Ring Road ke karolo ya leano la mmuso la meralo ya motheo tlasa lenaneo la ERRP, leo ka lona ho ikemiseditsweng ho theha le hona ho hodisa menyetla ya mesebetsi setjhabeng ho tswa makaleng fapafapaneng..     Koduwa ya Jagersfontein.
tgt_text: Lo mklamo wezigidi ezingama-R640 uvule amathuba kubantu basendaweni abasebenza ngokugcwele abangaphezu kwama-275 futhi uhlinzeke ngamathuba emiphakathini yendawo kanye namabhizinisi asafufusa (ama-SMME)..     Ukwakhiwa komgwaqo i-Musina Ring Road kuyingxenye yohlelo lwengqalasizinda lukahulumeni, ngokusebenzisa uHlelo Lokwakhiwa Kabusha Nokuvuselelwa Komnotho (i-ERRP), okuhloswe ngalo ukwakha ukukhula okubandakanyayo namathuba omsebenzi emikhakheni yonkana nemiphakathi ehlukahlukene.

src_text: Kabinete lebisa kutlwelo bohloko ya yona ho malapa ohle lahlehetsweng ke beng ka ona ka lebaka la ho phatloha ha letamo la morafo neng se sa sebediswe wa Jagersfontein mane Foreisitata ka Sontaha sa la 11 Loetse.
tgt_text: Inhlekelele yase-Jagersfontein.

src_text: Koduwa ena sentse meralo mengata ya motheo esitana le matlo le dikoloi tsa batho..     Ketelong ya hae sebakeng sena sa koduwa ka Mantaha wa la 12 Loetse 2022, Mopresidente Ramaphosa ile thoholetsa matsapa neng se entswe ho leka ho thusa sebakeng seo ile ba ikana hore mmuso tla fana ka tshehetso hlokahalang setjhabeng seo sa Jagersfontein.
tgt_text: 1    IKhabhinethi lizwakalise ukudabuka kwalo okukhulu futhi ladlulisa amazwi enduduzo emindenini yalabo abalahlekelwe yimiphefumulo yabo emuva kokuqhuma nokubhidlika kwezindonga zedamu lemfucuza yemikhiqizo emayini yendawo e-Jagersfontein eFreyistata futhi okudale izikhukhula zodaka ezidale umonakalo omkhulu entathakusa ngeSonto mhla ziyi-11 kuMandulo.

src_text: Kabinete boetse ya kgothatswa ke taba ya hore beng ba morafo ona ba ikemiseditse ho tshehetsa mmuso ka tshehetso ya setekginiki haeba ka kotjwa ke Moifo okametseng Dimenerale Afrika Borwa..     Indasteri ya merafo ke le leng la makala nang le seabo se seholo kgolong ya moruo wa naha ena ka ho theha menyetla ya mesebetsi, ho romelwa ha thepa dinaheng tsa kantle ha mmoho le ho etsa matsete dinaheng tsa kantle, tseo tsohle tse tswelang batho ba dibaka tsa merafong molemo..     Mmuso le mekgatlo ikemetseng ba ile ba phallela ho thusa mahlatsipa ka dintho tse kang mepheme ya nakwana, ditshebeletso tsa ho thojwa maikutlo le ditlhoko tsa sethatho tse kang dikobo, mealo ha mmoho le dijo.
tgt_text: Le nhlekelele idale umonakalo omkhulukazi nakwingqalasizinda yendawo kanye nempahla yabantu enjengezimoto kanye namakhaya amaningana.. 2    Ngenkathi evakashele indawo yenhlekelele ngoMsombuluko mhla ziyi-12 kuMandulo 2022 uMongameli u-Ramaphosa udlulise amazwi okubonga imizamo eyenziwayo endaweni yokutakula kanye nokuvuselela.

src_text: Metsi le motlakase le tsona di boetse setlwaeding sebakeng sena..     Ha ho se ho hlwekisitswe sebakeng seo sa koduwa, boratekginiki ba tla hlahloba maemo matlo moo.
tgt_text: Uthembisile futhi ukuthi uhulumeni uzohlinzeka ngosizo oludingekayo kubahlali base-Jagersfontein abakhahlamezekile.

src_text: Kabinete leboha ba ditshebeletso tsa tshohanyetso, mekgatlo ya setjhaba le setjhaba ka kakaretso ka ho phallela ka thuso..     Moruo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likhuthazekile ngokuthi abanikazi bemayini bathe bona sebemi ngomumo kakade ukuhlinzeka ngosizo futhi basekele uhulumeni uma lokho kucelwa nguMkhandlu Wezimbiwa waseNingizimu Afrika.

src_text: Kabinete ile ya sekaseka maemo moruo naha ena ho latela dipalopalo tse sa tswa lokollwa ke Lefapha la Dipalopalo (Stats SA) la naha ena tse bontshang ha tlhahiso ya thepa kotareng ya bobedi ya selemo sena theohile ka persente tse 0,7%.
tgt_text: 3    Imboni yezimayini isalokhu iyimboni enohlonze efaka isandla esikhulu emnothweni ngokuhlinzeka ngqo ngamathuba omsebenzi, futhi ihlinzeke nangamanye amathuba okuqashwa kwabantu avuleka emikhakheni esebenzisana nale mboni, ifaka isandla futhi kwingenisomali etholakala ngokuthengiswa kwemikhiqizo emazweni angaphandle, kanye nakutshalomali olungena ngqo kuleli oluvela emazweni angaphandle futhi le mboni idlala indima esemqoka kakhulu ekwenzeni ngcono izimpilo zabantu emiphakathini eyakhelene nezimayini.

src_text: Hara dintlha tse bakileng phokotseho ena re ka bala ho tingwa ha motlakase ka sepheo sa ho baballa, ntwa ya Rashiya le Ukraine ha mmoho le ho nyoloha ha ditjeho tsa bophelo ka kakaretso..     Matsapa ileng etswa ka Lenaneo la Kahobotjha le Tsoseletso ya Moruo ile thusa haholo ho thibella ho lahleha ho hong ha mesebetsi ha mmoho le kgahlamelo mpe ya maemo matjhaba moruong wa rona.
tgt_text: 4    Uhulumeni kanye nezinhlangano ezingenzi nzuzo ezithile sebengenelele ngokushesha ngokuthi bahlinzeke ngendawo yokukhosela nokufihla ikhanda okwesikhashana, usizo lokwelulekwa kwabahlali ngokwengqondo ukuze bakwazi ukubhekana nenhlekelele ebavelele, omatalasi kanye nezijumbana zokudla.

src_text: Matsapa ana mmuso bontsha katleho kgolo, mme bopaki ba teng bo bonahetse dipalopalong tsa Kotara tsa Stats SA tsa Dipatlisiso tsa Batho ba Sebetsang.
tgt_text: Sekubuyiseliwe esimweni esijwayelekile ukuphakelwa kwamanzi nogesi endaweni.

src_text: Dipalopalo tsena di bontsha ha le batho ba 648 000 ba fumaneng mesebetsi pakeng tsa kotara ya pele le ya bobedi ya selemo sa     Diqeto tsa Kabinete.
Ho Behwa Leihlo le ho Lekolwa Botjha (M&E) ha Moralo wa Leano la Naha la Batjha (NYP).
tgt_text: 5    Uma seyikhucululiwe indawo yenhlekelele, ongoti kulindeleke ukuba bahlole umonakalo owenzeke ezindlini.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana moralo wa M&E mme tla matlafatsa ho behwa leihlo ha ditshiya tsa NYP 2020-.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi libonge abezimo eziphuthumayo, izinhlangano zomphakathi wonkana kanye namalungu omphakathi ngeminikelo nosizo olubonisa ububele obukhulu.

src_text: Moralo ona na le dipontsho tse hlano tse tsamaisanang le ditshiya tsa NYP.
tgt_text: Umnotho.

src_text: Dipontsho tsena di ile tsa thehwa ka tshebedisano mmoho le bankakarolo ba nang le thahasello tshehetsong le ntshetsopeleng ya batjha naheng ena.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi libhungile ngesimo somnotho ezweni kulandela izibalomanani zakamuva ezikhishwe yiNhlangano Yezibalomanani yaseNingizimu Afrika (i-Stats SA) ezibonise ukuthi isambamkhiqizo (i-GDP) sekota yesibili yowezi-2022 sehle ngo-.

src_text: Dintlha tsa teng di tla arolwa ho ya ka dilemo, bonng, maemo ho itekanela, morabe ha mmoho le dibaka..     Ho behwa leihlo hona ho tla etsuwa maemong ohle mmuso ha mmoho le lekaleng le ikemetseng.
Tlaleho ya teng tla bokeletswa jwalo ka kotara mme phatlalatswe habedi ka selemo..     Moralo wa Leano bakeng sa Moralo wa Kopanelo.
tgt_text: Izimo ezibe nomthelela kulokhu kwehla kwesambamkhiqizo zibandakanya ukucishwa kukagesi ngenhloso yokuwonga, udweshu phakathi kwe-Russia ne-Ukraine, kanye nokudlondlobala kwezindleko zokuphila nokwehla kwamandla emali.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana Moralo wa Leano bakeng sa Moralo wa Kopanelo mmusong oo ka ona ho ikemiseditsweng ho hlwaya dikgeo tse teng moralong wa ha jwale..     Matsapa ana rerilweng, ka ona ho ikemiseditswe ho shebana le ho hloleha ho etsa meralo maemong ka boraro mmuso.
tgt_text: Izinhlelo zokungenelela ezenziwe ngaphansi kwe-ERRP zibe wusizo olukhulu ekuvikeleni izwe ezivunguvungwini zamazwe ngamazwe, futhi ziyivikelile imisebenzi ngokunjalo futhi zavikela nezindlela abaziphilisa ngazo abantu.

src_text: Matsapa ana tla tla ka lenaneo le bontshang bopaki le tla beha tshebetso leihlo.
tgt_text: Izinhlelo ezinohlonze zikahulumeni zokungenelela emnothweni seziqalile ukuthela izithelo ezinhle, njengalokhu kubonakala emiphumeleni yoCwaningokuhlola Lokubheka Inani Labasebenzi Abakhona Kuleli Olwenziwa Njalo Emuva Kwezinyanga Ezintathu yi-Stats SA olubonise ukuthi kuvuleke imisebenzi eyevile ezi-648 000 phakathi kwekota yokuqala nekota yesibili yowezi-     Izinqumo zeKhabhinethi.

src_text: Leano lena le boetse le tla le leano la tjhebelopele la nako telele bohareng le kgutshwane maemong ohle mmuso..     Sena se tla thusa ho tla le diphetoho melaong ka maikemisetso ho ntlafatsa tshebedisano meralong le tjhebelong pele..     Ho Amohelwa ha Tumellano ya ho Thehwa ha Akgente ya Meriana ya Seafrika (AMA).
tgt_text: Uhlaka Lokuqapha Nokuhlola (i-M&E) lweNqubomgomo Kazwelonke Yentsha (i-NYP).

src_text: Kabinete amohetse ho tekenwa ha Tumellano ya ho Thehwa ha AMA le ho tliswa ha yona Palamenteng bakeng sa ho sekasekwa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lilugunyazile uhlaka lwe-M&E oluzovumela ukuqapha okusebenza kahle kanye nokuhlolwa komthelela wezinsika ze-NYP yowezi-2020-.

src_text: Sena se tla thusa ho theha tumellano eo ho neng ho dumellanwe ka yona Palamente ya Dinaha tsa Afrika ka.
tgt_text: Lolu hlaka luhlinzeka ngezinkombakusebenza ezinhlanu ezisezingeni eliphezulu ezihambelana nezinsika ze-NYP.

src_text: Ka tumellano ena, ho tla thehwa AMA bakeng sa kontinente ya Afrika.
tgt_text: Izinkombakusebenza zenziwa ngokubambisana nababambiqhaza abafanele abanentshisekelo ekuthuthukisweni nokufukulwa kwentsha ezweni.

src_text: Akgente ena tla laola meriana yohle ya kontinente ena mme ntlafatse le polokeho le tshebediso ya yona..     Ho tekenwa ha tumellano ena ho tla ntshetsa pele boinehelo ba Afrika Borwa matjhabeng ba ho ntlafatsa ho laolwa ha meriana kontinenteng ena..     Tlaleho Tshebetsong ya Dipatlisiso le Ntshetsong Pele (R&D) ya Lenaneo la Merokotso ya Lekgetho – 2019/20 le 2020/.
tgt_text: Ukuqoqwa kwemininingwane kuzohlukaniswa ngokweminyaka yobudala, ubulili, ukukhubazeka, uhlanga lomuntu kanye nendawo okwenzelwa kuyona lezi zinhlelo zokungenelela..     Umsebenzi wokuqapha uzokwenziwa kuyo yonke imikhakha kahulumeni, izikhungo zikahulumeni kanye nomkhakha ozimele.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tliswa Palamenteng ha Lenaneo la R&D la Merokotso ya Lekgetho la dilemo tse pedi tse fetileng (2019/20 le 2020/21).
