tgt_text: Imibiko izokhiqizwa njalo ngekota yonyaka bese ishicilelwa kabili ngonyaka..     Uhlaka Lwenqubomgomo Yokuhlela Okudidiyelwe.

src_text: Sena se tsamaisana le karoloya bo 11D (17) ya Molao wa Lekgetho, wa 1962 (Molao wa bo 58 wa 1962) bolelang tlhokeho ya ho tliswa ha ditlaleho tsena Palamenteng..     Lenaneo lena la merokotso ya lekgetho le kgothaletsa dikhamphane tse ikemetseng ho tsetela ho R&D le ho tshehetsa kgolo ya matsete.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lilugunyazile uHlaka Lwenqubomgomo Yokuhlela Okudidiyelwe kuhulumeni, okuhloswe ngalo ukuvala amagebe ahlonziwe ekuhlelweni kwenqubomgomo ohlelweni lokuhlela okuyilona olukhona nolusebenzayo njengamanje.

src_text: Lenaneo lena le tshehetsa ntlafatso ya saense le mahlale kgolong ya moruo le matlafatsong ya tlhodisano..     Kabinete kgotsofetse ka tlaleho ena bontshang dikhamphane tse ntjha tse kentseng dikopo tsa merokotso ya lekgetho.
tgt_text: Izinhlelo zokungenelela ezihlongozwayo, phakathi kokunye, zizobhekana nokungabi khona kokuhlela okuhambelanayo emikhakheni yomithathu kahulumeni.

src_text: Sena se kgothaletsa dikhamphane tse ngata ho nka karolo ka maikemisetso ho hodisa matsete tsona le ho matlafatsa kgolo ya moruo..     Dikhamphane tse nne tse ka pele lenaneong lena la merokotso ya lekgetho ke tsa lekala la tlhahiso ya tsa temo, tsa merafo, tsa dikhemikhale, ditlolo, meriana, setekginiki le tsa thekenoloji ya dikhomputara mme Kabinete nkile makala ana la ona ka Sehloohong Leanong la Meralo ya Diindasteri.
tgt_text: Izinhlelo zokungenelela zizokwethula indlela yokuqapha esekelwe phezu kobufakazi.

src_text: Tlaleho feletseng ka fumaneha ho websaete ya Lefapha la Saense le Mahlale: www.dst.gov.za..     Foramo ya Afrika ya Menyetla ya Kgolo (AGOA) –.
tgt_text: Uhlaka lwenqubomgomo lwethula futhi nesimo sokubikezela kalula esihambisana nokuhlelela isikhathi esimaphakathi kanye nesikhathi esifushane kuhulumeni wonkana.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tshwarwa ha Foramo ya AGOA ya.
tgt_text: Luzosebenzela ekwethulweni kwezinguquko zomthetho ukuze kwenziwe ngcono ukusebenza ngendlela ehambelanayo futhi ebikezelekayo emsebenzini kahulumeni wokuhlela nokuqapha..     Ukugunyazwa ngokusemthethweni kweSivumelwano Sokusungulwa Kwenhlangano Yezemithi yase-Afrika (i-AMA).

src_text: AGOA ne thakgolwe ke naha ya Amerika ka selemo sa 2000 ho fana ka tshebedisano ya tsa kgwebo dinaheng tse ka tlase ho lehwatata la Sahara..     Thumello ya thepa ya Afrika Borwa ka tlasa lenaneo la AGOA kenyeletsa ditholwana, matokomane, dikoloi, dikarolwana tsa dikoloi, menerale ya ho etsa tshepe, tshepe le dihlahiswa tsa dikhemikhale.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likugunyazile ukusayinwa kweSivumelwano Sokusungulwa kwe-AMA kanye nokuthunyelwa kwaso ePhalamende ukuze sigunyazwe ngokusemthethweni.

src_text: Sebaka le letsatsi la seboka seo di tla phatlalatswa ha nako ntse tsamaya..     Seboka sa Matona sa Tlhahlobo ya Lefatshe (GEO) –.
tgt_text: Lokhu kuzoqalisa ukusebenza kwesivumelwano esamukelwa ngokusemthethweni eMhlanganweni weNhlangano Yamazwe ase-Afrika ngowezi-.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tshwarelwa ha Seboka sa Matona sa GEO mane Kapa ka.
tgt_text: Isivumelwano sisungula ngokusemthethweni i-AMA eqondene nezwekazi.

src_text: GEO ke mokgatlo wa kopanelo wa mmuso neng thehwe ka selemo sa 2003 ka mora Seboka sa Matjhaba sa Ntshetsopele se neng se tshwarwe ka.
tgt_text: Le nhlangano izolawula imikhiqizo yokwelapha, futhi yenze ngcono ukuphepha nokusebenza kahle kwemikhiqizo yokwelapha kuleli zwekazi.

src_text: Lena ke lepatlelo leo dinaha tse fapafapaneng di fanang ka kabelo ya tsona molemong le mong wa ho aha tshebeletso ya GEO..     Ha jwale GEO na le ditho tsa mebuso ya dinaha tse fetang tse 113, mme tse 30 tsa tsona ke tsa mona Afrika.
tgt_text: Ukusayinwa nokugunyazwa ngokusemthethweni kwalesi sivumelwano kuzothuthukisa ukuzibophezela kweNingizimu Afrika emazweni omhlaba kanye namazwe ezwekazi ekusebenzeleni ukuqinisa ukusebenza kohlelo lokulawula lwezwekazi phezu kwemikhiqizo yayo yezempilo..     Umbiko maqondana nokuSebenza Kohlelo Lwesikhuthazo-ntela Socwaningo Nokuthuthukisa (i-R&D) – wezi-2019/20 kanye nezi-2020/.

src_text: Afrika Borwa haesale le setho se ka sehloohong ho tloha ka selemo sa 2005 mme borasaense ba rona ke karolo ya dipatlisiso tse ngata tse etswang ke GEO..     Mphalane Kgwedi ya Dipalangwang (OTM) –.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likugunyazile ukwethulwa ePhalamende koHlelo Lwesikhuthazo-ntela Socwaningo Nokuthuthukisa lweminyaka emibili edlule (owezi-2019/20 kanye nowezi-2020/21).

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho thakgolwa ha letsholo la OTM ka Moqebelo wa la 1 Mphalane 2022 tlasa lepetjo le reng: “Sishov’ingolovane: mmoho re aha moralo wa motheo wa dipalangwang ntlafatsang maphelo batho.”.
tgt_text: Lokhu kuhambisana nesigaba 11D (17) soMthetho Wezentela Yengenisomali, we-1962 (uMthetho wama-58 we-1962), odinga ukuthi le mibiko yethulwe ePhalamende.

src_text: Lenaneo la selemo la OTM ke leo ka lona ho hlokomediswang setjhaba ka bohlokwa ba dipalangwang jwalo ka karolo ya kgolo le ntshetsopele ya moruo.
tgt_text: Uhlelo lwesikhuthazo-ntela luhlose ukugqugquzela izinkampani ezizimele ukuthi zitshale izimali ku-R&D ukuze kukhuthazwe ukukhula kotshalomali.

src_text: Ho tla ba le diketsahalo tse fapafapaneng mefuteng yohle ya dipalangwang jwalo ka difofane, dikepe, dipalangwang tsa setjhaba ha mmoho le tsa mebila.
tgt_text: Luvumela ukuthuthukiswa kwezesayensi nokuqanjwa nokusungulwa kwezinto ezintsha ngenhloso yokukhulisa umnotho futhi kugqugquzelwe nokuncintisana.

src_text: Diketsahalo tsena di tla hlokomedisa ka tshireletso le polokeho dipalangweng.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liyakuthokozela ukuthi umbiko ubonisa ukuthi izinkampani ezintsha zisifakile isicelo sesikhuthazo-ntela.

src_text: Bankakarolo ba tla bontshana le ka diphephetso tse tobaneng le lekala la dipalangwang..     Mmuso ntse ikemiseditse ka taba ya ho ntlafatsa meralo ya motheo ya dipalangwang, mahaeng le ditoropong ka sepheo sa ho bebofatsa ho thothwa ha batho le thepa..     Kopano ya Matjhaba Kopaneng (UN) ya Lenaneo la ho Dudiswa ha Batho.
tgt_text: Liyazikhuthaza nezinye izinkampani ukuthi zingene kulolu hlelo njengengxenye yokukhulisa utshalomali lwazo ngokwehlukana kwazo futhi ngalokho kukhuthazwe ukukhula komnotho.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tshwarwa ha kopano ya UN-HABITAT Johannesburg ka la 16 le la 17 Mphalane.
tgt_text: Izinkampani ezine ezihamba phambili ezinkampanini esezisitholile isikhuthazo-ntela zisemkhakheni wezokulungiswa kwemikhiqizo yezolimo; owokulungiswa kwemikhiqizo yezimayini ngaphakathi kuleli lizwe ukuze kuhlomule kakhulu abantu bakuleli; owamakhemikhali, owezimonyo, owemithi yokwelapha, owemikhiqizo yobuchwepheshe besimanjemanje kanye nowezoBuchwepheshe Bolwazi okuyimikhakha egunyazwe yiKhabhinethi njengemikhakha eseqhulwini oHlelweni Lokusebenza Lwenqubomgomo Yezimboni.
Umbiko ophelele uyatholakala kuwebhusayithi yoMnyango Wezesayensi Nokuqanjwa Kwezinto Ezintsha: www.dst.gov.za..     Isithangami Somthetho Wokukhula kanye Namathuba e-Afrika (i-AGOA) – sowezi-.

src_text: Lefapha la ho Dudiswa ha Setjhaba ke lona le tla tsamaisa seboka sena sa matsatsi mabedi seo ho sona ho tla tla boradipolotiki, basebeletsi le boradipatlisiso lekaleng lena ho kenyeletsa ditho tsa bohlokwa tseo tla beng le Kemedi ya UN-HABITAT ho tswa Nairobi, Kenya.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likugunyazile ukusingathwa kweSithangami se-AGOA ngowezi-.

src_text: Taba tla ba ka sehloohong mona tla ba ho nkuwa ha mehato mabapi le dibaka tsa baipehi le ba mekhukhung..     Sephetho sa dipuisano tsena tla ba ona mokotaba tla theha Moralo wa Matjhaba tla tliswa ho Kopano ya UN-HABITAT ho tla pasiswa ka     Ditshisinyo tsa Melao.
tgt_text: I-AGOA ngumthetho owashaywa yizwe laseMelika (i-USA) ngowezi-2000 ukuhlinzeka ngokubhekelelwa kangcono nokucatshangelwa kwamazwe aseNingizimu nogwadule i-Sahara maqondana nezohwebo kanye nokufinyelela ezimakethe zangaphakathi e-USA.

src_text: Tshisinyo ya Molao wa Moifo wa Naha Shebaneng le Tlhekefetso tsa Basadi le Dipolao tsa Bona (GBVF) wa.
tgt_text: Izimpahla ezithunyelwa ngaphandle yiNingizimu Afrika ngaphansi kwe-AGOA zibandakanya izithelo ezidliwayo, amantongomane, izimoto, izingxenye zezimoto, insimbi, imikhiqizo esansimbi kanye nemikhiqizo yamakhemikhali.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tliswa ha Tshisinyo ya Molao wa 2021 wa Moifo wa Naha Shebaneng le GBVF bakeng sa ho sekasekwa.
tgt_text: Usuku nendawo okuzobanjelwa kuyo lesi sithangami kusazomenyezelwa.

src_text: Tshisinyo ena tla le moralo wa molao tla thusa ho theha komiti ya molao tla shebana le taba ya GBVF boetse dumella ho thehwa ha Boto tla tla le maano le ho kenya tshebetsong ha Leano la Moralo wa Naha shebaneng le GBVF le neng le tjhaelwe monwana ke Kabinete ka Mphalane.
tgt_text: INgqungquthela yoNgqongqoshe Yeqembu Eliqondene Nokubheka Nokuqoqa Ulwazi Ngomumo-Jikelele Womhlaba (i-GEO) – yowezi-.

src_text: Boto ena tla ba le kemedi ya persente tse 51 ho tswa setjhabeng le tse 49 ho tswa mmusong.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likugunyazile ukuthi iNingizimu Afrika isingathe iNgqungquthela yoNgqongqoshe ye-GEO eKapa ngowezi-.

src_text: Tshisinyo ena ya molao se phatlaladitswe bakeng sa maikutlo setjhaba..     Tshisinyo ya Molao Laolang Kwae le Disebediswa tsa ho Tsuba tsa Elektroniki wa.
tgt_text: I-GEO yinhlangano yohulumeni abahlukahlukene eyasungulwa ngowezi-2003 emuva kokubanjwa kweNgqungquthela Yomhlaba Yentuthuko Esimeme.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tliswa ha Tshisinyo ya Molao Laolang Kwae le Disebediswa tsa ho Tsuba tsa Elektroniki wa 2018 Palamenteng oo ka ona ho ikemiseditsweng hore kene sebakeng sa Molao Laolang Kwae wa 1993 (Molao wa bo 83 wa 1993) jwalo ka ha ntlafaditswe..     Ka tshisinyo ena ho ikemiseditswe ho tiisa melawana ya dipetlele tsa mmuso hore ikamahanye le ya Mokgatlo wa Matjhaba wa Bophelo bo Botle Laolang Kwae nngwe ya dintho tse bolelwang ke tshisinyo ena ke dibaka tseo ho sa tsubelweng ho tsona kantle le ka hara meaho; ho kwalwa ha ho rekiswa ha kwae metjhining ya ho rekisa, le hore kwae be le letshwao la tlhokomediso pakaneng ya yona..     Tshisinyo ena sekasikilwe ke bankakarolo bohle ho kenyeletsa indasteri ya kwae, mekgatlo ya setjhaba ha mmoho le mafapha amehang mmuso     Diketsahalo tse Tlang.
tgt_text: Lokhu kuyisigcawu esibandakanya ohulumeni bamazwe ahlukahlukene lapho amazwe efaka isandla ngokuzithandela kwawo ekufezekiseni inhloso eyodwa futhi efanayo yokwakha izinhlelo ze-GEO.

src_text: Kopano Tlwaelehileng ya bo 77 ya Matjhaba Kopaneng (UNGA77).
tgt_text: Njengamanje i-GEO inohulumeni bamazwe abangaphezu kwe-113, futhi abangama-30 kulaba ngohulumeni abavela emazweni ase-Afrika kanye nezinhlangano ezilinganiselwa kwi-140, futhi eziyi-11 kulezi yizinhlangano ezivela kwelase-Afrika.

src_text: Afrika Borwa nka karolo ho UNGA77 tswelang pele ntlokgolo ya Matjhaba Kopaneng mane New York City, USA ho tloha ka la 20 ho isa ho la 27 Loetse 2022 tlasa lepetjo le reng: “Nako ya bohlokwa: Tharollo ya diphetoho mathateng rarahaneng”.
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika ibilokhu iyilungu elibambe iqhaza ngenkuthalo eKomidini Lesigungu Esiphezulu kusukela ngowezi-2005 futhi njengamanje ososayensi bethu babambe iqhaza emiklamweni yocwaningo eminingana eholwa yi-GEO.

src_text: Kgahlamelo ya sewa sa Khorona (COVID-19) dinaheng tseo moruo le bodulo ba teng bo seng maemong bile kgolo ha bapiswa le ya dinaha tse setletseng mme dinaha tsena ha di tlameha ho tlohelwa di sale morao ha re tla tabeng ya kahobotjha le tsoseletso..     Pele ho Ngangisano ya Kopanong eo ya UN, Mongodi Moholo wa UN, Ntate António Guterres tla kopanya seboka se mabapi le “Diphetoho ho tsa Thuto” mme bitse le kopano ya bohlokwa ya Maano Ntshetsopele (di-SDG).
tgt_text: UNcwaba Inyanga Yezokuthutha (i-OTM) –.

src_text: Dikopano tsena tsa di-SDG ho lebeletswe hore di tle le ditsela tsa ho potlakisa ho kengwa tshebebetsong ha maano..     Letsatsi la Botjhaba.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likugunyazile ukwethulwa komkhankaso we-OTM ngoMgqibelo mhla lu-1 kuNcwaba 2022 ngaphansi kwesiqubulo esithi: “Sishov’ingolovane: ngokubambisana sakha ingqalasizinda yezokuthutha eyakha futhi isimamise izindlela zokuziphilisa”.

src_text: Mopresidente Ramaphosa tla fana ka puo ya bohlokwa moketeng wa ho keteka Letsatsi la Botjhaba la 2022 mane Union Buildings ka Moqebelo wa la 24 Loetse.
tgt_text: I-OTM yaminyaka yonke isetshenziselwa ukuqwashisa ngezokuthutha njengenye yezinto ezisemqoka kakhulu ekukhuliseni umnotho kanye nokuthuthukiswa kwezindawo zokuhlala nokuziphilisa.

src_text: Lepetjo la mokete ona ke le reng: “Re Hopola Lefa la Solomon Linda re Thabela le Mmino wa Setso sa Afrika Borwa.”.
tgt_text: Kunemicimbi eminingana ezobanjwa ngenhloso yokubonisa izinto ezisemqoka ezihlukahlukene zengqalasizinda yezokuthutha emkhakheni wezokuthutha ngezindiza, ngemikhumbi, owezokuthuthwa komphakathi kanye nemigwaqo.

src_text: Selemong sena Kgwedi ena ya Botjhaba tla tsepamisa maikutlo mminong wa setso sa Afrika Borwa haholoholo wa Isicathamiya ha mmoho le kabelo ya ona dipapading, tsa bonono, tsa setso le botjhaba.
tgt_text: Imicimbi izoqwashisa futhi nangokuphepha nokuvikeleka emgwaqeni.

src_text: Ka lepetjo lena ho ikemiseditswe ho keteka dilemo tse 60 sebini le moqapi wa dipina Solomon Popoli Linda (1909-1962) hlokahetse mme boela tsebisahale ka la Solomon Ntsele, eo leng moqapi wa pina ya, “Mbube”.
tgt_text: Kuzobanjwa futhi nezingxoxo zokubonisana nababambiqhaza ukuze kubhungwe ngezinselele ezihlukahlukene ezikhona emkhakheni wezokuthutha.

src_text: Mokete wa Matjhaba wa 2022 wa Letsatsi la Ditaba tsa Mawatle.
tgt_text: Uhulumeni usalokhu ezibophezele ekwenzeni ngcono ingqalasizinda yezokuthutha, ezindaweni zasemakhaya ngokunjalo futhi nasezindaweni ezisemadolobheni, ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukuthuthwa kwezimpahla nabantu ngendlela efanele..     UMhlangano weNhlangano Yezizwe (i-UN) woHlelo Lokuhlaliswa Kwabantu (i-UN-HABITAT).

src_text: Afrika Borwa tla keteka Mokete wa Matjhaba wa 2022 wa Letsatsi la Ditaba tsa Mawatle mane Thekong ho tloha ka la 12 ho isa ka la 14 Mphalane.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likugunyazile ukusingathwa komhlangano wamalungu e-UN-HABITAT eGoli mhla ziyi-16 kanye nomhla ziyi-17 kuMfumfu.

src_text: Mokete ona tla tshwarwa nakong ya OTM moo ka lona ho tlang ho etswa tlhokomediso ka dikepe jwalo ka lekala la dipalangwang.
Moketeng ona ho tla ba teng le kemedi ho tswa dinaheng tse fapafapaneng ho tla iponela tsa indasteri ya dikepe ya Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: UMnyango Wezokuhlaliswa Kwabantu yiwona ozohlela futhi ulawule lo mhlangano wezinsuku ezimbili ozokwethanyelwa yizingqwele zezepolitiki, ongoti abangabasebenzi bomkhakha kanye nabacwaningi, kubandakanya namalungu asemqoka eKomidi Lamanxusa le-UN-HABITAT elizinze e-Nairobi, kwelase-Kenya.

src_text: Afrika Borwa haesale le setho sa Mokgatlo wa Matjhaba wa Dikepe ho tloha ka selemo sa.
tgt_text: Izindaba ezisemqoka okuzobhungwa ngazo zibandakanya ukuzama ukuthola izinhlelo zokungenelela ezizoletha uguquko ezindaweni zokuhlaliswa kwabantu nezindawo eziyimijondolo.

src_text: Mokgatlo ona ke lekala le laolang tshebetso ya dikepe ho Matjhaba Kopaneng..     Kgwedi ya Bohahlaudi.
tgt_text: Imiphumela yalezi zingxoxo izoholela ekwethulweni koHlaka Lohlelo Lokusebenza Lomhlaba Wonke, oluzokwethulwa eMhlanganweni Wesigungu se-UN-HABITAT ngowezi-2023 ukuze lugunyazwe ngokusemthethweni     Imithethosivivinywa.

src_text: Letsatsi la Matjhaba la Bohahlaudi (27 Loetse) Kgweding ena ya Bohahlaudi re tlo le keteka ka lepetjo le reng, “Re Nahana Botjha ka Bohahlaudi”.
tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa Womkhandlu Kazwelonke Wezodlame Olweyamene Nobulili kanye Nokubulawa Kwabantu Besifazane (i-GBVF) wezi-.

src_text: Tsa bohahlaudi kwano lapeng di bohlokwa bakeng sa kahobotjha ya lekala lena la bohahlaudi le karolo kgolo ya Lekeno la Afrika Borwa ha mmoho le ho thehwa ha mesebetsi..     Kabinete thabetse ho ntlafala ha lekala la kamohelo ya baeti le ntlafetseng ka mora sewa sa COVID-.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likugunyazile ukwethulwa ePhalamende koMthethosivivinywa woMkhandlu Kazwelonke we-GBVF wezi-2021 ukuze ucutshungulwe.

src_text: Halofong ya pele ya 2022, ho bile le maeto lehae dimilione di.
tgt_text: Lo Mthethosivivinywa uhlinzeka ngohlaka lomthetho lokusungulwa kwenhlangano eyakhiwe ngokomthetho wePhalamende ezogxila ngokuphelele ekubhekaneni ne-GBVF.

src_text: 2 leng keketseho ya persente tse 114 ha ho bapiswa le nako tshwanang selemong sa.
tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa uhlinzekela futhi nokusungulwa kweBhodi loMkhandlu elizohlinzeka ngobuholi obukhethekile obunobuqhinga futhi lengamele ukuqaliswa koHlelo Lobuqhinga Lukazwelonke oluqondene ne-GBVF, olwagunyazwa yiKhabhinethi ngoMfumfu 2020 ukuze luqaliswe.

src_text: Sena se bontsha keketseho leha ho bapiswa le nako tshwanang ka selemo sa 2019 moo ho bileng le maeto lehae dimilione di.
tgt_text: Ibhodi lizoba nabameleli abangama-51% abavela ezinhlanganweni zomphakathi wonkana bese futhi kuba nabangama-49% abavela kuhulumeni.

src_text: Jwalo ka karolo ya ho keteka Kgwedi ya Bohlaudi, Kabinete kgothaletsa Maafrika Borwa hore etele diprofensi tsa bona ka ho fapana..     Kabinete amohetse qeto ya Bofofise ba Belgium ba ho ba le difofane tse tlang Afrika Borwa ka ho otloloha ho qalang kgweding ena (Loetse) leng se tla matlafatsa lekala lena le ho netefatsa taba ya hore Afrika Borwa ke sebaka se setle sa bohahlaudi.
tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa usudlulile kakade esigabeni sokufakana imilomo nomphakathi..     UMthethosivivinywa Wokulawulwa Kwemikhiqizo Kagwayi kanye Nogwayi Obhenywa Ngamadivayisi Obuchwepheshe Besimanjemanje wezi-.

src_text: Sena se tla kenyeletsa difofane tse tla ya Kapa le Johannesburg jwalo ka beke     Melaetsa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likugunyazile ukwethulwa ePhalamende koMthethosivivinywa Wokulawulwa Kwemikhiqizo Kagwayi kanye Nogwayi Obhenywa Ngamadivayisi Obuchwepheshe Besimanjemanje wezi-2018, ohlose ukuqeda ukusebenza komthetho okhona njengamanje uMthetho Wokulawulwa Kwemikhiqizo Kagwayi, we-1993 (uMthetho wama-83 we-1993), njengoba uchitshiyeliwe.

src_text: Diteboho    Kabinete lebisa diteboho le ditakaletso tse ntle ho: Mopresidente William Samoei Ruto wa Kenya, ya neng behwa semmuso ka Labobedi la la 13 Loetse 2022, ho latela dikgetho tse se nang morusu tse neng di tshwerwe ka la 9 Phato.
tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa uhlose futhi ukuqinisa izinyathelo zezwe zokubhekelela impilo yomphakathi futhi zihanjelaniswe neSivumelwano Sohlaka lweNhlangano Yezempilo Emhlabeni esiqondene noKulawulwa Kukagwayi.

src_text: Motlatsi wa Mopresidente, Ntate David Mabuza ne le teng moketeng oo ho emela Mopresidente Ramaphosa, mmuso le setjhaba sa Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa uphakamisa, phakathi kokunye, ukuthi kungavunyelwa nakancane ukubhenywa kukagwayi ezindaweni ezingaphakathi kwezakhiwo kanye nasezindaweni ezithile ezingaphandle kwezakhiwo; ukunqatshelwa kokudayiswa kukasikilidi kusetshenziswa imishini ethengisa ugwayi, futhi uqinisa ukuqashelwa kwendlela opakishwa ngayo usikilidi kanye nokufakwa kwezimpawu ezixwayisayo.

src_text: Mokgatlo wa Afrika Borwa wa Rabi ha mmoho le Toropo ya Kapa ka ho tshwara ka katleho Mohope wa Lefatshe wa borobedi wa Rugby Sevens ho tloha ka la 9 ho isa ka la 11 Loetse ne le lekgetlo la pele tonamente ena tshwarelwa Afrika, mme seo se bontsha hantle hore Afrika Borwa tumme hantle ka kamohelo ya baeti..     Matshediso     Kabinete fetisetsa matshediso yona ho malapa le metswalle ya:  Bana ba sekolo ba 18 le batho ba baholo ba babedi ba ileng ba hlokahala kotsing nyarosang ka Labohlano la la 16 Loetse mane Phongola, KwaZulu-Natal ka mora hore lori thulane le vene tsamaisang bana ba sekolo     Kgiro.
tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa usudlulile ezigabeni zokubonisana okunzulu nababambiqhaza abahlukahlukene, kubandakanya imboni kagwayi, izinhlangano zomphakathi wonkana kanye neminyango kahulumeni efanele     Imicimbi Ezayo.

src_text: Pele batho bohle ba hirwa, ho tla hlahlobisiswa mangolo bona thuto le mang hlokahalang     Ntate Makgothi Samuel Thobakgale jwalo ka Molaodi Kakaretso (DG): Mokomeshenara wa Naha wa Lefapha la Tlhabollo ya Batshwaruwa     Ngaka Malixole Percival Mahlati Motlatsi wa Molaodi Kakaretso DDG: Ya Karolong sebetsang ka Dipetlele le Thuto Phahameng ho tsa Bophelo bo Botle le Ntshetsopele ya Ditaba tsa Basebetsi Lefapheng la tsa Bophelo     Ntate Siyabonga Blessing Mdubeki jwalo ka Moabi wa Lefatshe ya ka Sehloohong Lefapheng la tsa Temo, Ntlafatso ya tsa Mobu le ho Ntlafatswa ha Dibaka tsa Mahaeng     Ntate Phaswa Phineas Mamogale Motsamaisi ya ka Sehloohong wa Ditjhelete Lefapheng la tsa Bophelo..     Kabinete dumellana le ho hirwa ha batho ba latelang     Ntate Tshediso Matona jwalo ka Mokomeshenara wa Komeshene ya Tshehetso ya ba Batsho Moruong (BBBEE)     Ditho tsa Boto ya Maipiletso ya Difilimi le Diphatlalatso: Ntate Siyazi Tyamtyam (Modulasetulo); Mme Sohani Natasha Chundhur;Mme Sisanda Nkoala;Mme Shandukani Mulaudzi;Mme Nomaswazi Rachel Shabangu-Mndawe;Ngaka Litheko Modisane;Mme Phuti Nehemia Phukubje;Mme James Shikwambana; leMme Manko Thalitha Bufffel kgethilwe hape).
tgt_text: Isigcawu sama-77 SesiGungu-Jikelele se-UN (i-UNGA77).

src_text: Paballo ya Metsi.
tgt_text: Ukuvikelwa kokutholakala kwamanzi.

src_text: Kabinete leboha Maafrika Borwa ka ho ikobela dipehelo mabapi le ho fokotswa ha phepelo ya metsi dikarolong tse itseng tsa Johannesburg, Tshwane le Ekurhuleni ka boiteko ba ho imolla mehlodi ya rona.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi libonge abantu baseNingizimu Afrika ngokuthobela kwabo imikhawulo yokusetshenziswa kwamanzi ebekiwe ezingxenyeni ezithile zedolobha laseGoli, e-Tshwane kanye nase-Ekurhuleni ngenhloso yokuletha uzinzo emandleni ezigcinamanzi.

src_text: Mehlodi le matamo rona tlasa kgatello kgolo ka lebaka la maemo motjheso phahameng Gauteng leng se qobelletseng ba ha Rand Water ho fokotsa phepelo ya bona ya metsi ho bommasepala bana.
tgt_text: Amadamu kanye nezigcinamanzi kusalokhu kungaphansi kwengcindezi ngenxa yamazingakushisa aphakeme e-Gauteng, futhi isidingo esikhulayo samanzi sesiphoqe inkampani yakwa-Rand Water ukuba inciphise kakhulu ukuphakelwa kwamanzi komasipala.

src_text: Khamphane ena ya metsi fepela batho ba fetang dimilione tse 11 Gauteng le karolong tse ding tsa Mpumalanga, Foreisitata le Leboya Bophirima..   Ho fokotswa hona ha phepelo ka hona ho ikemiseditswe ho leka ho baballa metsi ho fihlela maemo ntlafala.
tgt_text: Le nkampani yamanzi iphakela ngamanzi okuphuza ahlanzekile kubantu abangaphezu kwezigidi eziyi-11 e-Gauteng, nasezingxenyeni ezithile zesifundazwe saseMpumalanga, eFreyistata kanye naseNyakatho Ntshonalanga.

src_text: Kabinete ipiletsa ho setjhaba hore se tswele pele ho ikobela dipehelo tsa ho fokotswa hona ha phepelo ya metsi ka hore se sebedise ka nepo..   Seteraeke sa ha Transnet.
tgt_text: Le mikhawulo engenakugwemeka ihlose ukuvikela ukuphakelwa kwamanzi futhi izoqhubeka isebenze kuze kufike isikhathi lapho sesingcono isimo.

src_text: Kabinete amohetse tumellano ya nyollelo ya meputso ya dilemo tse tharo fihletsweng ke mokgatlo wa basebetsi wa United National Transport Union (UNTU), le Transnet tla qala morao ho tloha ka la 1 Mmesa 2022 ho fihlela ka la 31 Tlhakubele.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi linxuse umphakathi ukuba uqhubeke nokuthobela imikhawulo ebekiwe yokusetshenziswa kwamanzi futhi udlale indima yawo ekusebenziseni le nsiza eyingcosana ngokuyonga.

src_text: Komeshene ya Tharollo ya Ditaba tsa Basebetsi (CCMA) ke yona neng laola dipuisano tsena mme sena se tlisitse mohwanto ona wa ditho tsa UNTU pheletsong hanghang.
tgt_text: Isiteleka sakwa-Transnet.

src_text: Kabinete boetse ya amohela kgoeletso ya mokgatlo wa basebetsi wa South African Transport and Allied Workers Union wa ho fedisa seteraeke sa bona..   Kabinete amohela hape boinehelo ba Transnet ba ho shebana le mosebetsi wa ho leka ho fokotsa mosebetsi saletseng morao boemakepeng le ditereneng tse tsamaisang thepa bakilweng ke seteraeke sena leng se ammeng moruo wa naha le bohle ba tshepetseng tshebeletsong ya Transnet..   Kabinete leboha tshehetso le tshebedisano mmoho bontshitsweng ke dikgwebo nakong ena ya seteraeke.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lisamukele ngezandla ezimhlophe isivumelwano samaholo seminyaka emithathu okufinyelelwe kusona phakathi kwenkampani yakwa-Transnet nenyunyana yabasebenzi i-United National Transport Union (i-UNTU), esizosebenza esikhathini esisukela mhla lu-1 kuNhlaba 2022 kuze kube ngumhla zingama-31 kuNdasa.

src_text: Kabinete kgothaletsa taba ya hore dikamano tsena di tswele pele pakeng tsa Transnete le mekgatlo ya basebetsi molemong wa khamphane le moruo wa naha..   Dikamano tsa Afrika Borwa le naha ya Saudi Arabia.
tgt_text: IKhomishana Yokubuyisana, Ukuxazulula Nokwahlulela iyona ebilawula izingxoxo eziholele kulesi sivumelwano esiqede ngokushesha isiteleka samanje samalungu e-UNTU.

src_text: Kabinete amohetse ketelo bileng le katleho ya Mopresidente Cyril Ramaphosa naheng ya Saudi Arabia ka la 15 le la 16 Mphalane.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lisamukelile futhi nesinqumo senyunyana i-South African Transport and Allied Workers Union (i-SATAWU) sokuqeda isiteleka.

src_text: Ketelong ena dinaha tsena tse pedi di ile tsa saena ditumellano tse 17 makaleng mangata kenyeletsang la temo, botshwasi ba dihlapi, la merafo, ho fehlwa ha motlakase ka tsela ya tlhaho, tsa tshireletso, dipalangwang le la tlhahiso ya dimela le diphoofolo tsa lewatleng.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lisamukelile isibophezelo se-Transnet sokugxila ekuqedeni ukusalela emuva komsebenzi okwenzeke ohlelweni lonkana lokuthuthwa kwempahla emachwebeni ngemikhumbi kanye nezitimela ngenkathi kuqhubeka isiteleka, okuyinto ebe nomthelela omubi kakhulu emnothweni nasemikhakheni ethembele ezinsizakalweni zalolu hlelo..   IKhabhinethi lizwakalise ukubonga kwalo ukwesekwa nokubambisana okuboniswe ngabamabhizinisi ngenkathi kuqhubeka isiteleka.

src_text: Ho boetswe ha saenwa le ditumellano tsa ho thehwa ha Moifo wa tsa Kgwebo le tshebedisano ho tsa sesole le theko ya thepa ya mmuso ha mmoho le tsa tlhahlobo ya maemo lefatshe..   Mopresidente sebedisitse monyetla ona ho mema ba tsa kgwebo Saudi Arabia ho tla sebokeng sa bohlano sa matsete sa Afrika Borwa se tla ba isao ka.
tgt_text: Likhuthaza ukuthi kube nobudlelwano obuhle obuqhubekayo phakathi kwabaphathi be-Transnet nabasebenzi ukuze kuhlomule inkampani kanye nomnotho wezwe.

src_text: Saudi Arabia ke naha ya bobedi ka boholo hwebelanang le Afrika Borwa dinaheng tsa Botjhabela ba Bohareng mme hape ke naha eo ho yona ho rekwang thepa ngata tikolohong ena.
tgt_text: Ubudlelwano phakathi kweNingizimu Afrika ne-Saudi Arabia.

src_text: Dikamano tsa dinaha tsena di tlisitse tshebedisano ntle ho tsa kgwebo le matsete..   Matsete Meralo ya Motheo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lilwamukele uhambo lokuvakasha ngokomsebenzi lukaMongameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa lapho ebevakashele ezweni lase-Saudi Arabia mhla ziyi-15 nomhla ziyi-16 kuMfumfu.

src_text: Kabinete amohela taba ya ho simollwa ha sitsi sa tlhahiso sa dihlahiswa tsa polasitiki sa maemo pele mane Lanseria Gauteng ke khamphane ya matjhaba ya ALPLA Group.
tgt_text: Ngenkathi kuqhubeka lolu hambo, lawa mazwe amabili asayine iZivumelwano Zokusebenzisana (ama-MoU) ayi-17 emikhakheni ehlukahlukene, njengezolimo, ezokudoba, ezezimayini, ezamandla kagesi ovuselelekayo, ezokuvikeleka, ezokuthutha kanye nomkhakha wemboni yezitshalo nezilwanyana zasemanzini.

src_text: Sena se paka boinehelo ba Mopresidente Ramaphosa ba ho ntshetsa meralo ya motheo pele jwalo ka mokgwa wa ho nyolla moruo le menyetla ya mosebetsi..   Sena ke projeke ya matsete bitsang tjhelete dimilione di 50 tsa ditollara tsa Amerika mme ke karolo ya projeke ya moralo wa Toropo sebedisang Marangrang ya Lanseria.
tgt_text: Amanye ama-MoU asayiniwe aphathelene nokusungulwa koMkhandlu Wokusebenza Ngokuhlanganyela Kwezebhizinisi, ubambiswano emkhakheni wezimboni zezempi nokuthengwa kwemikhiqizo nezinsizakalo ezihlobene nalokhu kanye nesivumelwano sokubambisana kwizingcwaningo zomkhakha wezomumomhlaba, ezejiyoloji.

src_text: Projeke ena tla hlahisa botsitso moruong thehe le mesebetsi ka bang.
tgt_text: UMongameli usebenzise lolu hambo ukumema amabhizinisi ase-Saudi Arabia ukuba eze kuleli azokwethamela ingqungquthela yotshalomali yaseNingizimu Afrika yesihlanu ezobanjwa ngowezi-.

src_text: Projeke ena kenyeletsa le mananeo 36 thupello ya boratekginiki ho tsa motlakase le ho lokiswa ha metjhini mmoho le ho tsoselletswa botjha ha dintho tse lahlilweng.
tgt_text: I-Saudi Arabia iyizwe lesibili ngobukhulu emazweni ahwebelana neNingizimu Afrika esifundeni esiseMpumalanga Emaphakathi futhi ingumthombo omkhulu kunayo yonke eminye wezimpahla ezingena kuleli ezivela kulesiya sifunda.

src_text: Ba rupelletsweng lenaneong lena ba tla sebetsa ho ALPLA Group dinaheng tsohle tse Afrika ka borwa.
tgt_text: Ubudlelwano phakathi kwamazwe womabili sebuholele ekutheni kube nomthelela omuhle kwezohwebo nasekutshalweni kwezimali.

src_text: Lenaneo lena la thupello le tla qala ka 2023 mme ba 12 ba pele ho tla rupellwa ba tla kgethwa hona mona setjhabeng..   Ho Rashwa Ntle le Molao.
tgt_text: Ukutshalomali lwengqalasizinda.

src_text: Ho rashwa ntle le molao ho lematsa setjhaba le moruo wa rona.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likwamukelile ukugunyazwa komsebenzi wokwakhiwa kwefemu kanokusho yesimanjemanje ezokhiqiza imikhiqizo kapulastikhi yinkampani yamazwe ngamazwe engumkhiqizi ohamba phambili i-ALPLA Group, e-Lanseria e-Gauteng.

src_text: Sena se tlisa tahlehelo ya lekeno mmusong le lekaleng la merafo..   Kabinete thabetse ho hatjwa ha dithunya le ho tshwarwa ha babelaellwa ba 20 ba belaellwang ketsong tsena tsa ho rafa ntle le molao mane Stillfontein Leboya Bophirima..   Kabinete etsa boipiletso ho mekgatlo qobellang melao ho netefatsa hore matsholo bona a atleha.
tgt_text: Lokhu kwengeza phezu kwesibophezelo sikaMongameli u-Ramaphosa sokusebenzisa ukuthuthukiswa kwengqalasizinda njengendlela yokufukula umnotho kanye nokukhulisa amathuba omsebenzi..   Lolu tshalomali olubalelwa ezigidini ezingama-50 zamadola aseMelika luwutshalomali olusemqoka kakhulu olufakwa kuhlelongqangi lokwakhiwa kwedolobha likanokusho lesimanjemanje i-Lanseria Smart City oluzoqhuba futhi lukhuthaze ukusimama kanye nokusetshenziswa kwemikhiqizo kabusha futhi ngokunjalo ludale futhi lusekele ngokuqhubekayo amathuba omsebenzi angama-.

src_text: Sena se tla romela molaetsa pakang hore tlolo tsa molao ha di na molemo, dinokwane di tshwarwa di kwallwe ntle le tshabo..   Motlakase.
tgt_text: Okubandakanyiwe kulokhu wuhlelo lokuqeqeshelwa emsebenzini lonjiniyela bemishini yobuchwepheshe besimanjemanje kanye nochwepheshe bezokusetshenziswa kwemikhiqizo kabusha abangama-36 abazosebenza ezinkampanini ze-ALPLA Group esifundeni esiseningizimu ne-Afrika sonkana.

src_text: Eskom sa tswa saena tumellano ya dilemo tse 30 le bahlahisi ba ikemetseng ba tla fehla motlakase seteisheneng sa Majuba le sa Tutuka mane Mpumalanga.
tgt_text: Uhlelo lokuqeqeshelwa emsebenzini luzoqala ngowezi-2023, lapho kuzoqeqeshwa khona abantu baseNingizimu Afrika abafundela umsebenzi bokuqala abayi-12 abavela emiphakathini yendawo.

src_text: Kgiro ya lefatshe leo ho tlo ahwa diteishene tsena ho lona le tla tlisa matsete ballwang ho dibilione tse 40 tsa diranta..   Dikhamphane tse nne tse tla fehla motlakase ona ke – HDF Energy South Africa, Red Rocket SA, Sola Group le Mainstream Renewable Power Developments South Africa – mme di tla eketsa motlakase wa 2 000 megawatts phepelong ya naha.
tgt_text: Ukumbiwa kwezimbiwa okungekho emthethweni.

src_text: Motlakase ona tla hokelwa phepelong ya naha dikgweding tse 24 ho isa ho tse 36 ka mora ho phethelwa ha ditlhoko tse hlokahalang tsa ditjhelete mmoho le ditumello tse mabapi le tshebediso ya mobu..   Paballo ya Tlhahiso ya Dijo.
tgt_text: Ukumbiwa kwezimbiwa okungekho emthethweni kulimaza imiphakathi kanye nomnotho wethu, futhi kuholela ekulahlekeni kwengenisomali kuhulumeni ngokunjalo futhi nasemkhakheni wezimayini..   IKhabhinethi likwamukelile ukushaqwa kwenqwaba yezibhamu ebezifihliwe kanye nokuboshwa kwabasolwa abangama-20 abeyamaniswa nokumbiwa kwezimbiwa okungekho emthethweni ngenkathi kubanjwe umkhankaso ongukhukhulelangoqo emgodini wemayini e-Stilfontein eNyakatho Ntshonalanga.

src_text: Kabinete amohela ho tshwarwa ha seboka sa Agri SA sa 2022 mane Tshwane ka la 13 le 14 Mphalane 2022 tlasa lepetjo le reng: “Re Hlahisa tsa Lehae”.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liyabanxusa abantu baseNingizimu Afrika ukuba baqhubeke nokusebenzisana nabomthetho ukuqinisekisa ukuphumelela kwemikhankaso yokulwisana nobugebengu esikhathini esizayo.

src_text: Sebokeng sena ho sekasekilwe taba tse kenyeletsang moralo bakeng sa tlhahiso ya lehae, meralo ya motheo bakeng sa bahlahisi ba lehae; ho etsa tikoloho ya rona dumelle tlhahiso ya dijo bakeng sa nako tlang ha mmoho le ho thusa bahlahisi ba lehae tshebetsong ya bona ya ho hlahisa dijo kwano..   Bakeng sa paballo ya nako tlang ya tlhahiso ya dijo, Kabinete amohetse ho thehwa ha Sitsi sa Naha sa Thibelo ya Ditshwaetso tse amang Leruo le Dijalo.
tgt_text: Lokhu kuzothumela umyalezo oqinile wokuthi ubugebengu abukhokheli, nokuthi izigebengu zizoboshwa futhi zishushiwe ngaphandle kovalo nokwenzelela..   Amandla kagesi.

src_text: Sena se etswa ke Lekala la Mahlale tsa Temo Lefapheng la Saense le Mahlale ka kopanelo le Yunivesithi ya Tshwane.
tgt_text: Inkampani yakwa-Eskom isanda kusayina izivumelwano zokuqasha zeminyaka engama-30 nabatshalizimali abane abangabakhiqizi bamandla kagesi abazimele, ukuze kwakhiwe isikhungo esisha esizoba namandla okukhiqiza amandla kagesi ohlanzekile eziteshini eziphehla ugesi iMajuba kanye neTutuka esifundazweni saseMpumalanga.

src_text: Sitsi sena se tla thusa thibelong le ho fokotseng ditshwaetso tsa dijalo le diphoofolo leng se tla tshehetsa tlhahiso ya dijo le ntshetsopele ya dibaka tsa mahaeng   Diqeto tsa Kabinete.
tgt_text: Lezi zivumelwano zokuqashwa komhlaba zizoheha utshalomali olulinganiselwa ezigidigidini ezingama-40 zamarandi.

src_text: Ho Lokiswa ha Tokomane ya Mokgatlo wa Dinaha tsa Afrika.
tgt_text: Laba batshalizimali abane – okuyi-HDF Energy South Africa, i-Red Rocket SA, i-Sola Group kanye ne-Mainstream Renewable Power Developments South Africa – bazofaka okungenani ugesi ongamamegawathi ayizi-2 000 esikhungweni sikagesi sikazwelonke.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tliswa Palamenteng ha Tokomane ya Mokgatlo wa Dinaha tsa Afrika bakeng sa Dipehelo, Keketso ya Matla Tshebetso, Taolo ya Bommasepala le Ntshetso pele ya bona ho tla tla lokiswa.
tgt_text: Lezi zikhungo ezintsha zokukhiqiza ugesi kulindeleke ukuthi zixhunywe kwisikhungo sikagesi sikazwelonke ezinyangeni ezingama-24 kuya kwezingama-36 kusukela esikhathini okuphothulwe ngaso imidanti nemicikilisho yezivumelwano eziphathelene nezimali zokuxhaswa komklamo, futhi uma sekutholakale izimvume eziphathelene nezemvelo, ukuklanywa komhlaba kanye nezinye izimvume zokulawula.

src_text: Afrika Borwa ne saene Tokomane ena ka Phato.
tgt_text: Ukutholakala kokudla okwanele.
IKhabhinethi likwamukelile ukusingathwa kweNgqungquthela ye-Agri SA yowezi-2022 ePitoli mhla ziyi-13 nango mhla ziyi-14 kuMfumfu 2022 ngaphansi kwesiqubulo esithi: “Ukulinywa Kokudla Endaweni”.

src_text: Tokomane ena ya Keketso ya Matla Tshebetso fana ka moralo dinaheng tsohle tseo leng ditho mabapi le taba ya keketso ya tsela tsa tshebetso ho tloha boemong ba naha ho isa maemong ohle mmuso.
tgt_text: Ingqungquthela ibhunge ngezindaba ezinjengokwakhiwa kwezinhlelongqangi zezolimo ezenzelwe abalimi bendawo; ingqalasizinda esimeme yokudla okulinywe endaweni; ukwenza isimo semvelo sendawo esisimeme esikulungele ukukhiqizwa kokudla endaweni kuya phambili esikhathini esizayo, kanye nokuqiniswa kwamandla abakhiqizi bokudla okulungisa imikhiqizo elinywe endaweni.

src_text: Tokomane ena shebane haholo le temana ya katoloso ya matla tshebetso maemong bommasepala le ntshetsopele ya bona..   Kopano ya Matjhaba ya bo 32 ya Selemo le Selemo ya Polokeho Ditereneng (IRSC).
tgt_text: Ngenhloso yokuqhubeka nokubeka eqhulwini ukutholakala kokudla okwanele, iKhabhinethi likwamukelile futhi nokwethulwa kwesizinda sikazwelonke sokuvinjelwa kwamagciwane abanga izifo ezithathelwanayo, i-National Biosecurity Hub, esingaphansi kohlelo i-Agricultural Bio-economy Innovation Partnership Programme, okuwuhlelo loMnyango Wezolimo Nokuqanjwa Kwezinto Ezintsha oluqhuba ngokubambisana neNyuvesi yasePitoli.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tshwarelwa ha kopano ya bo 32 ya Selemo le Selemo ya IRSC Johannesburg ho tloha ka la 1 ho isa ka la 6 Mphalane 2023, tlasa lepetjo le reng: “Re lokisa diterene tsa rona Maemong sa Lokang”.
tgt_text: Lesi sizinda sizokweseka ukuvinjelwa, ukuncishiswa kanye nokulawulwa kwezifo zezitshalo nezilwane, okuyinto ezolekelela ekukhuliseni imikhiqizo, ukutholakala kokudla kanye nentuthuko esimeme ezindaweni zasemakhaya   Izinqumo zeKhabhinethi.

src_text: IRSC ke foramo ya matjhaba kopanyang ditsebi ho tsa polokeho ho tsa diterene boemong ba matjhaba ho tla hlabana malotsana ka tsa ntlafatso ya polokeho ditereneng..   Mokgatlo wa Afrika Borwa wa tsa Polokeho ho tsa Diterene ne qetele ho tshwara kopano ena ka selemo sa.
tgt_text: Ukugunyazwa ngokusemthethweni koMqulu weNhlangano Yamazwe ase-Afrika (i-AU) Wokudluliswa Nokwabiwa Kwamagunya Okulawula.

IKhabhinethi likugunyazile ukwethulwa ePhalamende koMqulu we-AU Wamagugu Nemigomo Yokudluliswa Nokwabiwa Kwamagunya Okulawula, Ukuphathwa kanye Nokuthuthukiswa Kwezindawo ukuze ugunyazwe ngokusemthethweni.

src_text: Mokgahlelo wa Bobedi wa Moralo wa Naha wa Selemo sa 2050 wa Meralo ya Motheo (NIP 2050).
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika yawusayina ngoNcwaba 2021 umqulu.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho hatiswa ha mokgahlelo wa bobedi wa moralo wa NIP 2050 bukeng ya diphatlalatso tsa mmuso bakeng sa maikutlo setjhaba.
tgt_text: UMqulu Wokudluliwa Nokwabiwa Kwamagunya Okulawula uhlinzeka ngohlaka kuyo yonke imibuso engamalungu olungumbhalo ongumhlahlandlela maqondana nokudluliswa nokwabiwa kwamandla kanye nemisebenzi kusuka kuhulumeni kazwelonke kudluliselwa kweminye imikhakha nezinhlaka zikahulumeni.

src_text: Moralo ona fana ka tataiso tabeng ya maano tshebetso le diprojeke tsa mmuso..   Moralo ona hlwaya ditshebetso tsa diprojeke lekaleng la ho dudiswa ha setjhaba, ditshebeletso tsa bommasepala tse kenyeletsang motlakase; metsi; ho thothwa ha matlakala; dipalangwang tsa setjhaba; meralo ya motheo ya tsa thuto, bophelo le dijithale le thibelo ya bobodu le bonokwane..   Moralo ona bontsha moo ho hlokahalang ho tsepamiswa maikutlo teng, le ho lekola maemo teng renang ha jwale le se tlamehang ho etswa bakeng sa ho fihlela tjhebelo pele ya moralo ona.
tgt_text: Umqulu ubhekene ikakhulukazi nokudluliswa nokwabiwa kwamagunya nemisebenzi, uhlaka lokuphatha kanye nokuthuthukiswa kwezindawo.

src_text: Moralo ona eletsa hore tshebetso ya moralo ona be ya nako ya dilemo tse tharo.
tgt_text: Umhlangano Wama-32 Waminyaka Yonke Womkhandlu Wamazwe Ngamazwe Wezokuphepha Kwezokuthutha Ngezitimela (i-IRSC).

src_text: Moralo wa Naha wa Ntlafatso ya Tsela ya Tshebetso ya Ditshebeletso tsa Mmuso.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likugunyazile ukusingathwa koMhlangano Wama-32 Waminyaka Yonke we-IRSC eGoli kusukela mhla lu-1 kuya kumhla ziyisi-6 kuMfumfu 2023 ngaphansi kwesiqubulo esithi: “Sibumba kabusha ezokuthutha ngezitimela emhlabeni ongenakho ukuqiniseka”.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho kengwa tshebetsong ha Moralo wa Naha wa Ntlafatso ya Tsela ya Tshebetso ya Ditshebeletso tsa Mmuso.
tgt_text: I-IRSC iyisithangami samazwe ngamazwe esiqoqela ndawonye ongoti bezokuphepha kwezokuthutha ngezitimela abaqhamuka kuwo wonke amagumbi amane omhlaba ukuze bazocobelelana ngolwazi mayelana nezimo abadlule kuzona kanye nalezo abahlangabezana nazo emsebenzini wabo wansuku zonke, ngenhloso yokwenza ngcono ukuphepha kwezokuthutha ngezitimela.

src_text: Moralo ona ne phatlalatswe ka selemo sa 2021 bakeng sa maikutlo setjhaba..  Moralo ona fana ka ditshiya tse hlano mabapi le ho ntlafatsa Mokgwa wa Tshebetso wa Ditshebeletso tsa Mmuso.
tgt_text: Njengelungu le-IRSC, uMlawuli Wezokuphepha Kwezokuthutha Ngezitimela waseNingizimu Afrika wayegcine ngowezi-2015 ukusingatha lesi sithangami.

src_text: Ditshiya tsena di kenyeletsa tsela ya kamohelo ya ba sa tswa hirwa Ditshebeletsong tsa Mmuso; tataiso ya mosebetsi ho ba sa tswa hirwa; meralo le ho behwa leihlo ha tsela eo basebeletsi ba sebetsang ka yona; thupello tswellang ha mmoho le menyetla ya ntlafatso ya maemo thuto..   Diphetoho dipehelong tsa kgiro ya Balaodi Kakaretso (bo DG).
tgt_text: Uhlaka Lohlelo Lukazwelonke Lwengqalasizinda lowezi-2050 (i-NIP 2050) Isigaba sesi-.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana tlaleho sisinyang dipehelo le boiphihlelo boo ba hirwang jwalo ka Balaodi Kakaretso Mafapheng Mmuso ba tlamehang ho ba le bona.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likugunyazile ukushicilelwa kuSomqulu kahulumeni kohlaka lwe-NIP 2050 Isigaba sesi-2 ukuze kuboniswane nomphakathi ngalo.

src_text: Tlaleho ena tla le ditshisinyo tse ngata tse kenyeletsang nako ya kgiro ya bo DG le tsela eo ba maemong hodimo taolo ba abang ka teng mosebetsi ho basebeletsi ba tsa ditjhelete nngwe ya ditshisinyo ke ya hore DG ofising ya Mopresidente boele be yena Hlooho ya Ditshebeletso tsa Setjhaba.
tgt_text: Lolu hlaka luhlinzeka ngesiqondiso ekuqiniseni nokwengeza emiklamweni edidiyelwe yamasu akhethekile kahulumeni..   Luhlonza imiklamo ekhethekile okuhloswe ngayo ukufeza ngempumelelo izinjongo zikahulumeni maqondana nezokuhlaliswa kwabantu; ugesi kamasipala; amanzi; imfucuza; ezokuthutha abagibeli; ingqalasizinda yezemfundo nezempilo; ingqalasizinda yobuchwepheshe besimanjemanje, kanye nobugebengu nenkohlakalo.

src_text: Maemong diprofensi sena se tla kengwa ofising ya ditonakgolo.
tgt_text: Isimosakhiwo sohlelo sihlinzeka ngenhlosombono yendima okumele kubhekwane nayo ngqo, sihlinzeka ngolwazi olutholakale ekuhlolweni kwesimo samanje, sichaza kabanzi ngezimo ezisemqoka ezidingekayo ukuze kuzuzwe impumelelo futhi sibalula lokho okudingeka ukuthi kwenziwe ukufezekisa inhlosombono.

src_text: Tlaleho ena boetse fana ka tataiso ya ka moo mafapha tlang ho laola ka yona ditumellano tsa kgiro tsa bo DG..   Ho boetse ho na le diphetoho ho tsela eo ho lekolwang Maemo Tshebetso bo DG hore di tsamaisane le diphetoho tse tokomaneng ena.. 4   Bekeng tlang Letona le Tshwereng Mokobobo la Ditshebeletso tsa Setjhaba, Ntate Thulas Nxesi tla bitsa seboka sa boraditaba ho tla phatlalatsa tsela eo Moralo wa Ntlafatso ya Tsela ya Tshebetso ya Ditshebeletso tsa Mmuso tla kengwa tshebetsong ka teng le ho hlopholla diphetoho tse entsweng dipehelong tsa kgiro ya bo DG..   Tlaleho ya Bohlano ya Kgatelopele ya ho Kengwa Tshebetsong ha Tokomane ya Tshebetso Mabapi le Ditokelo tsa Batho ba sa Itekanelang ya 2020-2021 (WPRPD).
tgt_text: Siphakamisa inqubo yokuqaliswa kokusebenza kohlelo okumele ilandelwe emjikelezweni weminyaka emithathu yohlelo lokusebenza.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana Tlaleho ya Bohlano ya Kgatelopele ya ho Kengwa Tshebetsong ha WPRPD fanang ka kgatelopele ho kengweng tshebetsong ha WPRPD.
tgt_text: Uhlaka Lukazwelonke Lokuqalisa Ukusebenza okuhloswe ngalo ukufezekisa Ukusebenza Ngobungcweti Emkhakheni Wezemisebenzi Kahulumeni.

src_text: Tlaleho ena na le diphehiso ho tswa mafapheng naha le diprofensi kenyeletsang le kabo ya teng ya ditjhelete..   Tlaleho ya pele ne phatlalatswe ka selemo sa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lilugunyazile uHlaka Lukazwelonke Lokuqalisa Ukusebenza okuhloswe ngalo ukufezekisa Ukusebenza Ngobungcweti Emkhakheni Wezemisebenzi Kahulumeni.

src_text: Ena ya bohlano se tjhaetswe monwana hore ka hatiswa bukeng ya diphatlalatso tsa mmuso ke Lefapha la Basadi, Batjha le Batho ba sa Itekanelang..   Diphetoho Karolong ya bo 20(1) ya Tumellano ya ho Fokotsa Kgethollo Kgahlano le Basadi (CEDAW).
tgt_text: Uhlaka lwashicilelwa ngowezi-2021 ukuze kuboniswane nomphakathi ngalo..   Uhlaka luhlinzeka ngezinsika ezinhlanu maqondana nezinhlelo zokungenelela okumele zisetshenziswe ekwenzeni umkhakha wezeMisebenzi Kahulumeni usebenze ngobungcweti.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tliswa Palamenteng ha diphetoho Karolong ya bo 20(1) ya CEDAW ho tla lokiswa.
tgt_text: Lezi zinsika zibandakanya ukuqashwa kwabasebenzi abasha kuhulumeni; ukuhlinzekwa kwabasebenzi abasha ngolwazi oluphathelene nomsebenzi wesikhungo kanye nokujwayezwa kwabo umsebenzi; ukuhlela kanye nokuphathwa kwensebenzo; ukufunda okuqhubekayo nokuthuthukiswa kobungcweti bomsebenzi, nenqubekela phambili emsebenzini kanye nezigameko eziphathelene nomsebenzi.

src_text: Diphetoho tsena di bolela ka ho eketswa ha nako ya dikopano tsa komiti sekasekanang le ditlaleho tsa dinaha tseo leng ditho..   Afrika Borwa ne saene tumellano ena ka 1993 mme ya lokiswa ka Tshitwe.
tgt_text: Izinguquko ezimweni zokuqashwa kwaBaqondisi-Jikelele (o-DG).

src_text: Ho tliswa ha yona Palamenteng ho etsetswa hore tokomane ena kgone ho tsamaisana le diphetoho tsa Karolo ya bo 20(1) ya tumellano ena.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liwugunyazile umbiko ophakamisa izinyathelo zokuqinisa amandla okusebenza o-DG kanye nobungcweti babo bokwenza umsebenzi ngempumelelo.

src_text: Tumellano ya Matjhaba ya Kamohelo ya Mangolo Thuto Phahameng.
tgt_text: Umbiko wenze iziphakamiso eziningana kubandakanya ubude besikhathi esizohlalwa ngo-DG ezikhundleni zabo kanye nokuphathwa kokudluliswa nokwabiwa kwamandla yiSiphathimandla Esiphezulu siwadlulisela ezikhulwini eziphendulayo..   Umbiko uphakamisa ukuthi u-DG oseHhovisi likaMongameli anikezwe isikhundla sokuba yiNhloko Yophiko Lokuphathwa Kwemisebenzi Kahulumeni.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tliswa Palamenteng ha Tumellano ya Matjhaba ya Kamohelo ya Mangolo Thuto Phahameng bakeng sa tokiso.
tgt_text: Ezifundazweni, lo msebenzi uzonikezwa o-DG abasebenza emahhovisi oNdunankulu.

src_text: Ha se lokisitswe tla romelwa ho Matjhaba Kopaneng lekaleng la teng la Thuto, Saense le tsa Botjhaba leng se etswang ho latela Molao wa Naha Laolang Mangolo Thuto Phahameng wa 2008 (Molao wa bo 67 wa 2008).
tgt_text: Umbiko uphakamise futhi nezinyathelo zokuqondisa iminyango maqondana nokuphathwa kwezinkontileka zo-DG.

src_text: Tumellano ena ya Matjhaba maikemisetso yona ke ho netefatsa hore ha ho kgethollo boemong ba matjhaba kamohelong ya mangolo thuto phahameng.
tgt_text: Uhlelo Olubuyekeziwe Lokuphathwa Kokusebenza ko-DG luyabuyekezwa njengamanje ukuze luhanjelaniswe kahle nezinguquko ezigunyaziwe.

src_text: Sena se etsa hore dinaha tseo leng ditho di amohele maemo thuto dinaha tse 193 tseo leng ditho tsa Matjhaba Kopaneng.
tgt_text: 4   Ibamba likaNgqongqoshe Wezemisebenzi Kahulumeni Nokuphathwa Kwayo, uMnu Thulas Nxesi, ngeviki elizayo uzobiza isithangami sabezindaba lapho ezochaza khona ngoHlaka Lukazwelonke Lokuqalisa Ukusebenza okuhloswe ngalo ukufezekisa Ukusebenza Ngobungcweti Emkhakheni wezeMisebenzi Kahulumeni futhi achaze kabanzi nangezinguquko ezigunyaziwe maqondana nezimo zokuqashwa nokusebenza ko-DG.

src_text: 9  Ho tlohelwa ha diphetoho Bukaneng ya Merokotso ya Ditho tsa Kabinete.
tgt_text: Umbiko Wesihlanu Wenqubekela Phambili esiyenziwe Ekuqalisweni Kokusebenza Komthetho Odingidwayo Oqondene Namalungelo Abantu Abanokukhubazeka (i-WPRPD) wezi-2020-.

src_text: 1   Kabinete dumellane le phatlalatso ya ofisi ya Mopresidente ya ka Mantaha wa la 17 Mphalane 2022 ya ho tlohelwa ha diphetoho tse neng di entswe Bukaneng ya Merokotso ya Ditho tsa Kabinete ya.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liwugunyazile uMbiko Wesihlanu Wenqubekela Phambili esiyenziwe Ekuqalisweni Kokusebenza kwe-WPRPD, ohlinzeka ngolwazi lwakamuva maqondana nokuqaliswa kokusebenza kwe-WPRPD.

src_text: 2  Diphetoho tsena tse neng di etswe ka Mmesa 2022, di ne di eketsa merokotso diofising tsa Matona ikarabellang mafapheng fetang le le leng.
tgt_text: Umbiko uqukethe imibono evela eminyagweni kazwelonke kanye neyezifundazwe.

src_text: Di ne di boetse di bolela ha mmuso tla lefella ka botlalo motlakase le metsi moo matona dulang teng.. 3  Kabinete mametse kgoeletso ya setjhaba mme ya nka qeto ya ho lekola diphetoho tsena botjha.
tgt_text: Uhlinzeka ngolwazi lwakamuva maqondana nokuqaliswa kokusebenza kwenqubomgomo okubandakanya nokwabiwa kwezabelomali..   Umbiko wokuqala waminyaka wonke wenqubekela phambili esiyenziwe washicilelwa ngowezi-.

src_text: Ho lekolwa botjha hona ho tla etswa ke komiti ikemetseng mme tlaleho ya teng tla phatlalatswa ho websaete ya Lefapha la Ditshebeletso tsa Mmuso: www.dpsa.gov.za.10  Tshebedisano Diphetohong tsa ho Fokotsa ho Silafala ha Moya (JETP) ha mmoho le Moralo wa Matsete JETP, (JETP-IP).
tgt_text: Umbiko wenqubekela phambili wesihlanu usugunyaziwe ukuthi usungashicilelwa kuSomqulu Kahulumeni futhi ushicilelwe nanguMnyango Wezabesifazane, Intsha kanye Nabantu Abanokukhubazeka.

src_text: 1  Ka mora ho amohela ho phatlalatswa JETP le JETP-IP, Kabinete tjhaetse JETP-IP monwana mme ya leboha le mosebetsi wa ho hlahisa.. 2  JETP-IP hlakisa se hlokahalang ho etswa bakeng sa hore mmuso finyelle maikemisetso ona ho fokotsa ho silafala ha moya ho ka tlisa diphetoho setjhabeng le ho basebeletsi ba amehang.. 3  Komiti ya Matona ya ho Fetoha ha Maemo Lehodimo tla bitsa seboka sa boraditaba haufinyane ho tla fana ka lesedi le eketsehileng   Ditshisinyo tsa Molao.
tgt_text: Ukuchitshiyelwa Kombhalo wama-20(1) Wesivumelwano Esiqondene Nokuqedwa Kwazo Zonke Izinhlobo Zokucwaswa Okubhekiswe Kwabesifazane (i-CEDAW).

src_text: Tshisinyo ya Molao wa Bahwebi ba Dikepeng ya Selemo sa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likugunyazile ukuthunyelwa ePhalamende kwezichibiyelo zoMbhalo wama-20(1) we-CEDAW ukuze zigunyazwe ngokusemthethweni.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tliswa Palamenteng ha Tshisinyo ya Molao wa Bahwebi ba Dikepeng wa Selemo sa 2022 ho ka sekasekwa.
tgt_text: Izichibiyelo zihlinzekela ukwelulwa kwesikhathi semihlangano yamakomidi ecubungula imibiko yemibuso engamalungu.

src_text: Tshisinyo ena ntlafatsa molao wa dilemong tse 70 tse fetileng wa Bahwebi ba Dikepeng wa 1951, (Molao wa bo 57 wa 1951)..   Ha tshisinyo ena se le molao tla fana ka moralo wa taolo ya kgwebo ya dikepeng tla laola le ho ahwa, ho ngodiswa, ho rehwa mabitso le ho behellwa ha dikepe tse tsofetseng ka thoko..   Diphetoho tsena di tla tlisa diphetoho lekaleng lena la dipalangwang tsa mawatleng le ho netefatsa hore naha ena ipapisa le Ditumellano tsa Matjhaba tsa Dipalangwang tsa Mawatleng..   Tshisinyo ya Molao wa Dipalopalo wa Selemo sa.
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika yasisayinda ngowe-1993 lesi sivumelwano futhi emuva kwalokho yasigunyaza ngokusemthethweni ngoZibandlela.

src_text: Kabinete amohetse ho tliswa Palamenteng ha Tshisinyo ya Ntlafatso ya Molao wa Dipalopalo wa Selemo sa 2022 ho tla sekasekwa.
tgt_text: Ukuthunyelwa kwaso ePhalamende kuhloswe ngakho ukuhambelanisa isivumelwano esagunyazwa ngokusemthethweni phambilini nesichibiyelo soMbhalo wama-20(1).

src_text: Tshisinyo ena sisinya diphetoho Molaong wa Dipalopalo wa 1999 (Molao wa bo 6 wa 1999).
tgt_text: Isivumelwano Somhlaba Wonke Sokwamukelwa Ngokusemthethweni Kweziqu eziphathelene Nemfundo Ephakeme .

src_text: Diphetoho tsena di etswa mabapi le ho ralwa ha mmoho le ho kengwa tshebetsong ha Mokgwa wa Tshebetso wa Naha wa Dipalopalo tshehetsang ho sebediswa ha mokgwa wa dipalopalo bontshang bopaki..   Diphetoho tsena di matlafatsa tshebedisano mmoho ya Lefapha la Dipalopalo le makala mang mmuso ha mmoho le ho atolla tshebetso ya Molao ona   Diketsahalo tse tlang.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likugunyazile ukuthunyelwa ePhalamende kweSivumelwano Somhlaba Wonke Sokwamukelwa Ngokusemthethweni Kweziqu eziphathelene Nemfundo Ephakeme ukuze sigunyazwe ngokusemthethweni.

src_text: Seboka sa Mopresidente sa Dikgwebo tse Nyane, tse Mahareng le tse Kgolwanyane (SMME) le Mekgatlo ya Matsema.
tgt_text: Uma sesigunyazwe ngokusemthethweni sizothunyelwa kwiNhlangano Yezemfundo, Ezesayensi Nezamasiko yeNhlangano Yezizwe (i-UN) futhi siqalise ukusebenza nakuleli lizwe ngaphansi koMthetho Wohlaka Lweziqu Lukazwelonke, wezi-2008 (uMthetho wama-67 wezi-2008).

src_text: Lefapha la Ntshetsopele ya Dikgwebo tse Nyane ka kopanelo le lekala le ikemetseng ba tla tshwara Seboka sa Naha sa Mopresidente sa di-SMME le Mekgatlo ya Matsema mane Bryanston, Gauteng ho tloha ka la 13 ho ya ka la 15 Pudungwana.
tgt_text: 2   Isivumelwano Somhlaba Wonke sisungula imigomo-jikelele ezosetshenziswa kuwo wonke amazwe maqondana nokwamukelwa ngokusemthethweni kweziqu zemfundo ephakeme kanye nezinye iziqu, ngendlela engenakho ukwenzelela, esobala futhi engenakho ukucwasa.
Isivumelwano sivumela ukwamukelwa ngokusemthethweni kweziqu zemfundo ezitholwe emazweni angaphandle, emibusweni engamalungu e-UN eyi-.

src_text: Seboka sena se tla kopanya ditsebi ho tswa ho mmuso le lekaleng le ikemetseng ho tla bontshana ka tsela tsa ntlafatso lekaleng lena.
tgt_text: Ukuhoxiswa kwezichibiyelo zoMhlahlandlela Wamalungu Esigungu Seziphathimandla.

src_text: Hara ba lebeletsweng ke mekgatlo ya dikgwebo, ba sebetsang ka di-SMME, barutehi, bangodi ba melawana le ba mekgatlo ya tshehetso ya ditjhelete..   Sebokeng sena ho tla boela ho sekasekwe Moralo wa Kopanelo wa Ntshetsopele ya Dikgwebo tse Nyane oo ka ona ho ikemiseditsweng ho matlafatsa lekala lena la di-SMME.
tgt_text: 1  IKhabhinethi lisigunyazile isimemezelo esenziwe yiHhovisi likaMongameli ngoMsombuluko mhla ziyi-17 kuMfumfu 2022 sokuthi kuhoxiswe izichibiyelo ezenziwe kuMhlahlandlela Wamalungu Esigungu Seziphathimandla, futhi obizwa ngeBhukwana Elingumhlahlandlela woNgqongqoshe wezi-.

src_text: Seboka sena hape ho lebeletswe hore se thakgole le taba ya Dikgau tsa Selemo le Selemo tsa Mopresidente tsa di-SMME..   Seboka sa Mopresidente sa Twantsho tsa Tlhekefetso ya Basadi le Dipolao tsa Bona (GBVF) sa Selemo sa.
tgt_text: 2  Izichibiyelo ezenziwe ngoMbasa 2022 bezihlinzekela amandla angeziwe emahhovisi athile oNgqongqoshe abengamele iminyango kahulumeni engaphezu kowodwa.

src_text: Mopresidente Ramaphosa tla tshwara Seboka sa bobedi sa GBVF mane Gallagher Convention Centre, Gauteng ka la 1 le la 2 Pudungwana.
tgt_text: Futhi beziyalela ukuba uMbuso uthwale ngokuphelele zonke izindleko eziqondene nokuhlinzekwa kukagesi namanzi ezindlini zombuso okuhlala kuzona amalungu esigungu seziphathimandla.. 3  IKhabhinethi likuphawulile ukukhathazeka okuzwakaliswe ngumphakathi futhi lathatha isinqumo sokubuyekeza uMhlahlandlela Wamalungu Esigungu Seziphathimandla.

src_text: Seboka sa pele se ne se tshwarwe ka selemo sa 2018 seo ho sona mmuso le mekgatlo ya setjhaba ba neng ba etse boinehelo ba ho fokotsa ditlhekefetso tsena naheng ena..   Seboka sena sa bobedi ka sona ho tla shejwa tema seng kgathilwe ho kenyeng tshebetsong Moralo wa Naha wa GBVF.
tgt_text: Le nqubo izosingathwa wuhlaka oluzimele olungathathi hlangothi futhi uma seyiphothuliwe, umhlahlandlela uzokwaziswa emphakathini ngokusebenzisa iwebhusayithi yoMnyango Wezemisebenzi Kahulumeni Nokuphathwa Kwayo: www.dpsa.gov.za.

src_text: Lepetjo la selemong sena le tla re: “Re Tiisa Boikarabelo, ho Patlakiswa le ho Matlafatswa HONA JWALE”..   Seboka sena se tla buisana ka taba tse kenyeletsang boikarabelo mafapheng ikarabellang ha mmoho le bankakarolo ba kang mekgatlo ya setjhaba, lekala le ikemetseng le ya basebetsi..   Imbizo ya Bohlano ya Mopresidente leba Kapa Leboya.
tgt_text: Ubambiswano Loguquko Olunobuqotho Nobulungiswa Kwezamandla (i-JETP) kanye noHlelo Lotshalomali lwe-JETP (i-JETP-IP).

src_text: Imbizo ya Bohlano ya Mopresidente ya Ntlafatso ya Ditereke (DDM) tlo tshwarelwa Upington, Kapa Leboya ka Labohlano la la 21 Mphalane 2022 lebaleng la dipapadi la Mxolisi Dicky Jacobs..   Imbizo ena ya Mopresidente ya DDM tlo lekola kgatelo pele le diphephetso tse teng phanong ya ditshebeletso Kapa Leboya mme ho be le mekgwa ya tharollo.
tgt_text: 1    Emuva kokwamukela isethulo esiqondene ne-JETP kanye ne-JETP-IP, iKhabhinethi liyigunyazile i-JETP-IP futhi lizwakalise ukuwuthokozela umsebenzi onohlonze futhi obanzi owenziwayo ukwakha nokuthuthukisa i-JETP-IP.. 2     I-JETP-IP ichaza kabanzi ngotshalomali oludingekayo ukufezekisa izibophezelo ezenziwe nguHulumeni waseNingizimu Afrika zokuncishiswa kwezinukubezimkhathi, ngenkathi ngakolunye uhlangothi kugqugquzelwa intuthuko esimeme, futhi kuqinisekiswa uguquko olunobuqotho nobulungiswa kubasebenzi nemiphakathi ethintekile.

src_text: DDM netefatsa ho potlakiswa ha moralo wa phano ya ditshebeletso, ho kengwa ha lona tshebetsong ha mmoho le kabo ya teng ya ditjhelete..   Pele ho imbizo ena, matona, ditho tsa moifo wa bommasepala le boramotse ba tla tshwara mananeo fapafapaneng sebakeng seo sa Upington..   Tlaleho ya Hara Selemo ya Kabo ya Matlotlo (MTBPS).
tgt_text: Ikomidi loNgqongqoshe Beminyango Ehlukahlukene Elethweswe Umsebenzi Wokubhekana Nokuguquguquka Kwesimo Sezulu lizobamba isithangami sabezindaba khona maduze nje ukuze lihlinzeke ngemininingwane ethe xaxa   Imithethosivivinywa.

src_text: Kabinete kgolwa hore ho fana ka MTBPS ya selemo sa 2022 ke Letona la Matlotlo Enoch Godongwana ka Laboraro la la 26 Mphalane 2022, ke karolo ya mehato ya bohlokwa ya ho beha tsohle pepeneng ha re tla kabong ya matlotlo..   MTBPS fana ka tlaleho ya boinehelo ba mmuso ba ho bontsha ka moo matlotlo naha sebediswang ka teng boetse bontsha le ka moo mmuso tlang ho leka ho fokotsa sekgeo pakeng tsa tjhelete kenang le sebediswang..   Ditlhahlobo tsa Sehlopha sa Leshome.
tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa Wezokuhweba Ngemikhumbi wezi-.

src_text: Ditlhahlobo tsa Makgaolakgang tsa Sehlopha sa Leshome tsa selemo sa 2022 di tlo qala ka la 31 Mphalane mme di fele ka la 7 Tshitwe.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi selikugunyazile ukuthunyelwa ePhalamende koMthethosivivinywa Wezokuhweba Ngemikhumbi wezi-2022 ukuze kuqhutshekwe nokuwucubungula.

src_text: Kabinete lakaletsa baithuti bana ba Selemo sa 2022 mahlohonolo ditlhahlobong tsa bona.
tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa ulungisa kabusha uMthetho Wezokuhweba Ngemikhumbi, wonyaka we-1951 (uMthetho wama-57 wonyaka we-1957) osekuphele iminyaka engama-70 ukhona.

src_text: Tshehetso ya matitjhere, batswadi le bahlokomedi tla thusa baithuti bana ho shebana le ditlhahlobo tsa bona ka boitshepo..   Kabinete etsa kgoeletso ho batswadi le bahlokomedi ho kgothatsa le ho thusa bana hore ba kgone ho ithuta hantle malapeng..   Seboka sa Moralo wa Naha wa Ntsetsopele (NDP) le Bokgoni ba Mmuso.
tgt_text: Uma usuphasisiwe, uMthethosivivinywa uzohlinzeka ngohlaka olusemthethweni lwezokuhweba ngemikhumbi oluzolawula umsebenzi wonkana ophathelene nokusebenza kwemikhumbi yokuhweba.

src_text: Lefapha la Ditshebeletso tsa Setjhaba ka kopanelo le Komeshene ya Naha ya Meralo ka tshebedisano mmoho le lekala la Ntshetsopele Yunivesithing ya Kwa Zulu-Natal di tla tshwara seboka sa NDP le Bokgoni ba Mmuso ho tloha ka la 7 ho ya ho la 9 Pudungwana 2022 lekaleng la Howard College la Yunivesithi ena ya KwaZulu-Natal..   Seboka sena se tla hlahloba bokgoni ba mmuso le tshebetso ya ona dilemong tse leshome tsa pele tsa NDP.
tgt_text: Uzolawula, phakathi kokunye, isimokwakhiwa, ukubhaliswa, ukuqanjwa kwemikhumbi amagama kanye nokwesulwa kwayo.

src_text: Lepetjo la seboka sena ke le reng: “Re Lekola Tshebetso le Bokgoni ba Mmuso Dilemong tse Leshome tsa NDP”.
tgt_text: Lezi zinguquko zizolekelela ekuvuseleleni umkhakha wezithuthi zasolwandle futhi ngokunjalo zihambelanise izwe neSivumelwano Senhlangano Yamazwe Ngamazwe Yezasolwandle.

src_text: Ho Nehelanwa ka Lengolo la Bopaki ba Borena ho Morena Misuzulu KaZwelithini.
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika seyisigunyazile ngokusemthethweni lesi sivumelwano.

src_text: Mopresidente Ramaphosa tla fana ka Lengolo la Bopaki ba Borena ho Morena Misuzulu KaZwelithini mane Lebaleng la Dipapadi la Moses Mabhida, Thekong, ka Moqebelo wa la 29 Mphalane..   Mokete ona latela wa setso bitswang “Ukungena eSibayeni” neng tshwarwe ka la 20 Phato 2022 neng paka ho nka ha hae setulo sa borena ba setjhaba sa Mazulu   MelaetsaDitebohoKabinete lebisa diteboho le ditakaletso tse ntle ho: Ntate Sam Matekane, ya thonyeditsweng ho ba Tonakgolo ya Mmuso wa Lesotho.

Kabinete boetse ikopanya le Moifo wa Mokgatlo wa Dinaha tsa Afrika neng Behile Dikgetho tsa Palamenteng ya Lesotho ka la 7 Mphalane 2022 leihlo, mme thoholetsa naha eo ka botsitso ba yona ho tsa dipolotiki ka ho tshwara dikgetho tseo ka katleho.
tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa Wokuchibiyela Ezezibalomanani wezi-.

src_text: Afrika Borwa ntse ikemiseditse ho tiisa maqhama yona tshebedisano le dinaha tsa sedika, kontinete ha mmoho le tsa matjhaba..   MatshedisoKabinete fetisetsa matshediso yona ho malapa le metswalle ya: Ntate Fatere Albert Nolan (88), Moprista ya neng inehetse haholo wa Afrika Borwa wa Kereke Katolike ya neng sa tshabe ho hlahisa maikutlo hae ka tsa tumelo nakong ya kgethollo ya mmala.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likugunyazile ukuthunyelwa ePhalamende koMthethosivivinywa Wokuchibiyela Ezezibalomanani wezi-2022 ukuze kuqhutshekwe nokuwucubungula.

src_text: Ka selemo sa 2003, Mopresidente wa ka nako eo Thabo Mbeki ne mo tlotle ka Kgau ya Silivera ya Order of Luthuli ka kabelo ya hae ntweng ya demokrasi ya naha ena le ho lwanela toka le ditokelo tsa botho nakong ya kgethollo ya mmala”   Kgiro.
tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa uphakamisa ukuchitshiyelwa koMthetho Wezezibalomanani, wonyaka we-1999 (uMthetho wesi-6 wonyaka we-1999).

src_text: Pele batho bohle ba hirwa, ho tla hlahlobisiswa mangolo bona thuto le mang hlokahalang   Moatevokate James Mlawu – Molaodi Kakaretso, Lefapheng la Dipalangwang   Ntate Shabeer Khan – Motsamaise Moholo wa Ditjhelete: Lefapheng la Matlotlo.
tgt_text: Izichibiyelo zihlinzekela ukwakhiwa nokuqaliswa kokusebenza koHlelo Lwezibalomanani Lukazwelonke olweseka izinqumo ezisekelwe phezu kobufakazi.

src_text: Kabinete dumellana le ho hirwa ha batho ba latelang:.
tgt_text: Ziqinisa ukusebenza ngendlela ehambelanayo okukhona njengamanje phakathi koPhiko Lwezibalomanani lwaseNingizimu Afrika kanye nezinye izinhlaka zombuso, futhi zelula uhlaka lokulawula loMthetho   Imicimbi Ezayo.

src_text: Ditho tsa Boto ya Afrika Borwa ya tsa Bohahlaudi   Ngaka Nondumiso Maphazi (Modula Setulo)   Ngaka Aubrey Mhlongo (Motlatsi wa Modula Setulo)   Mme Pretty Ntombela   Mme Nomahlubi Mazwai   Ntate Odwa Mtati   Ntate Ravi Nadasen kgethilwe hape)   Ntate Enver Duminy kgethilwe hape)   Mme Nandipha Mzileni Mbulawa   Ntate Mduduzi Zakwe kgethilwe hape)   Mme Rosemary Anderson   Mme Lehlohonolo Rapodile; lel.
tgt_text: INgqungquthela Kazwelonke kaMongameli Yezamabhizinisi Asafufusa (ama-SMME) Nemifelandawonye.

src_text: Mme Nonkqubela Silulwane (Moemedi wa Lefapha).
tgt_text: UMnyango Wezokuthuthukiswa Kwamabhizinisi Amancane, ngokubambisana nababambiqhaza bomkhakha ozimele, uzosingatha iNgqungquthela Kazwelonke kaMongameli yezama-SMME Nemifelandawonye e-Bryanston, e-Gauteng kusukela mhla ziyi-13 kuya kumhla ziyi-15 kuLwezi..   Ingqungquthela izoqoqela ndawonye ababambiqhaza abasemqoka bomkhakha ozimele nabomkhakha kahulumeni embonini yonkana yezamabhizinisi asafufusa ukuze kubhungwe maqondana nokuthola izindlela zokubambisana ekuqiniseni lo mkhakha.

src_text: Ditho tsa Boto ya Koporasi ya Taolo ya Mebila   Ngaka Eddie Mogalefi Thebe kgethilwe hape)   Mme Thandi Clara Thankge kgethilwe hape)   Moprofesara Maredi Mphahlele   Mme Nomusa Mufamadi (Modulasetulo)   Moatevokate Xola Stemela   Mme Lerato Magalo   Moprofesara Chitja Twala   Ntate Nkumeleni John Kudzingana   Mme Jaxa (Setho sa keketso); le   Mme HM Mbanyele-Ntshinga (Setho sa keketso).
tgt_text: Ababambiqhaza abalindeleke kule ngqungquthela babandakanya izinhlangano zosomabhizinisi, ongoti bezama-SMME, izifundiswa, abenzi bezinqubomgomo kanye nezikhungo ezixhaza ngezimali zentuthuko.

src_text: Ntate Tshepo Monaheng – Motsamaisi ya ka Sehloohong (CEO): Khamphane ya Naha ya Meru (Tumellano ya kgiro ekeditswe ka dilemo tse tharo.
tgt_text: Ingqungquthela izobhunga futhi nangoHlelongqangi Lukazwelonke Oludidiyelwe Lwezokuthuthukiswa Kwamabhizinisi Amancane, oluhlinzeka ngohlaka lwamasu lokuqinisa umkhakha wezama-SMME.

src_text: Ntate Reginald Lavhelesani Demana – CEO: Mokgatlo wa Naha wa Afrika Borwa wa Taolo ya Mebila..   Mme Ditebogo Kgomo – CEO: Taolo ya Naha ya Nuclear.
tgt_text: Ingqungquthela kulindeleke futhi ukuthi yethule uMcimbi Waminyaka Yonke Kazwelonke kaMongameli Wokuklomelisa Ngezindondo ama-SMME Avelele.

src_text: Ntate Risenga Maluleka – Radipalopalo Moholo (Tumellano ya kgiro ekeditswe).
tgt_text: Ukusingathwa Kwengqungquthela kaMongameli Yodlame Olweyamene Nobulili Nokubulawa Kwabantu Besifazane (i-GBVF) yowezi-.

src_text: Mme Kedibone Olga Madiehe – CEO: Mokgatlo wa Taolo ya Penshene ya Basebeletsi ba Mmuso.
tgt_text: UMongameli u-Ramaphosa uzosingatha iNgqungquthela yesibili kaMongameli ye-GBVF e-Gallagher Convention Centre e-Gauteng mhla lu-1 nomhla zi-2 kuLwezi.

src_text: Issues in the environment.
tgt_text: Ingqungquthela kaMongameli mayelana noDlame Olubhekiswe Kwabobulili Obuthile Nokubulawa Kwabesifazane (i-GBVF).

src_text: Presidential Summit on Gender-Based Violence and Femicide (GBVF).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lamukele ukusingathwa kweNgqungquthela yesibili kaMongameli ye-GBVF e-Gallagher Estate e-Midrand, e-Gauteng mhla lu-1 nomhla zi-2 kuLwezi 2022 ngaphansi kwesiqubulo esithi: "Ukuziphendulela, Ukusheshisa kanye Nokukhulisa, NJENGAMANJE!".

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the hosting of the second Presidential Summit on GBVF at the Gallagher Estate in Midrand, Gauteng on 1 and 2 November 2022 under the theme: “Accountability, Acceleration and Amplification, NOW!”.
tgt_text: Ingqungquthela ibheke inqubekelaphambili esiyenziwe ekuqalisweni kwezimemezelo ezethulwa ngesikhathi seNgqungquthela kaMongameli yowezi-2018, eyayiqinisekisa ukuzinikela kwezwe ohlelweni lokubhekana ne-GBVF oluhlangene, olucacile futhi olusebenzayo.

src_text: The summit reflected on progress made in the implementation of declarations proposed during the 2018 Presidential Summit, which reaffirmed the country’s commitment to united, comprehensive and effective response to GBVF..
tgt_text: Ababambiqhaza kule ngqungquthela yezinsuku ezimbili baziphendulela ngomsebenzi osuwenziwe ekuqaliseni ukusebenza koHlelo Lwamasu Lukazwelonke (i-NSP) oluqondene ne-GBVF, oluhlose ukuhlinzeka ngenqubomgomo yeqhingasu emikhakha-miningi, ehlangene kanye nohlaka lokuhlela ukuqinisa indlela kazwelonke edidiyelwe yokubhekana nenkinga ye-GBVF kuhulumeni nasezweni lonkana..     Ingqungquthela bekuyinkundla ekahle yokuxoxisana kabanzi nangeqiniso ngempumelelo nangezinselele ezikhona ekulweni ne-GBVF.

src_text: Participants at the two-day summit accounted for work being done towards the implementation of the National Strategic Plan (NSP) on GBVF, which aims to provide multi-sectoral, coherent strategic policy and programming framework to strengthen coordinated national response to the crisis of GBVF by the government and country as whole..
tgt_text: Iphinde yabonisa isidingo sesinyathelo esisodwa nokuthi impumelelo ebonakalayo ingazuzwa kanjani uma kuhlinzekwe ngezinsizakusebenza ezanele futhi zaphathwa ngendlela eqondile.

src_text: The summit was the ideal platform to engage in honest and robust discussions around successes and challenges in the fight against GBVF.
tgt_text: Izivumelwano okufinyelelwe kuzona engqungqutheleni zibonise ukubaluleka kokubambisana phakathi kukahulumeni nomphakathi, amabhizinisi, ozakwabo kwezokuthuthukisa, umkhakha wezenkolo kanye neminye imikhakha ukuze babambisane ekulweni nesihlava se-GBVF..     Ezinye izingenelelo zivumelane ngokubandakanywa kwesidingo sokwabiwa koxhasomali olwanele ku-NSP ye-GBVF, ukuze kuzoqaliswa ukusebenza kwezindlela zokuphatha ezilandelayo ukuqinisekisa ukuziphendulela, kanye nokuqinisa izinhlaka zokuziphendulela kuzwelonke, esifundazweni nakohulumeni basekhaya..     IKhabhinethi likuphindile ukuthi zonke izenzo zodlame nokuhlukumeza ngeke zibekezelelwe emphakathini wakithi.

src_text: It also showcased the need for collective action and how significant success can be achieved if adequate resources are provided and managed correctly.
tgt_text: Imiphakathi iyanxuswa ukuthi ilwisane ngqo nalesi sihlava se-GBVF ngokubika izigilamkhuba kwabezomthetho.

src_text: The agreements reached at the summit have demonstrated the importance of the partnership that government has forged with civil society, business, development partners, the faith-based sector and other sectors to work together to deal with the scourge of GBVF..
tgt_text: Umkhakha ngamunye emphakathini wakithi kufanele udlale indima yawo ngokwenza izimo ezenza kube nzima kakhulu, noma kungenzeki nhlobo, ukuthi i-GBVF ikhule.

src_text: Some of the interventions agreed upon included the need to allocate adequate funding to the NSP on GBVF, to implement consequence management mechanisms to ensure accountability, and to strengthen national, provincial and local accountability structures..
tgt_text: Ezokuphepha Nokuvikeleka .

src_text: Cabinet reiterated that all acts of violence and abuse will not be tolerated in our society.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liqinisekise umphakathi ukuthi uPhiko Lukazwelonke Lwezokusebenza Ngokuhlanganyela Nezobunhloli (i-NATJOINTS) — olwakhiwe iminyango kahulumeni eyahlukene eholwa i-Ejensi Yezokuvikelela Kombuso, uPhiko Lwamaphoyisa aseNingizimu Afrika kanye noMbutho Kazwelonke Wezokuvikela eNingizimu Afrika — inekhono lobunhloli lokubhekana nezinsongo ezibhekiswe kwezokuvikeleka kuzwelonke, kubandakanya nobuphekula.

src_text: Communities are urged to tackle the scourge of GBVF head-on by reporting perpetrators to law-enforcement agencies.
tgt_text: Ngokusebenza kwe-NATJOINTS, ukuvikeleka kwezwe kuhlolisiswa njalo nje kubhekwe izinsongo ezingaba khona kwezokuvikeleka kwezwe.

src_text: Each sector of our society must play its part by creating conditions that make it difficult, if not impossible, for GBVF to thrive.
tgt_text: Njengengxenye yezivumelwano zokusebenzisana namanye ama-ejensi ezobunhloli akwamanye amazwe, iNingizimu Afrika nayo iyazuza ekwabelananeni ngolwazi lobunhloli oluyilona oluzoqinisekisa ukuphepha kwesizwe.

src_text: Safety and security .

Cabinet has reassured the public that the National Joint Operational and Intelligence Structure (NATJOINTS) – which comprises various government departments led by the State Security Agency, South African Police Service and South African National Defence Force – has an intelligence-driven capacity to deal with threats to our national security, including terrorism.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi licela umphakathi ukuthi uhlale uqaphile futhi ubike kwabomthetho izenzo ezisolisayo nezingekho emthethweni.

src_text: Through NATJOINTS, the security of the country is assessed regularly for any possible security threat.
tgt_text: Ungathuli nje; uma ubona okuthile, yisho okuthile — sisonke singagcina isizwe siphephile.

src_text: As part of the cooperation agreements with other intelligence agencies from other countries, South Africa also benefits from the exchange of relevant intelligence information that can ensure the safety of the nation..
tgt_text: ISitatimende Senqubomgomo Yesabelomali Sesikhathi Esiphakathi (i-MTBPS) sowezi-.

src_text: Cabinet calls on the public to remain vigilant and to report any suspicious and illegal activities to law enforcement agencies.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lamukele imizamo eqatha eyethulwe kwi-2022 MTBPS ukubuyisela ukuqina kwezimali zikahulumeni, njengoba umnotho womhlaba ubheke esimweni esiyingozi kakhulu..     Izinyathelo ezamenyezelwa uNgqongqoshe Wezezimali u-Enoch Godongwana ePhalamende, eKapa ngoLwesithathu, mhla wama-26 kuMfumfu 2022, zabandakanya ukunciphisa kakhulu ukuntuleka kwesabelomali ukuze kuzothuthukiswa uhlaka lwethu lwezezimali, kwesekwe isimo sethu sezomnotho kanye nokunika abantu baseNingizimu Afrika iqholo kumathemba esikhathi esizayo somnotho wethu.

src_text: Do not keep quiet; if you see something, say something – together we can keep the nation safe.
tgt_text: Ukwenyuka okuhleliwe kwezinqolobane eziphuthumayo kuzosivumela ukuthi sibhekane nezimo eziphuthumayo ezifana nenhlekelele edalwa imvelo.

src_text: 2022 Medium-Term Budget Policy Statement (MTBPS).
tgt_text: I-2022 MTBPS iphinde ikhuthaze lokho esikubeke eqhulwini kwingqalasizinda kanye nezinhlelo zokulethwa kwezidingonqangi, futhi ihlinzeka usizo olwengeziwe lokweseka abahlwempu nababuthakathaka esizweni sakithi..     IKhabhinethi licela yonke imikhakha yezenhlalo-mnotho ukuthi isebenzisane nohulumeni ukuthuthukisa umnotho wethu ukuze kuzokwenziwa ngcono izimpilo zezakhamuzi kulolonke izwe.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the bold measures introduced in the 2022 MTBPS to restore the health of our public finances, just as the world economy is taking dangerous turn for the worse..
tgt_text: Ubudlelwano phakathi kweNingizimu Afrika ne-Spain.

src_text: The steps announced by Finance Minister Enoch Godongwana in Parliament, Cape Town on Wednesday, 26 October 2022, included narrowing our budget deficit greatly to improve our fiscal framework, support our economic standing and give South Africans every confidence in the future prospects of our economy.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liwamukele umphumela Wokuvakasha Okusemthethweni eNingizimu Afrika kukaNgqongqoshe Wombuso wase-Spain u-Pedro Sánchez Pérez-Castejón ukuzoqinisa amaxhama phakathi kwala mazwe amabili.

src_text: The planned increase in contingency reserves allows us to deal with emergencies such as natural disasters.
tgt_text: UNgqongqoshe ubephelezelwa uNgqongqoshe Wase-Spain Wezezimboni, Ezohwebo kanye Nezokuvakasha, uNks Reyes Maroto, kanye nezithunywa zezamabhizinisi.

src_text: The 2022 MTBPS further boosts our key priorities of infrastructure and service-delivery programmes, and provides additional relief to support the poor and vulnerable in our nation..
tgt_text: Lolu hambo luvule amathuba emikhakheni eyehlukene yaseNingizimu Afrika ukuthi ihlangane nozakwabo base-Spain kanye nokuqinisa amaxhama kwezohwebo nakutshalomali, isayensi nokuqamba kabusha, ubuciko namasiko, ezemidlalo nezemfundo.

src_text: Cabinet calls on all socio-economic sectors to partner with the government to uplift our economy to improve the lives of our citizens across the country.
tgt_text: Lolu hambo lukhuthaze utshalomali lwakuleli lizwe kanye nogqozi lokukhula komnotho.

src_text: South Africa – Spain relations.
tgt_text: Izingxoxo zokuletha ukuthula e-Tigray ese-Ethiopia.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the outcome of the Official Visit to South Africa by Prime Minister Pedro Sánchez Pérez-Castejón of Spain to solidify the already strong relations between the two countries.
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika ngaphansi kweso leNhlangano Yamazwe ase-Afrika, isingathe izingxoxo ezisemthethweni zokuthula phakathi kwezinhlangothi ezilwayo kudweshu olusesifundeni sase-Tigray e-Ethiopia, kusuka mhla wama-25 kuya mhla wama-30 kuMfumfu.

src_text: The Prime Minister was accompanied by the Spanish Minister for Industry, Trade and Tourism, Ms Reyes Maroto, and business delegation.

The visit created opportunities for various South African sectors to meet with their Spanish counterparts and to deepen cooperation in trade and investment, science and innovation, arts and culture, sports and education.
tgt_text: Izingxoxo beziholwa nguMongameli waphambilini wase-Nigeria u-Olusegun Obasanjo, uMongameli waphambilini wase-Kenya u-Uhuru Kenyatta kanye nePhini likaMongameli laphambilini uPhumzile Mlambo-Ngcuka.

src_text: This visit provided another boost to the country’s investment and economic growth drive.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lidlulise ukweseka kwayo isisombululo sodweshu esinokuthula nesisimeme, ngokuhambisana nezinjongo zenqubomgomo yamazwe angaphandle yaseNingizimu Afrika zokuba nezwekazi eliphephile nelingenadweshu     Izinqumo zeKhabhinethi.

src_text: Ethiopia – Tigray Peace Talks.
tgt_text: UHlaka Lweqhingasu Lukazwelonke Oludidiyelwe Lokuthuthukisa Amabhizinisi Amancane (i-NISED).

src_text: South Africa, under the auspices of the African Union, hosted formal peace talks between the warring sides in the conflict in Ethiopia's Tigray region, from 25 to 30 October.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligunyaze ukuqaliswa kokusebenza koHlaka Lweqhingasu lwe-NISED.
IQhingasu Elididiyelwe Lokugqugquzela Ukuvulwa Kwamabhizinisi Nokuthuthukiswa Kwamabhizinisi Amancane (i-ISPESE) lokuqala lwamukelwa ngowezi-.

src_text: The dialogue was facilitated by Nigeria’s former President Olusegun Obasanjo, Kenya's former President Uhuru Kenyatta and South Africa's former Deputy President Phumzile Mlambo-Ngcuka.
tgt_text: I-ISPESE ne-NISED elandelayo ziphumelelisa uMthetho Odingidwayo wangowe-1995 woHlaka Lweqhingasu Lukazwelonke Lokuthuthukisa Nokugqugquzela Amabhizinisi Amancane eNingizimu Afrika.

src_text: Cabinet expressed its support for peaceful and sustainable solution to the conflict, in line with South Africa’s foreign policy objectives of secure and conflict-free continent   Cabinet Decisions.
tgt_text: UHlaka Lweqhingasu lwe-NISED luhlinzeka ngeqhingasu elididiyelwe ukuqinisa nokweseka ukuvulwa kwamabhizinisi amancane naphakathi.

src_text: National Integrated Small Enterprise Development (NISED) Strategic Framework.
tgt_text: Luhlinzeka ngohlaka lokuxhumanisa bonke ababambiqhaza abahamba phambili ekuthuthukisweni kwamabhizinisi amancane kuya kwaphakathi.

src_text: Cabinet approved the NISED Strategic Framework for implementation.
The initial Integrated Strategy for the Promotion of Entrepreneurship and Small Enterprises (ISPESE) was adopted in.
tgt_text: NgoMbasa kulo nyaka, iKhabhinethi lagunyaza ukushicilelwa kohlaka lweqhingasu olusahlongozwa lwe-NISED ukuze umphakathi uzophawula ngalo.

src_text: The ISPESE and the subsequent NISED give effect to the 1995 White Paper on the National Strategy for the Development and Promotion of Small Business in South Africa.
tgt_text: Ngokuxoxisana kabanzi, leli qhingasu lathuthukiswa kakhulu yimibono yomphakathi kanye neyoMkhandlu Kazwelonke Wezokuthuthukiswa Komnotho Nezabasebenzi, okungumkhandlu ohlanganise amabhizinisi, umphakathi, ezabasebenzi, izifundiswa kanye nohulumeni ohlose ukubhekana nezinkinga zomnotho, ezabasebenzi nezentuthuko kanye nezinye izinselele ezihlobene nalokhu ezibhekene naleli lizwe.

src_text: The NISED Strategic Framework provides an integrated strategy to strengthen and support entrepreneurship for small and medium-sized enterprises.
tgt_text: INqubomgomo Esahlongozwa Ngezinsizakalo Zokuthuthukiswa Kwezenhlalo Yabantu Abaphila Nokukhubazeka.

src_text: It provides structured coordination framework for all key ecosystem role players in small to medium enterprise development.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligunyaze ukushicilelwa kweNqubomgomo esahlongozwa Ngezinsizakalo Zokuthuthukiswa Kwezenhlalo Yabantu Abaphila Nokukhubazeka ukuze umphakathi uzophawula ngawo.
Le nqubomgomo iphumelelisa uMthetho Osadingidwa Wamalungelo Abantu Abaphila Nokukhubazeka kanye neSivumelwano seZizwe Ezibumbene (i-UN) samaLungelo Abantu Abaphila Nokukhubazeka (i-UNCPRD).

src_text: In April this year, Cabinet approved the publication of the draft NISED strategic framework for public comment.
tgt_text: INqubomgomo ingumhlahlandlela woMnyango Wezokuthuthukiswa Komphakathi ekuhlinzekeni ngezinsizakalo zawo kubantu abaphila nokukhubazeka kanye nemindeni yabo.

src_text: Through the wide consultations, the strategy was enhanced by inputs from the public and from the National Economic Development and Labour Council, which is forum comprising business, civil society, labour, academics and government that seeks to deal with economic, labour and development issues and related challenges facing the country.
tgt_text: Icacisa imingcele yesimondawo kanye nemigoqo eqhubekayo nokubeka eceleni nokushiya ngaphandle abantu abaphila nokukhubazeka emphakathini owejwayelekile, nasekubambeni iqhaza ezintweni zomphakathi nezomnotho.

src_text: Draft Policy on Social Development Services to Persons with Disabilities.
tgt_text: Ihlongoza izindlela zokuqapha ezizoqinisekisa ukulandelela eduze kokuqaliswa kokusebenza kwayo kanye nezingenelelo ezihlangene ngaphakathi eminyangweni efanele.
